[\[42a.4\]]sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/_de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim
[\[42a.5\]]gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_bsti stong [#]du byas/_mchod par byas te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ci rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/_gsol
[\[42a.6\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_rnam par gzhog
[\[42a.7\]]pa dang /_rab tu gzhog pa dang /_'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_gsal [#]bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par ston pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/_de'i bsod nams [#]mang du 'phel lo/_/rab 'byor gal te
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs
[\[42b.2\]]pa la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang [#]la la zhig gis rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_bsti stang du byas/_mchod par byas te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rigs
[\[42b.3\]]kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha
[\[42b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_rnam par gzhog pa dang /_rab tu gzhog pa dang /_'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_gsal bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par ston pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas
[\[42b.5\]]rnam par spyod na/_de'i bsod nams [#]mang du 'phel lo/_/rab 'byor gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gang ji snyed [#]pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/_de dag rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa
[\[42b.6\]]dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_
[\[42b.7\]]rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de de'i rgyus bsod nams
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa
[\[43a.2\]]dang /_'chad pa dang /_rnam par gzhog pa dang /_rab tu gzhog pa dang /_'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_gsal bar byed pa dang [#]/_yang dag par ston na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
[\[43a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par 'byed pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gro ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par byang
[\[43a.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa de lta bu ni sems can gang la yang med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byams pa chen po mngon par bsgrubs te[#]/_de dag shes rab kyi
[\[43a.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can thams cad gsad [#]par 'gyur ba dang 'dra bar blta [#]ste/_de dag snying rje chen po thob [#]bo/_/de dag gnas pa des gnas pa na dga' bas rab tu dga' ba dang /_mngon par dga' bar 'gyur te/_de dag [#]dga' ba chen po mngon par sgrub [#]
[\[43a.6\]]po/_/de dag mtshan ma de dag [#]lhan cig tu mi gnas te/_de dag btang snyoms chen po 'thob bo/_/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba chen po ste/_'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[43a.7\]]dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyang sems can thams
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa[#]/_de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par spyod pa'i phyir/_su'i gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo
[\[43b.2\]]byad la yongs su spyod pa'i gtong ba dang /_sbyin bdag gi sbyin pa dag par 'gyur te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod par kham gyi [#]bsod snyoms la yongs su spyad par 'dod pa dang /_
[\[43b.3\]]sems can thams cad kyi lam bstan par 'dod pa dang /_snang ba chen po dbyung [#]bar 'dod pa dang /_khams gsum gyi btson ra na gnas pa'i sems can rnams yongs su dgrol bar 'dod pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi mig bskyed par 'dod pas shes rab kyi
[\[43b.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas [#]rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gnas par bya'o/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid [#]la bya ba 'di yid la bya'o snyam na des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa 'di nyid kyi [#]gtam brjod
[\[43b.5\]]par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba dang po'o//_//des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa nyid yid la bya ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas gnas pa des [#]ni yid la
[\[43b.6\]]byed pa gzhan rnams yid la byed par 'gyur ba'i go skabs [#]dbye bar ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa de dag nyid kyis nyin mtshan du brtson pa mi 'dor bar gnas pa de ltar bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sngan chad nor bu rin po che rnyed ma myong ba'i skyes bu
[\[43b.7\]]zhig yod la/_des dus gzhan zhig na nor bu rin po che rnyed par gyur te/_de nor bu rin po che de rnyed pas dga' ba dang /_spro ba dang /_yid bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa las/_des nor bu rin po che de rnyed ma thag tu stor bar gyur [#]na/_de'i rgyus sdug bsngal ba [#]dang /_yid mi bde ba chen po
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]dang ldan par 'gyur [#]te/_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par kyi hud bdag ni yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu rin po che de dang bral bar gyur to zhes nor bu rin po che dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba sha stag rgyun du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
[\[44a.2\]]'di ni rin po che'o snyam du bsams te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che de stor bar yang mi bya ste/_de ltar ni [#]rtag tu bde ba dang /_yid bde ba mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_
[\[44a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das yid la bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_yid la bgyi ba thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bgyi ba dang ma bral ba lags/_
[\[44a.4\]]yid la bgyi ba dang ma [#]bral ba la ni byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs/_yid la bgyi ba mi dmigs/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar chos thams cad
[\[44a.5\]]ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de dag ni nyan thos kyis ma byas/_rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ma mdzad de/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos nges pa nyid dang /_de bzhin
[\[44a.6\]]nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni gnas pa yin no zhes bya bar shes na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di
[\[44a.7\]]ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis dben/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de la 'phel ba med do/_/yongs su 'grib pa med do zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba gnyis pa yin no//_//gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis dben zhing
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ci [#]ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bsgrubs shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan
[\[44b.2\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bsgrubs kyang rnam par 'phel ba'am yongs su 'grib pa med de/_yang dag pa'i mtha' la rnam par 'phel ba'am yongs su 'grib pa med do/_/chos kyi dbyings
[\[44b.3\]]la rnam par 'phel ba'am yongs su 'grib pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gcig kyang ma yin/_gnyis kyang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te de skad du bshad pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum[#]/_mi 'gong /_mi
[\[44b.4\]]'jigs/_mi dngang /_skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar gtogs [#]par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis
[\[44b.5\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni [#]stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa gang lags pa de [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni
[\[44b.6\]]ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos gang yang dmigs su mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan
[\[44b.7\]]'das ci lags/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [#]la spyod dam/_bcom
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_stong pa nyid las gud du stong pa nyid la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[45a.2\]]ci lags/_gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan
[\[45a.3\]]'das ci lags/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong
[\[45a.4\]]pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_
[\[45a.5\]]tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_
[\[45a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[45a.7\]]rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid gang /_
[\[45b.2\]]chos nges pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes
[\[45b.3\]]dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos
[\[45b.4\]]kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang [#]/_chos nges pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci
[\[45b.5\]]lags/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[45b.6\]]chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos nges pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/
[\[45b.7\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi
[\[46a.2\]]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang [#]/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_
[\[46a.3\]]snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos nges pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes
[\[46a.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal [#]pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/[#]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar shes rab kyi
[\[46a.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos de khyod kyis mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
[\[46a.6\]]pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bu khyod kyis mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[46a.7\]]chos gang khyod kyis ma mthong ba'i chos de dmigs su yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos gang dmigs su med pa de skye ba'am 'gag par 'gyur ram ci/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ste/_rab 'byor bzod pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis [#]bla na med pa yang dag
[\[46b.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston te/_rab 'byor de ni stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i lam zhes bya ste/_lam der zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[46b.3\]]dpa' chen po ni [#]de ltar spyod/_de ltar rtsol[#]/_de ltar 'bad pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i gnas med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
[\[46b.4\]]des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir te/_'di ltar ji srid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du de la gzhol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba gsum pa yin no//_//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci
[\[46b.5\]]lags/_chos thams cad mi skye ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]bla na med pa [#]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_skye ba'i
[\[46b.6\]]slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te mi skye ba'i slad dang /_skye ba'i slad du byang chub
[\[46b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan [#]na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]de ji snyam du sems/_gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par
[\[47a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag ni bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gang la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba de
[\[47a.3\]]lta bu'i chos kyang bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
[\[47a.4\]]rgya'o/_/'dis ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/_/'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la rnam par rtog pa de
[\[47a.5\]]thams cad med pa'i phyir te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba bzhi pa yin no//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha
[\[47a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du zab pa'o/_/blta dka' ba'o/_/rtogs par dka' ba'o/_/brtag tu ma mchis pa'o/_/brtag pa'i spyod yul ma lags so/_/zhi ba phra ba zhib pa'o/_/mkhas shing rig pas rtogs par bgyi ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang shes
[\[47a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang zhing klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyid cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]gyi go mi 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan don dang ldan pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang zhing klog pa dang /_kun chub
[\[47b.2\]]par byed pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka de ji snyam du
[\[47b.3\]]sems/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur la/_rigs kyi bu dang
[\[47b.4\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin zhing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par byed par 'gyur te/_bzung zhing bcangs te/_bklags [#]shing kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed na kau shi ka dge ba'i rtsa ba
[\[47b.5\]]'di la snga ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/_stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi [#]cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang [#]ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/de nas dge slong gcig gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la
[\[47b.6\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/_bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/_tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan pa/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/_de dag
[\[47b.7\]]thams cad ni rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi g.yeng ba'i sems kyis 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing bla na med pa yang dag
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de dag gis zil gyis gnon to/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[48a.2\]]dge slong 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/_bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/_tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan pa/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad byang chub
[\[48a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis kyang zil gyis gnon na/_gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid
[\[48a.4\]]la byed pa dang /_bzung [#]zhing bcangs te/_bklags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis gnon par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des [#]
[\[48a.5\]]ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis gnon zhing [#]'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan zhing 'gro bar yang ma zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
[\[48a.6\]]ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad zil gyis gnon [#]zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa
[\[48a.7\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas su yang ma zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod [#]pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba de dag kyang zil gyis gnon zhing 'gro bar
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa [#]yang ma zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba de
[\[48b.2\]]dag kyang zil gyis gnon zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa [#]yang ma zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/_shes
[\[48b.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa [#]yang ma zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
[\[48b.4\]]phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba de[#]/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa [#]yang ma zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
[\[48b.5\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba de[#]/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
[\[48b.6\]]spyod pa [#]yang ma zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji [#]skad du bstan pa bzhin du spyod pa de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten [#]zil gyis gnon par mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[48b.7\]]chen po gang [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji skad bstan pa dang mthun par spyod pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don du gnas pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ring du mi byed pa'o/_/de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni snying po byang chub dang 'phang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sems can bying ba rnams gdon par 'dod pa'o/_/
[\[49a.2\]]de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob pa ste/_nyan thos kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba lnga pa yin no//_//de ltar slob pa'i byang chub
[\[49a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhis [#]kyang 'gro bar bya bar sems te/_nye bar 'dong zhing 'di skad ces smras so[#]/_/kye skyes bu chen po myur du slobs shig_/skyes bu chen po skyen par slobs shig_/lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag ni khyod kyis snying po byang chub
[\[49a.4\]]la 'dug ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas blang bar bya ba ste/_'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzhes pa'o zhes zer zhing ston pa'o[#]/_/de ltar shes rab
[\[49a.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po [#]bzhi dag kyang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi'i [#]ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro [#]bar sems so/_/de'i drung du bdag kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/_/
[\[49a.6\]]lha'i dbang [#]po rab 'thab bral yang 'thab bral gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/_/lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan yang dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/_/lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' yang 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/_/
[\[49a.7\]]lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur yang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/_/tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po yang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/_/tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/_/
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]dge rgyas dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi spong ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_legs mthong dang /_rab blta [#]dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la de ltar
[\[49b.2\]]spyod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang rtag tu dgongs pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la de ltar spyod pa de'i lus la ni 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa gang ji snyed cig lus la 'byung
[\[49b.3\]]ba de dag kyang thams cad du thams cad lus la mi 'byung zhing mi 'bab ste/_de [#]dge slong de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe 'di'i yon tan du 'gyur ba ste/_'dus pa'i nad rnams gang ji snyed pa 'di lta ste/_mig
[\[49b.4\]]gi nad dang /_rna ba'i nad dang /_sna'i nad dang /_lce'i nad dang /_lus kyi nad dang /_snying gi nad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang lus la mi 'byung zhing mi 'bab ste/_'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i
[\[49b.5\]]tshe 'di'i yon tan du rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba drug pa yin no//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du gyur [#]te/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di rang gi spobs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs pa
[\[49b.6\]]brjod dam/_'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston snyam pa dang /_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo bdag de ltar shes rab kyi pha
[\[49b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa ston pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang /_legs pa brjod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus rig [#]par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan dang legs pa brjod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pas [#]byin gyis brlabs so[#]/_/kun dga' bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[50a.2\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa de'i tshe gang stong gsum gyi [#]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud sdig can gang ji snyed cig yod pa
[\[50a.3\]]de dag thams cad ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas te/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub thob par 'gyur
[\[50a.4\]]ram/_'on te ma yin gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam ste/_dogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[50a.5\]]dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe/_bdud sdig can mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdud sdig can ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di
[\[50a.6\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa las sems gcig tsam 'khrug [#]par 'gyur ba dang /_zhum par 'gyur ba dang /_spu g.yo bar 'gyur bar skar mda' ltung ba gtong zhing 'jigs pa bskyed do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la
[\[50a.7\]]'di skad ces gsol to[#]/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig can brtse ba'i bsam pas mchi bar 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can brtse ba'i bsam pas [#]'ong ba ma yin no/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'on ji lta bus drung du mchi bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang
[\[50b.2\]]gis sngon [#]gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di [#]bstan pa'i tshe/_sems mos par ma byas pa de'i drung du bdud sdig can dag brtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo /_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[50b.3\]]zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/_'on tam ma yin zhes the tshom du gyur pa de dag gi drung du bdud sdig to can brtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo /_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral na des
[\[50b.4\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma mthong bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi thos so/_/ma thos pas mi shes so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar sgom pa ma shes pas de bzhin nyid du nan tan mi byed de/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig can
[\[50b.5\]]gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba dam pa'i chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin par byed na/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par
[\[50b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la bsngags pa brjod na/_de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/_gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba ni bdag gi grogs yin te/_gang
[\[50b.7\]]dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa mang po'i nang nas bdag gi grogs su rnyed pa ste/_de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gnyis las gcig tu gnas par gyur pa ni de
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o snyam ste/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu la bdud kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur zhe
[\[51a.2\]]na/_byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_'di skad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu zab ste[#]/_khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos pas ci zhig bya/_bsgom [#]pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_bcang ba dang /_
[\[51a.3\]]kun chub par byas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/_ngas kyang de'i gting ma rnyed na/_khyod kyis lta [#]rnyed re skan zhes zer na/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
[\[51a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' brnyas pa bskyed cing /_nga ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/_/nga ni tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/_/khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rol
[\[51a.5\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/_/khyod ni tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no zhes rlom sems su byed na/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed
[\[51a.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid mchog tu rlom sems bskyed na/_kun dga' bo de'i tshe bdud sdig can dga' ba dang /_spro ba dang /_nyams bde ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur te/_kun
[\[51a.7\]]dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ming brjod pa'am/_rus brjod pa kun tu grags par gyur na/_de ming brjod pa'am/_rus brjod pa des byang chub sems
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dge ba'i chos can dag khyad du gsod [#]cing bdag bstod gzhan la smod la/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa dang /_rtags dang /_mtshan mar bya ba'i yon tan de dag kyang de la med par rnam pa dang /_rtags
[\[51b.2\]]dang /_mtshan ma de dag gis nyon mongs pa bskyed cing /_bdag bstod gzhan smad de/_'di skad du ji ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par snang ba de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas par mi snang ngo /_/byang
[\[51b.3\]]chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par mi snang ngo zhes de de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa [#]de dag la mi snyan pa brjod cing smod na/_de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi gnas ni stongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba chen po dang /_byol song gi skye gnas
[\[51b.4\]]dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_yi dwags kyi yul shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes ci nas kyang /_de'i tshig bzung [#]du rung bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdud sdig can byang chub sems dpa' de byin gyis rlob ste/_de'i tshig bzung du [#]rung bar skye bo mang po dag kyang mnyan pa dang yid
[\[51b.5\]]ches par bya bar sems te/_de la de dag gis thos sam mthong na mthun par spyod par 'gyur te/_de la de dag gis thos sam mthong na mthun par spyod cing de bzhin du slob ste/_de dag de bzhin du slob cing de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa'i tshe/_nyon mongs pa shin tu 'phel bar
[\[51b.6\]]'gyur te/_de ltar de dag bsam pa phyin ci log tu gyur pas lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las gang dang gang brtsams pa de dag thams cad mi 'dod pa dang /_mi sdug pa dang /_yid du mi 'ong bar 'grub par 'gyur te/_de ltar na sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag kyang rab tu 'phel bar
[\[51b.7\]]'gyur/_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_yi dwags kyi yul yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/_bdud kyi gnas kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur bas/_kun dga' bo don gyi dbang de mthong bas bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang /_spro ba dang /_tshim
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]pa dang /_yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang gal te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang rtsod cing nga ni mchog tu gyur pa yin gyi/_khyod ni ma yin no zhes zer na/_de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam
[\[52a.2\]]du sems te/_kye rigs kyi bu 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa ste/_'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'thab mo dang /_'khrug pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_mtshang 'bru [#]ba 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad
[\[52a.3\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin te/_/de ni sems can dmyal ba pa'i [#]lam mo/_/de ni byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam mo/_/de ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam mo/_/de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang
[\[52a.4\]]zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang /_gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan du 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing mtshang 'bru [#]na de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di gnyis ka yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa'o/_/'di gnyis ka yang
[\[52a.5\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang brtsams pa de ni [#]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin/_rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye
[\[52a.6\]]gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam brtsams so zhes nas dga' zhing spro ba dang /_tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa la gnod par sems shing 'thab
[\[52a.7\]]cing rtsod [#]la 'khrug cing mtshang 'bru [#]na/_gal te des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtong zhe na/_ci tsam du sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa dang /_'thab cing rtsod [#]pa dang 'khrug cing mtshang 'bru [#]bar gyur pa de srid du bskal par go cha bgo bar bya'o/_/kun dga'
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sems bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan mchis sam/_'on te ma lags kyis [#]bskal pa de snyed kho nar go cha bgo 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams
[\[52b.2\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la ngas 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te/_kun dga' bo de la gang zag de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang 'thab cing rtsod la/_gshe ba'i mi snyan pa brjod pa dang /_
[\[52b.3\]]'thab cing rtsod de gshe ba dang /_mi snyan pa brjod pa [#]byas nas/_phyir mi 'chags par mdud par 'dzin zhing 'khon du bzung ste [#]gnas na/_kun dga' bo de la gang zag de ni 'byung bar nga mi smra ste/_gang zag des gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtong [#]
[\[52b.4\]]zhe na/_gdon mi za bar bskal pa [#]de snyed du go cha bgo bar bya'o/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' [#]chen po gang 'thab cing [#]rtsod de/_gshe ba dang mi snyan par brjod par gyur na yang mdud par mi 'dzin la/_phyin chad sdom pa 'dzin zhing bdag gis ni thob par
[\[52b.5\]]bya ba nyes par thob ste/_bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal dgos na de ltar bdag smras pa la phyir smra ba dang /_bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dgos na/_de ltar bdag gzhan la mi snyan par smra zhing phyir bzlog pa ni mi tshul gyis
[\[52b.6\]]bdag gis de ltar mi bya'i/_bdag gis glan [#]pa dang lkugs [#]pa bzhin du bya'o/_/bdag gis bsam pa la 'khrug pa med par bya'o/_/sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_yongs
[\[52b.7\]]su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya dgos na/_de dag nyid la bdag ngan sems su byed pa dang /_de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa ni tshul ma yin gyis/_bdag gis de dag la gnod sems su mi bya'o/_/bdag gis de dag la 'khrug par mi bya'o snyam na/_kun dga' bo byang chub
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'byung ba yod par ngas bshad de/_de la bdud sdig can glags lta zhing glags tshol bas kyang glags mi rnyed do/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag nyan thos kyi theg
[\[53a.2\]]pa pa dag dang 'grogs par mi bya'o/_/de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas par mi bya'o/_/'dug par mi bya'o/_/gal te 'dug na yang des su la [#]gnod sems su mi bya/_'khrug par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang bdag gis 'di dag la gnod sems su bya ba dang /_'khrug par bya ba de ni
[\[53a.3\]]bdag la mi tshul lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya ba dag go snyam du bya'o [#]zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba bdun pa yin no//_//
[\[53a.4\]]bam po lnga bcu bzhi pa/_kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag dang gnas par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/_ston pa
[\[53a.5\]]dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' [#]chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni bdag gi grogs te gru gcig tu zhugs pa'o/_/'dis ji ltar bslab par bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslab
[\[53a.6\]]par bya'o/_/'dis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_
[\[53a.7\]]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
[\[53b.2\]]dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang la bslab par bya ba de nyid la bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/_/des gzhan yang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/_'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ston pa ste/_gal te des 'dres
[\[53b.3\]]par spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang bral bar gyur na/_de la bdag gis bslab par mi bya'i/_gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar gnas na/_bdag
[\[53b.4\]]gis kyang de ltar bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/_de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bslab pa nyams [#]pa yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
[\[53b.5\]]sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
[\[53b.6\]]mnyam pa nyid do/_/phyi stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni byang chub sems
[\[53b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo /_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas stong /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis stong /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa
[\[54a.2\]]dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas stong /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin
[\[54a.3\]]dang /_gzungs kyi sgo ni gzungs kyi sgos stong /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pas stong /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
[\[54a.4\]]pa nyid kyis stong ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de/_de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba
[\[54a.5\]]brgyad pa yin no//_//gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/_gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa
[\[54a.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_gzugs 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_gzugs mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la [#]slob pa lags sam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[54a.7\]]'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pas [#]bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/_rnam par shes pa
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bas par bgyi
[\[54b.2\]]ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba dang /_'gag par bgyi ba dang /_mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong
[\[54b.3\]]pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
[\[54b.4\]]'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi
[\[54b.5\]]chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad bas par bgyi ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba dang /_'gag par bgyi ba dang /_mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bas par bgyi ba
[\[54b.6\]]dang /_'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba dang /_'gag par bgyi ba dang /_mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis
[\[54b.7\]]gang 'di skad du gzugs zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_gzugs 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_gzugs mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la [#]slob pa yin nam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa
[\[55a.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_
[\[55a.3\]]rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zad par bya ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba dang /_'gag par bya ba dang /_mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
[\[55a.4\]]pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
[\[55a.5\]]pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_
[\[55a.6\]]mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad zad par bya ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba dang /_'gag par bya ba dang /_mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_rnam
[\[55a.7\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zad par bya ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba dang /_'gag par bya ba dang /_mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam zhes smras pa de ni ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi de
[\[55b.2\]]bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs
[\[55b.3\]]med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge
[\[55b.4\]]'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir
[\[55b.5\]]'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la gang gis de bzhin gshegs pas [#]zhes brjod pa'i de bzhin nyid de dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/_spang ba'am/_
[\[55b.6\]]skye ba'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid la
[\[55b.7\]]slob ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/_de bzhin nyid ni zad pa'am/_spang ba'am/_skye ba'am/_'gag par 'gyur ba med de/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin nyid la slob pa ste/_rnam pa thams
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa yin/_stong pa nyid thams cad la slob pa yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la slob pa yin/_yang dag par spong ba dang /_
[\[56a.2\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la slob pa yin/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
[\[56a.3\]]'jug pa rnams la slob pa yin/_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la slob pa yin/_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo la slob
[\[56a.4\]]pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la slob pa yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang
[\[56a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bslab pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par 'gyur ba yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]ni bdud dam/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis pham par mi nus pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar
[\[56a.6\]]slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag gi pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
[\[56a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po ni mgon du 'gyur ba'i chos rnams la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob [#]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa bcu gnyis
[\[56b.2\]]lan gsum du bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun mi gcad [#]pa'i phyir slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
[\[56b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po ni [#]'chi ba med pa'i sgo dbye bar bya'o zhes slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dus ma byas kyi khams bstan par bya'o zhes slob pa yin te/_rab 'byor sems can dman pas ni bslab pa rgya chen po 'di dag
[\[56b.4\]]la bslab par mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni sems can thams cad 'khor ba las gdon par 'dod pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can dmyal bar mi skye/_
[\[56b.5\]]byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi skye'o/_/yul mtha' 'khob tu mi skye'o/_/gdol pa'i rigs su mi skye'o/_/dma' ba dang dman pa'i spyod pa dang /_btsog [#]pa'i rigs rnams [#]su mi skye'o/_/zhar bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sgur por mi 'gyur ro/_/zha bor [#]mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[56b.6\]]yan lag skyon can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'on par mi 'gyur ro/_/lag pa med par mi 'gyur ro/_/dbang po dang mi ldan par mi 'gyur te[#]/_dbang po yongs su tshang zhing dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/srog gcod par mi 'gyur ro[#]/_/ma byin
[\[56b.7\]]par len pa dang 'dod pas log par [#]g.yem par mi 'gyur ro[#]/_/brdzun du smra ba dang /_phra ma can dang /_tshig rtsub po smra ba dang /_tshig kyal [#]pa can dang /_brnab sems can dang /_gnod sems can dang /_log par lta bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'tsho ba log pas 'tsho bar
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims ngan pa can du mi 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims ngan pa yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
[\[57a.2\]]ni lha tshe ring po'i nang du mi skye'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_thabs mkhas pa de dag dang [#]/_gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha tshe ring por mi skye ba'i thabs mkhas pa de lta bu de la yod de/_de yang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[57a.3\]]'di nyid las thabs mkhas pa bstan pa ste/_thabs mkhas pa de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug_/tshad med pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug_/gzugs med pa'i snyoms
[\[57a.4\]]par 'jug pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug ste/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dbang gis kyang mi skye'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di lta
[\[57a.5\]]ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba'i dri ma yongs su dag pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi stobs yongs su dag pa [#]thob par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa lags na/_
[\[57a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang gi yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no[#]/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin
[\[57a.7\]]gyis yongs su dag pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad yongs su dag pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems zhum pa med cing 'gong ba med pa de ni rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_byis
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis ni chos nyid de mi shes mi mthong bas sems can de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi
[\[57b.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/_nang stong pa nyid la spyod/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod/_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu
[\[57b.3\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod/_
[\[57b.4\]]rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la spyod/_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
[\[57b.5\]]bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la spyod/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod de/_rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad kyi
[\[57b.6\]]stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa nyid rab tu thob par 'gyur te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo /_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa dang /_g.yo ba rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur
[\[57b.7\]]ro zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba dgu pa yin no//_//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sa chen po'i phyogs gang na 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi sa le sbram 'byung ba de lta bu ni nyung ngo /_/rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di la slob [#]pa'i
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]sems can de lta bu yang nyung ste/_sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas ches mang ngo zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba bcu pa yin no//_//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sems can gang 'khor los
[\[58a.2\]]sgyur [#]ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta bu ni nyung ste/_sems can gang khams kyi rgyal phran du 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa de lta bu ni ches mang ngo /_/rab 'byor de bzhin du sems can gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam
[\[58a.3\]]'dir 'jug pa de lta bu yang nyung ste/_sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas ches mang ngo /_/rab 'byor gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang
[\[58a.4\]]dag par zhugs pa de dag pas ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed [#]pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang sems can gang nyan thos sam/_rang sangs rgyas su gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni ches mang ngo /_/rab 'byor gang yang byang chub sems
[\[58a.5\]]dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod cing the tshom med par phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon pa de dag pas ni gang phyir mi [#]ldog pa'i sa gnon par 'gyur ba de lta bu ches mang ngo /_/rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob
[\[58a.6\]]par 'dod pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i sar chud par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba bcu gcig pa yin no//_//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[58a.7\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/tshul khrims ngan pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/'khrugs [#]pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/le lo dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/g.yeng ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/shes rab 'chal pa dang ldan
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/tha ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba bcu gnyis pa yin no//_//gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems
[\[58b.2\]]mi skye'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams
[\[58b.3\]]cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
[\[58b.4\]]par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig
[\[58b.5\]]pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe
[\[58b.6\]]chos gang yang dmigs su med de/_ma dmigs pas chos gang la yang sems bskyed pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol tu
[\[58b.7\]]phyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang mthun par spyod par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba bcu gsum pa yin
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]no//_//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_'jig tshogs su lta bar lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis po thams cad kyang 'dus pa yin te/_rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo [#]'dir pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste
[\[59a.2\]]dper na/_skyes bu dus byas par gyur pa'i 'tsho ba'i dbang po 'gags pas dbang po thams cad 'gag [#]par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pas pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus pa yin no[#]/_/_
[\[59a.3\]]rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo [#]'di la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba bcu bzhi pa yin no//_//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
[\[59a.4\]]la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ba la slob pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang ji snyed cig [#]'khod pa de dag ci mang ba yin nam/_gsol
[\[59a.5\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams kyang mang ba lags na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta smos [#]kyang ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis
[\[59a.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/_de bzhin
[\[59a.7\]]gshegs pa de dag thams cad re re la yang sku tshe'i mthar phyin gyi bar du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun ma chad par na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /[ (]snyan [,]snyun [)]gyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byas na/_rab 'byor de ji
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]de de'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/_
[\[59b.2\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems
[\[59b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de ltar don chen por 'gyur ba ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa'o/_/rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi bla na med par 'gyur bar
[\[59b.4\]]'dod pa dang /_sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /_skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /_dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /_skyob [#]med pa rnams kyi skyob par 'gyur bar 'dod pa
[\[59b.5\]]dang /_gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /_gling med pa rnams kyi gling du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /_mun par gnas pa rnams kyi sgron mer [#]'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar 'thob par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du
[\[59b.6\]]chud par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pas rnam par rtse bar 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i sgra'i nga ro bsgrags [#]par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnga brdung bar 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi dung 'bud par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gtam
[\[59b.7\]]bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni phun sum tshogs pa gang thob par bya ba de dag las mi thob [#]pa gang yang med
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang des thob par bgyi ba lags sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang des thob par bgyi ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[60a.2\]]rab 'byor nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang des thob par bya la/_rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang des thob par bya ba des/_de la gnas par mi bya/_'dug par mi bya/_shes pa dang mthong bas de dag bltas nas 'da' bar bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon
[\[60a.3\]]med par 'jug par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub
[\[60a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de ma yin pa'i sbyin pa'i gnas nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed
[\[60a.5\]]pa de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin te[#]/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi gtong zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
[\[60a.6\]]spyod pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni [#]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du rig par bya ste/_nyan
[\[60a.7\]]thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ring du byed cing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa [#]yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba bco lnga pa yin no//_//gal te yang 'di snyam du 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]'di na'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub par bya'o snyam ste/_gal te de ltar shes na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/gal te 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di na yod do
[\[60b.2\]]zhes bya bar shes pa med de[#]/_gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ba dang /_gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ba dang /_gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas byung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
[\[60b.3\]]'tshang rgya ba de lta bu yang mi shes mi mthong zhing /_de 'di snyam ste/_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas pa'i phyir 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma yin/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di na yod pa yang [#]ma yin/_shes rab
[\[60b.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis ni chos gang yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang med do zhes rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba bcu drug pa yin te/_'di dag [#]ni rnam par 'phel
[\[60b.5\]]ba bstan pa yin no//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[60b.6\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_
[\[60b.7\]]dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms [#]par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_
[\[61a.2\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la yang spyod bzhin du sems can
[\[61a.3\]]thams cad zil gyis gnon na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur na lta ci smos/_sems can gang gi sems rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa de dag kyang thob pa legs par thob cing de dag gi 'tsho ba legs
[\[61a.4\]]par 'tsho ba yin na/_gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag lta ci smos/_sems can gang gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di [#]nyan pa de dag ni kun gyi yid du 'ong bar bya
[\[61a.5\]]ba yin no snyam du sems par gyur to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis me tog man da ra ba mang po blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas me tog man da ra ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor to/_/mngon
[\[61a.6\]]par gtor to/_/rab tu gtor to/_/de ltar mngon par gtor rab tu gtor nas tshig 'di skad brjod do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dmigs pa de dag gis [#]sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
[\[61a.7\]]yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/rang byung gi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/zag pa med pa'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces bya ba ni kun mkhyen nyid gsum gyi chos
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]rnams bla na med pa yang dag par yongs su rdzogs pa yin no//_//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pas[#]/_slar ldog par 'gyur ba sems 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis so/_/
[\[61b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slar log ste/_nyan thos sam/_rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar sems 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis kyi/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos pa bskyed cing yang dang yang bla na med pa
[\[61b.3\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mang po 'di dag mthong nas/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi don du [#]sman par mos/_bde bar mos zhing legs par bgyi bar mos te/_sems bskyed pa de lta bu
[\[61b.4\]]dag [#]dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar rtog ste/_ci bdag brgal nas sems can ma brgal [#]ba sgrol bar 'gyur ram/_ci bdag grol nas sems can ma grol ba 'grol bar 'gyur ram/_bdag dbugs phyin nas sems can dbugs ma byung
[\[61b.5\]]ba dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/_ci bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas sems can yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar 'gyur ram zhes rtog ste zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi don yongs su mi gtong ba yin te/_nges par brten [#]pa gsungs pa yin no//_//
[\[61b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das de ltar theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang /_yun ring po nas spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag
[\[61b.7\]]la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang /_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de [#]la
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]rjes su yi rang bar bgyid na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ji tsam zhig tu 'phel bar 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka gling chen po
[\[62a.2\]]bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni srang la gzhal ba'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar [#]rung yang srid kyi[#]/_de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do/_/kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
[\[62a.3\]]dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni srang la gzhal ba'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi/_de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do/_/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
[\[62a.4\]]kyi rgya mtsho chen po rnams la chu'i phung po chen po ji snyed yod pa de dag ni skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs [#]pa'i cha gcig gis chu'i thigs pa blangs pa'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi/_de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do/_/
[\[62a.5\]]de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das
