[\[102b.2\]]phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi zad pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams [#]mi zad pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/
[\[102b.3\]]yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi zad pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_
[\[102b.4\]]bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting
[\[102b.5\]]nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo mi zad pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa mi zad pas shes rab kyi pha rol
[\[102b.6\]]tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi zad pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[102b.7\]]chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor tshor ba nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/'du shes nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/'du byed [#]rnams nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par
[\[103a.2\]]bsgrub par bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor skye mched rnams nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas byang chub sems
[\[103a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/khams rnams nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
[\[103a.4\]]nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par
[\[103a.5\]]bya'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon
[\[103a.6\]]par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub
[\[103a.7\](]paro [,]par [)]bya'o/_/rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_
[\[103b.2\]]mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab
[\[103b.3\]]'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
[\[103b.4\]]du nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang ma rig pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab
[\[103b.5\]]'byor 'du byed nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor rnam par shes pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
[\[103b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor ming dang gzugs nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor skye mched drug nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas byang chub
[\[103b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor reg pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor tshor ba nam
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor sred pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
[\[104a.2\]]phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor len pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor srid pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[104a.3\]]chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor skye ba nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre
[\[104a.4\]]sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[104a.5\]]chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par blta ba dang /_thog ma dang tha ma rnam par spangs par blta [#]ba ste/_gang de ltar rten cing 'brel par
[\[104a.6\]]'byung ba la rnam par lta ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [#]snying po byang chub la 'dug pa'i ma 'dres pa'i chos te/_de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba des ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gang la la
[\[104a.7\]]nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas mngon par bsgrub pa 'dis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba de ni nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mi 'gyur te/_de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]gnas par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang phyir ldog pa de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba 'di la ma brten [#]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[104b.2\]]chen pos ji ltar nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas mngon par bsgrub pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par blta [#]bar bya ba dang /_mngon par bsgrub par bya ba mi shes pas phyir ldog go_/rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa phyir ldog pa de dag thams cad ni thabs
[\[104b.3\]]mkhas pa 'di la ma brten pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog go/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
[\[104b.4\]]brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog ste/_de ltar thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas mngon par bsgrub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[104b.5\]]pa rnam par blta bar bya ste [#]mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par blta [#]bas ni chos gang yang rgyu med pa las byung bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_chos gang yang skye bar [#]yang dag
[\[104b.6\]]par rjes su mi mthong /_chos gang yang 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_chos gang yang bdag dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_'gro ba dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu dang /_byed pa po dang /_byed
[\[104b.7\]]du 'jug pa po dang /_slong ba po dang /_yongs su slong ba po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_tshor du 'jug pa po dang /_shes pa po dang /_lta ba por yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_rtag pa dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag dang /_bdag
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [#]spyod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos [#]rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par blta [#]bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gang
[\[105a.2\]]gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs rtag pa'am/_mi rtag pa'am/_bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bdag yod pa'am/_bdag med pa'am/_zhi ba'am/_ma zhi bar yang [#]dag par rjes su mi
[\[105a.3\]]mthong ngo /_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag pa'am/_mi rtag pa'am/_bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bdag yod pa'am/_bdag med pa'am/_zhi ba'am/_ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/_
[\[105a.4\]]skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtag pa'am/_mi rtag pa'am/_bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bdag yod pa'am/_bdag med pa'am/_zhi ba'am/_ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_
[\[105a.5\]]stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rtag pa'am/_mi rtag pa'am/_bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bdag yod pa'am/_bdag med pa'am/_zhi ba'am/_ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_
[\[105a.6\]]bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag
[\[105a.7\]]par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad rtag pa'am/_mi rtag pa'am/_bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bdag yod pa'am/_bdag med pa'am/_zhi ba'am/_ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]nyid kyi bar du rtag pa'am/_mi rtag pa'am/_bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bdag yod pa'am/_bdag med pa'am/_zhi ba'am/_ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
[\[105b.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_chos gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su [#]mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de yang [#]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[105b.3\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_chos gang gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de yang yang
[\[105b.4\]]dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_chos gang gis nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi
[\[105b.5\]]mthong ste/_chos gang gis dngos po med [(]po'i [,]pa'i [)]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_
[\[105b.6\]]byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_chos gang gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang dag par [#]mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'phags pa'i
[\[105b.7\]]bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_chos gang gis gzungs kyi sgo yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_
[\[106a.2\]]so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_chos gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rnam pa thams
[\[106a.3\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_chos gang gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos gang gis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spang bar bya ba de yang
[\[106a.4\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gang gi [#]tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad
[\[106a.5\]]mi dmigs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdud sdig can mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu zhig pha ma 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par 'gyur te/_mya ngan gyi zug rngu mi bzad par dang ldan par
[\[106a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mi dmigs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdud sdig can mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par 'gyur te/_mya ngan gyi zug rngus mi bzad pas zug par 'gyur ro/_/rab
[\[106a.7\]]'byor gyis gsol pa/_ci lags bcom ldan 'das bdud sdig can gcig 'ba' zhig mya ngan gyi zug rngus mi bzad pas zug par 'gyur ram/_'on te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten [#]khams na bdud sdig can gang ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag thams cad mya ngan gyi [#]zug rngu mi
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]bzad pas zug par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par [#]spyod pas rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud
[\[106b.2\]]sdig can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad mya ngan gyi zug rngu mi bzad pas zug par 'gyur te/_rang rang gi stan la 'dug par mi 'dod do/_/de ltar rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis gang
[\[106b.3\]]gi phyir de bzung zhing phyir zlog pa'i glags mi rnyed gting mi rnyed do/_/rab 'byor de [#]bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pas
[\[106b.4\]]rnam par spyad par bya ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pas rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
[\[106b.5\]]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro[#]/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pas rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[106b.6\]]chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni zad pa med pa'i rnam pa ni zad pa [#]shes pa'o/_/skye ba med pa'i rnam pa ni mi skye ba shes pa yin no//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[106b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa
[\[107a.2\]]yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing sbyin pa de dag yongs su gtong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
[\[107a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims bsrung ba'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing tshul khrims de dag bsrung ste/_rab 'byor [#]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
[\[107a.4\]]ro/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa sgrub pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing bzod pa de sgom ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [#]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs su
[\[107a.5\]]rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du [#]yongs su bsngo zhing brtson 'grus de rtsom ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha
[\[107a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa sgom [#]pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing bsam gtan de dag la snyoms par 'jug ste/_rab 'byor
[\[107a.7\]]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [#]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]shes rab de sgom ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[107b.2\]]dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
[\[107b.3\]]pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe/_sems can rnams la byams pa'i lus kyi las dang /_byams pa'i ngag gi las dang /_byams pa'i yid kyi las nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas su mi bsngo'i/_sems can thams cad
[\[107b.4\]]dang thun mong [#]du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_de ji ltar gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i 'du shes gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
[\[107b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
[\[107b.6\]]'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe len pa po de dag gshe zhing mtshang [#]'dru la mi bden pa'i ngag rtsub pos mi snyan pa brjod kyang de dag la gnod pa'i sems mi bskyed de/_dge
[\[107b.7\]]ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas su yongs su mi bsngo'i/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong [#]du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_de ji ltar gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]su bsngo ba'i 'du shes gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom
[\[108a.2\]]ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa
[\[108a.3\]]gtong ba'i tshe/_len pa de dag gshe zhing mtshang [#]'dru la mi bden pa'i ngag rtsub pos mi snyan par brjod de/_de ltar spyo ba dang /_'khyal pa dang /_tshul ma yin pa'i tshig rtsub pos mi snyan par brjod pa la sbyin pa'i blo dang /_yongs su gtong ba'i blo nyid du 'gyur te/_bdag gis
[\[108a.4\]]ni sbyin pa yongs su gtang bar bya ste/_bdag gis ni sbyin pa yongs su mi gtong [#]bar mi bya'o/_/de'i [#]lus sems kyi brtson 'grus bskyed de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas su yongs su [#]mi bsngo'i/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong [#]du byas nas
[\[108a.5\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_de ji ltar gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i 'du shes gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
[\[108a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
[\[108a.7\]]su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te sems 'jug pa ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]yongs su mi bsngo ste/_de ji ltar gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i 'du shes gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
[\[108b.2\]]gnas shing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan
[\[108b.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin zhing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe de rtag tu sbyin pa la sgyu ma'i blo nye bar gnas shing sbyin pa des sems can gang la yang phan pa'am mi phan par 'gyur ba mi mthong ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba
[\[108b.4\]]de dag kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su yongs su mi bsngo'i/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong [#]du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_de [#]ji ltar gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su bsngo
[\[108b.5\]]ba'i 'du shes gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
[\[108b.6\]]gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab
[\[108b.7\]]'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ni lus sam/_ngag gam/_sems kyi sdom pa gang yang rung ste/_sdom pa des nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'chel bar mi byed de/[ #]tshul khrims kyi pha
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi srog mi gcod do/_/ma byin par mi len to/_/'dod pas log par mi g.yem mo/_/brdzun gyi tshig mi smra'o/_/phra ma'i tshig mi smra'o/_/zhe gcod pa'i tshig rtsub mo mi smra'o/_tshig 'khyal pa
[\[109a.2\]]mi smra'o/_brnab sems [#]mi byed do/_/gnod sems su mi byed do/_/log par mi lta'o/_/de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnas shing zas 'dod pa la zas/_skom 'dod pa la skom/_bzhon pa 'dod pa la bzhon pa/_gos 'dod pa la gos/_me tog 'dod
[\[109a.3\]]pa la me tog_/phreng ba 'dod pa la phreng ba/_spos 'dod pa la spos/_byug pa 'dod pa la byug pa/_mal cha 'dod pa la mal cha/_gnas 'dod pa la gnas/_'tsho ba 'dod pa la 'tsho ba/_yo byad 'dod pa la yo byad yongs su gtong ba nas mi'i yo byad [#]ci yang rung ba'i bar du 'dod
[\[109a.4\]]pa rnams la mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa de ltar gtong ba'i tshe/_sbyin pa de nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'i/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
[\[109a.5\]]yongs su bsngo ste/_de yang ji ltar gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i 'du shes gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
[\[109a.6\]]gnas shing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[109a.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i drung du sems can thams cad lhag[#] nas yan lag dang nying lag rnams bcad gtubs [#]shing dong yang /_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]chen po 'khrugs [#]pa med de gnod pa'i sems gcig kyang mi bskyed do/_/gzhan du na de 'di snyam du sems te/_de ltar sems can thams cad kyis bdag gi yan lag dang nying lag bcad gtubs [#]te dong ba ni bdag gis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo/_/bdag gi [#]lus rul pa
[\[109b.2\]]'di yongs su btang bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lha rdzas rdo rje las byung ba thob par bya'o snyam ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas su mi bsngo'i/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong [#]du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
[\[109b.3\]]bsngo ste/_de [#]ji ltar gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i 'du shes gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
[\[109b.4\]]gnas shing bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom
[\[109b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can thams cad bdag gis 'khor ba las bsgral [#]te 'chi ba med pa'i dbyings su dgod par bya'o zhes lus dang sems kyi
[\[109b.6\]]brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_de ji ltar [#]gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i 'du shes gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar
[\[109b.7\]]yongs su bsngo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang gi [#]tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
[\[110a.2\]]gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'gog pa'i bar la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe/_nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar dmigs
[\[110a.3\]]pa med de/_gzhan du na de 'di snyam du bdag gis ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas te/_sems can thams cad 'khor ba las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o snyam ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas su mi bsngo'i/_sems can thams cad
[\[110a.4\]]dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_de [#]ji ltar gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i 'du shes gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/rab 'byor de
[\[110a.5\]]ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[110a.6\]]la gnas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing chos gang yang 'dus byas su mi mthong /_chos gang
[\[110a.7\]]yang [#]'dus ma byas su mi mthong /_dngos po yod pa 'dus byas su mi mthong /_dngos po med pa 'dus ma byas su mi mthong /_mtshan ma yod pa 'dus byas su mi mthong /_mtshan ma med pa 'dus ma byas su mi mthong [#]/_gzhan du na chos [#]gang yang de bzhin nyid las 'da' bar
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]med pa las phar chos gang yang yod pa'am med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa des nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung [#]ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas su yongs
[\[110b.2\]]su mi bsngo'i/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_de ji ltar gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i 'du shes gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar
[\[110b.3\]]yongs su bsngo'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[110b.4\]]chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos [#]sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_snying po byang
[\[110b.5\]]chub la 'dug gi bar du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_sems can thams cad gshe zhing 'khyal la yan lag dang nying lag gcod par gyur kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/_sems can
[\[110b.6\]]'di dag la ni bdag gis sbyin pa yongs su gtong [#]bar bya'i/_sbyin pa yongs su mi gtong [#]bar bya ba ma yin no zhes te/_de sems can de dag zas 'dod pa la ni zas/_skom 'dod pa la ni skom/_bzhon pa [#]'dod pa la ni bzhon pa/_gos 'dod pa la ni gos/_me tog 'dod
[\[110b.7\]]pa la ni me tog_/phreng ba 'dod pa la ni phreng ba/_spos 'dod pa la ni spos/_byug pa 'dod pa la ni byug pa/_mal cha 'dod pa la ni mal cha/_gnas 'dod pa la ni gnas/_'tsho ba 'dod pa la ni 'tsho ba/_yo byad 'dod pa la ni yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du yongs su
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]gtong ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ste/_de ji ltar gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i 'du shes gsum mi 'jug pa de
[\[111a.2\]]ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha
[\[111a.3\]]rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du sems can
[\[111a.4\]]no cog gi [#]srog mi gcod do/_/ma byin par mi len to/_/'dod pas log par mi g.yem mo/_/brdzun gyi tshig mi smra'o/_/phra ma'i tshig mi smra'o/_/zhe gcod pa'i tshig mi smra'o/_/tshig 'khyal pa mi smra'o/_/brnab sems su mi byed do/_/gnod sems su mi byed do/_/log par mi lta'o/_/
[\[111a.5\]]de'i sems kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi 'jug ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_de ji ltar gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang
[\[111a.6\]]du yongs su bsngo ba'i 'du shes gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems
[\[111a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing brtson 'grus
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]'di lta bu [#]yongs su bskyed de/_bdag gis dpag tshad dam/_dpag tshad brgya'am/_dpag tshad stong ngam/_dpag tshad brgya phrag stong ngam/_dpag tshad bye ba'am[#]/_dpag tshad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar ram/_'jig rten gyi khams brgya'am/_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag
[\[111b.2\]]khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar du song ste/_de dag tu chung ngu na sems can 'ga' tsam yang skyabs su 'gro ba'am bslab pa'i gnas la gzhag par bya'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_
[\[111b.3\]]rang byang chub bam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhag par bya'o zhes brtson 'grus brtsom [#]ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_ji ltar 'di la blo rnam pa gsum
[\[111b.4\]]po su zhig gis yongs su sngo [#]bar byed/_gang yongs su sngo [#]bar byed/_gang du yongs su sngo [#]bar byed ces bya ba mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su sngo [#]bar byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
[\[111b.5\]]su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
[\[111b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing 'di ltar 'dod pa las dben pa/_sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_
[\[111b.7\]]bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa gang dang gang skyes pa [#]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo'o/_/de'ang ci nas kyang de'i tshe bsam gtan dang bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs par de ltar [#]yongs su bsngo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[112a.2\]]chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_
[\[112a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing gang gi tshe chos rnams [#]dben pa'i rnam pa'am/_zhi ba'i rnam pa'am/_mi zad pa'i rnam par chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas kyang snying po byang chub la nam
[\[112a.4\]]'dug gi bar du chos nyid de mngon du mi byed de/_snying po byang chub la 'dug nas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/de las langs nas chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskor te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag
[\[112a.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_ji ltar de la 'du shes rnam pa gsum po gang zhig gis yongs su sngo [#]bar byed/_gang yongs su sngo [#]bar byed/_gang du yongs su sngo [#]bar byed ces bya ba mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su sngo [#]bar byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[112a.6\]]chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin te/_ci nas kyang mi spong mi 'dzin pa de ltar yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
[\[112a.7\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su [#]'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing lus dang sems kyi brtson pa mi 'dor ba yin te/_bdag
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar mi bya'i/_bdag gis ni gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes de sems can rnams kyi don du dpag tshad dam/_dpag tshad brgya 'am/_
[\[112b.2\]]dpag tshad stong ngam/_dpag tshad brgya phrag stong ngam/_'jig rten gyi khams sam/_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar du song zhing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing chung ngu na sems can 'ga' tsam yang byang chub la rab tu 'jog go/_/gal te gang zag byang
[\[112b.3\]]chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang ma phrad na yang de dag tu gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa ni nyan thos kyi sa la rab tu gzhog go/_/gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu gzhog ste/_chung ngu na sems can 'ga' tsam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu gzhog
[\[112b.4\]]go/_/des chos kyi sbyin pa de dag byin nas zang zing gi sbyin pas sems can rnams tshim par byed do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'i/_gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
[\[112b.5\]]pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_de ji ltar gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i 'du shes gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[112b.6\]]pa la gnas shing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan
[\[112b.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spangs pa yin/_gzhan yang srog gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]yin/_srog gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis srog gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/_bdag gis kyang ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin/_gzhan yang ma byin par len pa spong ba
[\[113a.2\]]la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_ma byin par len pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis ma byin par len pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/_bdag gis kyang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pa yin/_gzhan
[\[113a.3\]]yang 'dod pas [#]log par g.yem pa spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong ba'i [#]legs pa brjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/_bdag gis
[\[113a.4\]]kyang brdzun du smra ba spangs pa yin/_gzhan yang brdzun du smra ba spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_brdzun du smra ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis brdzun du smra ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/_bdag gis kyang phra ma
[\[113a.5\]]spangs pa yin/_gzhan yang phra ma spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_phra ma spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis phra ma spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/_bdag gis kyang zhe gcod pa'i tshig spangs pa yin/_gzhan
[\[113a.6\]]yang zhe gcod pa'i tshig spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_zhe gcod pa'i tshig spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis zhe gcod pa'i tshig spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/_bdag gis kyang tshig 'khyal pa spangs pa yin/_
[\[113a.7\]]gzhan yang tshig 'khyal pa spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_tshig 'khyal pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis tshig 'khyal pa spangs pa de dag gi [#]legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/_bdag gis kyang chags sems spangs pa yin/_gzhan
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]yang chags sems spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_chags sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis chags sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/_bdag gis kyang gnod sems spangs pa yin/_
[\[113b.2\]]gzhan yang gnod sems spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_gnod sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis gnod sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/_bdag gis kyang log par lta ba spangs pa yin/_gzhan
[\[113b.3\]]yang log par lta ba spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_log par lta ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin te/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des 'dod pa'i khams su
[\[113b.4\]]gnas par mi byed/_gzugs kyi khams su gnas par mi byed/_gzugs med pa'i khams su gnas par mi byed/_nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mi byed de/_gzhan du na dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni [#]sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang
[\[113b.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_de ji ltar gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i 'du shes gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson
[\[113b.6\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
[\[113b.7\]]'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mir gyur pa'am mi ma yin par gyur pas sems rnam par 'khrugs [#]par byas pa'am
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]yan lag dang nying lag thams cad bcad gtubs [#]shing khyer te dor yang de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de 'di snyam du bdag las ci zhig bcad pa'am gtubs [#]pa'am khyer ro zhes bya bar mi sems
[\[114a.2\]]to[#]/_gzhan du na de 'di snyam du gang gi phyir bdag gi lus yongs su bsgrubs pa de dag 'dir 'ong zhing yan lag dang nying lag bcad gtubs [#]nas khyer zhing dor [#]ba ni bdag gis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo snyam mo/_/de ni chos rnams kyi rang bzhin yang legs par yid la byas pa yin
[\[114a.3\]]te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'i/_gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong [#]du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_de ji ltar gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su
[\[114a.4\]]bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i 'du shes gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom
[\[114a.5\]]ldan 'das ji ltar na [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
[\[114a.6\]]'dod pas dben pa[#]/_sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/_
[\[114a.7\]]sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de dag [#]dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]te/_bde ba lus kyis [#]myong ba 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la [#]rnam par dpyod [#]pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing
[\[114b.2\]]yid bde ba dang mi bde ba snga ma nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med/_sdug bsngal ba yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de sems can rnams la bde ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas byams pa tshad med pa la
[\[114b.3\]]nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de sems can rnams la sdug bsngal ba dang bral ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas snying rje tshad med pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de sems can rnams la dga' ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas dga' ba tshad med pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de
[\[114b.4\]]sems can rnams la sdug bsngal ba [#]dang bde ba med pa'i 'du shes yid la byed pas btang snyoms tshad med pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de gzugs la rags par 'du shes shing nam mkha' la zhi bar 'du shes pa yid la byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de
[\[114b.5\]]nam mkha' la rags par 'du shes shing rnam par shes pa la zhi bar 'du shes pa yid la byed pas rnam shes [#]mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam par shes pa la rags par 'du shes shing cung zad med pa la zhi bar 'du shes pa yid
[\[114b.6\]]la byed pas cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de cung zad med pa la rags par 'du shes shing 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la zhi bar 'du shes pa yid la byed pas [#]'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
[\[114b.7\]]so/_/de bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa yongs su mi len te/_gzhan du na sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i phyir de dag tu skye zhing sems can de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag la yongs su smin par byed de/_dge ba'i rtsa
[\[115a.2\]]ba bskyed pa'i don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'i/_
[\[115a.3\]]nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su yongs su mi bsngo ste/_de ji ltar gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su sngo [#]bar byed ces pa'i 'du shes gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[115a.4\]]chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[115a.5\]]yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po dang rdzas dang /_mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_tshul
[\[115a.6\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/nang stong pa nyid dngos po dang
[\[115a.7\]]rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo [#]/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes
[\[115b.2\]]su mi mthong /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
[\[115b.3\]]'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang [#]/_dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par
[\[115b.4\]]rjes su mi mthong /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
[\[115b.5\]]du dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_chos thams cad [#]dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas chos gang la yang gnas mi 'cha' zhing de ji skad du smra ba de ltar byed pa yin te/_de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos dang rang
[\[115b.6\]]sangs rgyas su mi bsngo'i/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_de ji ltar gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su sngo [#]bar byed ces bya ba'i 'du shes gsum mi
[\[115b.7\]]'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben/_sdig
[\[116a.2\]]to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa [#]dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod [#]pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste sems kyi rgyud
[\[116a.3\]]gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i [#]ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/_bde ba
[\[116a.4\]]lus kyis myong ba [#]'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par dpyod [#]pas btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang
[\[116a.5\]]mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med/_sdug bsngal ba yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa/_bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar la yang de bzhin du nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/
[\[116a.6\]]de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnas nas mi g.yeng ba'i yid kyis sems can de dag la zang zing gi sbyin pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa de yongs su gtong zhing gzhan zang zing gi sbyin pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo/_/zang zing gi sbyin pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa'i legs pa
[\[116a.7\]]brjod do[#]/_/gzhan yang zang zing gi sbyin pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'i/_gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]de ji ltar 'di la gang gis sngo [#]bar byed pa'am gang sngo [#]bar byed pa'am gang du sngo [#]bar byed pa'i 'du shes rnam pa gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar
[\[116b.2\]]yongs su sngo [#]bar byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[116b.3\]]po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems 'dod
[\[116b.4\]]chags dang ldan pa mi bskyed/_sems zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang /_gti mug dang ldan pa dang /_'tshe ba dang ldan pa mi bskyed/_gzhan du na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs
[\[116b.5\]]rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'i/_gzhan du na [#]sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_de ji ltar gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i 'du shes
[\[116b.6\]]gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub
[\[116b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]gnas shing gzugs la dbu ba lta bur rab tu rtog_/tshor ba la chu bur lta bu dang /_'du shes la smig [#]rgyu lta bu dang /_'du byed la chu shing lta bu dang /_rnam par shes pa la sgyu ma lta bur rab tu rtog ste/_de de ltar nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la so sor rtog
[\[117a.2\]]cing snying po med par 'du shes pa nye bar gnas pa yin te/[ #]de ltar so sor rtogs [#]pas de 'di snyam ste/_yan lag dang nying lag bcad gtubs [#]kyang su la spyod[#]/_su la bcad/_lus ni su'i lus/_tshor ba ni su'i tshor ba/_'du shes ni su'i 'du shes/_'du byed ni su'i 'du
[\[117a.3\]]byed/_rnam par shes pa ni su'i rnam par shes pa snyam ste/_de de ltar so sor rtog pa'i tshe 'di snyam ste/_gang la spyod pa dang kyal [#]pa byas na gnod sems skye ba de lta bu'i [#]spyod pa yang gang zhig yod/_'khyal pa yang gang zhig yod snyam ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos
[\[117a.4\]]dang rang sangs rgyas su mi bsngo'i/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_de ji ltar gang gis yongs su [#]bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su [#]bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su [#]bsngo ba'i 'du shes gsum mi 'jug
[\[117a.5\]]pa de ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no//_//bam po lnga bcu brgyad pa/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan
[\[117a.6\]]'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
[\[117a.7\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing 'dod pas dben/_sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod [#]pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam par rtog pa dang
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]rnam par dpyod [#]pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa/_ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas
[\[117b.2\]]dran pa dang ldan [#]zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par dpyod [#]pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de
[\[117b.3\]]bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing /_yid bde ba dang mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/_bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med pa btang snyoms dang [#]dran pa yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/_/de bsam gtan dang bsam
[\[117b.4\]]gtan gyi yan lag de dag la yang mtshan mar mi 'dzin te/_de de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed de/_de sa chen po 'di yang rab tu g.yo bar byed do/_/gcig tu gyur zhing mang por 'gyur ro/_/mang por gyur zhing
[\[117b.5\]]gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/snang ba dang mi snang ba yang [#]nyams su myong bar byed do/_/rtsig pa las thal ba dang /_ra [#]ba las thal ba dang /_ri las thal bar [#]thogs pa med par 'gro ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bya ba [#]bzhin no/_/nam mkha' la yang 'gro ste/_dper na
[\[117b.6\]]'dab chags bya bzhin no/_/sa la yang gyen du 'byung ba dang 'og tu 'dzul bar byed de/_dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no/_/chu la yang 'bying ba med par 'gro ste/_dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no/_/du bar 'thul zhing me [#]'bar te/_dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no/_/
[\[117b.7\]]nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che la 'di ltar mthu che zhing dbang che ba de dag kyang lag pas byugs shing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur [#]ro/_/de lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas lha dang mi'i sgra nye ba'am ring yang rung ste thos so/_/
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]de sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems la [#]sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la 'dod chags [#]dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/
[\[118a.2\]]bla na med pa'i sems kyi bar la bla na med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de ni sngon gyi gnas [#]rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te sems gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/_sems brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no/_/bskal pa gcig rjes su dran pa
[\[118a.3\]]nas bskal pa brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar du yang rjes su dran te/_bdag ni de lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya/[# ]rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/_yun ni 'di
[\[118a.4\]]srid cig tu 'dug 'dug_/tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/_de ltar bdag 'di [#]nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas/_de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas/_gtan tshigs dang bcas/_dan rtags dang bcas
[\[118a.5\]]par bdag dang gzhan gyi [#]gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no/_/de ni lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba nas sems can rnams las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_de mngon par shes pa lnga po
[\[118a.6\]]de dag la gnas nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_yongs su dri ba dang /_yongs su zhu ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
[\[118a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'i/_gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_de ji ltar gang gis yongs su bsngo
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]ba dang /_gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i 'du shes rnam pa gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
[\[118b.2\]]'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
[\[118b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi [#]pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pas gzugs mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so/_/mig mi dmigs so/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid mi
[\[118b.4\]]dmigs so/_/gzugs mi dmigs so/_/sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_chos mi dmigs so/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi dmigs so/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar du mi dmigs so/_/mig gi 'dus
[\[118b.5\]]te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar du mi dmigs so/_/sa'i khams mi dmigs so/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du mi dmigs so/_/ma rig pa mi dmigs so/_/rga shi'i bar du mi dmigs so/_/sbyin
[\[118b.6\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/_/nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs
[\[118b.7\]]so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
[\[119a.2\]]dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams
[\[119a.3\]]pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs so/_/'dus byas kyi khams mi dmigs so/_/'dus ma byas kyi khams mi dmigs so/_/de ltar mi dmigs pas na
[\[119a.4\]]mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/mngon par 'du mi byed pas na skye ba dang 'gag par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste/_chos rnams kyi chos kyi gnas nyid de ni gnas pa ste/_chos kyi dbyings de bzhin
[\[119a.5\]]nyid gnas pa'i phyir de mi skye mi 'gag pas de g.yeng ba med pa'i sems dang ldan par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral ba yin te dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos dang rang [#]sangs rgyas su yongs su mi bsngo'i/_sems can thams cad dang
[\[119a.6\]]thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_de ji ltar gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su sngo [#]ba'i 'du shes gsum [#]mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang
[\[119a.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sbyin
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/gsol
[\[119b.2\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bgyi bar yang dag par [#]rjes su mthong ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
[\[119b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so/_/phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so/_/stong pa
[\[119b.4\]]nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so/_/chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so/_/
[\[119b.5\]]'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi
[\[119b.6\]]dmigs so/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so/_/
[\[119b.7\]]rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so[#]/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de stong pa nyid bcu bzhi po de dag la gnas shing gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so[#]/_/tshor ba dang /_
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad
[\[120a.2\]]dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa
[\[120a.3\]]brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[120a.4\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/bla na med pa yang dag
[\[120a.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/'dus byas kyi khams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/'dus ma byas kyi khams stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar [#]dmigs te/_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[120a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di [#]la spyod cing /_zas sam/_skom mam/_bzhon pa'am/_gos sam/_me tog gam/_phreng ba'am/_spos sam/_byug pa'am/_mal cha'am/_gnas sam/_'tsho ba'am/_yo byad dam/_mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung [#]
[\[120a.7\]]sbyin pa gang dang gang gtong yang des sbyin pa de gtong zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_gang yongs su gtong ba dang gang la yongs su gtong ba de dag gtong [#]zhes bya bar rjes su mi mthong ste/_de la 'jungs pa'i sems sam yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems kyi skabs med do/_/
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad med de/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
[\[120b.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la ji ltar 'jungs pa'i thugs sam/_yongs su 'dzin pa'i thugs mi mnga' ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
[\[120b.3\]]phyin pa la spyod pa yang 'jungs pa'i sems sam yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems skye ba med de/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ston pa'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su yongs su mi bsngo'i/_sems
[\[120b.4\]]can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_de ji ltar gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i 'du shes gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar
[\[120b.5\]]na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing tshul
[\[120b.6\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing nyan thos kyi sa'am[#]/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i go skabs mi 'byed do/_/
[\[120b.7\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar [#]de nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yang mi dmigs so/_/sems de [#]yang mi dmigs te/_de sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spangs pa yin/_gzhan
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]yang srog gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_srog gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis srog gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/_bdag gis kyang ma byin par
[\[121a.2\]]len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /_brdzun du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_zhe gcod pa'i tshig dang /_tshig kyal [#]pa dang /_brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba spangs pa yin/_gzhan yang log [#]par lta ba spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba
[\[121a.3\]]yin/_log par lta ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin[#]/_tshul khrims des nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas kyi chos gang la yang chags par mi 'gyur na/_gzhan man
[\[121a.4\]]chad lta ci smos te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_de ji ltar gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du [#]yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i 'du shes
[\[121a.5\]]gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub
[\[121a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
[\[121a.7\]]shing rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa bskyed de/_de 'di snyam du 'di la chos gang yang skye ba'am 'gag pa'am 'byung ba'am/_'jig pa'am/_'chi [#]ba'am/_gshe ba'am/_spyo ba'am/_mtshang 'bru ba'am/_gcad [#]pa'am/_gtub [#]pa'am/_brdeg pa med do snyam [#]pas de la
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du gal te sems can thams cad drung du lhags nas spyos te bskyel [#]tam/_rdo dbyig gis brdegs sam/_mtshon gyis btab ste gcad cing gtubs [#]kyang de la 'di snyam ste/_kye ma chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ni
[\[121b.2\]]ngo mtshar che ste/_'di'i chos gang la yang spyo ba'am/_bskyel ba'am[#]/_gcad [#]pa'am/_gtub [#]pa'am/_brdeg pa'am/_bcing ba med do snyam ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su yongs su mi bsngo'i/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du
[\[121b.3\]]byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_de ji ltar gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i 'du shes gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
[\[121b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing brtson 'grus kyi pha
[\[121b.5\]]rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas te/_thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas lus dang
[\[121b.6\]]sems kyi brtson 'grus bskyed de/_'jig rten gyi khams gcig gam/_'jig rten gyi khams brgya'am/_'jig rten gyi khams stong ngam/_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar [#]du song ste/_sems can rnams la chos ston zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
[\[121b.7\]]pa la rab tu 'god do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rab tu 'god
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la rab tu 'god do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la
[\[122a.2\]]rab tu 'god do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la rab tu 'god do/_/de yang ci nas kyang 'dus byas kyi khams la rab tu bkod pa yang ma yin/_'dus ma byas kyi khams la rab tu bkod pa yang ma yin pa de ltar rab tu 'god de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang
[\[122a.3\]]nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su yongs su [#]mi bsngo'i/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_de ji ltar na gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang du [#]yongs su bsngo
[\[122a.4\]]ba'i 'du shes gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji
[\[122a.5\]]ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
[\[122a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin tam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tam/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang rung ste/_ting nge 'dzin gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la snyoms par 'jug
[\[122a.7\]]ste/_ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas shing rnam par thar pa brgyad la lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo /_/brgyad gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs can [#]gzugs
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/_/nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/_/bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las
