[\[142b.5\]]rnam par dkrug par mi bya'o/_/'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid do zhes
[\[142b.6\]]rnam par dkrug par mi bya'o/_/'di ni nang stong pa nyid do/_/'di ni nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid do zhes rnam par dkrug par [#]mi bya'o/_/'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ro/_/'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [#]kyi chos nyid do zhes bya bar rnam par dkrug par mi
[\[142b.7\]]bya'o/_/'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/_/'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid do zhes rnam par dkrug par mi bya'o/_/'di ni yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/_/'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid do zhes rnam par dkrug par mi bya'o/_/'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar ro/_/'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi chos
[\[143a.2\]]nyid do zhes rnam par dkrug par mi bya'o/_/'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid do zhes rnam par dkrug par mi bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos rnams kyi chos nyid rnam par dkrug par mi
[\[143a.3\]]bgyi ba lags na/_de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ni gzugs so/_/'di ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'o/_/'di ni skye mched do/_/'di ni khams so/_/'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[143a.4\]]rnams so/_/'di ni stong pa nyid rnams so/_/'di ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so/_/'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar ro/_/'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ro zhes bya bar bstan par mdzad pa de [#]na bcom ldan 'das kyis chos rnams kyi
[\[143a.5\]]chos nyid rnam par dkrug [#]par ma gyur tam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin te ngas ji ltar na gzhan rnams [#]khong du chud par 'gyur ro zhes ming dang mtshan mas chos rnams kyi chos nyid de dag bstan zhing chos rnams brjod kyi/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid rnam
[\[143a.6\]]par dkrug [#]pa med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te gzhan rnams khong du chud par bgyi ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis ming dang mtshan mas chos rnams kyi chos nyid de dag bstan te chos rnams brjod pa mdzad na/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ming ma mchis shing
[\[143a.7\]]mtshan ma ma mchis pa la ji ltar ming dang mtshan mas tha snyad du mdzad ces bya ba ni spyod pa rnam par 'khrugs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no[#]/_/'di dag gis ni 'dzin pa'i rtog pa dang po rnam pa dgu gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor tha snyad ni ming
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]dang mtshan ma'am mngon par zhen pa ma yin te/_rab 'byor 'dir ming dang [#]tha snyad du byed pa [#]ma yin zhing mtshan ma dang mngon par zhen pa la tha snyad du byed pa [#]yang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_nyan thos ni ming ngam mtshan ma la mngon par mi zhen to/_/rab 'byor ming ni
[\[143b.2\]]ming la mngon par mi zhen to/_/mtshan ma ni mtshan ma la [#]mngon par mi zhen to/_/rab 'byor gal te ming la mngon par chags par 'gyur ram/_mtshan ma la mngon par chags par 'gyur na ni stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par 'gyur ro/_/mtshan ma med pa yang mtshan ma
[\[143b.3\]]med pa la mngon par chags par 'gyur ro/_/smon pa med pa yang smon pa med pa la mngon par chags par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin nyid kyang de bzhin nyid la mngon par chags par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang yang dag pa'i mtha' la mngon par chags par 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi
[\[143b.4\]]dbyings kyang chos kyi dbyings la mngon par chags par 'gyur ro/_/'dus ma byas kyang 'dus ma byas la mngon par chags par 'gyur te/_chos 'di dag thams cad kyang ming tsam du zad pas na de dag ni ming tsam la gnas pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[143b.5\]]chen pos ming dang mtshan ma tsam la gnas te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste de la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar 'dus byas 'di dag thams cad ming dang mtshan ma tsam du bas pa lags na byang chub sems dpa'
[\[143b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po de dag gang gi [#]don du byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /_byang chub tu sems bskyed nas 'du byed rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar bgyid pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad [#]pa spyod pa lags/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing sbyin pa sna tshogs yongs su gtong ba dang /_
[\[143b.7\]]tshul khrims srung ba [#]dang /_bzod pa sgrub pa dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_shes rab sgom [#]pa dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad la spyod pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_
[\[144a.2\]]rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
[\[144a.3\]]dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa lags//_//bam po drug cu pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor [#]
[\[144a.4\]]de skad du gal te 'dus byas thams cad ming dang mtshan ma tsam du zad na/_'o na gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod ces zer ba ni/_rab 'byor de ltar 'dus byas thams cad ming dang mtshan ma tsam du zad de/_ming yang ming
[\[144a.5\]]gis stong /_mtshan ma yang mtshan mas stong pas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/chos
[\[144a.6\]]kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum gyi [#]yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_ming dang mtshan ma de la skye ba dang /_'jig pa dang gnas pa dang gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa'i rtog pa gnyis pa spyir nye bar dgod pa yin no//_//gsol
[\[144a.7\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces gsung ngam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces smra'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]gshegs pas thams cad shes pa nyid gsungs [#]la/_lam gyi rnam pa [#]shes pa nyid ces mdor gsungs pa [#]dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs na/_bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de gsum la khyad par ni ci zhig mchis/_bye brag
[\[144b.2\]]ni ci zhig mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yin no/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
[\[144b.3\]]yin no/_/thams cad shes pa nyid ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis [#]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi lags/_bcom
[\[144b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar rnam pa gang dag dang /_rtags gang dag [#]dang /_mtshan ma gang dag gis chos rnams brjod par bya ba'i rnam pa de dag dang /_rtags de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pas/_de'i phyir rnam pa
[\[144b.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yin no zhes bya'o [#]zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no//_//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du
[\[144b.6\]]lam shes pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam thams cad bskyed par bya/_lam thams cad shes par bya ste/_nyan thos kyi lam gang
[\[144b.7\]]yin pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi lam gang yin pa de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya zhing lam gyi bya ba yang ma byas [#]la yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yang [#]
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpas [#]yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par ma byas pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
[\[145a.2\]]par ma byas pa de srid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed do/_/de'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yin no zhes bya'o [#]zhes bya ba ni lam shes pa la kun du rmongs pa'i rnam par
[\[145a.3\]]rtog pa yin no//_//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du thams cad mkhyen [#]pa nyid nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor thams cad ces bya ba ni nang dang phyi'i bdag nyid can gyi chos 'di
[\[145a.4\]]dag yin la/_de dag thams cad ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis shes kyi/_lam thams cad kyis kyang ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad kyis kyang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni thams cad shes pa nyid la kun du rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no//_//gsol pa/_bcom ldan
[\[145a.5\]]'das ci lags/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam la gnas te yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bgyi'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na lam ma lags pa la gnas te'am/_bcom ldan
[\[145a.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_'o na lam yang lags la lam ma lags pa la yang [#]gnas te'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na lam yang ma lags la lam ma lags pa yang ma lags
[\[145a.7\]]pa la gnas te'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]khyod lam la gnas pas nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'o na lam ma yin [#]la la gnas te'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom
[\[145b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'o na lam yang yin la lam ma yin pa la [#]yang yin pa la gnas te'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'o na lam yang ma yin la lam ma yin pa la yang [#]gnas te nye bar len pa med par
[\[145b.3\]]zag pa las sems rnam par grol lam[#]/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sems ni gang la yang gnas pas nye bar len pa ma mchis par zag pa las rnam par grol ba ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sems ni gang la yang
[\[145b.4\]]mi gnas pas rnam par grol lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ci la yang mi gnas par yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bya'o/_/rab 'byor gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams
[\[145b.5\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni rnam pa gcig gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ste/_'di ltar zhi ba'i rnam pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di ltar yang rnam pa gang dang rtags gang dang mtshan ma gang gis chos rnams brjod par bya ba'i rnam pa
[\[145b.6\]]de dag dang rtags de dag dang mtshan ma de dag de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pas de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces
[\[145b.7\]]bgyi ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa 'di gsum las nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i rnam pa 'dis ni lhag ma ma lus par spangs so/_/'dis ni lhag ma ma lus par ma spangs so zhes bgyi ba'i bye brag mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nyon mongs pa spangs
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]pa la ni bye brag med de/_de bzhin gshegs pa la ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spang ba [#]mnga'o/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci
[\[146a.2\]]lags/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis 'dus ma bgyis ma thob par nyon mongs pa spangs sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_'dus ma bgyis la bye brag dmigs su mchis
[\[146a.3\]]sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar dmigs su ma mchis na ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad du 'di la bag chags kyi [#]mtshams sbyor ba spang ba [#]mnga'o/_/'di la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor
[\[146a.4\]]ba spangs pa med do zhes bka' stsal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa yang ma yin mod kyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi lus kyi rnam pa dang ngag gi rnam pa
[\[146a.5\]]yod de/_de dag gi bag chags kyi [#]mtshams sbyor ba de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo kun dang thun mong yang gnod par 'gyur ba ni ma yin te/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la [#]thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mi mnga'
[\[146a.6\]]zhing mi dmigs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te lam yang ma mchis la/_mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma mchis na/_'o na ci'i slad du 'di skad du 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni lan cig
[\[146a.7\]]phyir 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bshad/_bcom ldan
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
[\[146b.2\]]rgyas zhes bya ba de dag thams cad kyang 'dus ma byas kyi bar du [#]phye ba'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_'dus ma bgyis pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang [#]/_'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/_/
[\[146b.3\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi bar rab tu 'byed pa mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'dus ma byas ni rab tu 'byed pa med mod
[\[146b.4\]]kyi/_'on kyang tshig tshad mar byas shing brjod de/_don dam par ni rab tu dbye bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de la tshig gi lam gyi [#]gdags pa med do/_/'on kyang gang dang gang gis mtha' ma chod pa de dang de dag la phyi ma'i mtha' [#]gdags pa yin te/_rab 'byor chos
[\[146b.5\]]thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la sngon [#]gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs na/_phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de gnas med do/_/rab 'byor sems can de dag chos rnams [#]rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par mi [(]shas [,]shes [)]pas de dag la 'di skad du 'di ni sngon gyi mtha'
[\[146b.6\]]zhes bya'o/_/'di ni phyi ma'i mtha' zhes bstan te/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la sngon [#]gyi mtha' 'am/_phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs su med do/_/rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya
[\[146b.7\]]ste/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la [#]spyad na/_nang ngam phyi'i chos sam/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas sam/_nyan thos kyi chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos gang la yang mngon par chags par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
[\[147a.2\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa thob pa yin te de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
[\[147a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur[#]/_pha rol tu phyin pa [#]pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur bas/_de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan
[\[147a.4\]]yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis chos thams cad kyi mchog gi tshul du [#]phyed de/_chos de dag kun la yang 'khor ba ma dmigs pas de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o [#]zhes bya ba ni lam la kun du rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no//_//rab 'byor gzhan yang
[\[147a.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir de bzhin nyid kyang chud/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang chud/_chos kyi dbyings kyang chud de/_de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang gis kyang ldan pa'am/_mi ldan
[\[147a.6\]]pa'am/_bstan du yod pa'am/_bstan du med pa'am/_thogs pa dang bcas pa'am/_thogs pa med pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzugs med pa bstan du med pa mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o zhes bya ba ni de
[\[147a.7\]]bzhin nyid la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang mi ldan pa la kun du rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no//_//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi spobs pa thams cad dang snang ba thams cad bskyed pa [#]ste/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]bdud dam bdud kyi ris [#]kyi lha rnams sam/_gang zag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa nas mu stegs can gzhan [#]gyi bar dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po rnams kyis mi chod mi 'phrogs pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
[\[147b.2\]]gcad [#]par mi nus so/_/de [#]ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i don la
[\[147b.3\]]spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni mi mnyam pa nyid la rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no//_//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i don la spyod pas mi rtag [#]pa'i don la spyad par bya'o/_/sdug bsngal gyi don la spyad
[\[147b.4\]]par bya'o/_/bdag med pa'i don la spyad par bya'o/_/sdug bsngal shes pa'i don la spyad par bya'o/_/kun 'byung shes pa'i don dang /_'gog pa shes pa'i don dang /_lam shes pa'i don la spyad par bya'o/_/zag pa shes pa'i don dang /_mi skye ba shes pa'i don dang /_chos
[\[147b.5\]]shes pa'i don dang /_rjes su 'gro ba shes pa'i don dang /_kun rdzob shes pa'i don dang /_yongs su rtog pa shes pa'i don dang /_sgra ji bzhin shes pa'i don la spyad par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don
[\[147b.6\]]la spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la sogs pa la kun du rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no//_//gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la don dang don ma lags pa mi dmigs na/_'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[147b.7\]]chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i don la spyad par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don zab mo 'di la spyod pas 'di ltar spyad par bya ste/_'dod chags bdag
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]gi don ce'am don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/zhe sdang bdag gi don ce'am don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/gti mug bdag gi don ce'am don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug bdag gi don ce'am don
[\[148a.2\]]ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/log par lta ba bdag gi don ce'am don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/lta bar gyur pa thams cad [#]bdag gi don ce'am don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi de bzhin nyid ni [#]
[\[148a.3\]]gang la yang don du mi byed don ma yin par mi byed do/_/lta ba'i rnam pa gang [#]gi de bzhin nyid ni gang la'ang don du mi byed don ma yin par mi byed do/_/gzugs bdag gi don zhes [#]spyad par mi bya'o/_/gzugs bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam
[\[148a.4\]]par shes pa bdag gi don zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bdag gi don zhes [#]spyad par mi bya'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa thams
[\[148a.5\]]cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bdag gi don zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad
[\[148a.6\]]med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo
[\[148a.7\]]bdag gi don zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/gzungs kyi sgo bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag gi don zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du bdag gi don zhes spyad par mi bya'o/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi
[\[148b.2\]]bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_chos gang don du bya ba'am/_don med par bya ba de lta
[\[148b.3\]]bu gang yang ma dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyes kyang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma skyes kyang rung ste/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang chos kyi gnas ni gnas pa chos kyi dbyings ni gnas te[#]/_de ni gang la don yang mi byed/_don
[\[148b.4\]]ma yin pa yang mi byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos don dang don ma yin pa spangs te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang la yang don yang mi bgyid/_don
[\[148b.5\]]ma lags pa'ang mi bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos nyid gang yang mi byed de/_de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang la yang don du byed pa yang ma yin/_
[\[148b.6\]]don ma yin par byed pa yang ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na 'dus ma bgyis sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos 'phags pa thams cad kyi don ni [#]ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dus ma byas ni sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos
[\[148b.7\]]'phags pa thams cad kyi don kyang yin te/_phan pa'am gnod par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i de bzhin nyid ni gang la yang phan pa'am gnod par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos gang la yang [#]phan pa'am gnod par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dus ma byas kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs
[\[149a.2\]]shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa mi bgyid dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
[\[149a.3\]]thob par byed de/_gnyis kyi tshul gyis ma yin no zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin la kun du rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no//_//gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos kyis gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos thob par bgyid dam/_bcom
[\[149a.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_'o na gnyis kyi [#]chos shig gnyis kyi [#]chos thob par bgyid pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_'o na ji ltar thob par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
[\[149a.5\]]stsal pa/_nam gnyis kyi [#]chos sam gnyis su med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs pa na thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gnyis kyi chos sam/_gnyis su med pa'i chos mi dmigs par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
[\[149a.6\]]stsal pa/_dmigs su med pa la gzugs dmigs su med cing thob pa med do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dmigs su med cing thob pa med do zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa la kun du rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin te/_'di dag gis ni
[\[149a.7\]]'dzin pa'i rtog pa gnyis pa dgu gsungs pa yin no//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa yang dka' ba bgyid pa ste/_sems can zhes bgyi ba'am[#]/_sems can du gdags pa gang yang mi dmigs na/_de dag ni sems can rnams kyi slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs so/_/
[\[149b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu la la zhig nam mkha' gzhi ma mchis pa la ljang bu bskyed par 'tshal ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang sems can rnams kyi slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'tshal lo/_/
[\[149b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du [#]mngon par
[\[149b.4\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams sems can du 'dzin pa las yongs su 'grel pa ni dka' ba byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni dngos po med pa la dmigs pa'i ye shes ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid [#]yin no//_//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu la la zhig ni [#]ljang bu bskyed
[\[149b.5\]]par 'dod la/_skyes bu des ljang bu de'i rtsa ba ma dmigs/_yal ga dang /_sdong bu dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu ma dmigs par ljang bu de'i sdong bu skyed [#]de/_dus dus su chus bran zhing de'i sdong bu de rim gyis yal ga phun sum tshogs par gyur/_lo ma phun sum
[\[149b.6\]]tshogs par gyur[#]/_me tog phun sum tshogs par gyur[#]/_'bras bu phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang /_de [#]ljang bu de'i 'dab ma la spyod pa dang /_me tog la spyod pa dang /_'bras bu la spyod pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang sems can rnams
[\[149b.7\]]kyi phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/_de dag rim gyis [#]pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/_de dag lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu ltar sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/rab
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]'byor de la lo ma ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten zhing sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su sgrol ba'o/_/me tog ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten zhing rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba dang /_
[\[150a.2\]]bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skye ba dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i
[\[150a.3\]]mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_'od gsal dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_dge chung dang /_dge rgyas dang /_tshad med dge dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /_mi spong
[\[150a.4\]]ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_legs mthong dang /_rab lta dang /_'og min dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'o/_/'bras bu ni byang chub
[\[150a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas sems can de dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la rab tu
[\[150a.6\]]'god pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyid la brten zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas sems can thams cad la 'bras bus brjid par 'gyur ba dang /_de la gang gis yon phul ba de
[\[150a.7\]]dag kyang rim gyis 'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_theg pa chen po'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]'gyur yang de la sems can du'ang mi 'dogs/_sems can du gdags pa'ang med par sems can de dag kyang sems can du 'dzin pa las yongs su 'grel pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang gang gi don du bdag gis rnam pa
[\[150b.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o zhes bya ba'i sems can nam sems can du gdags pa gang [#]yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_
[\[150b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten [#]thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/mi khom pa dang /_ngan song
[\[150b.4\]]thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/dbul po thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/lam gyi rgyud [#]dma' ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa'i khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/[#]gzugs kyi khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/gzugs
[\[150b.5\]]med pa'i khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro[#]/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub
[\[150b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po med na 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod par mi 'gyur/_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_dgra bcom
[\[150b.7\]]pa rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/_mi khom pa thams cad dang dbul po thams cad kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/_'gro ba dman pa thams cad rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/_'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyang [#]rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/_gzugs kyi khams thams
[\[151a.2\]]cad dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de bas na gang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o zhes zer ba ni/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor
[\[151a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de [#]ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs par gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid gang gis rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid gang gis 'phags pa
[\[151a.4\]]thams cad du gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid gang gis gzugs su gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid gang gis tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes par gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid gang gis skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung
[\[151a.5\]]bar gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun du gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid gang gis 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs
[\[151a.6\]]med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams
[\[151a.7\]]su gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid gang gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]bar du gdags pa dang /_de bzhin nyid gang gis 'dus byas kyi khams dang /_'dus ma byas kyi bar du gdags pa de dag thams cad kyang de kho na bzhin te/_de bas na de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin nyid de la bslabs shing
[\[151b.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pas/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na de bzhin [#]nyid tshad mar byas te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang
[\[151b.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la slob
[\[151b.4\]]bo/_/chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la bslabs shing chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas shing chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la dbang du gyur pa thob par byed do/_/chos thams cad kyi de bzhin
[\[151b.5\]]nyid la dbang du gyur pa thob par byas shing sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la mkhas par byed do/_/dbang po la mkhas par byas shing dbang po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas pa [#]thob par byed do/_/dbang po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas pa thob par byas shing sems
[\[151b.6\]]can rnams kyi las rang gis byas pa shes par byed do/_/sems can rnams kyi rang gi las shes par byas shing smon pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/smon pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byas shing dus gsum du ye shes rnam par dag par byed do/_/dus gsum du ye
[\[151b.7\]]shes rnam par dag par byas shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par [(]byad [,]byed [)]do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid [#]thob par byed do/_/
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'god do/_/sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu bkod nas phung po lhag ma ma
[\[152a.2\]]lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su [#]mya ngan las 'da'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yon tan dang legs pa thams cad mthong nas bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
[\[152a.3\]]par bya'o/_/gzhan yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la spyod pa
[\[152a.4\]]de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di
[\[152a.5\]]la spyod pa de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas [#]pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi [#]bar 'os pa'o zhes bya ba ni ji skad du gsungs pa'i bsgom [#]pa'i lam gyi ye shes dang ldan pa ni yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa yin no//_//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
[\[152a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de'i bsod nams ji tsam zhig tu 'phel bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
[\[152a.7\]]pa/_rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad nyan thos kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur[#]/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur [#]na sems can de dag gi [#]bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa bcom
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa [#]mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das tshad ma mchis so/_/bde bar gshegs pa tshad ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan
[\[152b.2\]]thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par 'gyur ba'i [#]bsod nams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams las byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs de la ni
[\[152b.3\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa de dag gi bsod nams des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba'i cha dang /_bye ba brgya'i
[\[152b.4\]]cha dang /_bye ba stong gi cha dang /_bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni gang zag nyan thos dang
[\[152b.5\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa [#]rnams te/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas
[\[152b.6\]]kyi theg pa par gyur pa lta zhog gi_/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad nyan thos kyi yon tan dang ldan par gyur kyang /_de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i
[\[152b.7\]]char yang nye bar mi [#]'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong [(]gyi [,]gi [)]bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]rnams te/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi yon tan dang ldan par gyur pa
[\[153a.2\]]'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang ldan par gyur pa lta zhog gi_/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[153a.3\]]dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi [#]char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems
[\[153a.4\]]dpa' las byung ba ni dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la gnas pa rnams te/_dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa 'byung [#]ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/_/stong gsum gyi [#]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dkar po rnam
[\[153a.5\]]par mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi_/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad rigs kyi sa la gnas par gyur kyang /_de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi
[\[153a.6\]]brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/_stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni rigs kyi sa la gnas pa
[\[153a.7\]]rnams te/_rigs kyi sa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rigs kyi sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi_/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad brgyad pa'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang /_de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag
[\[153b.2\]]khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni brgyad pa'i sa rnams te/_brgyad pa'i sa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/_/stong
[\[153b.3\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad brgyad pa'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi_/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang /_de dag gi bsod
[\[153b.4\]]nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[153b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni mthong ba'i sa rnams te/_mthong ba'i sa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma [#]yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur pa
[\[153b.6\]]lta zhog gi_/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad bsrabs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang /_de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed [#]pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha
[\[153b.7\]]dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag [#]stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni bsrabs pa'i sa la gnas pa rnams te/_bsrabs pa'i sa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad bsrabs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi_/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad
[\[154a.2\]]'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang /_de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char
[\[154a.3\]]yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la gnas pa rnams te/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma
[\[154a.4\]]yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi_/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur
[\[154a.5\]]kyang /_de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod
[\[154a.6\]]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la gnas pa rnams te/_byas pa rtogs pa'i sa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
[\[154a.7\]]thams cad byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi_/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur kyang /_de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni rang sangs rgyas rnams
[\[154b.2\]]te/_rang sangs rgyas las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur pa [#]lta zhog gi_/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
[\[154b.3\]]sems can de dag [#]thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur kyang /_de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu zhugs pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya
[\[154b.4\]]phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs pa rnams te/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs pa las byung ba ni byang chub
[\[154b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur par [#]lta zhog gi gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
[\[154b.6\]]de dag thams cad byang chub tu zhugs par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag
[\[154b.7\]]stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/grangs su yang mi bzod[#]/_char yang mi bzod[#]/_bgrang bar yang mi bzod/_dper yang mi bzod/_rgyur yang mi bzod do zhes bya ba ni bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin no//_//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]po sems dang po bskyed pas ci yid la bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid sangs rgyas nyid yin no/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
[\[155a.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dngos po ji lta bu zhig mchis/_dmigs pa ji lta bu zhig mchis/_dbang sgyur [#]ba ji lta bu zhig mchis/_rnam pa ji lta bu zhig mchis/_mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhig mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad
[\[155a.3\]]mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni dngos po med pa/_mtshan nyid med pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_byed pa med pa/_skye ba med pa/_'byung ba med pa ste/_rab 'byor gang yang [#]'di skad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ni [#]ji lta bu/_dbang sgyur [#]ba ni ji lta bu/_rnam pa ni ji lta bu/_
[\[155a.4\]]mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu zhes zer ba ni/_rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ni dngos po med pa/_bdag po ni dran pa/_rnam pa ni zhi ba/_mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa yin te/_rab 'byor 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa'o/_/'di ni
[\[155a.5\]]dbang sgyur [#]ba'o/_/'di ni rnam pa'o/_/'di ni mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa dang /_bdag po dang rnam pa yin te/_'di dag gis ni bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa'o/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_rnam pa
[\[155a.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'ba' zhig dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam/_'on te gzugs kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten
[\[155a.7\]]cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin
[\[155b.2\]]gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po yang dngos po ma mchis pa
[\[155b.3\]]lags/_'dus byas kyi khams dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o/_/gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed
[\[155b.4\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang [#]dngos po med pa'o/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dngos po med pa'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dngos po med pa'o/_/
[\[155b.5\]]'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon
[\[155b.6\]]par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o/_/byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang
[\[155b.7\]]snyoms chen po yang dngos po med pa'o/_/'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos po med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med de/_rab 'byor gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/gsol pa/_
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sbyor ba las byung ba ni ngo bo nyid med de/_gang la sbyor ba las [#]byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med
[\[156a.2\]]pa'o/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa 'thad pa la log par rtog pa yin no//_//rab 'byor 'di ltar yang chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do/_/chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/_/
[\[156a.3\]]chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/_/rab 'byor 'di ltar yang chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do/_/chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid do/_/chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid do/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar chos thams cad
[\[156a.4\]]ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/_'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa thabs gang dang ldan pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
[\[156a.5\]]spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi
[\[156a.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_bsam gtan dang po dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
[\[156a.7\]]su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams [#]yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_nam mkha' mtha' yas
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa
[\[156b.2\]]nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa [#]dang /_sems can rnams [#]yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_
[\[156b.3\]]dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams [#]yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_
[\[156b.4\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /[# ]stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs
[\[156b.5\]]pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams [#]yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_bcom
[\[156b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yongs su 'dris par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams [#]yongs su smin par byed la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can de
[\[156b.7\]]dag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pa de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa
[\[157a.2\]]nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]bar la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags
[\[157a.3\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid
[\[157a.4\]]dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu [#]dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la
[\[157a.5\]]yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/byang chub kyi lam de yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rab tu shes te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing nam de bzhin
[\[157a.6\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par ma gyur pa de'i bar du byang chub
[\[157a.7\]]kyi lam de la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam ste/_lam de la gnas shing pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis [#]rnam pa thams cad
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe de'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang [#]mi skye bar spangs pas yongs su spong bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid la log par rtog [#]pa yin no//_//des sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen
[\[157b.2\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la rnam par lta ba na dngos po med par yang mi dmigs na/_dngos po yod par lta smos kyang ci dgos [#]so/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/_de ltar sbyin pa yongs su
[\[157b.3\]]gtong yang mi rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/_/len pa la yang mi rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/_/gtong ba la yang [#]mi rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po yod pa'am
[\[157b.4\]]dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/_/byang chub kyi sems de yang mi dmigs te/_mtshan mar mi byed yul du mi byed yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshul khrims srung [#]/_bzod pa sgom[#]/_brtson 'grus rtsom/_bsam gtan goms
[\[157b.5\]]par byed/_shes rab sgom ste/_de ltar shes rab sgom yang mi rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/_/gang shes rab de la sgom pa de yang mi rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med pa [#]yang yid la mi byed do/_/
[\[157b.6\]]sems can gang gi don du shes rab de la sgom pa de dag la'ang mi rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba
[\[157b.7\]]dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang
[\[158a.2\]]dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la mi rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
[\[158a.3\]]byang chub kyi bar [#]yang mi rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/_/gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang /_gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba de la yang mi rtog mtshan
[\[158a.4\]]mar mi byed de/_dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang ma mdzad/_rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams kyis kyang ma byas te/_chos thams cad ni byed
[\[158a.5\]]pa po med pa byed pa po dang bral ba'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags na/_chos rnams ni [#]chos rnams nyid dang bral ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor chos rnams ni chos rnams nyid
[\[158a.6\]]dang bral ba'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos rnams chos rnams nyid dang bral ba lags na/_ji ltar chos kyis chos la dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba'am/_dngos po ma mchis zhes bgyi bar yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma
[\[158a.7\]]mchis pa'i chos kyis dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos yongs su 'tshal bar mi rung ste/_dngos po mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang dngos po mchis pa'i chos yongs su 'tshal bar mi rung ngo /_/dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang dngos po mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi rung ngo /_/dngos po
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi rung ngo /_/de ltar chos thams cad yongs su 'tshal ba ma mchis pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la [#]dngos po mchis pa'am dngos po ma mchis par sems par yang ga la 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
[\[158b.2\]]stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'jig rten gyi kun rdzob nye bar bzung bas dngos po yod ces bya ba'am dngos po med ces bya bar ston te/_don dam par ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la
[\[158b.3\]]log par rtog pa yin no//_//gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyang gzhan zhig la don dam pa yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyang gzhan zhig la don dam pa'ang gzhan
[\[158b.4\]]zhig yin zhes bya ba yang med de[#]/_'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid don dam pa'i de bzhin nyid yin yang /_de la sems can de dag phyin ci log tu gyur pas de bzhin nyid de mi shes mi mthong ste/_de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig
[\[158b.5\]]rten gyi kun rdzob kyi dngos po yod ces bya ba'am dngos po med ces bya bar brjod do/_/rab 'byor 'di ltar yang sems can gang ji snyed cig phung po lnga la dngos po yod pa'i 'du shes su gyur te/_dngos po med par mi shes pa de dag gi don du chos rnams rab tu dbye ba nye bar bzung ste/_dngos po
[\[158b.6\]]med pa ji ltar shes par 'gyur zhe na [#]de skad du brjod do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bden pa gnyis la log par rtog pa yin no//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di
[\[158b.7\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bgyi na/_de skad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bgyi ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byang chub
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya ba ni de byang chub kyi don du spyod pas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la spyod pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
[\[159a.2\]]gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su mi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su mi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten
[\[159a.3\]]cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa zhes bya bar spyod do[#]/_/ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su mi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan
[\[159a.4\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/_bsam gtan dang po dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam
[\[159a.5\]]gtan bzhi pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/_
[\[159a.6\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa
[\[159a.7\]]dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/_sangs rgyas
[\[159b.2\]]kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_spobs pa dang /_yi ge mngon par sgrub pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/_yi ge la 'jug pa dang /_yi ge med pa la 'jug pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/_phra mo la 'jug pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod[#]/_gzugs stong pa
[\[159b.3\]]zhes bya bar spyod/_'dus byas kyi khams dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su mi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod[#]/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni byang chub tu spyod pa
[\[159b.4\]]yin te/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba la log par rtog pa yin no//_//bam po drug cu gcig pa/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas sangs
[\[159b.5\]]rgyas zhes bgyi na sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba de gang gi tshigs [#]bla dgas lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor yang dag pa'i don ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/_rab 'byor yang 'di ltar des yang dag pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de'i phyir sangs
[\[159b.6\]]rgyas zhes bya'o/_/yang dag pa'i don rab tu rtogs pas de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor yang 'di ltar de [#]chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog la log par rtog pa yin no//_//
[\[159b.7\]]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub byang chub ces bgyi na byang chub ces bgyi ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub ces bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so/_/de ni de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]dgas so/_/de ni ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshig bla dgas so/_/rab 'byor yang 'di ltar byang chub ces
[\[160a.2\]]bya ba de ni de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ba ste/_de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di ltar yang 'di lta ste/_byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming dang mtshan ma tsam ste/_de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor yang 'di ltar
[\[160a.3\]]yang dag pa'i don ni byang chub kyi don to/_/rab 'byor yang 'di ltar de ni chos thams cad ming dang mtshan ma tsam du rtogs par byed pa ste/_de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor yang 'di ltar dbyer med pa'i don ni byang chub kyi don to/_/rab 'byor yang 'di ltar de ni sangs rgyas
[\[160a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste/_de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor yang 'di ltar de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o zhes bya ba ni chos dkon mchog la log par rtog pa yin no//_//
[\[160a.5\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub 'di'i don du spyod pa de ci pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad la spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_
[\[160a.6\]]bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs
[\[160a.7\]]kyi sgo la spyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la spyod pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa lags sam/_chos gang zhig 'ong ba'am/_'gro ba'am/_nyams
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]pa'am/_'phel ba'am/_skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba la spyod pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la
[\[160b.2\]]spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad la spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i
[\[160b.3\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo la spyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi
[\[160b.4\]]chos ma 'dres pa la spyod pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa de la chos gang yang tshogs su 'gyur ba'am/_'grib pa'am/_'gong ba'am/_'phel ba'am/_skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do/_/
[\[160b.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub ni chos gang yang tshogs su 'gyur ba'am/_'grib par bya ba'am/_'gong bar bya ba'am/_'phel bar bya ba'am/_skye bar bya ba'am/_'gag par bya ba'am/_kun
[\[160b.6\]]nas nyon mongs par bya ba'am/_rnam par byang bar bya ba'i phyir de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas par bya ba ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub ni [#]chos gang
[\[160b.7\]]yang tshogs su 'gyur ba'am/_'grib par bgyi ba'am/_'gong bar bgyi ba'am/_'phel bar bgyi ba'am/_skye bar bgyi ba'am/_'gag par bgyi ba'am/_kun nas nyon mongs par bgyi ba'am/_rnam par byang bar bgyi ba'i slad du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]pa ma lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na de [#]ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/_ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[161a.2\]]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/_ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
[\[161a.3\]]kyi bar la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_
[\[161a.4\]]bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[161a.5\]]gzungs kyi sgo la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu la spyod par 'gyur/_
[\[161a.6\]]ji ltar nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni gnyis su spyod pa'i blo med de/_
[\[161a.7\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnyis kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/gnyis kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/gnyis kyis nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod do/_/gnyis kyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyod do/_/gnyis kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub
[\[161b.2\]]kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi spyod do/_/gnyis kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[161b.3\]]smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo la mi spyod do/_/gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la mi spyod do/_/gnyis kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
[\[161b.4\]]la mi spyod do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar gnyis kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do[#]/_/gnyis kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi
[\[161b.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/_gnyis kyis stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mi spyod/_gnyis kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i
[\[161b.6\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo la mi spyod/_gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs
[\[161b.7\]]pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la mi spyod/_gnyis kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyod na/_'o na de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]par spyod pa de dag [#]'phel bar 'gyur bas sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_sems slad ma bskyed pa'i bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor su gang gnyis la spyod pa de dag ni dge
[\[162a.2\]]ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni gnyis la brten pa ste/_de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par mi 'phel lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnyis la mi spyod de/_de ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye
[\[162a.3\]]bar bzung ste/_sems phyi ma bskyed pa'i bar du dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel te/_de ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nyams smad pas nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung [#]bar 'gyur ba'am/_mi dge ba'i chos gzhan gyis
[\[162a.4\]]yongs su phrogs [#]par gyur cing de dag gis yongs su phrogs pas [#]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par mi 'phel ba dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi
[\[162a.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par mi 'phel ba dang /_nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [#]kyi bar la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par mi 'phel ba dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_
[\[162a.6\]]yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par mi 'phel ba dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_
[\[162a.7\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]rnam par mi 'phel ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par mi 'phel ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad [#]mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos
[\[162b.2\]]rnam par mi 'phel pa de ltar nyams smad par mi nus te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi slad du
