[\[183a.7\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]'brel par 'byung ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/_/blang ba dang dor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/_/bsam gtan dang po dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga'
[\[183b.2\]]ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi
[\[183b.3\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa dang /_skye ba rjes su dran pa dang /_
[\[183b.4\]]dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang /_'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/_/mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang /_bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /_mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /_dngos po
[\[183b.5\]]med pa'i 'du shes dang /_bdag gi 'du shes dang /_sems can gyi 'du shes dang /_srog gi 'du shes dang /_skye ba'i 'du shes dang /_gso ba'i 'du shes dang /_skyes bu'i 'du shes dang /_gang zag gi 'du shes dang /_shed [#]las skyes kyi 'du shes dang /_shed bu'i 'du shes dang /_
[\[183b.6\]]byed pa po'i 'du shes dang /_tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang /_shes pa po'i 'du shes dang /_mthong ba po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/_/rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_bde ba'i 'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang /_bdag gi
[\[183b.7\]]'du shes dang /_bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /_zhi ba'i 'du shes dang /_ma zhi ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]'dzin dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/_/rtog pa dang bcas/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa med pa la dpyod [#]pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa med
[\[184a.2\]]cing dpyod [#]pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/_/sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_kun 'byung 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_sdug bsngal shes pa dang /_kun 'byung shes pa dang /_
[\[184a.3\]]'gog pa shes pa dang /_lam shes pa dang /_zad pa shes pa dang /_mi skye ba shes pa dang /_chos shes pa dang /_rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang /_kun rdzob shes pa dang /_'dris pa shes pa dang /_sgra ji bzhin pa shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/_/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad
[\[184a.4\]]dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/_/mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams
[\[184a.5\]]pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_rnam pa
[\[184a.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang /_bag chags kyi [#]mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dngos po'i 'du shes can la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa med do/_/dngos po'i 'du shes can la
[\[184a.7\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa med do/_/dngos po'i 'du shes can la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]spangs pa'i bar du med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dngos po la 'di ni bdag go zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags te/_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs
[\[184b.2\]]pa thams cad spangs pa'i bar 'di ni bdag go zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags par gyur pas[#]/_gang mtha' gnyis la chags par 'gyur ba de la ni thar pa med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dngos po'i 'du shes can la ni sbyin pa'ang med/_tshul khrims kyang med/_bzod pa yang
[\[184b.3\]]med/_brtson 'grus kyang med/_bsam gtan yang med/_shes rab kyang med/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i bar du yongs su shes pa med na/_de thar par 'gyur ba lta ga las 'ong /_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dngos po mchis zhes
[\[184b.4\]]bgyi ba ni ci lags/_dngos po ma mchis zhes bgyi ba ni ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gnyis ni dngos po yod pa'o/_/mi gnyis pa ni dngos po med pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gnyis zhes bgyi ba ni ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan
[\[184b.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/blang ba dang dor ba'i
[\[184b.6\]]'du shes ni gnyis so/_/bsam gtan dang po dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas [#]skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam
[\[184b.7\]]shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa dang /_skye ba rjes su dran pa dang /_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang /_'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes ni
[\[185a.2\]]gnyis so/_/mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal gyi [#]'du shes dang /_bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /_mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /_dngos po med pa'i 'du shes dang /_bdag gi 'du shes dang /_sems can gyi 'du shes dang /_srog gi 'du shes dang /_skye ba'i 'du shes
[\[185a.3\]]dang /_gso ba'i 'du shes dang /_skyes bu'i 'du shes dang /_gang zag gi 'du shes dang /_shed las skyes kyi 'du shes dang /_shed bu'i 'du shes dang /_byed pa po'i 'du shes dang /_tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang /_shes pa po'i 'du shes dang /_mthong ba po'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/
[\[185a.4\]]rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_bde ba'i 'du shes dang /_sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /_bdag gi 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad
[\[185a.5\]]dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/rtog pa dang bcas dpyod [#]pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa med pa la dpyod [#]pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa med cing dpyod [#]pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/sdug
[\[185a.6\]]bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_kun 'byung 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_sdug bsngal shes pa dang /_kun 'byung shes pa dang /_'gog pa shes pa dang /_lam shes pa dang /_zad pa shes pa dang /_mi skye ba
[\[185a.7\]]shes pa dang /_chos shes pa dang /_rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang /_kun rdzob shes pa dang /_'dris pa shes pa dang /_sgra ji bzhin pa shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi [#]'du shes ni gnyis
[\[185b.2\]]so/_/rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes
[\[185b.3\]]dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/rab 'byor de ltar de [#]ji snyed du 'du shes dang bcas pa thams cad dang /_de [#]ji snyed du 'du shes med pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis te/_ji tsam du gnyis pa de tsam du dngos po'o/_/ji tsam du dngos po yod pa de tsam du 'khor ba'o/_/
[\[185b.4\]]ji tsam du 'khor ba de tsam du sems can rnams skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrugs pa las yongs su mi 'grol [#]lo/_/'du shes thams cad yid la mi byed pa de ni gnyis su med
[\[185b.5\]]pa ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar gnyis kyi 'du shes can la sbyin pa med pa dang /_tshul khrims med pa dang /_bzod pa med pa dang /_brtson 'grus med pa dang /_bsam gtan med pa dang /_shes rab med pa dang /_lam med pa dang /_thob pa med pa dang /_mngon par rtogs pa
[\[185b.6\]]med par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gnyis kyi 'du shes can la ni chung ngu na mthun pa'i bzod pa yang med na/_gzugs yongs su [#]shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_skye mched
[\[185b.7\]]dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_blang ba dang /_dor ba yongs su [#]shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_bsam gtan dang po dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa dang /_
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'du
[\[186a.2\]]shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa dang /_
[\[186a.3\]]skye ba rjes su dran pa dang /_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang /_'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang /_bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /_mi sdug
[\[186a.4\]]pa'i 'du shes dang /_dngos po med pa'i 'du shes dang /_bdag gi 'du shes dang /_sems can gyi 'du shes dang /_srog gi 'du shes dang /_skye ba'i 'du shes dang /_gso ba'i 'du shes dang /_skyes bu'i 'du shes dang /_gang zag gi 'du shes dang /_shed las skyes kyi 'du shes dang /_
[\[186a.5\]]shed bu'i 'du shes dang /_byed pa po'i 'du shes dang /_tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang /_shes pa po'i 'du shes dang /_mthong ba po'i 'du shes yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_bde ba'i 'du shes dang /_sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /_bdag gi 'du shes
[\[186a.6\]]yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
[\[186a.7\]]yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_sdug bsngal 'phags
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]pa'i bden pa dang /_kun 'byung 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_sdug bsngal shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba shes pa dang /_'gog pa shes pa dang /_lam shes pa dang /_zad pa shes pa dang /_mi skye ba shes
[\[186b.2\]]pa dang /_chos shes pa dang /_rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang /_kun rdzob shes pa dang /_'dris pa shes pa dang /_sgra ji bzhin pa shes pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/
[\[186b.3\]]mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos [#]
[\[186b.4\]]'dres pa rnams yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su shes par
[\[186b.5\]]'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_gang la lam sgom pa med pa [#]de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang ga la yod/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang ga la yod/_bag
[\[186b.6\]]chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa yang ga la yod/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar dngos po'i 'du shes can la [#]mthun pa'i bzod pa yang ma mchis pas thob pa lta [#]ga
[\[186b.7\]]la mchis te ma mchis/_mngon par rtogs pa lta [#]ga la mchis te ma mchis na/_ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa'i 'du shes can la mthun pa'i bzod pa'am/_dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa'am/_rigs kyi sa'am/_brgyad pa'i sa'am/_mthong ba'i sa'am/_
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]bsrabs pa'i sa'am/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa'am/_byas pa rtogs pa'i sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa'am/_sangs rgyas kyi sa'am/_lam sgom pa gang la brten cing nyon mongs pa gang gis bsgribs pas byang
[\[187a.2\]]chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par chud par mi 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma chud pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob pas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams
[\[187a.3\]]cad mi spong ba'i sgrib pa nyan thos dang ldan pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba'i lam mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang skye ba ma mchis na[#]/_ji ltar chos de dag ma bskyed [#]par rnam pa thams cad
[\[187a.4\]]mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la mthun pa'i bzod pa med do/_/mngon par rtogs pa'i sa med do/_/dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa med do/_/rigs kyi sa med do/_/
[\[187a.5\]]brgyad pa'i sa med do/_/mthong ba'i sa med do/_/bsrabs pa'i sa med do/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa med do/_/byas pa rtogs pa'i sa med do/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa med do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi sa med do/_/lam sgom pa gang la brten cing nyon mongs pa
[\[187a.6\]]gang gis bsgribs pas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud par mi 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma chud pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob pas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa
[\[187a.7\]]thams cad mi spong ba'i sgrib pa nyan thos dang ldan pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa [#]de dag spong bar 'gyur ba'i lam med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dngos po
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]mchis par 'du shes pa dang /_dngos po ma mchis par 'du shes pa mchis sam/_gzugs su 'du shes pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams [#]dang /_rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang /_skye mched dang /_khams su 'du shes pa [#]dang /_'dod chags su
[\[187b.2\]]'du shes pa dang /_'dod chags spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_zhe sdang du 'du shes pa dang /_zhe sdang spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_gti mug tu 'du shes pa dang /_gti mug spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_ma rig par 'du shes pa dang /_ma rig pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_'du byed du 'du shes
[\[187b.3\]]pa dang /_'du byed spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang /_rnam par shes pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs su 'du shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_skye mched drug tu 'du shes pa dang /_skye mched drug tu spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_
[\[187b.4\]]reg par 'du shes pa dang /_reg pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_tshor bar 'du shes pa dang /_tshor ba spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_sred par 'du shes pa dang /_sred pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_len par 'du shes pa dang /_len pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_srid par 'du shes pa dang /_srid pa
[\[187b.5\]]spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_skye bar 'du shes pa dang /_skye ba spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_rga shir [#]'du shes pa dang /_rga shi spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don par 'du shes pa dang /_mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal du 'du shes pa dang /_
[\[187b.6\]]sdug bsngal kun [#]shes par bya ba spang [#]bar 'du shes pa dang /_kun 'byung bar 'du shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba [#]spang bar 'du shes pa dang /_'gog par 'du shes pa dang /_'gog pa mngon du bya ba spang [#]bar 'du shes pa dang /_lam du 'du shes pa dang /_lam sgom pa spang [#]bar 'du shes pa dang /_
[\[187b.7\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang /_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'du shes pa'i bar du mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni med do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos gang la yang dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am/_dngos po med par 'du shes pa med de[#]/_/gang la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang /_dngos po med par 'du shes pa med pa de nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'
[\[188a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa'o/_/gang la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang /_dngos po med par 'du shes pa med pa de nyid ni lam sgom pa'o/_/gang la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang /_dngos po med par 'du shes pa med pa de nyid ni 'bras bu'o/_/rab 'byor byang
[\[188a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam ni dngos po med pa'o/_/mngon par rtogs pa yang dngos po med pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad
[\[188a.4\]]dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba 'am[#]/_de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas chos thams cad la mnga'
[\[188a.5\]]bsgyur [#]ba'i yul la mnga' brnyes par 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la [#]sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/_'dod pas dben/_sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis
[\[188a.6\]]dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas dpyod [#]pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas par gyur te/_'on kyang ngas bsam gtan de dag dang /_bsam gtan gyi
[\[188a.7\]]yan lag de dag gi mtshan mar [#]ma bzung ste/_bsam gtan de dag gis snyems par ma gyur/_bsam gtan gyi ro myang [#]bar ma gyur/_bsam gtan du dmigs par ma gyur te/_de ltar ngas bsam gtan de dag gi rnam pa yongs su dag pa la mnyam par gzhag go/_/de ltar ngas bsam
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]gtan de dag gis [#]rnam par smin par byas nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi shes pa rnam pa tha dad pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar byas/_lha'i rna ba shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar byas/_pha rol gyi sems shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar byas/_sngon gyi
[\[188b.2\]]gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar byas/_lha'i mig gi [#]shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar byas te/_'on kyang ngas mngon par shes pa mngon du byas pa de dag la mtshan mar ma bzung ste/_mngon par shes pa de dag gis rlom sems su ma gyur[#]/_ro [#]
[\[188b.3\]]myong bar ma gyur/_dmigs par ma gyur te/_mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag nam mkha' lta bur yang dag par rjes su dran pas mnyam par gzhag ste/_de ltar ngas skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
[\[188b.4\]]'di ni sdug bsngal lo/_/'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu [#]shes par gyur te/_de ltar nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par gyur/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi
[\[188b.5\]]dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan par gyur nas sems can rnams phung po gsum du lung bstan par gyur to/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
[\[188b.6\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bsam gtan bzhi bskyed par gyur/_ji [#]ltar mngon par shes pa drug mngon par mkhyen pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_
[\[188b.7\]]byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bskyed par gyur/_sems can rnams kyang sems can ma mchis par yang ji ltar phung po gsum du lung bstan par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te 'dod pa rnams
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]dang sdig to mi dge ba'i chos rnams la rang gi ngo bo'am dngos po med pa zhig yod na ni/_rab 'byor ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_'dod pa rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_sdig to mi dge ba'i chos rnams dngos po med pa'i
[\[189a.2\]]ngo bo nyid du rig nas bsam gtan bzhi nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par yang [#]mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor 'di ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ma gtogs par 'dod pa rnams dang /_sdig to mi dge ba'i chos rnams la rang gi ngo bo'am dngos po med pa nyid med pa yin te/_rab 'byor de'i phyir sngon nga
[\[189a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_'dod pas dben pa[#]/_sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa[#]/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur [#]to/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa'i
[\[189a.4\]]bar la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to/_/rab 'byor gal te mngon par shes pa rnams la dngos po zhig yod de/_ngo bo 'am gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yod na ni/_rab 'byor ngas kyang mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
[\[189a.5\]]pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams la dngos po med de/_ngo bo nyid med pa/_gzhan gyi dngos po med pa ste/_gzhan du na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
[\[189a.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du thugs su chud de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_sems can rnams kyang phung po gsum du lung bstan to zhes bya ba ni
[\[189a.7\]]bsgom [#]pa'i lam la log par rtog pa ste/_'di dag gis ni log par rtog pa gsungs te/_de ltar na rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa bstan pa yin no/_/'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi [#]rjes su 'brangs nas yang dag par
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]gtugs pa las rtse mo'i [#]mngon par rtogs pa'i skabs te bslabs [#]pa yongs su dag pa [#]zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//bam po drug cu gsum pa/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan
[\[189b.2\]]'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya na bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos thams cad
[\[189b.3\]]dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis spyad [#]pa dang /_mthar gyis bslab pa dang mthar gyis nan tan du bgyi ba gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i
[\[189b.4\]]mthar gyis spyad [#]pa dang mthar gyis bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis nan tan du bgyi ba [#]ma mchis par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thog mar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub
[\[189b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang /_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba'i dgra bcom pa dag dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa dag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_byang chub sems
[\[189b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
[\[189b.7\]]nyid dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_'phags pa thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_'du byed rnams ni ngo bo nyid chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi gnas tsam yang med do zhes bya bar thos nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ci
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyang dngos
[\[190a.2\]]po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/_gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang rung /_gal te mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyang rung ste/_chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin gyi[#]/_ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang
[\[190a.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas te/_sems can dngos po'i 'du shes la spyod pa thams cad dngos po med pa la rab tu dgod [#]par bya'o snyam ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan
[\[190a.4\]]las 'da' ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'jug ste/_mthar gyis pa'i bya ba dang /_mthar gyis pa'i bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis pa'i sgrub pa gang la bslabs pas sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag
[\[190a.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de lta bu'i mthar gyis pa'i bya ba dang /_mthar gyis pa'i bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis pa'i sgrub pa rtsom mo/_/de thog mar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol
[\[190a.6\]]tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod do zhes bya ba ni/_mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs par [#]spyir bkod pa yin no//_//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[190a.7\]]dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/pha rol yang sbyin pa la rab tu 'jog go/_/sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa yongs su
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]gtong ba de dag gi [#]yang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de sbyin pa des longs spyod kyi phung po chen po thob nas ser sna med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong bar byed de/_zas 'dod pa la ni zas/_skom 'dod pa la ni skom/_bzhon pa 'dod pa la ni bzhon pa/_
[\[190b.2\]]gos 'dod pa la ni gos/_spos 'dod pa la ni spos/_phreng ba 'dod pa la ni phreng ba/_byug pa 'dod pa la ni byug pa/_mal cha 'dod pa la ni mal cha/_gnas 'dod pa la ni gnas/_mar me 'dod pa la ni mar me gtong ba nas/_mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba dag kyang de la gtong ba'i bar du
[\[190b.3\]]ste/_de sbyin pa de nyid kyis sems can rnams tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu [#]'god par byed do/_/de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam
[\[190b.4\]]par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid dang ldan pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
[\[190b.5\]]byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas sems can rnams [#]yongs su smin par byed do/_/sems can rnams [#]yongs su smin par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/chos
[\[190b.6\]]kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god par byed do/_/theg pa gsum la so sor bkod nas 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas mthar gyis pa'i bya ba [#]rab tu 'dogs te/_mthar
[\[190b.7\]]gyis pa'i bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis pa'i sgrub pa rab tu 'dogs te/_de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa yin no//_//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa
[\[191a.2\]]brjod do/_/gzhan tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de tshul khrims des sems can rnams lha'i che ba nyid dang mi'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do/_/de nor med pa'i sems can rnams la nor byin zhing
[\[191a.3\]]tshul khrims la rab tu 'god pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do/_/de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam
[\[191a.4\]]par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub
[\[191a.5\]]sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas sems can yongs su smin par byed do/_/sems can yongs su smin par byas nas rnam pa
[\[191a.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas [#]nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god do/_/theg pa gsum la so sor bkod nas 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar
[\[191a.7\]]byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims kyis mthar gyis pa'i bya ba rab tu 'dogs te/_mthar gyis pa'i bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis pa'i sgrub pa de rab tu 'dogs te/_de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims kyi [#]pha rol tu phyin pa la mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa yin no//_//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bdag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[191b.2\]]la spyod do/_/gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod do/_/gzhan yang [#]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de bzod pa des sems can
[\[191b.3\]]rnams tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/_/ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do/_/de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam
[\[191b.4\]]par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems
[\[191b.5\]]dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas rnam pa
[\[191b.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god do/_/theg pa gsum la so sor bkod nas 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do/_/rab 'byor
[\[191b.7\]]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pas [#]mthar gyis pa'i bya ba dang /_mthar gyis pa'i bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis pa'i sgrub pa rab tu 'dogs te/_de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do zhes bya ba ni bzod pa'i pha rol
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]tu phyin pa'i mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa yin no//_//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bdag kyang dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/gzhan yang
[\[192a.2\]]brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul lo/_/brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod do/_/gzhan brtson 'grus rtsom [#]pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de brtson 'grus des sems can rnams tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/_/ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab
[\[192a.3\]]dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do/_/de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang
[\[192a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go[#]/_/byang chub sems dpa'i
[\[192a.5\]]skyon med par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad
[\[192a.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god do/_/theg pa gsum la bkod [#]nas 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson
[\[192a.7\]]'grus kyis [#]mthar gyis pa'i bya ba [#]rab tu 'dogs te/_mthar gyis pa'i bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis pa'i sgrub pa de rab tu 'dogs te/_de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthar gyis
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]pa'i mngon par rtogs pa yin no//_//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bdag kyang tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/gzhan yang tshad med pa
[\[192b.2\]]dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la gzhog go/_/gzhan yang tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de tshad med pa dang /_
[\[192b.3\]]bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis sems can rnams tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/_/ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do/_/de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting
[\[192b.4\]]nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/_tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam
[\[192b.5\]]par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas
[\[192b.6\]]sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la
[\[192b.7\]]so sor 'god do/_/theg pa gsum la bkod nas 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyis mthar gyis pa'i bya ba dang /_mthar gyis pa'i bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis pa'i sgrub pa rab tu 'dogs te/_de
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]thams cad kyang dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa yin no//_//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems
[\[193a.2\]]dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bdag nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims srung [#]ngo /_/bzod pa sgrub [#]bo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog go/_/shes rab sgom mo/_/gzhan yang sbyin pa dang /_
[\[193a.3\]]tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab la rab tu gzhog go/_/sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi legs pa brjod do/_/gang gzhan sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang /_
[\[193a.4\]]tshul khrims srung [#]ba dang /_bzod pa sgrub pa dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa dang /_shes rab sgom pa de dag gi [#]legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de shes rab de nyid kyis sems can rnams tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin
[\[193a.5\]]dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god par byed do/_/de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid
[\[193a.6\]]dang ldan pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas sems can rnams yongs su
[\[193a.7\]]smin par byed do/_/sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god do/_/theg pa
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]gsum la bkod nas 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mthar gyis pa'i bya ba 'dogs/_mthar gyis pa'i bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis pa'i sgrub pa 'dogs te de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i
[\[193b.2\]]phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa yin no//_//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis pa'i bya ba dang /_mthar gyis pa'i bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis pa'i sgrub pa
[\[193b.3\]]la bslab [#]ste/_de sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du lhag par mos pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom mo/_/chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul
[\[193b.4\]]khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa sgom mo/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
[\[193b.5\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzugs su yid la mi byed de[#]/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yid la mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gzugs la ngo bo nyid med de/_gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/tshor ba
[\[193b.6\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la ngo bo nyid med de/_gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o
[\[193b.7\]]zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa yid la mi byed pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yin no//_//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis yid la mi byed/_sku gser gyi kha dog gis yid la mi byed/_'od 'dom gang bas yid la mi byed/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus [#]yid la mi byed de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid med [#]de/_
[\[194a.2\]]gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pas ni dngos po med par [#]dran par mi nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o zhes bya ba ni mtshan [#]la sogs pa yid la mi byed pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yin no//_//
[\[194a.3\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshul khrims kyi phung por yid la mi byed/_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol
[\[194a.4\]]ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung por yid la mi byed de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid med de/_gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dran pa
[\[194a.5\]]med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims la sogs pa'i phung po yid la mi byed pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yin no//_//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na/_de bzhin gshegs
[\[194a.6\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur yid la mi byed/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yid la mi byed de/_
[\[194a.7\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid med de/_gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o zhes bya ba ni stobs bcu la sogs
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]pa yid la mi byed pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yin no//_//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar yid la mi byed do/_/de ci'i
[\[194b.2\]]phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid med de/_gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yid la mi
[\[194b.3\]]byed pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yin no//_//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la [#]sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/_/de ltar na mthar gyis pa'i bya ba 'dogs par byed pa
[\[194b.4\]]dang /_mthar gyis pa'i bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis pa'i sgrub pa 'dogs par byed do/_/de mthar gyis pa'i bya ba dang /_mthar gyis pa'i bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis pa'i sgrub pa la slob pa na/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams
[\[194b.5\]]cad dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med
[\[194b.6\]]pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs
[\[194b.7\]]par byed do/_/mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de ni chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa
[\[195a.2\]]'am/_dngos po med par 'du shes pa yang med na/_dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa'am/_dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yin no//_//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rjes su dran pa sgom pa
[\[195a.3\]]yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos rjes su dran pa sgom pa na dge ba'i chos yid la mi byed/_mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i chos yid la mi byed/_'jig rten pa'i chos dang /_'jig rten las
[\[195a.4\]]'das pa'i chos dang /_zang zing dang bcas pa'i chos dang /_zang zing med pa'i chos dang /_'phags pa'i chos dang /_'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos dang /_zag pa med pa'i chos dang /_'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i chos dang /_gzugs kyi khams
[\[195a.5\]]su gtogs pa'i chos dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i chos dang /_'dus byas kyi chos dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos yid la mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos de dag la ngo bo nyid med de/_gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag [#]ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med
[\[195a.6\]]pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar dran pa med cing rjes su dran pa med pa ni chos rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rjes su dran pa de la bslabs shing dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa
[\[195a.7\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de ni chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am/_dngos po med par 'du shes pa yang med na/_dran pa'i las rdul tsam
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]yang yod pa'am/_dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos zhes bya ba ni chos rjes su dran pa yin no//_//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
[\[195b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang /_tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba phun sum tshogs pa'i skyes bu zung bzhi
[\[195b.3\]]dang /_skyes bu gang zag brgyad po de dag dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid med do/_/gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar
[\[195b.4\]]dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge 'dun rjes su dran pa de la bslabs shing dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de ni
[\[195b.5\]]chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am/_dngos po med par 'du shes pa'ang med na/_dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa'am/_dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun
[\[195b.6\]]rjes su dran pa yin no//_//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa sgom pa na/_tshul khrims
[\[195b.7\]]ma nyams pa/_skyon med pa/_ma 'dres pa/_nag nog med pa/_mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa/_dbang 'byor pa/_mkhas pas bsngags pa/_shin tu rdzogs pa[#]/_ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par byed pa la gnas te/_de tshul khrims des [#]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med de/_gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag [#]ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni/_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar
[\[196a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims rjes su dran pa de la bslabs shing /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de ni chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
[\[196a.3\]]bar 'gyur te/_de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am/_dngos po med par 'du shes pa yang med na/_dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa'am/_dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa yin no//_//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
[\[196a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gtong ba [#]rjes su dran par 'gyur zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gtong ba rjes su dran pa sgom nas [#]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
[\[196a.5\]]gtong ba rjes su dran par bya ste/_gang zang zing gtong ba dang /_chos gtong ba [#]yid la mi byed do[#]/_/de yan lag dang nying lag kyang yongs su gtong na dngos po gzhan lta ci zhig smos/_de ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang 'di ltar bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'o/_/dngos po ni 'di [#]btang ba'o/_/
[\[196a.6\]]'di la gtang [#]bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar dngos po med pa de dag la ngo bo nyid med de/_gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag [#]ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar dran pa med cing yid la byed pa
[\[196a.7\]]med pa ni gtong ba rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong ba rjes su dran pa la bslabs shing dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de ni chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am/_dngos po med par 'du shes pa yang med na/_dran pa'i las rdul tsam yod pa'am/_dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos zhes bya ba ni gtong ba rjes su dran pa yin no//_//rab 'byor ji
[\[196b.2\]]ltar na [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lha rjes su dran pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha rjes su dran pa sgom pa na/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba
[\[196b.3\]]dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba'i rgyun du zhugs pa'i lha gang yin pa de dag dang /_gzugs na spyod pa dang /_gzugs med pa na spyod pa skye ba'i phyir mi 'ong ba'i lha gang yin pa de dag dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yid la
[\[196b.4\]]byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid med de/_gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni lha rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar
[\[196b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha rjes su dran pa de la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de ni chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa
[\[196b.6\]]'am/_dngos po med par 'du shes pa'ang med na/_dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa'am dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos zhes bya ba ni lha rjes su dran pa yin no//_//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes su dran pa drug yid la byed pa'i mthar
[\[196b.7\]]gyis pa'i bya ba 'dogs te/_mthar gyis pa'i bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis pa'i sgrub pa de rab tu 'dogs te/_de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do zhes bya ba ni rjes su dran pa drug yin no//_//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mthar gyis pa'i bya ba yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa dang /_mthar gyis pa'i bslab pa dang /_mthar gyis pa'i sgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_rnam
[\[197a.2\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bya'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/_/yang
[\[197a.3\]]dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam la bslab par bya'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar
[\[197a.4\]]gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu [#]dang /_ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bya'o/_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
[\[197a.5\]]dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bslab par bya'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po rnams la bslab par bya'o/_/snying rje chen po la bslab par bya'o/_/[#]de byang chub kyi sems la de ltar slob pa na/_chos thams cad
[\[197a.6\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de la dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang med na/_gzugs sam/_tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa'am/_skye mched rnams sam/_khams rnams sam/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung
[\[197a.7\]]ba rnams sam/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams sam/_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sam/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad med pa rnams sam/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'am[#]/_mngon par shes pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/_mi 'jigs
[\[197b.2\]]pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_byams pa chen po'am/_snying rje chen po'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod par gyur pa'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yod par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de/_de ni
[\[197b.3\]]gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la slob pa'i mthar gyis pa'i spyod pa yod pa yin/_mthar gyis pa'i bslab pa yod pa yin/_mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/_de la sems dang spyod pa
[\[197b.4\]]dang bslab pa 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/[#]de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/_'o na ni gzugs kyang ma mchis/_tshor ba dang /_
[\[197b.5\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'ang ma mchis/_skye mched rnams dang /_khams rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang ma mchis/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams kyang ma mchis/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub
[\[197b.6\]]kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang ma mchis/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med
[\[197b.7\]]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang ma mchis/_rnam pa
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar yang ma mchis/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun yang ma mchis/_lam yang ma mchis/_'bras bu yang ma mchis/_nyon mongs pa yang ma mchis/_rnam par byang ba yang ma mchis/_thob pa'ang ma mchis/_mngon
[\[198a.2\]]par rtogs pa'ang ma mchis/_chos thams cad kyang ma mchis pa lags sam[#]/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la yod pa'am med pa zhig dmigs su yod snyam mam[#]/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom
[\[198a.3\]]ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la mchis pa'am ma mchis pa mi dmigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'o na ci'i phyir khyod de ltar gal te chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na gzugs kyang med/_tshor ba dang /_
[\[198a.4\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'ang med/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'ang med/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang med/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan
[\[198a.5\]]dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin
[\[198a.6\]]gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang med/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar yang med/_sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[198a.7\]]chos dang /_dge 'dun yang med/_lam yang med/_'bras bu yang med/_nyon mongs pa yang med/_rnam par byang ba yang med/_'thob pa'ang med/_mngon par rtogs pa'ang med/_chos thams cad kyang [#]med do zhes bya bar sems par gyur[#]/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]bdag ni chos 'di dag la [(]ner [,]nem [)]nur yang ma mchis/_the tshom yang ma mchis te/_'on kyang bcom ldan 'das ma byung ba'i dus na dge slong nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag 'di skad du/_gal te chos thams cad dngos po med
[\[198b.2\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/_chos thams cad dngos po med pa la su zhig kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur zhes mchi zhing /_de dag kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma 'tshal bas tshul khrims log par 'gyur/_lta ba log par 'gyur/_spyod pa log par 'gyur/_'tsho ba
[\[198b.3\]]log par 'gyur te/_tshul khrims log par gyur pa dang /_lta ba log par gyur pa dang /_spyod pa log par gyur pa dang /_'tsho ba log par gyur pas de dag sems can dmyal ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan song gsum las gcig tu mchis par 'gyur te/_
[\[198b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ma byung ba'i 'jig [#]pa de mthong nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don de zhu ba lags kyis [#]bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos 'di dag la nem nur ram the tshom ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab
[\[198b.5\]]'byor legs so legs so/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smra ba [#]de bzhin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/_don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na byang chub
[\[198b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
[\[198b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dmigs pa ni rgya chung ba ste/_dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la thob pa med do/_/mngon par rtogs pa med do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub med do/_/
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dmigs pa ma mchis pa la thob pa'am/_mngon par rtogs pa'am/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub [#]mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la rnam par 'khrug
[\[199a.2\]]pa med pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa nyid thob pa'o/_/mi dmigs pa nyid mngon par rtogs pa'o/_/mi dmigs pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub po/_/gang mi dmigs pa la thob pa'am/_mngon par rtogs pa'am/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa de ni
[\[199a.3\]]chos kyi dbyings la rnam par 'khrug par 'dod du zad do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar dmigs pa ma mchis pa la yang 'thob pa ma mchis/_mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma mchis la/_mi dmigs pa nyid thob pa/_mi
[\[199a.4\]]dmigs pa nyid mngon par rtogs pa/_mi dmigs pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lags na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa dang po yang ga la mchis/_sa gnyis pa yang ga la mchis/_sa gsum pa yang ga la mchis/_sa bcu
[\[199a.5\]]pa'i bar yang ga la mchis/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa yang ga la mchis/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa yang ga la mchis/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i sbyin pa'ang ga la mchis/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson
[\[199a.6\]]'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyang ga la mchis/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang ga la mchis[#]/_rnam par smin pa'i chos de dag la gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyis [#]pa dang /_sangs rgyas
[\[199a.7\]]kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la zhal zas dang /_btung ba dang /_na bza' dang /_gzims cha dang /_pho brang dang /_yo byad dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /[# ]byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_mar me dang /_phreng ba dang /_lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa gzhan gang yang rung ba dag gis rim gro bgyid cing de la de dag rgyun mi 'chad par yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sku gdung dang /_nyan thos dag la rnam par smin par gyur kyang
[\[199b.2\]]bas bar mi 'gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'khrug par bgyid par mi 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang gi [#]phyir mi dmigs pa de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[199b.3\]]dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'khrug par mi byed de/_de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa dang po yod do/_/de nyid kyi phyir sa gnyis pa dang /_sa gsum pa dang /_sa bcu pa'i bar du yod do/_/de nyid kyi phyir mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yod do/_/de nyid kyi phyir
[\[199b.4\]]rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa yod do/_/de nyid kyi phyir rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab yod do/_/de nyid kyi phyir rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
[\[199b.5\]]rnams yod do/_/de nyid kyi phyir rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
[\[199b.6\]]rnams la yang [#]zhal zas dang /_btung ba dang /_na bza' dang /_gzims cha dang /_pho brang dang /_yo byad dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_mar me dang /_lha dang /_
[\[199b.7\]]mi'i phun sum tshogs pa gzhan gang yang rung ba dag gis rim gro [#]byed cing de la [#]de dag la rgyun mi 'chad par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams kyi bar dang /_nyan thos dag la rnam par smin par gyur kyang zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams la bye brag ni ci zhig mchis/_tha dad du bgyi ba ni ci zhig mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab
[\[200a.2\]]'byor mi dmigs pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams la tha dad du bya ba gang yang med do/_/rab 'byor gos pa med pa'i sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus
[\[200a.3\]]dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_gos pa med pa'i mngon par shes pa dag la tha dad du bya ba bstan to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gos pa ma mchis pa'i sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_mngon
[\[200a.4\]]par shes pa rnams la ji ltar tha dad du bgyi ba bstan/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa mi dmigs/_gtong ba mi dmigs/_len pa mi dmigs par
[\[200a.5\]]sbyin pa gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims mi dmigs par tshul khrims srung [#]ngo /_/bzod pa mi dmigs par bzod pa sgom mo/_/brtson 'grus mi dmigs par brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/ting nge 'dzin mi dmigs par ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go/_/shes rab mi dmigs par shes
[\[200a.6\]]rab sgom mo/_/mngon par shes pa mi dmigs par mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs par dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod do/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan
[\[200a.7\]]lag dang /_lam mi dmigs par lam la spyod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs par gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod do/_/rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs par mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa [#]rnams la spyod do/_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa mi dmigs par smon pa med pa la spyod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs
[\[200b.2\]]kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs par so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la [#]spyod do/_/byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs par
[\[200b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod do/_/sems can rnams mi dmigs par sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi dmigs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mi dmigs par byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
[\[200b.4\]]'tshang rgya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_de la bdud sdig can rnams sam/_bdud kyi
[\[200b.5\]]ris kyi lha rnams kyis thub par dka' ba yin no zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pa'i mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs [#]pa yin no/_/'di dag gis ni mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa gsungs so/_/'phags pa [#]bcom ldan 'das ma [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[200b.6\]]pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rjes su 'brangs nas dag par gtugs pa las mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'i dbang du mdzad pa rim gyis 'jug pas [#]bslab pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das
[\[200b.7\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ji ltar sems bskyed pa gcig gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag
[\[201a.2\]]brgyad pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[201a.3\]]phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying
[\[201a.4\]]rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su 'dzin pa lags zhes bya ba ni sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa spyir gsungs pa yin no//_//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
[\[201a.5\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/tshul khrims gang srung ba [#]dang /_bzod pa gang sgom pa dang /_brtson 'grus gang rtsom pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin
[\[201a.6\]]gang la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_shes rab gang la [#]sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par [#]'jug pa rnams la gang snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_dran pa nye bar
[\[201a.7\]]gzhag pa rnams la gang sgom pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi [#]rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gang sgom pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_rnam
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams [#]la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin [(]na[,]no[)]/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la [#]sgom pa dang /_ting
[\[201b.2\]]nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[201b.3\]]pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/mtshan rnams dang /_dpe byad bzang po rnams gang mngon par sgrub pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar
[\[201b.4\]]spyod pa ni sems bskyed pa gcig gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba
[\[201b.5\]]rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_rnam par
[\[201b.6\]]thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa [#]rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs
[\[201b.7\]]pa'i [#]stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams dang /_dpe byad bzang po rnams yongs su
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa de sems can [#]sems bskyed pa gcig gis ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bsam gtan rnams dang /_
[\[202a.2\]]tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags
[\[202a.3\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_stong pa nyid thams
[\[202a.4\]]cad [#]yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs
[\[202a.5\]]su 'dzin pa lags/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa gang gtong
[\[202a.6\]]ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par gtong ste/_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims gang srung [#]ba dang /_bzod pa gang sgom pa dang /_brtson 'grus gang rtsom pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_shes rab gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha
[\[202a.7\]]rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste/_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro/_/nang stong pa nyid gang sgom pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste/_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste/_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis
[\[202b.2\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig [#]
[\[202b.3\]]pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste/_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro/_/mtshan rnams dang /_dpe byad bzang po rnams gang mngon par sgrub pa de
[\[202b.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par mngon par sgrub ste/_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ji ltar na sbyin pa gtong ba dang /_de la gnyis kyi
[\[202b.5\]]'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags/_ji ltar na tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab sgom pa dang /_de [#]gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags/_ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgom pa dang /_
