[\[202b.6\]]de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags/_ji ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
[\[202b.7\]]pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang /_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags/_ji ltar na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu mngon par sgrub pa dang /_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes
[\[203a.2\]]su mi 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa der pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[203a.3\]]drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing sbyin pa gtong ba nas/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du [#]'dus par byas nas sbyin pa gtong ngo [#]/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[203a.4\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
[\[203a.5\]]do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/_
[\[203a.6\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa gtong ba de'i tshe/_zag pa med pa'i sems la gnas shing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/_de zag pa med pa'i sems de dag [#]la gnas te/_gang la sbyin pa dang /_gang sbyin
[\[203a.7\]]pa dang /_gang gis sbyin pa'i mtshan ma yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems zag pa med pa'i sems sred pa dang bral zhing dngos po dang bral bas sbyin pa gtong ste/_des sbyin pa de yang yang [#]dag par rjes su mi mthong /_sems de yang yang dag par rjes
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]su mi mthong /_len pa po de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nas/_des sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing mtshan ma
[\[203b.2\]]dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims [#]srung ba'i tshe/_tshul khrims de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sems de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //_//bam po drug cu
[\[203b.3\]]bzhi pa/_rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bzod pa sgom pa'i tshe/_bzod pa de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sems de yang yang dag par rjes su mi
[\[203b.4\]]mthong ba nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe/_des brtson
[\[203b.5\]]'grus de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sems de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[203b.6\]]la spyod cing mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis [#]bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe/_bsam gtan de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sems de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du yang yang dag par rjes su
[\[203b.7\]]mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom pa'i tshe/_shes rab de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sems de yang yang dag par rjes su mi
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]mthong ba nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du yang yang [#]dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis
[\[204a.2\]]nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i
[\[204a.3\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa
[\[204a.4\]]med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_mi chen po'i
[\[204a.5\]]mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu mngon par sgrub pa'i tshe/_sems de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nas sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_chos thams cad kyi bar du yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor gyis
[\[204a.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[204a.7\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad
[\[204b.2\]]med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin
[\[204b.3\]]gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
[\[204b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa gtong ba yin te/_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bgo ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_gnas dang /_khyim dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_dbyig dang /_gser dang /_
[\[204b.5\]]nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dngul dang /_mi'i cha dang /_yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar dag dang /_chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mo dang /_phyi dang /_nang ngam/_yan lag dang /_nying lag dang /_rgyal srid kyang rung /_rgyan
[\[204b.6\]]gyis brgyan cing slong ba rnams la yongs su gtong ste/_gal te de'i drung du la la zhig 'ongs shing /_'di skad du khyod kyi sbyin pa de lta bur de ltar phan pa med pa/_mi brtan pa yongs su btang ba des ci zhig bya zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
[\[204b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de 'di snyam du bdag la sems can 'di dag khyod kyi sbyin pa de ltar phan pa med pa mi brtan pa yongs su btang ba des ci zhig bya zhes zer mod kyi/_'on kyang bdag gis sbyin pa yongs su gtang bar bya'i/_bdag gis sbyin pa mi sbyin par mi bya'o snyam nas/_des sbyin pa
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_ci nas kyang yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe/_gang la sbyin pa dang /_gang sbyin pa dang /_gang gis sbyin pa dang /_su yongs su gtong ba dang /_ci yongs su gtong ba
[\[205a.2\]]dang /_su la yongs su gtong ba dang /_ci yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang la yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_su yongs su bsngo ba dang /_ci yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i mtshan ma gang yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de ltar yongs su bsngo
[\[205a.3\]]ste/_de gang gtong ba dang /_gang gi phyir btang ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de lta bus dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dngos po thams cad ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong /_phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong /_phyi nang stong pa
[\[205a.4\]]nyid kyis stong /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong ngo /_/des de ltar chos thams cad stong par yang rjes su mthong na/_ci zhig yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur/_gang la yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur/_gang gis yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur te/_de'i bsngo ba de lta bu'i bsngo ba ni
[\[205a.5\]]dam pa yin te dug med pa'i bsngo ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi bsngo ba yin te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_'byung ba
[\[205a.6\]]med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi
[\[205a.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs
[\[205b.2\]]pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de thog ma nyid du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang /_rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin te/_'on kyang
[\[205b.3\]]de'i yo byad bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub bo/_/[#]rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni bsams [#]pa tsam gyis 'byung ngo /_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]yo byad phun sum tshogs
[\[205b.4\]]pa thams cad kyang bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung ngo /_/de [#]yo byad de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yang bsnyen bkur byed/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang tshim par byed do/_/des sems can de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des yang dag par
[\[205b.5\]]bsdus te/_thabs mkhas pas theg pa gsum la rab tu 'jog go/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_zag pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab
[\[205b.6\]]'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
[\[205b.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de 'phags pa'i tshul khrims zag pa med pa/_lam gyi khongs su chud pa dang [#]/_chos nyid kyis [#]
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]thob pa de rab tu 'thob ste/_de'i tshul khrims kyi phung po de yang ma nyams pa skyon med pa mkhas pas bstod pa yin te/_tshul khrims des chos 'ga' yang mchog tu 'dzin pa med de gzugs sam/_tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa'am/_
[\[206a.2\]]mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar ram/_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la [#]chen po lta bu'am/_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams sam[#]/_sum cu rtsa gsum
[\[206a.3\]]dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /[# ]tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_
[\[206a.4\]]sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /_mi spong ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_legs mthong dang /_rab lta dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams sam/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad
[\[206a.5\]]med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams sam/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am[#]/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang sangs rgyas sam/_'khor los sgyur [#]ba'i rgyal po'i dbang phyug
[\[206a.6\]]tshul khrims 'dis thob par bya'o zhes mchog tu 'dzin pa med do/_/gzhan du na tshul khrims de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mtshan ma med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba dang /_dmigs pa med pa dang /_gnyis su med pa'i yongs su bsngo bas
[\[206a.7\]]yongs su bsngo ste/_de yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du[#]/_don dam par ni [#]ma yin no/_/de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa de dang /_thabs mkhas pas ro myang ba med pa'i tshul gyis [#]bsam gtan bzhi sgrub po/_/de lha'i mig mngon par sgrub ste/_lha'i mig rnam par smin pa
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]las byung ba des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/_de'i mthong ba de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
[\[206b.2\]]tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lha'i mig rnam par smin pa las byung ba des lho dang nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs
[\[206b.3\]]med dpag tu med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/_de'i mthong ba de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de lha'i
[\[206b.4\]]rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gsungs pa'i sgra thos te/_de'i thos pa de yang ji srid du thos pa des bdag dang gzhan gyi don byas par ma gyur gyi bar du chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sems kyi rnam par shes pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
[\[206b.5\]]'das de dag gi thugs sems kyis rab tu shes te/_des sems kyi rnam pa shes pa de yang ji srid du sems kyi rnam pa shes pa des sems can thams cad kyi don byas par ma gyur gyi bar du chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pas sems can de dag gi 'das pa
[\[206b.6\]]dang ma 'ongs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams shes shing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis sems can de dag yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par bskul lo/_/yang dag par gzengs bstod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/de dag de ltar yang dag par bstan pa dang /_yang dag par dga' ba'i
[\[206b.7\]]bar du byas pa rnams kyang khyad par du 'dong bar 'gyur ro/_/zag pa zad pa'i shes pas kyang sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu gzhog go/_/rang
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]byang chub la rab tu gzhog go/_/byang chub la rab tu gzhog go/_/[#]de bzhin du sems can rnams dge ba'i chos gang dang gang la mthu yod pa de dang de la rab tu gzhog go[#]/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[207a.2\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mtshan ma [#]ma mchis pa dang /_dmigs su ma mchis pa dang /_spob [#]pa med pa rnams la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
[\[207a.3\]]pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_snying po byang
[\[207a.4\]]chub la 'dug gi bar du de'i drung du sems can thams cad yang dang yang 'ongs te/_rdo ba dang dbyig pas brdegs shing mtshon gyis btab kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khrugs [#]pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/_/de la byang chub
[\[207a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bzod pa gnyis bsgom par bya'o/_/gnyis gang zhe na/_spyo ba dang /_dbyig pa dang /_bong ba la sogs pas brdeg pa'i sems can rnams thams cad la bzod par bya ba gang yin pa dang /_'di'i mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa skyed par [#]byed pa
[\[207a.6\]]gang yin pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos spyo ba dang /_mtshang 'dru [#]ba dang /_bong ba dang /_dbyig pa la sogs pas brdeg pa la 'di ltar so sor brtag par bya ste/_nga la spyo bar [#]byed pa'am/_mtshang 'dru [#]bar byed pa'am/_bong ba dang dbyig pa dang
[\[207a.7\]]mtshon gyis rdeg [#]par byed pa su zhig yod ces 'di ltar so sor brtag par bya'o/_/des chos rnams kyi rang bzhin la so sor brtag par bya ste/_chos thams cad la so sor brtags [#]pa na chos nyid kyang ma [#]dmigs na/_chos rnams [#]kyi rang bzhin lta ga la mchis zhes brtag par bya'o/_/
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]de de ltar chos kyi rang bzhin la so sor rtog pa na 'di snyam du bdag la 'bigs pa'am gcod par byed pa su yod snyam du sems so/_/des chos kyi rang bzhin la de ltar rtog pa na mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa rab tu thob bo/_/de [#]ci'i phyir bzod pa zhes bya zhe na/_nyon mongs pa mi skye ba dang
[\[207b.2\]]ye shes mi chod pa'i phyir bzod pa ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'o/_/de bzod pa de gnyis la gnas shing bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_
[\[207b.3\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi
[\[207b.4\]]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa/_'jig rten las 'das pa/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun
[\[207b.5\]]mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas te/_'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mngon par shes pa de dag yongs su rdzogs nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par sgrub po/_/de mngon par shes pa de la gnas te/_lha'i mig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
[\[207b.6\]]tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob po/_/de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de yang
[\[207b.7\]]nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad do/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob po/_/de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de yang nam bla na med pa yang dag
[\[208a.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad do/_/de [#]lha'i rna ba mi [#]las 'das pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gsungs pa thos te/_thos nas kyang 'dzin to/_/bzung nas kyang de bzhin du nan tan [#]byed do/_/de bzhin nyid [#]du nan tan byas nas kyang de bzhin
[\[208a.3\]]nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs sems kyis [#]rab tu shes so/_/'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyi [#]sems kyang rab tu shes so/_/de sems can thams cad kyi
[\[208a.4\]]sems sems [(]gyis [,]kyis [)]yongs su shes par byas shing de bzhin nyid du chos ston to/_/de sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pas sems can de dag gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su shes par byas shing yang sems can de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par bskul [#]lo/_/yang dag
[\[208a.5\]]par gzengs bstod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/de zag pa zad pa shes te/_de zag pa zad pa shes pa des sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'god do/_/rab tu 'jog par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing
[\[208a.6\]]thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya'o/_/bla na med pa yang
[\[208a.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum gyis [#]'khor ba las yongs su 'grel to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan ma med
[\[208b.2\]]pa dang /_zag pa med pa/_'bad rtsol med pa/_snang ba med pa'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
[\[208b.3\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_lus kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/_sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin te/_de lus kyi brtson 'grus la gnas nas/_bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/bsam
[\[208b.4\]]gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/des [#]bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par gzhag cing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed do/_/nyi ma dang zla ba'i bar du lag pas byugs shing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
[\[208b.5\]]gyi bar du lus kyis [#]dbang bsgyur te/_de lus kyi brtson 'grus de lta bu dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na [#]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang [#]ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag tu song zhing
[\[208b.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byed de[#]/_na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad mang po [#]de dag kyang nam bla na med pa yang
[\[208b.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du zad par mi 'gyur te/_byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad mang pos lha dang /_mi dang lha ma yin du bcas [#]pa'i 'jig
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]rten bde bar 'gyur ro/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang ring bsrel la ring bsrel gyi mchod pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi drung du song zhing chos nyan te/_ji skad du thos pa de yang bla na med pa
[\[209a.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su 'dzin to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
[\[209a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la lus kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[209a.4\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ci ltar [#]sems kyi brtson 'grus 'phags pa zag pa med pa lam gyi yan lag gi khongs su gtogs pa dang ldan pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/
[\[209a.5\]]sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas lus kyi las mi dge ba'i skabs mi 'byed[#]/_ngag gi [#]las mi dge ba'i skabs mi 'byed/_yid kyi las mi dge ba'i skabs mi 'byed de/_rtag ces bya ba'am/_mi rtag ces bya ba'am/_bde zhes bya ba'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/_bdag ces
[\[209a.6\]]bya ba'am/_bdag med ces bya ba'am/_zhi zhes bya ba'am/_ma zhi zhes bya ba'am/_'dod pa'i khams sam/_gzugs kyi khams sam/_gzugs med pa'i khams sam/_zag pa dang bcas pa'i khams sam/_zag pa med pa'i khams sam/_bsam gtan dang po'am/_bsam
[\[209a.7\]]gtan gnyis pa'am/_bsam gtan gsum pa'am/_bsam gtan bzhi pa'am/_byams pa'am/_snying rje'am/_dga' ba'am/_btang snyoms sam/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dam/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dam/_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dam/_'du shes
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]med 'du shes med min skye mched dam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/_'phags
[\[209b.2\]]pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad med pa rnams sam/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_stong pa nyid dam/_mtshan ma med pa'am/_smon pa med
[\[209b.3\]]pa'am/_mngon par shes pa'am/_ting nge 'dzin tam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/_mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_byams pa chen po'am/_snying rje chen po'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
[\[209b.4\]]pa rnams la yang rtag ces bya ba'am/_mi rtag ces bya ba'am/_bde zhes bya ba'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/_bdag ces bya ba'am/_bdag med ces bya ba'am/_zhi zhes bya ba'am/_ma zhi zhes bya ba'am/_dge zhes bya ba'am/_mi dge zhes bya ba'am/_'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'am/_
[\[209b.5\]]'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya ba'am/_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/_nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'am/_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/_kha na ma tho ba med pa zhes bya ba'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/_zag pa med pa zhes bya ba'am/_kun nas nyon
[\[209b.6\]]mongs pa zhes bya ba'am/_rnam par byang ba zhes bya ba'am/_'dus byas zhes bya ba'am/_'dus ma byas zhes bya ba snyems pa med do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu snyems pa med do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang
[\[209b.7\]]chub dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nyid dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu snyems pa med do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /_dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas zhes bya bar [#]snyems pa med do/_/sems can de [#]dag ni mthong ba'i lam gyis rab tu phye ba/_'di dag ni bsrabs pa'i sas rab tu phye ba/_'di dag ni 'og ma'i cha dang mthun pas rab tu phye ba/_'di dag ni gong ma'i cha
[\[210a.2\]]dang mthun pas rab tu phye ba/_'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas nyid kyis rab tu brjod pa/_'di dag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis rab tu brjod pa/_'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rab tu brjod pa zhes bya bar snyems pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar/_de dag la ngo bo
[\[210a.3\]]nyid gang gis rab tu dbye bar bya ba de dag gi ngo bo nyid med de[#]/_de sems las byung ba'i brtson 'grus de lta bu dang ldan pas mngon du gyur kyang sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su rdzogs par byed[#]/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mi
[\[210a.4\]]dmigs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang mi dmigs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang mi dmigs so/_/de sems kyi brtson 'grus de lta bu dang ldan pas dge ba'i
[\[210a.5\]]chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin kyang de la chags pa med de/_de chags pa med par sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro/_'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/sems can rnams kyi don
[\[210a.6\]]byed pa na rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul gang dang gang gis rnam par 'phrul pa [#]'dod pa'i rdzu 'phrul de [#]dang cho 'phrul de dang des rnam par 'phrul te/_me tog gi char dbab pa'am/_spos kyi ngad 'gyed pa'am/_'brug gi sgra bsgrags pa'am[#]/_glu bro dang sil snyan gyi sgra bsgrags pa'am[#]/_sa bskyod
[\[210a.7\]]pa'am/_snang ba bstan pa'am/_rin po che sna bdun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bstan pa rnam par 'phrul te/_gang dang gang du [#]gang sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba de dag kyang bdag gi lus las 'gyed de/_sems can rnams kyi don du bar 'ga' bdag 'gyed do/_/[#]bar 'ga' dri zhim
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]por 'gyed do/_/bar 'ga' srog gcod pa [#]med pa'i mchod sbyin chen po byed do/_/bar 'ga' sems can mtha' yas pa lam ma yin pa nas 'don te/_srog gcod pa las ldog go/_/ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /_phra ma smra ba'am/_zhe gcod pa'i tshig dang /_
[\[210b.2\]]brdzun [#]du smra ba dang /_tshig kyal [#]pa dang /_chags sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba las yongs su 'grel to/_/la la la ni sbyin pas phan 'dogs so/_/la la la ni tshul khrims kyis phan 'dogs so/_/la la'i don du ni yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong ngo //_
[\[210b.3\]]la la'i don du ni bu dang chung ma yongs su gtong ngo /_/la la'i don du ni rgyal srid yongs su gtong ngo /_/la la'i don du ni bdag kyang [#]yongs su gtong ngo [#]/_/de ltar thabs gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba'i thabs de dang des sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na
[\[210b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na
[\[210b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_mtshan ma med pa'i chos rnams la gnas nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
[\[210b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par ting nge 'dzin gzhan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de 'dod pas dben pa/_sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod [#]
[\[210b.7\]]pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems dang /_snying rje
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]dang ldan pa'i sems dang /_dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems dang /_btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'jig rten gyi chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad rnam pa thams cad du rgyas par bkang zhing nye bar bsgrubs te
[\[211a.2\]]gnas so/_/de nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bsam gtan gyi [#]ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnas shing rnam par thar pa brgyad
[\[211a.3\]]la lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo /_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa [#]med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/bar chad
[\[211a.4\]]med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/glog [#]lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
[\[211a.5\]]la gnas nas lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis [#]lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi khongs su ting nge 'dzin thams cad chud par byas shing dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las 'da'o/_/dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las 'das nas rigs kyi sa dang /_brgyad pa'i sa dang /_mthong ba'i sa dang /_
[\[211a.6\]]bsrabs pa'i sa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /_byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da'o/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi sa [#]yongs
[\[211a.7\]]su rdzogs par byed do/_/des de dag la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma thob kyi bar du 'bras bu bar ma dor thob par mi byed de/_ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]la bsnyen bkur byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can rnams yongs
[\[211b.2\]]su smin par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed de/_'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed de[#]/_de la sems can la la ni sbyin pas yongs su sdud do/_/la la ni tshul khrims kyis yongs su sdud do/_/la la ni bzod pas yongs su sdud do[#]/_/_
[\[211b.3\]]la la ni brtson 'grus kyis yongs su 'dzin to/_/la la ni ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su sdud do/_/la la ni shes rab kyis yongs su sdud do/_/la la ni rnam par grol bas yongs su sdud do/_/la la ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas yongs su sdud do/_/la la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la
[\[211b.4\]]rab tu gzhog go/_/la la ni [#]lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu gzhog go/_/la la ni rang byang chub la rab tu gzhog go/_/la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhog go/_/de de ltar dge ba'i
[\[211b.5\]]chos gang dang gang gis sems can rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba de dang de la sbyor te/_de [#]ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de [#]la gnas shing gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mngon par sgrub po/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu thob bo/_/rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams
[\[211b.6\]]kyang thob pa yin te/_de nam yang las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/nam yang 'dod pa la brten par mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du skye ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa'ang [#]gang yang med do/_/skye ba'i nyes pas kyang gos par mi
[\[211b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des sgyu ma lta bu'i chos thams cad rab tu mthong rab tu rig rab tu rtogs pas na de sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du byed thams cad rig par byas shing snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ste/[# ]sems can thams cad kyi don byed do/_/de la yang sems can nam sems can
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]du gdags [#]pa dmigs su med do/_/des chos thams cad mi dmigs nas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad nye bar bzung ste dmigs su med pa de nyid la sems can rnams 'god de/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing bsam
[\[212a.2\]]gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la spyod de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[212a.3\]]'di dag la gnas shing lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par bsgrubs te/_de la gnas nas bag chags kyi mtshams [#]sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong ngo /_/de la gnas shing bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu
[\[212a.4\]]spangs nas/_bdag gi don kyang byed/_gzhan gyi don kyang byed/_des bdag dang gzhan gyi don byas nas lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rim gro'i [#]gnas su gyur pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[212a.5\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyi [#]ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa la sogs pa gang yang rung bar zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad skad cig ma gcig gis bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi
[\[212a.6\]]sems kyi skad cig ma gcig pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ste dang po'o//_//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan ma med pa'i chos rnams la gnas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
[\[212a.7\]]phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa'am yongs su grub pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]de/_gzugs kyi yang dag pa dang yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i yang dag pa dang /_yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de de ltar rtogs pa'i tshe/_gzugs kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs
[\[212b.2\]]so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams [#]dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs par byed de/_de
[\[212b.3\]]de ltar rtogs par byed cing nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs sam/_tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa'am/_skye mched dam/_khams
[\[212b.4\]]sam/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'am/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams sam/_stong pa nyid thams cad dam/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sam/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad med pa rnams sam/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_
[\[212b.5\]]rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa rnams sam/_mngon par shes pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/_
[\[212b.6\]]mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_byams pa chen po'am/_snying rje chen po'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar ram/_chos gang la yang mngon par chags pa med do/_/de dngos po med
[\[212b.7\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon
[\[213a.2\]]par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_skyes
[\[213a.3\]]bu mi [#]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su 'dzin to/_/de byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam par smin pa'i chos can la gnas pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po [#]yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa
[\[213a.4\]]bdun yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par gyur nas sems can gang la sbyin pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang sbyin pas phan 'dogs so/_/gang la tshul khrims kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la
[\[213a.5\]]yang tshul khrims kyis phan 'dogs so/_/gang la bzod pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang bzod pas phan 'dogs so/_/gang la brtson 'grus kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang brtson 'grus kyis phan 'dogs so/_/gang la ting nge 'dzin gyis phan gdags par bya ba
[\[213a.6\]]de dag la yang ting nge 'dzin gyis phan 'dogs so/_/gang la shes rab kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang shes rab kyis phan 'dogs so/_/gang la rnam par grol bas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang rnam par grol bas phan 'dogs so/_/gang la rnam par grol ba'i ye
[\[213a.7\]]shes mthong bas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas phan 'dogs so/_/gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god par bya ba de dag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/_/gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'god par bya ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'god do/_/de bzhin du rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o/_/de rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du mas
[\[213b.2\]]rnam par 'phrul zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'gro ste/_de 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag rin po che gang las 'dod pa'i rin po che de dag las grub par mngon par sgrub ste/_de sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing
[\[213b.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro ste/_des 'jig rten gyi khams de dag mthong nas ci 'dod par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin te/_'di ltar dper na/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i ris kyi longs spyod dang /_skyid pa lta bu dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan
[\[213b.4\]]btsal ba dang bral ba dag na longs spyod dang skyid pa gang ji snyed [#]pa de dag der 'byung ste/_de rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi
[\[213b.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi lam des lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa thob nas/_rnam pa thams cad
[\[213b.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob ste/_gal te ji tsam du gzugs yongs su gzung [#]ba med pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams [#]dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung [#]ba med pa dang /_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su gzung [#]ba med
[\[213b.7\]]pa dang /_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams yongs su gzung [#]ba med pa de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing der longs spyod pa dang /_skyid pa thams cad yongs su gzung [#]ba med par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar chos thams cad ni dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su gzung [#]ba med pa dang /_chos thams
[\[214a.2\]]cad yongs su gzung [#]ba med pa'i phyir yang sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_byung ba
[\[214a.3\]]med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_dmigs
[\[214a.4\]]pa med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rnam par smin pa'i chos nyid kyi gnas skabs kyi zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad
[\[214a.5\]]skad cig gcig gis rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sems kyi skad cig gis mngon par rtogs pa ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis shing mtshan ma ma
[\[214a.6\]]mchis pa rang gi mtshan nyid kyis [#]stong pa nyid lags na/_ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi
[\[214a.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang ji ltar na tha dad du gyur par gdags pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du 'dus pa lags/_
[\[214b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de ltar mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i chos mtshan nyid gcig pa 'di lta ste/_mtshan nyid med pa rnams la 'di [#]ltar tha dad du byed pa dag rab tu 'byed pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad [(]cis [,]ces [)]bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor
[\[214b.3\]]'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims srung [#]ngo /_/bzod pa sgom mo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/_/shes rab
[\[214b.4\]]sgom mo/_/sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_chu zla lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /_dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la nye bar [#]gnas shing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims srung [#]ngo //_
[\[214b.5\]]bzod pa sgom mo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/_/shes rab sgom mo/_/de 'di ltar rtogs te/_nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni rmi lam lta bu ste/_mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_chu zla lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu
[\[214b.6\]]dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /_dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu ste/_mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rmi lam la rang bzhin gang yang med do/_/sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang /_mig yor dang /_sgra brnyan dang /_gzugs
[\[214b.7\]]brnyan dang /_dri za'i grong khyer dang /_sprul pa la rang bzhin gang yang med do/_/gang la rang bzhin med pa de la mtshan nyid med de gang la mtshan nyid med pa de ni 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o zhes bya bar rtogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na khyod kyis
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]'di ltar rig par bya ste/_sbyin pa ni mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/gtong ba ni mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/len pa ni mtshan nyid med pa'o zhes bya bar shes par bya ste/_gang de ltar shes nas sbyin pa gtong ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin te/
[\[215a.2\]]de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed na/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog go/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog go/_/de pha
[\[215a.3\]]rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag la gnas shing bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/tshangs [#]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_
[\[215a.4\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad [#]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/stong pa nyid
[\[215a.5\]]kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
[\[215a.6\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par [(]byad [,]byed [)]do/_/de 'phags pa'i chos 'jig rten las 'das pas thun mong ma yin pa rnam par smin
[\[215a.7\]]pa las byung ba rnams la gnas shing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa [#]grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du rdzu 'phrul gyis [#]song zhing na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]rkyen sman dang /_yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byed de/_longs spyod dang skyid pa thams cad kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi [#]don byed do/_/de na sems can gang sbyin pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /_/sbyin pas yongs su sdud do/_/gang tshul khrims kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag dang /_gang bzod
[\[215b.2\]]pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag dang /_gang brtson 'grus kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag dang /_gang bsam gtan gyis [#]yongs su bsdu ba de dag dang /_gang shes rab kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang shes rab kyis [#]yongs su sdud [#]do/_/gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su bsdu ba de
[\[215b.3\]]dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do/_/de ltar gang dang gang dge ba'i chos gang dang gang gis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dge ba'i chos de dang de dag gis yongs su sdud do/_/de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan zhing chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur [#]bas 'khor ba de nye bar len
[\[215b.4\]]kyang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi gos te/_de sems can rnams kyi don du mi dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa nye bar len te/_phun sum tshogs pa de dag gis sems can rnams yongs su sdud do/_/de [#]chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par shes pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la
[\[215b.5\]]mi gnas so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid shes kyang de la mi gnas so/_/rang byang chub shes kyang de la mi gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad [#]dang thun mong [#]ma yin pa'i rnam pa thams cad
[\[215b.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par shes pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug mtshan nyid med par shes so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mtshan nyid med par shes so/_/rab 'byor gzhan
[\[215b.7\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_chu zla lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /_dri za'i grong
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]khyer lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rmi lam lta bur shes/_sgyu ma
[\[216a.2\]]lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_chu zla lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /_dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur [#]shes nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med pa ma zhig pa/_ma ral ba/_skyon med pa/_rnyog pa med pa/_nyams
[\[216a.3\]]pa med pa/_dpang du gyur pa/_mkhas pas bsngags pa/_shin tu rdzogs pa/_'phags par gyur pa/_zag pa med pa/_lam gyi khongs su chud pa/_'jig rten las 'das pa/_yongs su rdzogs par byed do[#]/_de la gnas shing yang dag par blang ba'i brda [#]dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang chos nyid kyis
[\[216a.4\]]thob pa'i tshul khrims dang /_sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang /_dmigs pa'i tshul khrims dang /_spyad pa'i tshul khrims dang /_mi spyad pa'i tshul khrims bsrung ngo /_/de tshul khrims de lta bu dang ldan yang 'dis bdag rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam
[\[216a.5\]]pa'am/_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe'am/_rgyal phran nam/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur bar bya'o zhe'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i
[\[216a.6\]]rigs [#]kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'am/_'thab bral lam[#]/_dga' ldan nam/_'phrul dga' 'am/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe'am/_tshangs ris sam/_tshangs 'khor ram/_tshangs
[\[216a.7\]]pa'i mdun na 'don nam/_tshangs chen nam/_'og min gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe'am/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya'o zhe'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]byang chub thob par bya'o zhes tshul khrims des mchog tu 'dzin pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad ni [#]mtshan nyid med pa ste/_'di ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mtshan nyid gcig pas na mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyis [#]mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thob par
[\[216b.2\]]mi rung ngo /_/mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos kyis mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos thob par mi rung ngo /_/mtshan nyid tha dad pa'am/_mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyis kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa'am/_mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
[\[216b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa'i tshe/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/_lam gyi rnam pa
[\[216b.4\](]shas [,]shes [)]pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga rab tu thob nas/_gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya la gnas te/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing /_sangs
[\[216b.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing [#]yongs su 'dzin to/_/de 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na [#]'khor yang 'khor ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pas gos par mi 'gyur te/_'di lta ste dper na sprul pa ni 'gro ba
[\[216b.6\]]'am 'ong ba'am sdod pa'am 'dug pa'am nyal bar byed kyang de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba'am sdod pa'am 'dug pa'am nyal ba yang mi dmigs te/_de sems can rnams kyi don yang byed do/_/sems can dang sems can du [#]gdags pa yang mi dmigs so//_//bam po drug cu lnga pa/_
[\[216b.7\]]rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu zhi ba zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te sems can tshad med pa theg pa gnyis
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu gang yang ma gzigs nas des tshe'i [#]'du byed spangs nas sprul pa sprul pa mdzad de/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan
[\[217a.2\]]las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/rab 'byor de ltar sprul pa des bskal pa gcig lon nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to/_/yongs su mya ngan
[\[217a.3\]]las 'das par gyur pa de'i gzugs sam/_tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa'am/_dngos po gang yang dmigs su med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can nam sems can du gdags par mi dmigs la
[\[217a.4\]]sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de yongs su rdzogs pas mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
[\[217a.5\]]thams cad khong du [#]chud par shes so/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_
[\[217a.6\]]sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas te/_mtshan nyid med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid med pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po
[\[217a.7\]]rnams la gnas nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa gnyis kyis [#]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_gnyis gang zhe na/_
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]nyams su len pa'i bzod pa dang /_chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa'o/_/de la nyams su len pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du gal te sems can thams cad yang
[\[217b.2\]]dang yang du [#]'ongs shing gshe ba'am mi snyan par brjod cing ma klas pa'i tshig brlang bar [#]zer bar gyur tam/_rdo dbyug dang mtshon chas brdegs sam btab kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas/_sems bskyed pa 'ga'
[\[217b.3\]]tsam yang 'khrugs [#]pa dang ldan pa'am/_gnod sems dang ldan pa bskyed par mi bya ste/_phyir sems can de dag la kye ma sems can 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis mnar ba ste/_'di dag la bdag gis [#]sdig to'i sems mi bskyed kyi/_'di ni bdag nyid kyis phung po dgrar gyur pa 'di
[\[217b.4\]]rnams blangs pas lan to zhes de dag la lhag par snying rje bskyed par bya'o/_/byams pa dang ldan te snying rje bar gyur nas rnam pa de ltar rtogs pa de [#]ni nyams su len pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o/_/de la chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na/_sems can de dag kyang don dam par dmigs su med na/_
[\[217b.5\]]bdag la gshe ba'am/_mi snyan par brjod pa'am/_ma klas pa'i tshig brlang po zer ba'am/_rdo dbyug gis [#]brdeg cing mtshon 'debs pa lta bu zhig yod de/_'du byed thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu gsob gsog rag las pa nam mkha' lta bu/_bdag dang sems can dang srog dang /_'gro ba
[\[217b.6\]]dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed can dang /_shed bdag dang bral ba ste/_rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni yongs su rtog pa las byung ba yin na/_bdag la gshe ba dang /_mi snyan par brjod pa dang /_ma klas pa'i tshig brlang po zer ba dang /_rdo dbyug
[\[217b.7\]]gis brdeg [#]cing mtshon 'debs pa lta bu zhig yod de/_bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/_de ltar rnam par brtag par mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa zhes bya ste/_de de ltar yongs su rtog cing bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa zhes bgyi ba ni gang lags/_de la spangs pa ni ci mchis ye
[\[218a.2\]]shes ni ci mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos gang la yang [#]rdul tsam yang skye ba med pa de ni mi skye ba'o/_/de gang gis shes pa de [#]ni bzod pa zhes bya ba ste/_shes pa des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob po/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams dang /_rang
[\[218a.3\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyi [#]mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa'i bzod pa de dag la bye brag tu bgyi ba ci mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i shes pa gang
[\[218a.4\]]yin pa dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang spong ba gang yin pa
[\[218a.5\]]de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o/_/dgra bcom pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa gang yin pa dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems
[\[218a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa ste/_rab 'byor de ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi bzod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i bye brag yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas de dag
[\[218a.7\]]thams cad zil gyis gnon te/_de rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mi skye ba'i chos [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]bzod pa la gnas te/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod cing lam gyi rnam pa [#]shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de yongs su rdzogs pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stong
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang mi 'bral ba yin/_de mngon par shes pa rnams dang mi 'bral ba yin/_de mngon par shes pa rnams dang mi 'bral bas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su rdzogs [#]par byed
[\[218b.2\]]pa yin/_de sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/_skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[218b.3\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan nyid med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta
[\[218b.4\]]bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing mtshan ma med pa'i [#]lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid med pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po
[\[218b.5\]]rnams la gnas nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom par byed do/_/de lus kyi brtson 'grus kyis rdzu 'phrul
[\[218b.6\]]mngon par bsgrubs te phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/de lus kyi brtson 'grus des sems can
[\[218b.7\]]rnams yongs su smin par byas nas theg pa gsum la 'dzud cing 'dul la rab tu 'god do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan nyid med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de sems
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]kyi brtson 'grus zag pa med pa lam gyi yan lag tu gyur pa lam gyi khongs su chud pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang du dge ba'i chos 'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga
[\[219a.2\]]dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis
[\[219a.3\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad khongs su 'dus pa/_yongs su rdzogs par byed
[\[219a.4\]]do/_/de la spyod cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do[#]/_/de yongs su rdzogs par byas pas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/_/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs nas mtshan phun sum
[\[219a.5\]]tshogs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs nas kun nas snang ba thob par byed do/_/kun nas snang ba thob par byas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis lan gsum du bzlas pa bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/de bskor bas stong gsum gyi stong
[\[219a.6\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yo ba dang /_rab tu g.yo ba dang /_kun nas g.yo ba dang /_'gul ba dang /_rab tu 'gul ba dang /_kun nas 'gul ba dang /_ldeg pa dang /_rab tu ldeg pa dang /_kun nas ldeg par 'gyur te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
[\[219a.7\]]thams cad kyang [#]snang ba chen pos rgyas par gang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i sgra gang du byung zhing dbyangs grag par gyur pa'i sgra de [#]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed kyis thos pa de
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]dag thams cad theg pa gsum la nges par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar phan pa chen po dang ldan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnas te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs
[\[219b.2\]]rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
[\[219b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing mtshan nyid med pa'i
[\[219b.4\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid med pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams la gnas nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
[\[219b.5\]]bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na[#]/_bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam
[\[219b.6\]]gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med
[\[219b.7\]]min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/_/glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/_/yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/_/rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin sgom par byed de/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing de
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par nyan thos dang thun mong ba'am[#]/_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang ji snyed pa dang /_gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad lus kyis [#]khyab par byas shing
[\[220a.2\]]nye bar bsgrubs te gnas kyang ting nge 'dzin de dag dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu'i ro myong bar yang [#]mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ting nge 'dzin de dag gi mtshan nyid med pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pas na/
[\[220a.3\]]mtshan nyid med pa'i chos mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyis [#]ro myong bar byed pa [#]yang ga la 'gyur ro[#]/_/dngos po med pa'i chos kyang dngos po med pa'i chos kyis [#]ro myong bar byed par yang ga la 'gyur te[#]/_de ro myong bar byed pa med pas ting nge 'dzin de dag [#]gis kyang gzugs kyi khams sam/_gzugs med
[\[220a.4\]]pa'i khams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des khams de nyid kyang mi dmigs/_gang snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_gang gis snyoms par 'jug pa de [#]yang mi dmigs so/_/de mi dmigs pas mtshan nyid med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis [#]pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/
[\[220a.5\]]ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis las yongs su 'da'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gyis [#]pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
[\[220a.6\]]kyi sa las yongs su 'da' ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nang stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs [#]pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
[\[220a.7\]]bar la shin tu bslabs [#]pa'i phyir te/_stong pa nyid 'di dag la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_gang la gnas par bya ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang mi dmigs te/_rnam
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de'ang stong pa nyid rnams kyis stong ste/_stong pa nyid de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su 'das nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan
[\[220b.2\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon ni gang lags/_skyon ma mchis pa de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor dmigs pa thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon no/_/mi dmigs pa thams cad ni skyon med pa'o/_/gsol
[\[220b.3\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das dmigs pa ni gang lags/_mi dmigs pa ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o/_/rab 'byor tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams [#]dang /_rnam par shes
[\[220b.4\]]pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o/_/mig dang gzugs ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o/_/rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_sna dang /_dri dang /_lce dang /_ro dang /_lus dang /_reg bya dang /_yid dang chos ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[220b.5\]]chen po'i dmigs pa'o/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni dmigs pa'o/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
[\[220b.6\]]tshor ba ni dmigs pa'o/_/sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams ni dmigs pa'o/_/ma rig pa dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg
[\[220b.7\]]pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi ni dmigs pa'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_
[\[221a.2\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dmigs pa'o/_/rnam pa thams
[\[221a.3\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni dmigs pa ste skyon no/_/rab 'byor skyon med pa ni gang la gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams [#]dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid
[\[221a.4\]]thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong
[\[221a.5\]]pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams [#]dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje
[\[221a.6\]]chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang /_chos de dag gis [#]brjod pa yang dmigs su med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs la rang bzhin med de/_gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med
[\[221a.7\]]pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la rang bzhin med de/_gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rang bzhin med de/_gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o/_/pha rol tu
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams [#]la rang bzhin med de/_gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
[\[221b.2\]]'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams [#]dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rang bzhin med de[#]/_gang la rang bzhin
[\[221b.3\]]med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rang bzhin med de/_gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med
[\[221b.4\]]pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rang bzhin med de/_gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyon med par zhugs pa/_ting
[\[221b.5\]]nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de [#]ni ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang [#]mi skye na 'dod chags sam/_zhe sdang ngam/_gti mug gis [#]skye bar 'gyur zhing de la gnas te/_de la las mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_las de mngon
[\[221b.6\]]par 'du byas pas 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar ltung bar 'gyur [#]ba lta ci smos te/_de ni gnas med do/_/gzhan du na sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams la gnas shing sems can thams cad kyi don byed de/_sems can nam sgyu mar yang dmigs pa [#]med do/_/de sems can dang sgyu mar mi dmigs pas
[\[221b.7\]]sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su [#]rdzogs par byas nas chos kyi 'khor
[\[222a\]]
