[\[222a.1\]]lo bskor ba'i bar du ste/_mi dmigs pa'i 'khor lo dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams
[\[222a.2\]]cad rmi lam lta bur yongs su shes so/_/chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur [#]yongs su shes so zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mtshan ma med par skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sems
[\[222a.3\]]kyi skad cig gis mngon par [#]rtogs pa ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ji ltar na chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur
[\[222a.4\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 'tshal ba lags/_ji ltar na chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 'tshal ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor
[\[222a.5\]]'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rmi lam mi mthong ngo /_/rmi lam mthong ba mi mthong ngo [#]/_/sgra brnyan [#]mi thos so/_/sgra brnyan nyan pa mi thos so/_/[#]mig yor mi mthong ngo /_/mig yor mthong ba mi mthong ngo /_/sgyu ma mi mthong ngo /_/_
[\[222a.6\]]sgyu ma mthong ba mi mthong ngo /_/smig rgyu mi mthong ngo /_/smig rgyu mthong ba mi mthong ngo /_/sprul pa mi mthong ngo /_/sprul pa mthong ba mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi rmi lam ni phyin ci log go/_/sgra brnyan ni phyin ci log go/_/mig yor ni phyin [#]ci log
[\[222a.7\]]go/_/sgyu ma ni phyin ci log go/_/smig rgyu ni phyin ci log go/_/sprul pa ni phyin ci log go/_/dgra bcom pa ni rmi lam mi mthong ngo /_/rmi lam mthong ba mi mthong ngo /_/sgra brnyan mi thos so/_/sgra brnyan nyan pa mi thos so/_/mig yor mi mthong ngo /_/mig yor mthong ba mi mthong ngo /_/sgyu ma mi
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]mthong ngo /_/sgyu ma mthong ba mi mthong ngo /_/smig rgyu mi mthong ngo /_/smig rgyu mthong ba mi mthong ngo /_/sprul pa mi mthong ngo /_/sprul pa mthong ba mi mthong ngo /_/rang sangs rgyas kyi bar dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
[\[222b.2\]]ni rmi lam mi gzigs so/_/rmi lam mthong ba mi gzigs so/_/sgra brnyan mi gsan to/_/sgra brnyan nyan pa mi gzigs so/_/mig yor mi gzigs so/_/mig yor mthong ba mi gzigs so/_/sgyu ma mi gzigs so/_/sgyu ma mthong ba mi gzigs so/_/smig rgyu mi gzigs so/_/smig rgyu
[\[222b.3\]]mthong ba mi gzigs so/_/sprul pa mi gzigs so/_/sprul pa mthong ba mi gzigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar yang dag pa ma yin pas chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa ste yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad
[\[222b.4\]]yongs su grub pa med na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dngos po'i 'du shes sam/_yongs su grub pa'i 'du shes sam/_yang dag pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de/_de ni gnas med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te chos
[\[222b.5\]]la la zhig gi ngo bo nyid dam/_yongs su grub pa'am/_yang dag par gyur pa zhig dmigs na ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang [#]mi 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa na/_gzugs la chags pa med do/_/tshor ba dang /_
[\[222b.6\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang [#]/_rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/_/khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la chags pa med do/_/'dod pa'i khams la chags pa med do/_/gzugs kyi khams la chags pa med do[#]/_/gzugs med pa'i khams la chags
[\[222b.7\]]pa med do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do/_/nang stong pa nyid
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]la chags pa med do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la chags pa med do/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la chags pa med do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs
[\[223a.2\]]med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams la chags pa med do/_/ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la chags
[\[223a.3\]]pa med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la chags [#]pa med do/_/de shes
[\[223a.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed do[#]/_/de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags mi bskyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang mi dmigs na/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skye bar lta ga la 'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing sa
[\[223a.5\]]gnyis pa dang /_sa gsum pa dang /_sa bzhi pa dang /_sa lnga pa dang /_sa drug pa dang /_sa bdun pa dang /_sa brgyad pa dang /_sa dgu pa dang /_sa bcu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags mi bskyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang mi dmigs na/_de la
[\[223a.6\]]'dod pa'i 'dod chags bskyed par [#]lta ga la 'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mi dmigs so/_/de mi dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa der chos thams cad kyang 'dus par mthong ste/_
[\[223a.7\]]chos de dag kyang mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos de dag dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar [#]med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos de dag ni tha dad du bya ba gang yang med do/_/chos kyi dbyings su bstan pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]bstan pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' bstan pas chos thams cad dbyer med do[#]/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad dbyer med pa lags na ji ltar dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i chos rnams bstan pa lags/_ji ltar 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams
[\[223b.2\]]bstan pa lags/_ji ltar zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams bstan pa lags/_ji ltar 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams bstan pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa
[\[223b.3\]]de la 'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas sam/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_byang chub bam/_sems gang [#]yang brjod du yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni
[\[223b.4\]]ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas na khyod kyis [#]rnam grangs des 'di ltar chos thams cad dbyer med pa dang /_chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i
[\[223b.5\]]spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs zhes bya ba'am/_tshor ba zhes bya ba'am/_'du shes zhes bya ba'am/_'du byed ces bya ba'am/_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'am/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'am/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams
[\[223b.6\]]cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams zhes [#]bya ba'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar zhes bya ba'am/_dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams zhes bya ba'am/_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa
[\[223b.7\]]dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_thun mong [#]dang thun mong ma yin pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'am/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba'am/_rang byang chub ces bya ba'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya ba'i chos gang gi rang bzhin yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
[\[224a.2\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis [#]chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la mkhas par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[224a.3\]]chen po chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la mkhas pa ni/_byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par bya'o[#]/_/sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to/_/de la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
[\[224a.4\]]sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams ci nas kyang 'dul [#]bar gyur nas srid pa gsum na mi snang ba de ltar rnam par btul lo/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni
[\[224a.5\]]gnyis su med pa nyid du chos thams cad skad cig ma gcig la mngon par rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid can sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa ste [#]bzhi pa'o/_/'di dag gis ni skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa gsungs pa yin no/_/'phags pa bcom ldan
[\[224a.6\]]'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan [#]gyi rjes su 'brangs nas dag par gtugs pa las/_skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa'i dbang du byas pa bslab pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//rab 'byor gzhan
[\[224a.7\]]yang zag pa med pa'i chos rmi lam lta bu dngos po dang mi ldan pa dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin can rang gi [#]mtshan nyid kyis stong pa rnam pa thams cad du [#]yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa mtshan nyid gcig po 'di lta ste/_mtshan nyid med pa de ni de bzhin
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin par rig par bya ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das zag pa med pa'i
[\[224b.2\]]chos de dag [#]thams cad kyang gang dag lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang /_zil
[\[224b.3\]]gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon nas mkhyen pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_rnam pa thams cad du yongs su dag pa bzhi dang /_dbang bcu dang stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi
[\[224b.4\]]dang /_bsrung ba med pa gsum dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang /_bag chags yang dag par bcom pa dang /_thugs rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_
[\[224b.5\]]lam gyi rnam pa [#]shes pa nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen [#]pa nyid dag ste/_rab 'byor 'di dag [#]ni zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku
[\[224b.6\]]yin no//_//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing chos de dag thams cad thob nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad nas thams cad du de bzhin
[\[224b.7\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la theg pa chen po mchog gi chos kyi longs spyod
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]bla na med pa'i [#]dga' ba dang /_bde ba dang /_tshim pa dang /_rab tu dga' ba ston par mdzad par 'gyur ro zhes/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku
[\[225a.2\]]yin no//_//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab [#]pa na chos de dag thams cad rtogs par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med mtha' med par dus thams cad du de
[\[225a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku'i sprul pa sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis [#]sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa de ltar rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i sku yin no//_//
[\[225a.4\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dngos po ma mchis pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa rnams la 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos so/_/'di
[\[225a.5\]]dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i
[\[225a.6\]]rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o zhes bgyi
[\[225a.7\]]bar ji ltar rnam par dgod par 'gyur chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_dngos po ma mchis pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa rnams la 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni mi dge ba'i
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
[\[225b.2\]]bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro[#]/_/'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o[#]/_/'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur
[\[225b.3\]]ba'o zhes bgyi bar ji ltar rnam par dgod par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byis pa thos pa dang mi ldan pa'i so so'i skye bo ni [#]rmi lam yang dmigs [#]la rmi lam mthong ba yang dmigs so/_/sgra brnyan yang dmigs la sgra brnyan nyan pa yang dmigs so/_/mig
[\[225b.4\]]yor yang dmigs la mig yor mthong ba yang dmigs so/_/sgyu ma yang dmigs la sgyu ma mthong ba yang dmigs so/_/smig rgyu yang dmigs la smig [#]rgyu mthong ba yang dmigs so/_/sprul pa yang dmigs la sprul pa mthong ba yang dmigs so/_/des rmi lam yang dmigs la rmi lam mthong ba
[\[225b.5\]]yang dmigs so/_/sprul pa'i bar yang dmigs la [#]sprul pa [#]mthong ba yang dmigs nas/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyis dge ba'i 'du bya ba yang mngon par 'du byed do/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyis mi dge ba'i 'du bya ba yang mngon par 'du byed do/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyis [#]bsod nams dang [#]
[\[225b.6\]]bsod nams ma yin pa dang /_mig yo ba'i 'du bya ba yang mngon par 'du byed do/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid 'di gnyis la gnas
[\[225b.7\]]shing sems can rnams la chos ston te/_khams gsum po [#]'di ni stong pa ste/_'di la gzugs sam/_tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa'am/_skye mched rnams sam/_khams rnams med do/_/'di ni rmi lam/_'di ni sgra brnyan/_'di ni mig yor/_'di ni
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]sgyu ma/_'di ni smig rgyu[#]/_'di ni sprul pa ste/_'di la phung po rnams sam/_khams rnams sam/_skye mched rnams med do/_/'di la ni rmi lam med do/_/rmi lam mthong ba med do/_/sgra brnyan med do/_/sgra brnyan nyan pa med do/_/mig yor med do/_/mig yor
[\[226a.2\]]mthong ba med do/_/sgyu ma med do/_/sgyu ma byed pa med do/_/smig rgyu med do/_/smig rgyu mthong ba med do/_/sprul pa med do/_/sprul pa byed pa med do/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni [#]dngos po med pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/_'on kyang khyod ni phung po med pa la phung por 'du shes pa/_skye mched
[\[226a.3\]]med pa la skye mched du 'du shes pa dang [#]/_khams med pa la khams su 'du shes pa dag ste/_chos 'di dag thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba phyin ci log las skye ba las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su bzung ba yin na/_khyed rnams ci'i phyir chos thams cad dngos po med pa la dngos po'i
[\[226a.4\]]'du shes su byed ces te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can ser sna can de [#]dag ser sna las rnam par bzlog nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor te sbyin pa yongs su btang ba de yang de dag la longs
[\[226a.5\]]spyod chen po'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/des de dag las bskyod nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor te/_tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa de yang de dag la [#]mtho ris su skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/des de dag [#]las bskyod nas ting nge 'dzin la sbyor te/_ting nge 'dzin de yang de dag la tshangs pa'i
[\[226a.6\]]'jig rten du skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/des de dag [#]las bskyod nas bsam gtan dang po la sbyor te/_bsam gtan dang po las bsam gtan gnyis pa[#]/_bsam gtan gnyis pa las bsam gtan gsum pa/_bsam gtan gsum pa las bsam gtan bzhi pa/_bsam gtan bzhi pa
[\[226a.7\]]las nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]par 'jug pa/_cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyor ro/_/des sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dma' ba de las rnam [#]grangs su bskyed [#]de/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
[\[226b.2\]]su dbugs 'byin to/_/gzhog go/_/rab tu 'god do/_/de tshul khrims dang tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de las rnam grangs du mas bskyed [#]de/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rab tu gzhog go/_/des ting nge 'dzin dang ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu de las rnam grangs du
[\[226b.3\]]mas bskyed [#]de/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rab tu gzhog go/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan
[\[226b.4\]]lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_
[\[226b.5\]]mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
[\[226b.6\]]la 'god do/_/rab tu 'jog go/_/de zag pa med pa'i chos gzugs med pa bstan du med pa thogs [#]pa med pa de dag gis gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu don du gnyer ba de dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/_/gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu don du gnyer ba de dag
[\[226b.7\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/_/gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu don du gnyer pa de dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/_/gang dgra bcom pa nyid don du gnyer ba de dag dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu 'god do/_/gang rang byang chub don du gnyer pa de dag rang byang
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]chub la rab tu 'god do/_/gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba de dag la byang chub kyi lam brjod cing ston to/_/yang dag par bskul lo/_/yang dag par gzengs bstod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_/
[\[227a.2\]]rab tu 'god do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu dang /_dngos po med pa dang /_
[\[227a.3\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la rnam par 'god par byed do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de [#]shes rab kyi
[\[227a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_chos thams cad mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i
[\[227a.5\]]chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni
[\[227a.6\]]'dus ma byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /[ #]phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/
[\[227a.7\]]'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o zhes bya bar rnam par dgod par bgyid pa de dag ni ngo mtshar te rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_chos thams cad mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la 'di
[\[227b.2\]]dag ni dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/_/'di
[\[227b.3\]]dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras
[\[227b.4\]]bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o zhes bya bar rnam par dgod par byed pa de ni ngo mtshar te rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'
[\[227b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po gang gi ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos de shes kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la slar phan gdags par bya ba sla ba ma yin te/_khyed cag thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos de dag zil
[\[227b.6\]]gyis mnan par mi nus so/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la ma mchis pa'i ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma [#]mchis pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de'i phyir
[\[227b.7\]]shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung [#]shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i stong pa nyid thams cad
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i
[\[228a.2\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /[# ]gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen
[\[228a.3\]]po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas shing phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song zhing sems can gang la sbyin pas phan gdags par bya ba de [#]ni sbyin pas phan 'dogs so/_/de sems can gang la tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa
[\[228a.4\]]dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab kyis [#]phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni shes rab kyis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la bsam gtan dang po dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pas phan gdags par bya ba de
[\[228a.5\]]dag la ni bsam gtan bzhi pas phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la nam mkha' mtha' yas kyi skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med
[\[228a.6\]]min gyi [#]skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la [#]snyoms par 'jug pas [#]phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la byams pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni byams pas phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la snying rje
[\[228a.7\]]dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni btang snyoms kyis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[228b.2\]]gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
[\[228b.3\]]brgyad kyis phan 'dogs so/_/gang la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis phan 'dogs so/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas sems
[\[228b.4\]]can rnams la phan 'dogs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_zas 'dod pa rnams la zas/_skom 'dod pa rnams la skom/_bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa/_
[\[228b.5\]]phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba/_spos 'dod pa rnams la spos/_byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa/_gos 'dod pa rnams la gos/_mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha/_gnas 'dod pa rnams la gnas/_mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du yongs su gtong ste/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs
[\[228b.6\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dbul zhing yongs su gtong ba dang /_ji ltar rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams
[\[228b.7\]]dang /_yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la yongs su gtong ba de bzhin du mir gyur pa rnams dang /_de bzhin du byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la yang tha dad du bya ba med pa'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]chos thams cad ni tha dad du bya ba med pa ste/_des tha dad du bya ba med pa'i sbyin pa byin pas tha dad du bya ba med pa'i chos 'di lta ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byol song gi skye gnas
[\[229a.2\]]su gtogs pa'i srog chags sbyin pa'i gnas ma yin pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du bdag gi sbyin gnas ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa ma yin no snyam na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[229a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos [#]ni byang chub tu sems bskyed nas 'di ltar bdag gis sems can 'di dag la ni sbyin pas phan gdags par bya'o/_/'di dag la ni phan gdags par mi bya'o zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ma [#]yin te/
[\[229a.4\]]de dag sbyin pas phan btags nas rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i rigs su skye/_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i rigs su skye/_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur te/_sbyin pa de nyid kyis phan btags pa de dag theg pa gsum gyis [#]rim
[\[229a.5\]]gyis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis bsad [#]par gsol ba btab na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos [#]sbyin no snyam
[\[229a.6\]]pa'am[#]/_mi sbyin no snyam pa'i sems gzhan bskyed par mi bya'i/_'khrug pa med pa'i sems kyis skye bo'i tshogs de dag la sbyin par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'i phyir/_
[\[229a.7\]]gal te rnam par rtog na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_slob pa rnams dang /_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis smad [#]par 'gyur te/_de la
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]thog mar sems can thams cad [#]kyi mgon gyis shig ce'am/_gnas dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen gyis shig ces [#]gsol ba btab ces smad par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du mir gyur pa'am/_mi ma yin par gyur
[\[229b.2\]]pa dag 'ongs nas bdag ni slong [#]mo pa'o zhes yan lag dang nying lag bcad par gsol ba btab na de'i tshe des sbyin nam mi sbyin snyam pa'i sems gnyis su bskyed par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can rnams kyi don du ched du bsams te/_
[\[229b.3\]]lus 'dis bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don bya'o zhes lus yongs su bzung bas na de 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can 'di dag gi don du lus yongs su bzung bas na [#]de dag blang mi dgos par khyer cig dengs shig ces sems bskyed par bya ste/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
[\[229b.4\]]sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos slong mo pa mthong na 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med na/_'di la su zhig ni [#]sbyin pa yongs su gtong /_su la ni sbyin par bya/_ci
[\[229b.5\]]zhig ni sbyin par bya zhes sems bskyed par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos 'di dag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis [#]stong pa ste/_stong pa nyid la ni gang la yang yongs su stong pa'am [#]gang las kyang phrogs pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
[\[229b.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_'di lta ste nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bya'o/_/de stong pa nyid la gnas shing sbyin pa yongs [#]su gtong ba de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par [#]yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[229b.7\]]yongs su rdzogs pa des phyi nang gi dngos po gcad [#]cing gtubs kyang bdag la su yang gtub pa'am gcod do snyam pa'i sems mi 'byung ngo zhes pa [#]ni sprul pa'i sku'i sgo nas chos kyi sku'i phrin las spyir bstan pa yin no//_//rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]na/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/_sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/_rdzu 'phrul
[\[230a.2\]]gyi cho 'phrul dang /_kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i [#]sems can de dag la chos ston cing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas te/_kun brjod pa'i cho
[\[230a.3\]]'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/_des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa'
[\[230a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas lha dang mi dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing rim gyis theg pa gsum [#]gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo /_/
[\[230a.5\]]rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' [#]sems dpa' chen
[\[230a.6\]]po de dag la [#]ched du bsams te/_sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i
[\[230a.7\]]sems can de dag la chos ston zhing rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/_kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang /
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang [(]snyams [,]snyoms [)]chen pos chos ston te/_des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag
[\[230b.2\]]sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_lha dang mi dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing rim gyis [#]theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni dmyal ba'i 'gro ba zhi bar mdzad pa'i phrin las yin no//_//rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs
[\[230b.3\]]rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams [#]la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[230b.4\]]po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur bas ma yin gyi dgyes par 'gyur ba dang /_thugs su mi byon pas ma yin gyi thugs su byon pa dang /_ma gus pas ma yin gyi/_gus pas shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
[\[230b.5\]]dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das [#]de dag gis [#]chos bstan pa de yang 'dzin zhing bzung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du yang chud mi gson no/_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten
[\[230b.6\]]la rnam par gzigs na/_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen
[\[230b.7\]]bkur byed pa dag mthong ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur bas ma yin gyi/_dgyes par 'gyur ba dang /_thugs su mi byon pas ma yin gyi/_thugs su byon pa dang /_ma gus pas ma yin gyi[#]/_gus pas
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]shin tu dad par bsnyen bkur byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin zhing bzung nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi
[\[231a.2\]]bar du 'chang zhing nam du yang chud mi gson to//_//bam po drug cu drug pa/_rab 'byor ngas yang [#]'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na[#]/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag [#]na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag [(]byel
[\[231a.3\]]sang [,]byol song [)]gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong bar byed cing /_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang nying lag bcad cing gtubs te phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis
[\[231a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa thob pa dang /_de dag la [#]byams pa thob pa des byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing rnam par langs nas lha dang mi'i nang du skye ba dang /_de dag tu skyes
[\[231a.5\]]nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams [#]mnyes par byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das las chos thos te/_de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed pa dang /_de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi
[\[231a.6\]]theg pa'am/_theg pa chen po'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis [#]phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa [#]mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
[\[231a.7\]]sems bskyed cing /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o/_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i [(]glung [,]klung [)]gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong bar byed cing /_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang nying lag bcad
[\[231b.2\]]cing gtubs te phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa thob pa dang /_de dag byams pa thob
[\[231b.3\]]pa des byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing rnam par langs nas lha dang mi'i nang du skye ba dang /_de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mnyes par byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas
[\[231b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang /_de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_theg pa chen po'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan
[\[231b.5\]]las 'da' ba mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni byol song gi skye gnas zhi bar mdzad pa'i phrin
[\[231b.6\]]las yin no//_//rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar phyogs [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na
[\[231b.7\]]sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing /_ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /_de dag na [#]sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /_yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dang de dag
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag yi dwags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i [#]bar du sangs
[\[232a.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang bral [#]bar mi 'gyur bdag mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
[\[232a.3\]]khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir [#]chos ston pa dang /_de dag na sems can yi
[\[232a.4\]]dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /_yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas de dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang /_mi'i 'jig
[\[232a.5\]]rten du skyes te/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni yi dgas kyi 'jig rten zhi bar mdzad pa'i phrin las yin no//_//rab 'byor ngas yang [#]
[\[232a.6\]]'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs [#]kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_
[\[232a.7\]]'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/_rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing /_de la skyo bar gyur par shes nas/_'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/_'du byed thams cad ni sdug
[\[232b.2\]]bsngal pa/_'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/_'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/_'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung ba/_'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/_'du byed thams cad la lta su zhig yid la [#]'bebs par gnas zhes [#]chos ston to/_/rab 'byor ngas
[\[232b.3\]]yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang [#]shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen
[\[232b.4\]]bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas theg pa
[\[232b.5\]]gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur bar mthong ste/_rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas
[\[232b.6\]]shing de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/_'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/_'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/_'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/_'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung ba/_'du byed thams cad ni rnam
[\[232b.7\]]par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/_'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes [#]chos ston to/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/_kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba bskyed/_chos thams cad gsog dang /_gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de
[\[233a.2\]]dag dang bral bar byed pa de dag mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi [#]rmad du byung ba'i chos
[\[233a.3\]]so/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems
[\[233a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can [#]gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba bskyed/_chos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/_rab
[\[233a.5\]]'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so zhes bya ba ni lha'i 'gro [#]ba zhi bar mdzad pa'i phrin
[\[233a.6\]]las yin no//_//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/_bzhi
[\[233a.7\]]gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang /_tshig snyan pa dang /_don spyod pa dang /_don mthun pa'o/_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par [#]gzigs na/_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang /_tshig snyan pa dang /_don spyod pa dang /_don mthun pa'o/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
[\[233b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gnyis kyis sems can rnams sdud de/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /_chos kyi sbyin pa'o/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub
[\[233b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gser ram/_dngul lam/_nor bu'am/_mu tig gam/_bai DUR+Ya 'am/_dung ngam/
[\[233b.4\]]man shel lam/_byi ru'am/_sa le sbram mam/_zas sam/_skom mam/_gdugs sam/_gos sam/_spos sam/_phreng ba'am/_byug pa'am/_mal cha'am/_stan nam/_'tsho ba'am/[# ]bud med dam/_skyes pa'am/_rta'am/_glang po'am/_bdag yongs su gtong na/_'di
[\[233b.5\]]skad du kye sems can dag [#]tshur shog_/bdag nyid kyi [#]dang 'dra bar bslang [#]mi dgos par khyer cig[# ]/long la dengs shig ces brjod do/_/sbyin pa des sbyin pa byin nas sangs rgyas la skyabs su gtong ngo /_/chos la skyabs su gtong ngo /_/dge 'dun la skyabs su gtong ngo /_/la la ni bslab
[\[233b.6\]]pa'i gnas lnga 'dzin du 'dzud do/_/la la ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong la nye bar gnas par byed do/_/la la ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rnam par 'god do/_/la la ni bsam gtan dang po la/_la la ni bsam gtan gnyis pa la/_la la ni bsam gtan gsum pa la/_
[\[233b.7\]]la la ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la 'god do/_/la la ni byams pa la/_la la ni snying rje la/_la la ni dga' ba la/_la la ni btang snyoms la 'god do/_/la la ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la/_la la ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la/_la la ni cung zad med pa'i skye mched la/_
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]la la ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la 'god do/_/la la ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la/_la la ni chos rjes su dran pa la/_la la ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa la/_la la ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa la/_la la ni gtong ba rjes su dran pa la/_la la ni
[\[234a.2\]]lha rjes su dran pa la yang dag par bskul lo/_/la la ni lus la mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i 'du shes so sor brtag pa la/_la la ni rnam par dag pa la yang dag par bskul lo/_/la la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la/_la la ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi la[#]/_la la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
[\[234a.3\]]pa bzhi la/_la la ni dbang po lnga la/_la la ni stobs lnga la/_la la ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la/_la la ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par bskul lo/_/la la ni stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la[#]/_la la ni rnam par
[\[234a.4\]]thar pa brgyad la/_la la ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la/_la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la/_la la ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi la/_la la ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul lo/_/la la ni byams pa chen po la/_la la ni snying
[\[234a.5\]]rje chen po la/_la la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par bskul lo/_/la la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su grub par bya ba la yang dag par bskul lo/_/la la ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par bskul lo/_/la la ni rgyun du
[\[234a.6\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la[#]/_la la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la/_la la ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la/_la la ni dgra bcom pa nyid la/_la la ni rang byang chub la yang dag par bskul lo/_/la la ni byang chub la/_la la ni lam gyi rnam pa [#]shes pa nyid la/_la la ni rnam pa thams cad
[\[234a.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yang dag par bskul lo/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /_thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa'i bde ba dang ldan par 'god do[#]/_/
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor gnyis po 'di
[\[234b.2\]]dag ni chos kyi sbyin pa ste/_'jig rten dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang zhe na/_'jig rten pa'i chos rnams brjod pa dang /_bshad pa dang /_ma nor bar bstan pa ste/_'di ltar mi gtsang ba'i rnam pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshangs pa'i
[\[234b.3\]]rnam par spyod pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i chos byis pa so so'i skye bo dag dang thun mong du gyur pa rnams te/_rab 'byor de ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[234b.4\]]chen po des 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa de btang nas rnam grangs du mas 'jig rten gyi chos rnams ma nor bar blangs pa de las bskyod de/_de dag las bskyod nas/_thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos rnams dang /_'phags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu dag la rab tu 'god do/_/de la 'phags
[\[234b.5\]]pa'i chos rnams ni gang /_'phags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu ni gang zhe na 'phags pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mo/_/'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
[\[234b.6\]]bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid de/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]'phags pa'i chos ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes
[\[234b.7\]]pa'o/_/dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu nyid shes pa'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/_/nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes pa'o/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun shes pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med
[\[235a.2\]]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams shes pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo
[\[235a.3\]]rnams shes pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes pa'o/_/byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po shes pa'o/_/gzhan
[\[235a.4\]]yang 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams [#]dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma gtogs par [#]de dag byang chub sems dpa'
[\[235a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba ste[#]/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
[\[235a.6\]]'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis
[\[235a.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos [#]ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]thob par 'gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la bye brag ni ci zhig mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bye brag yod do/_/gsol pa/_bye brag ni ji lta bu zhig mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[235b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes brnyes pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang la gnas shing chos thams cad la mun pa med pa thob pa la byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyang gzhan la/_de bzhin
[\[235b.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med do/_/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [#]'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa ste/_de la brten pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'byung ngo /_/rab
[\[235b.4\]]'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la sbyor zhing thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa la bkod nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la 'god pa yin no zhes bya ba ni mi'i
[\[235b.5\]]'gro ba zhi bar mdzad pa'i phrin las yin no//_//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi
[\[235b.6\]]dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_zad par gyi
[\[235b.7\]]skye mched bcu dang /_zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_smon nas shes pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_yongs su dag pa bzhi dang /_dbang bcu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]bzhi dang /_bsrung ba med pa gsum dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid dang /_bag chags yang dag par bcom pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_rnam pa
[\[236a.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /[ (]skyas [,]skyes [)]bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /_gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams te/_de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/_
[\[236a.3\]]'di lta ste/_nang gi lus dang /_phyi'i lus dang /_phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal zhing rnam par spyod do/_/lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par
[\[236a.4\]]spyod do/_/lus la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/_/lus la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/_/lus la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang la yang nye bar len pa med do/_/nang gi tshor ba dang /_phyi'i tshor ba dang /_phyi nang gi tshor ba dang /_nang gi
[\[236a.5\]]sems dang /_phyi'i sems dang /_phyi nang gi sems dang /_nang gi chos dang /_phyi'i chos dang /_phyi nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal zhing rnam par spyod do/_/chos la kun 'byung
[\[236a.6\]]ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/_/chos la zad pa med [#]pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/_/chos la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do/_/rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/_sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i
[\[236a.7\]]phyir mos pa skyed [#]pa dang /_skyes pa rnam par spang ba'i phyir rtsol ba dang /_dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa bskyed cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_skyes pa rnams shin tu 'phel zhing shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang /_sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa bskyed
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]pa'o/_/rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/_mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_sems dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dpyod [#]pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/_/rab 'byor dbang po lnga gang zhe na/_
[\[236b.2\]]dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po dang [#]/_de dag ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o/_/stobs lnga gang zhe na/_dad pa'i stobs dang /_brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /_dran pa'i stobs dang /_ting nge 'dzin
[\[236b.3\]]gyi stobs dang /_shes rab kyi stobs dang [#]/_de dag ni stobs lnga zhes bya'o[#]/_/rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/_dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_dga'
[\[236b.4\]]ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi [#]yan lag dang /_btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/_de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
[\[236b.5\]]brgyad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/_de dag ni 'phags pa'i
[\[236b.6\]]lam yan lag brgyad ces bya'o/_/de la ting nge 'dzin gsum gang zhe na/_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_stong pa'i rnam pa dang /_dben pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/_de ni
[\[236b.7\]]stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o/_/mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/_de ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o/_/smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]ba'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/_de ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/_gzugs can gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/_/nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs
[\[237a.2\]]thams cad mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/_/bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam
[\[237a.3\]]par thar pa lnga pa'o/_/cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/_/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/_/'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa
[\[237a.4\]]'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/_de dag [#]rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o/_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/_'di la la la 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyi dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/[ #]dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i
[\[237a.5\]]dga' ba dang bde ba can/_bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas [#]rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa/_ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/_bsam
[\[237a.6\]]gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba las [#]rnam par spyod [#]pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_
[\[237a.7\]]dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid [#]mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa/_bsam gtan bzhi pa
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/[ (]thags [,]thogs [)]pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar
[\[237b.2\]]bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par
[\[237b.3\]]'das te/_cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes
[\[237b.4\]]med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes dang /_tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o/_/de la zad par gyi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/_zad par sa dang /_zad par chu dang /_zad
[\[237b.5\]]par me dang /_zad par rlung dang /_zad par sngon po dang /_zad par ser po dang /_zad par dmar po dang /_zad par dkar po dang /_zad par rnam par shes pa dang /_zad par nam mkha' ste/_de dag ni zad par gyi skye mched bcu zhes bya'o/_/de la zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang
[\[237b.6\]]gang zhe na/_nang gzugs su 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang /_kha dog sdug pa dang /_kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/_zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing /_de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o/_/nang gzugs su
[\[237b.7\]]'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang /_kha dog [#]sdug pa dang /_kha dog mi [#]sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/_zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa [#]dang /_kha dog sdug pa dang /_kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/_zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing
[\[238a.2\]]phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang /_kha dog sdug pa dang /_kha dog mi sdug pa dag [#]mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/_zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po/_
[\[238a.3\]]kha dog sngon po/_/sngon por snang ba/_mdog sngon po 'di lta ste/_dper na/_me tog o ma ka lta bu'am/_yul bA rA Na sIr [#]byas pa'i gos ltar sngo ba/_sngon po kha dog sngo ba/_sngon por snang ba/_mdog sngo ba mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/_zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing /_de ltar
[\[238a.4\]]'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po/_/kha dog ser po/_ser po snang ba/_mdog ser po 'di lta ste/_dper na/_shing kar shi ka ra'i me tog lta bu'am/_yul bA rA Na sIr [#]byas pa'i gos ltar ser ba/_kha dog ser
[\[238a.5\]]ba/_ser bar snang ba/_mdog ser ba mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/_zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing /_de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon [#]pa'i skye mched drug pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po/_kha dog dmar po/_dmar
[\[238a.6\]]por snang ba/_mdog dmar po 'di lta ste/_dper na/_ban+du dzi [#]ba ka'i me tog lta bu'am/_yul bA rA Na sIr [#]byas pa'i gos ltar dmar ba/_kha dog dmar ba/_dmar bar snang ba/_mdog dmar bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/_zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing /_de ltar 'du
[\[238a.7\]]shes pa de [#]ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po/_/kha dog dkar po/_dkar por snang ba/_mdog dkar po 'di lta ste/_dper na/_skar ma pa bsangs kyi 'od lta bu'am/_yul bA rA Na sIr [#]byas pa'i gos ltar dkar ba/
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]kha dog dkar ba/_dkar bar snang ba/_mdog dkar bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/_zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing /_de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa'o/_/de la nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhe na/_bsam gtan la gnas nas
[\[238b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rnam par spyod pa sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi nyon mongs pa mi skye ba'i mthu yod pa ting nge 'dzin gang gis 'grub pa de ni nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/smon lam gyi shes pa gang zhe na/_bsam gtan la gnas te 'di shes par
[\[238b.3\]]bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dus gsum gyi shes bya'am[#]/_shes pa gang dang gang 'dod par 'gyur ba de la yid kyis smon par byed de/_ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas de'i smon lam de yongs su grub par gyur cing shes bya de'ang shes pa de ni smon lam gyi shes pa zhes bya'o/_/_
[\[238b.4\]]de la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na/_rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang /_lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa dang /_lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /_zag pa zad pa'i
[\[238b.5\]]mngon par shes pa ste drug po de dag go/_/de la yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na/_lus yongs su dag pa dang /_dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang /_sems yongs su dag pa dang /_ye shes yongs su dag pa ste bzhi po de dag go/_/de la dbang bcu gang zhe na/_tshe la dbang ba dang /_sems la
[\[238b.6\]]dbang ba dang /_yo byad la dbang ba dang /_las la dbang ba dang /_skye ba la dbang ba dang /_mos pa la dbang ba dang /_smon lam la dbang ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang /_ye shes la dbang ba dang /_chos la dbang ba ste/_bcu po de dag go/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
[\[238b.7\]]gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnas la yang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i las dang las yongs su
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]blangs pa'i rnam par smin pa gnas kyi rnam pa dang rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/khams sna tshogs can dang khams du ma can gyi 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa sna
[\[239a.2\]]tshogs dang mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/kun du 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_
[\[239a.3\]]byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs te/_tshe rabs gcig kyang
[\[239a.4\]]rjes su dgongs pa nas/_tshe rabs brgya dang /_tshe rabs stong dang /_tshe rabs brgya stong dang /_tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du yang rjes su dgongs te[#]/_bskal pa gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/_bskal pa brgya'i bar dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya stong phrag
[\[239a.5\]]du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar dag kyang rjes su dgongs te/_bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug go/_/ming ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rigs ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rus ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/_/zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za'o/_/yun ni 'di srid cig tu
[\[239a.6\]]gnas gnas so/_/tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/_bdag de nas shi [#]'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas/_de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so [#]zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas/_sa mal dang bcas/_gtan tshigs dang bcas pa rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su
[\[239a.7\]]dgongs so/_/lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/_sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba dag kyang gzigs so/_/kha dog sdug pa dang /_mi sdug pa dang /_bzang ba dang /_ngan pa dang /_bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang /_ngan 'gro na 'khod pa dang /_las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'dong ba'i sems
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]can rnams rab tu mkhyen te/_sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis [#]ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/_ngag gis [#]ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa[#]/_yid kyis [#]ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/_'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa/_log par lta ba dag ste/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas ngan song log par ltung ba [#]

[\[239b.3\]]'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha'i nang du skye'o zhes bya ba [#]rab tu mkhyen to/_/zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang /_shes rab rnam par grol ba dang /_zag pa med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te[#]/_bcu po de dag ni de bzhin [#]gshegs pa'i stobs so/_/rab 'byor
[\[239b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/_bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/_'di la chos gang yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_skye dgu'i
[\[239b.5\]]tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/_'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par [#]rjes su mi mthong ste/_rgyu yang dag par [#]rjes su ma mthong bas bdag bde ba thob pa dang /_bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa thob pa rnam par spyod de/_khyu mchog rlabs
[\[239b.6\]]po che'i gnas su dam bca'o 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra bsgrag go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan su yang [#]rung ste/_chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/_/bdag zag pa
[\[239b.7\]]zad do zhes dam bcas na/_de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/_'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas/_de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang /_bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa thob pa rnam par spyod do[#]/_/khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra bsgrag
[\[240a.2\]]go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan sus kyang rung ste/_chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/_/gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la brten na
[\[240a.3\]]bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur zhes dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/_'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas de
[\[240a.4\]]la bdag bde ba thob pa dang /_bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa thob pa rnam par spyod de/_khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra bsgrag [#]go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_

[\[240a.6\]]nas [#]sdug bsngal yang dag par zad pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/_'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rgyu

[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan sus kyang rung ste/_chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste bzhi po de dag ni mi 'jigs pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di
[\[240b.2\]]lta ste/_don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/_de dag kyang gang zhe na/_don la dmigs pa dang /_chos la dmigs pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig la dmigs pa
[\[240b.3\]]dang /_spobs pa la dmigs pa'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba med pa gsum gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas la las shes su 'ong zhes gang
[\[240b.4\]]yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/_'di ni bsrung ba med pa dang po'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas la las shes su 'ong zhes gang
[\[240b.5\]]yang [#]bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/_'di ni bsrung ba med pa gnyis pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni [#]thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas la las shes su 'ong ngo zhes
[\[240b.6\]]gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/_'di ni bsrung ba med pa gsum pa'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i tshe la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan zhing bka' mnyan pa'i
[\[240b.7\]]sems nye bar gzhag pa dang /_chos dang nye bar [#]chos la nan tan du byed na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur/_yid bde bar mi 'gyur/_thugs yeng yeng por mi 'gyur te/_'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po'o/_/la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan zhing bka'
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med pa dang /_chos dang gnyer ba'i chos nan tan du mi byed na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs khro bar mi 'gyur/_mi bzod par mi 'gyur/_thugs mi ches par mi 'gyur te/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
[\[241a.2\]]dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa'o/_/la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan zhing bka' mnyan [#]pa'i sems nye bar gzhog la chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed/_la la rna ba btud de rim gror mi byed cing /_bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med pa ste[#]/_chos dang gnyer ba'i
[\[241a.3\]]chos nan tan du mi byed kyang /_des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa'am/_thugs khro bar gnyis su [#]mi 'gyur te/_thams cad du dgongs pa dang [#]ldan zhing mkhyen par btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyams
[\[241a.4\]]pa med pa'i chos nyid gang zhe na/_gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir/_sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la dus las mi 'da' ba ste/_de ni nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid ces bya'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib
[\[241a.5\]]pa rab tu spangs pa gang zhe na/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni nyon mongs pa spangs kyang lus kyi 'gyur ba yod kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de lta bu yang mi mnga' ste/_de ni bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa zhes bya'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje
