[\[241a.6\]]chen po gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi brda nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i phyir dus thams cad du 'jig rten la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du rtog pa mdzad [#]ces bya ba ste/_dngos su na sangs rgyas bcom
[\[241a.7\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba la gzigs pa rtag par 'byung ste/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/_de bzhin
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o/_/ca co mi mnga'o/_/dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o/_/thugs mnyam par ma bzhag [#]pa mi mnga'o/_/so sor [#]ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o/_/mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/brtson 'grus
[\[241b.2\]]yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/dran pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi
[\[241b.3\]]mnga'o/_/sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/_ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/_/gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes [#]sngon du 'gro ba ste/_ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/_/thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes [#]sngon du 'gro ba [#]ste/_ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/_/
[\[241b.4\]]'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa [#]'jug go/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa [#]'jug go/_/de ltar byung ba'i du [#]la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs [#]pa 'jug ste/_de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
[\[241b.5\]]rnams so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na/_gang la dmigs pa med pa dran pas dbang bsgyur [#]ba zhi ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o//_//bam po drug cu bdun
[\[241b.6\]]pa/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang /_zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang /_phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel pa dang /_phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang /_bdun shin tu mtho ba dang /_
[\[241b.7\]]sor mo ring ba dang /_rting pa yangs pa dang /_sku che zhing drang ba dang /_zhabs legs par mtho ba dang /_yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil pa dang /_ri dgas e na [#]ya'i byin pa lta bu dang /_phyag brla drang por slebs pa dang /_gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang /_gser gyi kha dog dang /
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]mdog shin tu 'jam pa dang /_spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang /_zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang /_seng+ge'i ro stod lta bu dang /_phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa dang /_phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang /_ro bro ba'i mchog dang /_shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng
[\[242a.2\]]gab pa dang /_dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa dang /_ljags shin tu yangs pa dang /_tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang /_seng+ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang /_tshems shin tu dkar ba dang /_tshems shin tu [#]mnyam pa dang /_tshems thags [#]bzang ba dang /_tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba dang /_spyan dkar
[\[242a.3\]]nag 'byes pa dang /_ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/_mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di lta ste/_rus pa'am/_ba so la gzugs su brkos pa dang 'dra ba mnga'
[\[242a.4\]]bas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o/_/zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing zhabs zhum pa med pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa'o/_/ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel pas phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba'o/_/shing bal gyi
[\[242a.5\]]sgo nga ltar shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'o/_/phyag dang zhabs dang mgur gyi lhun shin tu mtho bas bdun shin tu mtho ba'o/_/phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring bas sor mo ring ba'o/_/rting pa ring bas rting pa yangs pa'o/_/sku khru bdun du 'phags la
[\[242a.6\]]drang bas sku che zhing drang ba'o/_/pus mo'i lha nga dang long bu mdzes par nub pas zhabs legs par mtho ba'o/_/spu gyen du g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pas yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'o/_/ri dgas e na [#]ya'i byin pa dang /_smyig ma dang ldum bu dar ba ltar drang zhing ma nyams la rim gyis [#]
[\[242a.7\]]gzhol bar grub cing byin pa zlum pas ri dgas e na ya'i [#]byin pa lta bu'o/_/brla drang por bzhag ste ma btud kyang phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis pus mo'i lha nga la reg pas phyag brla drang por slebs pa'o/_/glang po dang rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin tu mdzes shing sbubs su
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]nub pas gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o/_/shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gser gyi [#]kha dog go/_/gser dang dngul shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing gzhon pa'i mdog tu 'dug la sku la rdul gyis mi 'go bas kha dog shin tu 'jam pa'o/_/shin tu [#]
[\[242b.2\]]rnam par phye ba'i spu re rer skyes shing gnyis su med pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa'o/_/me tog kun da dang zla ba dang /_'o ma dang /_ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug pa [#]nyi ma dang zla ba brgya las kyang 'phags par 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spus smin mtshams shin tu brgyan pas zhal mdzod spus brgyan
[\[242b.3\]]pa'o/_/ro stod tshe bas seng+ge'i ro stod do/_/mgur dang rgyud legs par 'brel zhing lhun zlum pas phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'o/_/gser gyi gtan pa shin tu phyis pa la [#]phrag so legs par grub pas phrag so shin tu legs par rgyas pa'o/_/rlung dang mkhris pa dang bde kan gyis ma nyams
[\[242b.4\]]shing rnam par shes pa 'dra ba med pas ro bro ba'i mchog go/_/sku chu zheng 'dom du mnyam pas shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa'o/_/spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang ldan pa'i dbu mnyam zhing legs par grub la mdzes pa mnga' bas dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan
[\[242b.5\]]pa'o/_/me tog ut+pal dmar po'i 'dab ma'i mdog ltar 'dug cing shin tu yangs pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'o/_/tshangs pa dang bya [#]ka la ping ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs so/_/'gram pa me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing mdzes par
[\[242b.6\]]skyes te/_yid du 'ong bas seng+ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o/_/me tog kun da dang dung gi bcag 'phro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas tshems shin tu dkar ba'o/_/tshems la mtho dman med pas tshems mnyam pa'o/_/tshems la mtshams ma dod pas tshems thags bzang ba'o/_/bla
[\[242b.7\]]'og dgye gu [#]med pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'o/_/dkar nag gi cha ma 'dres la shin tu rnam par dag cing mdog dmar pos ma g.yogs pas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa'o/_/rdzi ma bla 'og [#]tu legs par gnas la ma 'dzings pas ba'i rdzi ma [#]lta bu'o/_/de la bla ma la bsu skyel
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]dang /_chos nyan pa la bstod pa dang /_gtsug lag khang dang /_mchod rten la sogs pa'i bsti stang byas pas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/_da ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas so/_/yid dam la brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste/_de ni
[\[243a.2\]]mi g.yo zhing shin tu brtan pa'i snga ltas so/_/sbyin pa dang /_ngag snyan pa dang /_don spyod pa dang /_don mthun pa'i bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi goms par byas pas/_phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel pa ste/_de ni myur du 'du ba'i snga ltas so/_/bza' ba dang bca' ba dang btung ba zhim zhing nyams su
[\[243a.3\]]bde ba byin pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang /_bdun shin tu mtho ba ste/_de gnyis ni bza' ba dang btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba thob pa'i snga ltas so/_/bcings pa bkrol ba dang /_srog gi rim gro byas pa dang srog gcod pa spangs pas/_sor mo ring ba dang /_rting pa yangs
[\[243a.4\]]pa dang sku che zhing drang ba ste/_de ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so/_/dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang bzung ba mngon par spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang /_yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil pa ste/_de ni mi nyams pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga ltas so/_/rig
[\[243a.5\]]pa dang bzo'i las la [#]rim gror byas shing gzhan la byin pa dang /_bdag gis blangs pas ri dgas e na [#]ya'i byin pa lta bu ste/_de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas so/_/bdog cing yod pa'i nor la bslangs nas mi god par [#]gtong zhing med ces ma byas pas phyag brla drang por slebs pa ste/_de ni
[\[243a.6\]]yo byad la dbang ba dang dul ba'i snga ltas so/_/'grogs pa dang mdza' bshes dang [#]gnyen pa ma phye ba dang /_dbye [#]bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang /_gsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsrungs pas gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa ste/_de ni bu mang
[\[243a.7\]]ba'i snga ltas so/_/stan dang gos dang khang pa dang gzhal med khang dang /_gnas bzang po byin pas gser gyi kha dog dang mdog shin tu 'jam pa ste/_de gnyis ni gdan dang na bza' dang /_khang pa dang gzhal med khang dang gnas bzang po 'thob pa'i snga ltas so/_/'du 'dzi spangs pa dang /_mkhan
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]po dang /_slob dpon dang /_pha ma dang /_phu [#]nu la sogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim gro [#]byas pa dang /_btsun par byas pa dang /_bsgo ba rnal ma gzan pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang /_zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste/_de ni mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltas so/_/mi
[\[243b.2\]]snyan pa mi zer zhing mi smod pa [#]snyan par smra zhing legs par bshad pa mthun par 'dzin pas seng+ge'i ro stod lta bu dang phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa ste/_de ni thub pa med pa'i snga ltas so/_/na ba rnams la rtsis [#]dang rim gro dang sman dang nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang /_rim gror byas pas phrag
[\[243b.3\]]so shin tu rgyas pa dang /_ro bro ba'i mchog ste/_de ni nad nyung ba'i snga ltas so/_/skyed mos tshal dang /_'khor dang btung [#]ba dang /_rdzing bu dang /_rgal [#]dka' ba'i zam pa dang /_kha zas dang /_phreng ba'i gnas dang /_stegs dang gtsug lag khang bya ba la sogs pa la gzhan mos par bya ba
[\[243b.4\]]sngon du gtong zhing bdag gis gzhan la byin pas shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang /_dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/_de ni mnga' chen po mnga' ba'i snga ltas so/_/yun ring por tshig snyan zhing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde bar [#]smras pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa dang tshangs pa'i
[\[243b.5\]]dbyangs te/_de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so/_/gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/_yongs su shes shing rnam par shes par 'gyur ba [#]dang /_mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang /_zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang /_btang mi bra
[\[243b.6\]]zhing rnar snyan pa dang /_ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o/_/yun ring po nas tshig 'khyal pa spangs shing dus su smra smra bas seng+ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/_de ni tshig kun gyis snyan pa'i snga ltas so/_/rim gror bya ba dang brnyas pa med pa gnyis kyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas tshems shin tu dkar
[\[243b.7\]]ba dang mnyam pa ste/_de ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas so/_/yun ring po nas bden zhing phra ma med pa'i tshig smra smra bas tshems thags bzang ba dang /_tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba ste/_de ni 'khor dbyer mi phyed pa'i snga ltas so/_/pang [#]gis 'khyud pa bzhin du nyes par bsam[#]
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]pa med pa la ma chags shing mi sdang ba dang /_rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta lta bas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang /_ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so/_/rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so/_/de
[\[244a.2\]]la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste/_sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyen bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can
[\[244a.3\]]la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste/_sen mo mdog snum pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs dang rgyud mthon por byung ba ste/_sen mo mtho ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ba ste/_sor mo zlum pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan
[\[244a.4\]]'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu tshogs pa ste/_sor mo rgyas pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste/_sor mo rim gyis gzhol ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dang gsung dang sku'i phrin las dang 'tsho ba shin tu dben pa ste/_
[\[244a.5\]]rtsa mi mngon pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grol ba ste/_rtsa mdud pa med pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu dben pa'i chos mnga' ba ste/_long bu mi mngon pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa
[\[244a.6\]]thams cad las sgrol ba ste/_zhabs mi [#]mnyam pa med pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams [#]mi'i seng+ge ste/_seng+ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i glang po ste/_glang po'i [#]'gros su bzhud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
[\[244a.7\]]ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pa ste/_ngang pa'i stabs su bzhud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i khyu mchog ste/_khyu mchog gi stabs su bzhud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste/_g.yas phyogs su bzhud pa
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni blta na mdzes pa ste/_mdzes par bzhud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste/_ma yo bar bzhud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston pa ste/_sku
[\[244b.2\]]shin tu legs pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i chos thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste/_sku shin tu sbyangs pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rim gyis ston pa ste/_sku rim gyis gzhol ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku dang gsung
[\[244b.3\]]dang thugs gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/_sku shin tu gtsang ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/_sku shin tu 'jam pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/_sku shin tu rnam
[\[244b.4\]]par dag pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste/_dpe byad shin tu rdzogs pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan shin tu [#]yangs shing bzang po ston pa ste/_sku che zhing mdzes pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
[\[244b.5\]]ni sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/_sku legs par mnyam pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa ste/_sku shin tu gzhon pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/_sku
[\[244b.6\]]zhum pa med pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang ba ste/_sku shin tu rgyas pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/_sku shin tu mkhregs pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten
[\[244b.7\]]cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nying lag legs par ston pa ste/_yan lag dang nying lag dpa' [#]bar mdzes pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu dag pa ste/_snang ba rab rib med ces [#]rnam par dag pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]ni tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/_phyal zlum pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste/_phyal shin tu byang ba dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nga rgyal gyi de'u bcom
[\[245a.2\]]pa ste/_phyal ma zhom pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zad pa rnams [#]bzlog pa ste/_phyal phyam mer 'dug pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zab mo shin tu thugs su chud pa ste/_lte ba zab pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun
[\[245a.3\]]par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/_lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' ba ste/_kun nas mdzes pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs shin tu gtsang ba dang ldan pa ste/_kun
[\[245a.4\]]tu spyod pa shin tu gtsang ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste/_sku la sme ba med pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shing bal ltar rab tu yang ba rab tu mtho ba'i [#]chos ston pa ste/_phyag shing bal ltar
[\[245a.5\]]shin tu [#]'jam pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi skye bo dang skye bo phal pa [#]byams pas dge sbyong chen po mnyes pa ste/_phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu zab cing brtan par bzhugs pa ste/_phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin/_sangs rgyas
[\[245a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bzod pa'i chos yangs pa ston pa ste/_phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang mi ring bar 'cha' ba ste/_zhal ha cang mi ring ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs brnyan 'jig rten du
[\[245a.7\]]skye ba ste/_zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam pa sngon du btang zhing 'dul ba ste/_ljags shin tu 'jam pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste/_ljags shin tu srab pa yin/_
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byis pa so so'i skye bo 'dod chags pa rnams kyis [(]ches [,]chos [)]dang 'dul ba gting dpag par dka' ba ste/_ljags shin tu dmar ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po'i sgra dang 'brug gi sgra lta bus bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba ste/_
[\[245b.2\]]glang po'i nga ro dang /_'brug gi sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyan zhing 'jam pa dang /_nyams su bde bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/_snyan zhing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde ba'i [#]gsung dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni srid pa [#]kun tu sbyor
[\[245b.3\]]ba las 'das pa ste/_tshems mche ba shin tu [#]zlum pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skye bo rno ba rnams 'dul ba ste/_tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin tu dkar ba ste/_tshems mche ba shin tu dkar ba yin/_
[\[245b.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/_tshems mche ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rim gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste/_tshems mche ba rim gyis gzhol ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan
[\[245b.5\]]'das rnams ni shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pa ste/_shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ba mnga' ba ste/_shangs shin tu gtsang ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
[\[245b.6\]]phul du yangs pa mnga' ba ste/_spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/_spyan rnam par dag pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi tshogs shin tu bsags pa ste/_rdzi ma stug pa
[\[245b.7\]]yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lha dang mi dang [#]lha ma yin dang skyes bu dang [#]na chung mchog mig dkar nag 'byes shing pad+mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar byas pa ste/_spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad+mo'i [#]'dab ma ltar 'dug pa yin/_sangs rgyas
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu yangs par gzigs pa ste/_smin ma ring ba dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pa ste/_smin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skyon
[\[246a.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa ste/[ (]smig [,]smin [)]ma'i spu mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis sems can snum par 'gyur ba'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/_smin ma snum pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog tu yangs
[\[246a.3\]]shing don dang ldan pa [#]mnga' ba ste/_snyan shal legs shing snyan shal ring ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba ste/_snyan 'jam [#]pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can bsam pa ma nyams pa 'dul ba ste/_snyan
[\[246a.4\]]gyi dbang po ma nyams pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su sbyangs pa ste/_zhal 'phral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phas kyi rgol ba shin tu 'dul ba ste/_zhal 'phral ba [#]
[\[246a.5\]]yangs pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam dam pa shin tu rdzogs pa ste/_dbu shin tu rgyas pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul gyi bung ba rnams bzlogs [#]pa ste/_dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom
[\[246a.6\]]ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ba dang bsgom pa spang ba'i [#]bag la nyal ba zad par byas pa ste/_dbu skra stug pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs su chud pa ste/_dbu skra 'jam pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma
[\[246a.7\]]'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/_dbu skra mi [#]'dzings pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni brlangs pa'i [#]gsung dang yongs su bral ba ste/_dbu skra mi rtsub pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag spos kyi me tog gi [#]skye bo
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]mthun par bsgrubs pa ste/_dbu skra dri zhim pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang /_bkra shis dang /_g.yung drung 'khyil pas brgyan pa yin[#]/_rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
[\[246b.2\]]kyi dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar [#]de lta bu'i chos kyi rnam pa de dag gzhan la bshad pa dang /_bstan pa dang /_yang dag par bstan pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams
[\[246b.3\]]zang zing gi sbyin pa dang chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor
[\[246b.4\]]'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can rnams sdud pa yin te/_'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
[\[246b.5\]]phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan par smra bas [#]sems can rnams sdud do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa
[\[246b.6\]]med de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don byas pas [#]sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[246b.7\]]dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [#]don bya bas sems can rnams
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]sdud do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don mthun pas sems can rnams
[\[247a.2\]]sdud do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun par sems can rnams [#]sdud do/_/rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[247a.3\]]chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la 'god pa'i phrin las yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag
[\[247a.4\]]la 'di skad du 'doms shing 'di skad ston to[#]/_/rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog yi ge mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas par gyis shig_/yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyis shig_/yi ge gnyis nas yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas par gyis shig_/yi ge gcig gis [#]byang ba'i rang bzhin
[\[247a.5\]]thams cad shes par gyis shig_/yi ge gnyis kyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig_/yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig_/yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgoms shig_/yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa
[\[247a.6\]]gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par sgoms shig ces chos ston to/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin/_yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas pa yin/_yi ge gcig gi nang du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su [#]'dus par sgom [#]pa
[\[247a.7\]]la mkhas pa yin/_yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par sgom [#]pa la mkhas pa yin[#]/_de de ltar yi ge mngon par sgrub [#]pa la mkhas par bya na/_lam la goms shing yi ge med par mngon par sgrub [#]pa la mkhas pa yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos la mkhas pa dang yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/_chos la mkhas pa dang yi ge la mkhas pas yi ge mang pos yi ge med pa'i chos ston kyang /_rab 'byor chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang bral ba yang ma yin te/_rab 'byor de yang byang
[\[247b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos te/_gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang [#]thun mong ma yin pa'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te mtha' las 'das pa
[\[247b.3\]]dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/_sems can yang shin tu mi dmigs/_chos kyang mi dmigs/_chos kyi dngos po yang mi dmigs pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam
[\[247b.4\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa [#]dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la
[\[247b.5\]]spyod pa [#]dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la spyod pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
[\[247b.6\]]pa dgu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po
[\[247b.7\]]brgyad cu la spyod cing /_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la gnas nas sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur/_de la ni sems can mi dmigs te/_sems can [#]gdags pa'ang mi dmigs so/_/sems can mi dmigs pas gzugs dmigs su ma
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]mchis so/_/sems can mi dmigs pas tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so/_/sems can rnams [#]mi dmigs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du dmigs su ma
[\[248a.2\]]mchis so/_/sems can mi dmigs pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su ma mchis so/_/sems can mi dmigs pas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dmigs su ma mchis so/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dmigs su ma mchis so/_/sems can
[\[248a.3\]]dmigs su ma mchis pa la ni sems can ma mchis so/_/gzugs ma mchis so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du ma mchis so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma
[\[248a.4\]]mchis so/_/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ma mchis so/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang mi dmigs
[\[248a.5\]]na/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smras pa [#]bzhin no/_/rab 'byor de ltar na sems can mi dmigs pas nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/phyi stong pa
[\[248a.6\]]nyid du rig par bya'o/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rig par bya'o/_/phung po stong pa nyid kyi bar [#]du rig par bya'o/_/khams stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/skye mched stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid du
[\[248a.7\]]rig par bya'o/_/bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/sems can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/srog dang /_'gro ba dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed can dang /_shed bdag dang /_byed pa po dang /_byed du 'jug pa po dang /_slong
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]ba po dang /_kun nas slong ba po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_tshor bar byed pa po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang
[\[248b.2\]]chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
[\[248b.3\]]pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi [#]dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa nyid du
[\[248b.4\]]rig par bya'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/lam gyi rnam pa [#]shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par
[\[248b.5\]]bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos de dag thams cad
[\[248b.6\]]stong par mthong na[#]/_phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston te/_ji ltar stong pa nyid de dag la yang mi 'jug pa de ltar ston to/_/des de ltar mthong nas chos thams cad sgrib pa med par shes te/_chos gang la yang 'khrug par mi byed gnyis su mi byed de/_yang dag pa ji
[\[248b.7\]]lta ba bzhin du yang ston par byed do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni sprul pa bye ba phrag du mar sprul zhing sems can la la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/_la la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/_la la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/_
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]la la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/_la la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/_la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/_la la bsam gtan bzhi la/_la la tshad med pa bzhi la/_la la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la
[\[249a.2\]]sbyor/_la la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la sbyor/_la la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_la la rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_la la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_la la stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_la la
[\[249a.3\]]mngon par shes pa lnga la sbyor/_la la ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_la la gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sbyor/_la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_la la mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_la la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_la la byams pa chen po dang /_la la snying rje chen
[\[249a.4\]]po dang /_la la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor/_la la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang [#]/_la la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_la la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_la la dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_la la rang byang chub la sbyor/_la la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
[\[249a.5\]]pa nyid kyi bar la sbyor na/_rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/_sprul pa des chos la la zhig tha dad du phye ba yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes
[\[249a.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams la chos ston te/_de dag phyin ci log rnams las yongs su bkrol nas ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshul du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 'god do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba[#]/_
[\[249a.7\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba ste/_gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi [#]ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni shin tu
[\[249b.2\]]rnam par dag pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[249b.3\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams la chos ston kyang sems can du mi dmigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/_gzugs stong pa nyid mi [#]dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes
[\[249b.4\]]dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la [#]ni gang la yang gnas pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni
[\[249b.5\]]'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs te/_dngos po med pa la dngos po med pa mi gnas so/_/rang bzhin la rang bzhin mi gnas so/_/gzhan gyi dngos po la gzhan gyi dngos po mi gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de dag thams cad dmigs su med de/_
[\[249b.6\]]gang dmigs su med pa de ni gang la yang [#]mi gnas so/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos de dag thams cad stong pa nyid thams cad kyi [#]rab tu 'byed de/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod
[\[249b.7\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams dang /_'phags pa thams cad kyis [#]skyon du mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_rang sangs rgyas de dag dang /_nyan thos de dag gis kyang chos nyid de'i [#]rjes su rtogs te/_chos nyid [#]rjes su rtogs nas kyang sems can rnams la chos
[\[250a.2\]]ston te/_de'ang chos rnams kyi chos nyid las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings ni 'da' ba med do/_/de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' ni 'da' ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag la'ang 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin med do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
[\[250a.3\]]gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos kyi dbyings la 'da' ba yang ma mchis/_de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' la'ang 'da' ba ma mchis na/_ci lags 'o na gzugs kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang
[\[250a.4\]]gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
[\[250a.5\]]nyid kyi bar yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gzugs kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag
[\[250a.6\]]pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan[#]/_chos
[\[250a.7\]]kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar gzugs kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags/_tshor ba
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du [#]yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin
[\[250b.2\]]nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags na/_'o na ji ltar chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par 'god cing nag po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa nag po ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dkar po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin
[\[250b.3\]]pa dkar po ni lha dang mi/_dkar nag gi chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar nag gi [#]bde ba dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba/_mi gnag cing dkar ba'i chos kyi rnam par smin pa mi gnag cing dkar ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /[ #]phyir mi 'ong ba'i
[\[250b.4\]]'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes bgyi bar rnam par dgod par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor kun rdzob kyi bden pa tshad mar byas te/_'bras bu rnam par dgod [#]pa bstan gyi/_don dam
[\[250b.5\]]pa'i bden par ni 'bras bu rnam par dgod [#]pa bstan par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos de ni rnam par brtag tu med pa/_brjod du med pa/[#]tha snyad med pa ste/_'di ltar mi bden pa dang /_gzugs med [#]pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_
[\[250b.6\]]rnam par byang ba med pa ste/_'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar kun rdzob kyi bden pa nye bar bzung ste/_'bras bu rnam par 'god pa lags kyi don dam pa'i bden pas ma lags na/_byis pa so so'i
[\[250b.7\]]skye bo thams cad kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /[# ]dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ci [#]
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kun rdzob kyi bden pa'am/_don dam pa'i bden pa shes sam/_gal te shes na ni de dag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang
[\[251a.2\]]byang chub bam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam par 'god par 'gyur na/_rab 'byor gyis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la lam yang med/_lam rnam par dgod [#]pa yang med/_lam sgom pa yang med par byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la 'bras bu rnam par dgod [#]pa lta ga la 'ong /_
[\[251a.3\]]rab 'byor 'phags pa'i gang zag la ni lam yang yod/_lam sgom pa yang yod pas na/_de'i phyir 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag la 'bras bu rnam par bkod [#]pa yod do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags lam bsgoms pas 'bras bu 'thob pa'am/_'bras bu 'thob par
[\[251a.4\]]bgyi ba [#]ma mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no[#]/_/lam bsgoms pas 'bras bu 'thob pa'am/_'bras bu thob [#]par bya ba med do/_/rab 'byor lam ma bsgoms par yang 'bras bu thob [#]pa med de/_lam gyi 'bras bu thob [#]par bya ba yang med
[\[251a.5\]]do/_/lam la ma gnas par yang 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas par [#]sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod [#]par byed de/_'dus byas kyi khams dang /_
[\[251a.6\]]'dus ma byas kyi khams [#]ris su bcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod [#]par mi byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams sam 'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su bcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa [#]ma mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]'di ni kun du
[\[251a.7\]]sbyor ba gsum spangs pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems bsrabs [#]pas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/'og ma'i cha can gyi kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/bla ma'i cha can gyi kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pas
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]dgra bcom pa nyid do/_/gang ci yang rung ste kun 'byung ba'i chos de dag thams cad 'gog pa'i chos can du shes pas rang byang chub bo/_/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes gsungs na/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[251b.2\]]ris su bcad cing 'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa ma mchis na gsungs pa'i don de bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
[\[251b.3\]]bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dus byas sam/_'on te 'dus ma byas pa yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'o/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni
[\[251b.4\]]'dus ma bgyis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'o na 'dus ma byas kyi chos la ris su bcad pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gang gi tshe
[\[251b.5\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams 'di lta ste/_mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig tu chud par gyur na/_de'i tshe 'dus byas shes [#]sam/_'dus ma byas shes [#]chos gang la yang ris su gcod pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags
[\[251b.6\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di lta ste/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du nye bar bzung ste/_sems can rnams la ris su
[\[251b.7\]]bcad pas [#]chos mi ston to/_/de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/_bsam gtan
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]dang po'am/_bsam gtan gnyis pa'am/_bsam gtan gsum pa'am/_bsam gtan bzhi pa'am/_byams pa'am/_snying rje'am/_dga' ba'am/_btang snyoms sam/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'am/_rnam shes mtha'
[\[252a.2\]]yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'am/_cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'am/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'am[#]/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang
[\[252a.3\]]po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_lam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad med pa rnams sam/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar gyis
[\[252a.4\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/_mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so
[\[252a.5\]]yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_byams pa chen po'am/_snying rje chen po'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ram/_chos gang la yang mngon par zhen pa med do/_/de la mngon par zhen pa med pas gang la yang chags pa med do/_/
[\[252a.6\]]'di lta ste/_dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba [#]yang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa med de/_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med do/_/gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims kyi
[\[252a.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams sam/_'jig rten pa [#]dang 'jig rten las 'das pa [#]dang /
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sgom yang /_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med[#]/_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/_gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du/_
[\[252b.2\]]'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sgom [#]mo/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_chos thams cad la spyod de/_chos gang la yang gnas pa'am chags pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des chos rnams kyi chos kyi
[\[252b.3\]]mtshan nyid shin tu khong du chud pa med do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi [#]mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis
[\[252b.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sprul pa ni 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang gti mug la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/bag la nyal ba [#]dang kun nas ldang ba la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/phyi nang gi chos thams cad la [#]spyod pa med do/_/zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa
[\[252b.5\]]med do/_/'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/gzugs la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la
[\[252b.6\]]yongs su spyod pa med do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
[\[252b.7\]]pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su spyod pa
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/rnam pa thams cad
[\[253a.2\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la yongs su spyod pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi chos kyi [#]mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa yin no//_//
[\[253a.3\]]bam po drug cu brgyad pa/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sprul pas lam bsgoms pa la brten kyang kun nas nyon mongs par yang [#]mi 'gyur/_rnam par byang bar yang [#]mi 'gyur[#]/_'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na yang mi snang na lam bsgom [#]du ci mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji
[\[253a.4\]]snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dngos po la la zhig la brten te/_kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa'am[#]/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'am/_'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na snang bar gyur pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom
[\[253a.5\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas dngos po la la zhig la brten te/_kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'am/_'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba nas gdon par [#]'gyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu gang [#]yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[253a.6\]]rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams [#]kyi tshul rab tu rtogs pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa
[\[253a.7\]]thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]gzugs thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/_bcom ldan 'das sprul pa la [#]ni gzugs ma mchis/_tshor ba ma mchis/_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ma mchis/_kun nas
[\[253b.2\]]nyon mongs pa ma mchis/_rnam par byang ba ma mchis/_gang las grol bar 'gyur ba'i 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba [#]ma mchis na/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyes bu'i byed par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[253b.3\]]dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can dmyal ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/_lha'am mi dag las yongs su dgrol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang dmigs sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan
[\[253b.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khams gsum nas yongs su dgrol [#]bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes so/_/mthong ngo /_/rtogs so/_
[\[253b.5\]]sprul pa lta bur shes so/_/mthong ngo /_/rtogs so/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyes bu'i byed par rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur [#]'tshal zhing mthong ste rtogs pa [#]la/_
[\[253b.6\]]sprul pa lta bur 'tshal zhing mthong ste rtogs pa lags na/_gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa lags/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_byang
[\[253b.7\]]chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa lags/_ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam gyi bar la spyod pa lags/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa lags/_sems can
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te sems can rnams rang rang gis [#]chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur shes su zin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can rnams kyi don du bskal
[\[254a.2\]]pa grangs med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa mi spyod de/_rab 'byor sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu [#]mi shes pas/_de'i phyir [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]bskal pa grangs med par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod do/_/sems can rnams yongs su
[\[254a.3\]]smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu/_sgra brnyan lta bu/_smig rgyu lta bu/_mig yor lta bu/_sgyu ma lta bu/_sprul pa lta bu lags na/_bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ci la
[\[254a.4\]]gnas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams gyen du bskyod par bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sems can rnams ni ming dang mtshan mar [#]yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags [#]pa la gnas pas na/_byang
[\[254a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_de dag ming dang mtshan ma la gyen du bskyod do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ming ni gang lags/_mtshan ma ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste ming zhes bya ba'am/_mtshan ma
[\[254a.6\]]zhes bya ba ni glo bur du ming gis [#]sgro btags pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_ming zhes bya ba'am/_mtshan ma zhes bya ba'am/_gzugs zhes bya ba'am/_tshor ba zhes bya ba'am/_'du shes zhes bya ba'am/_'du byed rnams zhes bya ba'am/_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'am/_bud med ces bya ba'am/_skyes pa
[\[254a.7\]]zhes bya ba'am/_khye'u zhes bya ba'am/_bu mo zhes bya ba'am/_sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas [#]zhes bya ba'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'am/_lha zhes bya ba'am/_mi zhes bya ba'am/_'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba'am/_'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba'am/
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba'am/_rang byang chub ces bya ba'am/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba de ni sgyu ma'i ming gis sgro btags pa ste/_rab
[\[254b.2\]]'byor ming thams cad ni ming gi [#]don [(]kyis [,]gyis [)]btags pa ste/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par 'gyur ba'i 'dus byas thams cad ni ming tsam ste/_de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas ming thams cad ni yongs su
[\[254b.3\]]rtogs [#]pa las byung ba yin gyis/_yongs su brtags [#]pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis [#]stong pa la khyed chags par ma byed cig_/chos thams cad stong pa la mkhas pa rnams ni mngon par zhen par mi byed do zhes skul [#]bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
[\[254b.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston pa yin no/_/rab 'byor mtshan ma gang zhe na/_gnyis po 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang /_gzugs med
[\[254b.5\]]pa'i mtshan ma'o/_/rab 'byor gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i gzugs rags pa'am/_phra ba'am/_bzang ba'am/_ngan pa'am/_rgyang ring ba'am/_thag nye ba gang chos thams cad skad cig ma la kun du rtog pas bzung ba ste/_'di ni gzugs
[\[254b.6\]]kyi mtshan ma zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na/_gzugs med pa'i chos gang la yang rung ste/_mtshan mar bzung bas yongs su brtags [#]shing nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur te/_'di ni gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya'o/_/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[254b.7\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas mtshan ma de dag las bkrol zhing mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su 'god cing rab tu gzhog ste/_ci nas kyang 'di ni mtshan ma'o/_/'di ni mtshan ma med pa'o zhes bya ba gnyis su mi ltung ba de ltar 'god cing gzhog ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na [#]
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams mtshan ma las rnam par bkrol zhing mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'god do/_/gsol pa/_gal te chos 'di dag thams cad ni de tsam du
[\[255a.2\]]bas te/_ming dang mtshan mar bas la btags pa tsam du bas te/_yongs su btags pa las byung ba lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag kyang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par thob la/_gzhan yang dge ba'i
[\[255a.3\]]chos kyi khyad par 'thob pa la gzhog cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/_sems can rnams theg pa gsum la sbyor ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te dngos po'am dngos po'i mtshan ma zhig yod na ni/_rab 'byor byang
[\[255a.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_khyad par 'thob par yang mi 'gyur te/_gzhan yang khyad par 'thob pa la sbyor [#]bar mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar dngos po'i mtshan ma yang med/_dngos po yang med pas na/_rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[255a.5\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[255a.6\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par
[\[255a.7\]]spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
[\[255b.2\]]dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_
[\[255b.3\]]so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de dge ba'i chos de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas nas mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzhan yang dge ba'i chos de dag la sbyor te/_rab 'byor
[\[255b.4\]]gal te chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag [#]pa tsam gyi khyon cig mtshan ma yod na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos mtshan ma med pa dang [#]dran pa med pa dang /_yid la byed pa med pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur te/_sems
[\[255b.5\]]can rnams kyang de bzhin nyid dang /_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la gzhog par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos rnams ni mtshan ma med pa/_dran pa med pa/_yid la bya ba med pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
[\[255b.6\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis [#]sems can thams cad kyi don byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis shing /_dran pa ma mchis te/_yid la bgyi ba ma mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni mi
[\[255b.7\]]dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni thun mong gi chos so/_/
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes ji ltar bgrang bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[256a.2\]]mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/_nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/_mtshan
[\[256a.3\]]ma med pa yang gzhan la/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/_mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa nyid rgyun du
[\[256a.4\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/dgra bcom pa nyid do/_/rang byang chub bo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i chos so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de de lta [#]lags
[\[256a.5\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med par rig par bya ste[#]/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i chos mang po [#]rnam par 'phel te/_'di lta ste pha
[\[256a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi [#]rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan
[\[256a.7\]]lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
[\[256b.2\]]bco brgyad dang /_de ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa dag gis rnam par 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la bslab par bya ba ma gtogs par gzhan la bslab [#]par bya ba med do/_/
[\[256b.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'di gsum du dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de[#]/_'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o/_/mtshan ma dang bral ba ni mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o/_/mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni smon pa
[\[256b.4\]]med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di dag la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phung po lnga la slob pa yin/_skye mched bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/_khams bco brgyad la slob pa yin/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu
[\[256b.5\]]gnyis la slob pa ste[#]/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa yin/_nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga
[\[256b.6\]]dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_
[\[256b.7\]]mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la slob pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan
[\[257a.2\]]'das rnam pa gang gi tshul du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la slob pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
[\[257a.3\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs rab tu shes te/_gzugs ji ltar skye ba dang /_gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa dang /_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu yin par rab tu shes so/_/de la ji ltar na gzugs shes pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na dbu ba'i phung po snying po med pa ltar shin tu
[\[257a.4\]]gsong ldong [#]dang /_shin tu gse tshags [#]dang /_shin tu snying po med par rab tu shes te[#]/_de ltar [#]gzugs shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang /_'jig [#]pa shes pa yin zhe na/_gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pas gang nas kyang mi 'ong /_gang du yang mi 'gro
[\[257a.5\]]ste/_gang gang [#]nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes te/_de ltar na gzugs kyi skye ba dang /_'jig pa shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid [#]ni mi skye mi 'gag 'ong ba med 'gro ba med kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/_rnam par byang
[\[257a.6\]]ba ma yin/_'bri ba ma yin/[ (]'phal [,]'phel [)]ba ma yin te/_phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/_/de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na chu'i chu bur gsog tu 'dug pa skye zhing
[\[257a.7\]]'gag pa ltar shes pa ste/_de ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang /_'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/_tshor ba ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pas gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro ba ste/_gang gang nas kyang [#]ma 'ongs pa de [#]gang du yang ma 'ongs par [#]shes
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]pa ste/_de ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang /_'jig pa shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni mi skye ste [#]mi 'gag 'ong ba med 'gro ba med kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/_rnam par byang ba ma yin/_'bri [#]ba ma yin/_'phel ba ma yin te/_phyin ci
[\[257b.2\]]log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/_/de ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na/_smig rgyu la chu shin tu mi dmigs pa ltar shes pa ste/_de ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 'du shes
[\[257b.3\]]kyi skye ba dang /_'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/_'du shes ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pas gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro ste/_gang gang nas kyang [#]ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang [#]ma song bar shes pa ste/_de ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na
[\[257b.4\]]'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/_'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag 'ong ba med 'gro ba med/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/_rnam par byang ba ma yin/_'bri ba ma yin/_'phel ba ma yin te/_de [#]phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/_/
[\[257b.5\]]de ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 'du byed rnams shes pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na/_chu shing gi shun pa so sor phye na snying po shin tu mi dmigs pa ltar shes par bya ste/_de ltar na 'du byed rnams shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 'du byed rnams kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin
[\[257b.6\]]zhe na/_'du byed rnams ni gang nas kyang [#]'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pas gang nas kyang mi 'ong /_gang du yang mi 'gro ste/_gang [#]gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/_de ltar na 'du byed rnams kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes
[\[257b.7\]]pa yin zhe na/_'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag 'ong ba med 'gro ba med/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/_rnam par byang ba ma yin/_'bri ba ma yin/_'phel ba ma yin te/_phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/_/de ltar na 'du byed rnams
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma byed par sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ltar shes pa ste/_de ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin
[\[258a.2\]]zhe na/_rnam par shes pa ni gang [#]gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pas gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba [#]gang du yang mi 'gro ba ste/_gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/_de ni rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na [#]rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa ma
[\[258a.3\]#]yin zhe na/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag 'ong ba med 'gro ba med/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/_rnam par byang ba ma yin/_'bri ba ma yin/_'phel ba ma yin te/_phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/_/de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
[\[258a.4\]]nyid shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin zhe na/_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid rnams ni mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid rnams kyis stong ngo /_/nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams kyis stong ngo /_/phyi'i chos rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams
[\[258a.5\]]kyis stong par shes te/_de ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin zhe na/_mig gi khams kyang mig gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mig gi rnam par shes
[\[258a.6\]]pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi khams kyang yid kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/chos kyi khams kyang chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo
[\[258a.7\]]zhes bya bar shes te/_de ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin no/_/sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis [#]stong ngo /_/de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rang gi ngo bos stong par shes so/_/ji ltar na rten cing
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med par shes pa dang /_de bzhin du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang /_chad pa med pa dang /_rtag pa med pa dang /_don gcig pa ma yin pa dang /_don tha dad pa [#]ma yin pa dang /_'ong ba med pa dang /_'gro ba med pa dang /_
[\[258b.2\]]spros pa dang bral zhing zhi bar shes pa de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin zhe na/_sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/_ji
[\[258b.3\]]ltar na sdug bsngal [#]'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin zhe na/_sdug bsngal shes pa yin/_bden pa shes pa yin/_'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/_gnyis las rnam par grol ba 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/_gnyis su med pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba [#]shes pa yin no/_/de bzhin du kun 'byung
[\[258b.4\]]ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/_de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/_sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba zhes bya bar shes pa yin no/_/de bzhin du kun 'byung ba
[\[258b.5\]]dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam gyi de bzhin nyid kyang rab tu shes pa yin te/_de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[258b.6\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phan tshun tha dad pa'i chos de dag de ltar 'tshal na/_des chos kyi dbyings rnam par dkrugs [#]par mi 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos la la zhig yod na ni rnam par dkrugs
[\[258b.7\]]par yang 'gyur te/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan gang yang mi dmigs so/_/gal te dmigs na ni chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par dkrugs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' 'am/_rang sangs rgyas sam/_
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis [#]chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang mi [#]dmigs so/_/de ltar mi [#]dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan no zhes btags pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
[\[259a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i [#]chos kyi dbyings la bslab par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings la slob pas gang la bslab par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la
[\[259a.3\]]spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos [#]thams cad la bslab par 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[259a.4\]]rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste/_dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings ni 'di lta ste/_dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dang /_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa [#]
[\[259a.5\]]dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i chos dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang [#]/_kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos dang /_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad de rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos kyi
[\[259a.6\]]dbyings la slob pas chos thams cad la bslab [#]par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ji ltar gzugs la bslab [#]par bgyi/_ji ltar tshor ba dang /_
[\[259a.7\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la bslab par
[\[259b.2\]]bgyi/_ji ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_
[\[259b.3\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la bslab
[\[259b.4\]]par bgyi/_ji ltar [#]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar
[\[259b.5\]]mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su grub par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang /_ji ltar khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho
[\[259b.6\]]ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs
[\[259b.7\]]chen dang /_snang ba dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can gyi lha rnams su skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar gnas
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]gtsang ma'i ris [#]kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing /_der yang mi skye bar bgyi/_ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi [#]skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang
[\[260a.2\]]mi skye bar bgyi/_ji ltar sems dang po bskyed pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sems bskyed [#]pa gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa dang /_drug pa dang /_bdun pa dang /_brgyad pa dang /_dgu pa dang /_sems bskyed pa bcu pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la bslab
[\[260a.3\]]par bgyi/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar byang chub kyi lam la bslabs [#]shing chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du btsal [#]bar bgyi ba'i byang chub kyi lam la bslab
[\[260a.4\]]par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs la bslab par bgyi/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung
[\[260a.5\]]ba la bslab par bgyi/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_nang stong pa nyid la bslab
[\[260a.6\]]par bgyi/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bgyi/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la bslab par bgyi/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams [#]dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_
[\[260a.7\]]mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bgyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_
