[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la
[\[260b.2\]]bslab par bgyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bgyi na/_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyin ci log la spyod pa'am/_mi spro ba spro bar bgyid par [#]mi 'gyur ba lags grang /_bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/_chos kyi dbyings la ni rnam
[\[260b.3\]]par rtog pa de dag ma mchis te/_gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_gzugs las gud na yang [#]chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzugs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi
[\[260b.4\]]dbyings ma lags/_rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rten cing 'brel par
[\[260b.5\]]'byung ba las gud na yang [#]chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_byang
[\[260b.6\]]chub kyi phyogs kyi chos las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te[#]/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams [#]kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med
[\[260b.7\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_gzungs kyi sgo [#]nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
[\[261a.2\]]dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams [#]las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings
[\[261a.3\]]nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rang byang chub las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rang byang
[\[261a.4\]]chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi
[\[261a.5\]]dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no/_/gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so/_/de bzhin du [#]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed
[\[261a.6\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong
[\[261a.7\]]pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
[\[261b.2\]]dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig
[\[261b.3\]]phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub nyid [#]kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
[\[261b.4\]]do/_/rab 'byor gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos kyi dbyings las ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan 'ga' zhig mthong na ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par mi 'gyur te/_chos thams cad ni chos kyi
[\[261b.5\]]dbyings yin pas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes nas chos thams cad ming med pa la ming gi brdas chos ston te/_'di ni gzugs zhes bya'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams
[\[261b.6\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos [#]sum cu rtsa bdun zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so[#]/_/_
[\[261b.7\]]bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/_/'di ni bla na med pa yang
[\[262a.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar zhes bya'o zhes chos ston to zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba rtogs pa la 'god pa'i phrin las yin no//_//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na [#]sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am sgyu ma byed pa'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis rdzas kyi rnam pa 'ga' zhig la brten te/_
[\[262a.3\]]gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_glang po'i gzugs sam/_rta'i gzugs sam/_ba lang gi gzugs sam/_rnga mo dang lug gi gzugs sam/_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo'i gzugs sam/_skyed mos tshal lam/_gzhal med [#]khang dang /_dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang /_kun
[\[262a.4\]]dga'i ra ba mdangs dga' ba dang /_rdzing bu mdangs dga' ba dang /_nags tshal mdangs dga' ba dag sprul zhing de dag tu bstan[#]/_'khor gyi stan dang /_gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs bting ste/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_kha zas dang /_spyan gzigs zhim po dag bstan tam/_glu dang sil
[\[262a.5\]]snyan gyis skye bo dga' bar byas sam/_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'am/_tshul khrims srung [#]ba'am/_bzod pa sgrub pa'am/_brtson 'grus rtsom pa'am/_ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba'am/_shes rab sgom pa'am/_rnam pa de lta bu dag gis skye bo dga' bar byas te/_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i [#]
[\[262a.6\]]rigs bstan tam/_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i rigs dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i rigs bstan tam/_ri rab bstan tam/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams bstan tam/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan
[\[262a.7\]]dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i [#]mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]bu che dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can gyi lha rnams bstan tam/_mi che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/_mi gdung ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/_legs mthong gi lha rnams dang /_rab lta'i lha rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams bstan tam/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes
[\[262b.2\]]mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha [#]gzugs med pa rnams bstan tam/_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas mang po bstan tam/_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[262b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[262b.4\]]la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams [#]dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /[ (]snyems [,]snyoms [)]par 'jug pa la spyod pa dang /_sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sa bcu pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_byang chub
[\[262b.5\]]sems dpa'i [(]skyen [,]skyon [)]med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub [#]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse [#]zhing 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa dang /_sems can rnams [#]yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang /_yan lag dang nying lag yongs
[\[262b.6\]]su gtong ba dang /_spyad par dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams [#]yongs su sgrub pa dang /_snying rje chen po yongs su sgrub pa de dag
[\[262b.7\]]bstan tam/_sangs rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bstan na/_de la sems can byis pa'i ngang tshul can dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma mi 'dis legs par bslabs [#]pa ngo mtshar che'o/_/re mdzes dag byed/_de ltar skye bo dga' bar byed cing /_gzugs kyi bye brag
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_glang po'i gzugs dang /_rta'i gzugs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang /_nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du [#]ston pa ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes ngo mtshar cher 'dzin to/_/de la skyes bu mkhas shing gsal ba yid rno ba dang ldan pa spyod
[\[263a.2\]]pa dam pa dang ldan pa rnams ni 'di snyam ste/_'di la chos gang yang dmigs su med na mi 'di de ltar med pa'i chos kyis [#]skye bo mang po 'di dag dga' bar byed pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so snyam ste/_sems can de dag ni dngos po med pa la dngos por 'du shes pa'o zhes bya bar de dag gis shes
[\[263a.3\]]par 'byung ngo /_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod [#]pa'i tshe/_chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang mi [#]mthong ste/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang /_sems can mi dmigs
[\[263a.4\]]sems can du gdags pa yang mi dmigs te zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams don ji lta ba bzhin du 'god pa'i phrin las yin no//_//de bdag kyang sbyin pa gtong ba yin/_gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/_sems can gang sbyin pa gtong
[\[263a.5\]]ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/_bdag kyang tshul khrims srung [#]ba yin/_gzhan yang tshul khrims [#]la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_tshul khrims kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan [#]gang tshul khrims srung [#]ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing
[\[263a.6\]]mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang bzod pa sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang bzod pa sgom pa la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_bzod pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang bzod pa sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag
[\[263a.7\]]kyang brtson 'grus rtsom pa yin/_gzhan yang brtson 'grus rtsom pa la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin la
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_ting nge 'dzin gyi legs pa brjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang gis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas [#]dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang shes rab sgom pa yin/_gzhan
[\[263b.2\]]yang shes rab sgom pa la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_shes rab kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang shes rab sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la 'god pa'i phrin las yin no//_//bam po drug cu dgu pa/_
[\[263b.3\]]bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang [#]yang dag par 'dzin pa yin/_gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi legs pa brjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs
[\[263b.4\]]pa brjod [#]cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzin pa yin/_gzhan yang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la [#]yang dag par bskul ba yin/_bslab pa'i gnas lnga'i legs pa brjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag
[\[263b.5\]]par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyad [#]pa yin/_bdag kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong
[\[263b.6\]]gi legs pa brjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang
[\[263b.7\]]dag par bskul ba yin/_bsam gtan dang po'i legs pa brjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan bzhi pa la [#]snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun
[\[264a.2\]]pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang btang snyoms la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_btang snyoms kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi
[\[264a.3\]]legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang 'du shes med 'du shes
[\[264a.4\]]med min skye mched la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi [#]legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_
[\[264a.5\]]bdag kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi legs pa brjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
[\[264a.6\]]sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs
[\[264a.7\]]kyi sgo rnams sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
[\[264b.2\]]'dres pa bco brgyad kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/[# ]sems can gzhan gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu sgrub pa yin/_gzhan yang skyes
[\[264b.3\]]bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i legs pa brjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po
[\[264b.4\]]brgyad cu sgrub pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas [#]dga' bar spyod pa yin zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi lam la 'god pa'i phrin las yin no//_//rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin ma yin[#]/_bar du yang de bzhin du ma yin du zin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[264b.5\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings ston par mi 'gyur/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par mi 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings de sngon ji lta bar phyis
[\[264b.6\]]kyang de bzhin/_bar du yang de bzhin du bas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings ston to/_/sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod [#]pa spyod do/_/sems can rnams
[\[264b.7\]]yongs su smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar gal te sems can yang [#]shin tu dmigs su ma mchis la/_sems can du dmigs pa yang ma mchis na/_su'i
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [#]sgom pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yang dag
[\[265a.2\]]pa'i mtha' tshad mar byas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom [#]ste/_rab 'byor gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan la/_sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan zhig yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom [#]par mi 'gyur te/_rab
[\[265a.3\]]'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin pas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom [#]ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
[\[265a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrugs [#]pa med par sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags/_sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma lags na/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
[\[265a.5\]]dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par 'gyur na ni des rang bzhin rang bzhin la gnas par 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas pa ma mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub
[\[265a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas par 'gyur ba yang med/_rang bzhin la
[\[265a.7\]]rang bzhin gnas par 'gyur ba yang [#]med na/_'on te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can gyi mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god de[#]/_yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin te/_de ltar na sems can gyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
[\[265b.2\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug par mi bgyid pa de lta bu'i thabs gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[265b.3\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_sems can rnams sbyin pa la rab tu 'god do/_/sbyin pa la rab tu bkod [#]nas/_sbyin pa de'i thog ma'i mtha' dang /_tha [#]ma'i mtha' dang dbus ston te/_ji ltar sbyin pa de'i thog ma'i mtha' yang stong /_
[\[265b.4\]]tha [#]ma'i mtha' yang stong /_dbus kyang stong pa de ltar sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang stong /_sbyin bdag kyang stong /_len pa yang stong par ston zhing /_rigs kyi bu de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' la don de dag med kyis[#]/_sbyin pa yang gzhan la sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan no snyam du ma sems shig_/
[\[265b.5\]]sbyin bdag kyang gzhan la/_len pa yang gzhan no snyam du ma sems shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod nam sbyin pa yang gzhan la sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan no snyam du mi sems[#]/_sbyin bdag kyang gzhan la len pa yang gzhan no snyam du mi sems pa de'i tshe/_khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di bdud rtsi dang bdud
[\[265b.6\]]rtsi'i 'bras bu dang mthar bdud rtsir 'gyur te/_sbyin pa 'dis [#]gzugs yongs su ma 'dzin cing [#]/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su ma 'dzin cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar khyod kyis sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pas stong ngo /_/de'i 'bras bu yang 'bras bus
[\[265b.7\]]stong ngo /_/sbyin bdag kyang sbyin bdag gis stong ngo /_/len pa yang len pas stong ste/_stong pa nyid la ni sbyin pa mi dmigs/_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang /_sbyin bdag dang len pa mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis shin tu stong ngo zhes brjod do/_/gzhan yang rab 'byor
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams tshul khrims la 'god de/_tshur rigs kyi bu srog gcod pa spongs la srog gcod pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig_/ma sbyin [#]par len pa dang 'dod pas
[\[266a.2\]]log par g.yem pa dang /_brdzun du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_zhe gcod pa dang /_tshig 'khyal [#]pa dang /_chags sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba spongs la/_log par lta ba las phyir ldog par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu chos de dag la ji ltar yongs su brtags pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin gang
[\[266a.3\]]yang med kyis/_rigs kyi bu soms dang /_gang gis srog gcad par bya ba'i srog chags dang /_gang gis srog gcod par byed pa de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/_gang ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /_brdzun du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_zhe gcod pa'i tshig dang /_
[\[266a.4\]]tshig 'khyal [#]pa dang /_chags sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_gang log par lta ba dang /_gang gis log par lta bar brtogs [#]pa dang /_gang gis log par lta bar [#]mthong ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin zhes ston zhing tshul khrims la 'god de/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[266a.5\]]dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams [#]yongs su smin par byed do/_/de la sbyin pa dang tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu bstan te/_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang /_tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de yang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par bstan pas
[\[266a.6\]]rigs kyi bu des sbyin pa dang tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu ngo bo nyid [#]stong par rig nas de la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/mngon par zhen pa med pas 'khrug par mi 'gyur zhing shes rab bskyed do/_/shes rab des kyang bag la nyal ba dang /_kun nas ldang ba thams cad bcad nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan
[\[266a.7\]]las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/_de yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi don dam par ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'am/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang mi dmigs te/_de'i
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni/_'di lta ste/_mtha' [#]las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can phan tshun gnod par sems shing 'khrug par 'gyur ba dang ldan pa dag mthong na
[\[266b.2\]]'di snyam du 'dems [#]shing ston te/_rigs kyi bu bzod pa sgrubs shig_/bzod pa sgoms shig_/des pa dang sems zhi ba dang nang du sems pa'i ngang tshul du gyis shig_/gang gnod pa byed pa dang /_gang gis gnod par bya ba dang /_gang la gnod par bya ba'i chos de dag ni thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis
[\[266b.3\]]stong pa yin gyis/_rigs kyi bu gnod par byed pa ni su yod/_gnod par ni su la bya/_cis ni gnod par bya/_sems dang chos de dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa de ni nam yang mi stong par mi 'gyur te/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ma mdzad do/_/
[\[266b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas so/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis ma byas so/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis ma byas so/_/sum cu rtsa
[\[266b.5\]]gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs pa dang /_dge rgyas dang /_gnas gtsang ma dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med
[\[266b.6\]]min skye mched kyi [#]lha rnams kyis ma byas te/_de ni rtag par yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rang bzhin gyis stong pa ni su la yang gnod par mi byed do zhe na[#]/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams thabs mkhas pas rang bzhin
[\[266b.7\]]gyis stong pa nyid dang rgyu dang 'bras bu la sbyor te/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la bkod cing rim gyis [#]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par bskul lo/_/yang dag par gzengs bstod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/gzhog go/_/'dul lo/_/rab tu
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]'god do/_/de yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi don dam par ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la gang thob par byed pa dang /_gang gis thob par bya ba dang /_gang thob par bya ba gang yang med do/_/rab 'byor 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid de/_de la
[\[267a.2\]]gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi don du gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_de la sems can du dmigs pa med do/_/sems can du gdags pa dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad sems can gyis dben pa'o/_/
[\[267a.3\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na/_'di ltar lus dang sems kyis [#]brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul te/_rigs kyi bu dag [#(]ngang [,]rang [)]bzhin gyis
[\[267a.4\]]stong pa nyid la ni chos gang yang zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba'am/_gang la zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba'am/_gang gis zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba'am/_gang zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang med do/_/chos de dag [#]thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis [#]stong pa nyid las mi 'da' ba yin gyis/_
[\[267a.5\]]lus dang sems kyis [#]brtson 'grus bskyed la/_le lo bor te dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'am/_tshul khrims sam/_bzod pa'am/_brtson 'grus sam/_bsam gtan nam/_shes rab bam/_nang stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ram/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_
[\[267a.6\]]yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad med pa rnams
[\[267a.7\]]sam/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/_mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dag la brtson par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu dag stong pa nyid kyis [#]chos de dag thams cad sgrib
[\[267b.2\]]pa med par rtogs shig_/sgrib pa med pa'i chos la zhum par 'gyur ba gang yang med do zhes rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyis [#]stong pa nyid yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par bskul
[\[267b.3\]]lo/_/yang dag par gzengs bstod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/gzhog go_/'dul lo/_/rab tu 'god do/_/ci nas kyang gnyis la mi gnas par [#]de ltar rab tu 'god do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/gnyis su med pa'i chos ni gang la yang
[\[267b.4\]]gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi brtson 'grus la 'dems shing rjes su ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu sbyin pa'am/_tshul khrims
[\[267b.5\]]sam/_bzod pa'am/_brtson 'grus sam/_bsam gtan nam/_shes rab bam/_nang stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [#]kyi bar ram/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs
[\[267b.6\]]rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad med pa rnams sam/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar gyis
[\[267b.7\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang [#]/_mngon par shes pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/_mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]par rig pa rnams sam/_byams pa chen po'am/_snying rje chen po'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag la brtson 'grus rtsoms [#]la/_chos de dag gnyis par yang yid la ma byed cig_/mi gnyis par yang yid la ma byed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos de dag
[\[268a.2\]]ni rang bzhin gyis [#]stong pa ste/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni gnyis par yid la bya ba ma yin/_mi gnyis par yang [#]yid la bya ba ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams rang bzhin
[\[268a.3\]]gyis stong pa nyid la yongs su smin par byed de/_yongs su smin par byas nas rim gyis [#]rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la 'god do/_/lam gyi rnam pa [#]shes pa nyid dang /_bla na med pa yang dag
[\[268a.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu [#]'god do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can sems g.yeng ba rnams la 'di skad du 'dems [#]shing rjes su ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin sgoms
[\[268a.5\]]shig_/g.yeng ba'i 'du shes sam/_ting nge 'dzin gyi 'du shes su ma byed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos de dag ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ni gang yang g.yeng ba'am/_rtse gcig tu 'gyur ba'i chos de yang dmigs su med do/_/khyed kyi [#]ting nge 'dzin de la
[\[268a.6\]]gnas te/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la spyad na/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyis [#]dge ba'i chos gang ci byed kyang rung ste/_sbyin pa gtong ba'am/_tshul khrims srung [#]ba'am/_bzod pa sgom pa'am/_brtson 'grus rtsom pa'am/_bsam gtan skyed [#]pa'am/_shes rab sgom pa'am/_nang stong pa nyid
[\[268a.7\]]la spyod dam/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod dam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]lag brgyad pa la spyod dam/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang [#]/_bsam gtan rnams dang [#]/_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med
[\[268b.2\]]pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod dam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_
[\[268b.3\]]btang snyoms chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod dam/_skyes bu chen po'i [#]mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la spyod dam/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod dam/_nyan thos kyi lam dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la spyod dam/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang /_sangs rgyas kyi lam
[\[268b.4\]]la spyod dam/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la spyod dam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa [#]nyid kyi bar la spyod dam/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la spyod dam/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing
[\[268b.5\]]yongs su dag par bya ba la spyod kyang rung ste/_dge ba'i chos de dag tshegs chung ngus 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes 'dems shing rjes su ston te/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byas te/_
[\[268b.6\]]sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung nas bar 'ga' yang las mi byed par mi 'gyur gyi/_dge ba thams cad tshol zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsnyen bkur byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yongs su 'gro ste/_
[\[268b.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la chos thob [#]pa de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du tshe rabs brjes [#]kyang nam du'ang rnam par chud mi za ste/_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzungs thob cing lus kyi dbang po'am/_ngag gi dbang po'am/yid kyi
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]dbang po mi nyams pa yin/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu bsgoms [#]pa des lam thams cad shin tu bsgom [#]par 'gyur te/_nyan thos kyi lam mam/[# ]rang
[\[269a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/[# ]byang chub sems dpa'i lam mam/[# ]sangs rgyas kyi lam la shin tu bsgom [#]par 'gyur/_mngon par shes pa gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rnam par chud mi za ba'i tshul gyis phan par 'gyur ba de dag kyang shin tu bsgom [#]par 'gyur te/_rnam par smin pa las byung
[\[269a.3\]]ba'i mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed na 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar 'khor ba yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las kyang [#]yongs su mi nyams so/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rang bzhin
[\[269a.4\]]stong pa nyid la gnas shing thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing sems can shes rab 'chal ba can blo chung ba rnams mthong na/_
[\[269a.5\]]'di skad du 'dems [#]shing rjes su ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu lus dang /_ngag dang yid kyi las ci byed kyang rung ste/_de dag thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du rtogs shig dang /_khyod kyi las thams cad bdud rtsi'i 'bras bur 'gyur te/_mthar bdud rtsir 'gyur ro/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni gang
[\[269a.6\]]mngon par shes par 'gyur ba'am/_yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su nyams pa'i chos kyang gang yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[269a.7\]]'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni dngos po yod pa yang ma yin/_dngos po med pa yang ma yin/_chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ci zhig yongs su nyams par 'gyur zhes rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la 'dems shing [#]rjes su ston to/_/de ltar 'dems [#]shing rjes su ston pa'i tshe/_nam yang rjes su ma bsgrubs pa ma yin/_de ni bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang
[\[269b.2\]]dag par bskul ba yin/_bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_bdag kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong la nye bar gnas par yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin/_
[\[269b.3\]]gzhan yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong la nye bar gnas par yang dag par bskul ba yin/_bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan
[\[269b.4\]]gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par byams pa la gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par byams pa sgom pa la yang
[\[269b.5\]]dag par bskul ba yin/_bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms la gnas pa yin gzhan yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par btang snyoms sgom pa la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_bdag kyang rtag tu nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi [#]snyoms par
[\[269b.6\]]'jug pa dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi
[\[269b.7\]]snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_bdag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la sgom [#]pa yin/_gzhan yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_bdag kyang
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la slob pa yin/_gzhan yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
[\[270a.2\]]pa dgu dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob pa yin/_gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin/_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la
[\[270a.3\]]yang dag par bskul ba yin/_bdag kyang mi 'jigs [#]pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin/_gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par bskul ba
[\[270a.4\]]yin no/_/bdag kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la slob pa yin/_gzhan yang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par bskul ba yin/_bdag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i shes pa bskyed cing de la
[\[270a.5\]]mi gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god pa dang /_bdag kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i shes pa bskyed cing de la mi gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god pa yin/_
[\[270a.6\]]bdag kyang rang byang chub kyi lam bskyed cing de la mi gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang rang byang chub la rab tu 'god pa yin/_bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam bskyed pa yin/_gzhan yang de la 'dems [#]shing rjes su ston pa dang /_gzhog cing 'dul ba dang 'god pa yin te/_
[\[270a.7\]]rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'i tshe/_nam yang las med par gnas pa ma yin no/_/gsol pa/
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags na/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ni sems can yang mi dmigs/_chos kyang mi dmigs/_chos ma lags pa yang mi dmigs na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa
[\[270b.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du yang dag par zhugs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no/_/chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_rang bzhin gyis [#]stong pa nyid la ni sems can mi dmigs so/_/
[\[270b.3\]]chos mi dmigs so/_/chos ma yin pa mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
[\[270b.4\]]par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang chos rnams [#]rang bzhin gyis stong par mi ston to/_/rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/skye
[\[270b.5\]]mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med
[\[270b.6\]]pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs
[\[270b.7\]]kyi sgo rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni rang
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub ni rang
[\[271a.2\]]bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phung po lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/skye mched bcu gnyis ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes
[\[271a.3\]]bya bar chos ston to/_/khams bco brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/stong pa nyid thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes
[\[271a.4\]]bya bar chos ston to/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/'phags pa'i
[\[271a.5\]]bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon
[\[271a.6\]]par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po
[\[271a.7\]]dang /_btang snyoms chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba ni rang
[\[271b.2\]]bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/rab 'byor gal te nang stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te phyi stong pa nyid dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /[# ]phyi nang stong pa
[\[271b.3\]]nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams
[\[271b.4\]]cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [#]rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad
[\[271b.5\]]rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur te/_de'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bshig par mi [#]'gyur na/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni 'jig par mi 'gyur/_rtag par mi 'gyur[#]/_phyis med par 'gro ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni yul na mi gnas/_phyogs na mi gnas
[\[271b.6\]]te/_de ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba ma yin/_gang du yang 'gro ba ma yin[#]/_de ni chos gnas pa nyid do/_/de la ni chos gang yang 'phel ba dmigs pa'am/_'grib pa dmigs pa'am/_'grib [#]pa'am/_skye ba'am/_'byung ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba
[\[271b.7\]]dmigs pa med do/_/de ni chos rnams kyi rang bzhin te/_de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/_chos gang la [#]yang 'jug pa'am mi 'jug par mthong ba med do/_/chos thams cad 'jug pa
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]med cing gnas pa med pa ste/_de ni chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa'o/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par mthong nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
[\[272a.2\]]phyir mi ldog go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des [#]sgrib pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_chos thams cad sgrib pa med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni bdag mi dmigs/_bdag tu btags [#]pa yang mi dmigs/_sems can dang /_srog
[\[272a.3\]]dang /_'gro ba dang /_gso [#]ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed can dang /_shed bdag dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_tshor bar byed pa po dang /_slong ba po dang /_kun nas slong ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba por yang mi dmigs/_mthong ba por btags pa yang mi dmigs/_gzugs
[\[272a.4\]]kyang mi dmigs/_gzugs su btags pa yang mi dmigs/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang mi dmigs/_rnam par shes par btags pa yang mi dmigs/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yang mi dmigs/_
[\[272a.5\]]dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur btags par [#]yang mi dmigs na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la the tshom za bar 'gyur ba lta ga la'ang [#]zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid la 'god pa'i phrin las yin no//_//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas[#]/_
[\[272a.6\]]dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma la bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar rgyun du chos bstan na[#]/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sprul pa de dag la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su thob par 'gyur ba'i skal ba yod dam/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i
[\[272a.7\]]'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang [#]/_rang byang chub bam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i skal ba yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar de dag la dngos po ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_chos thams cad la dngos po med na sems can gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_bla na
[\[272b.2\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god par bya ste/_gzhan du na phyin ci log gis yongs su 'khris [#]pa'i skye dgu dag phyin ci log med pa la gzhog go/_/'dul lo/_/rab tu 'god do/_/phyin ci log gang yin pa de yang rtog pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir phyin ci log ma yin pa ste/_rnam par rtog pa med pa ni
[\[272b.3\]]phyin ci log ma yin pa'o/_/gang la phyin ci log med pa [#]la bdag med do/_/sems can med do/_/srog med do/_/'gro ba med do/_/gso ba med do/_/skyes bu med do/_/gang zag med do/_/shed can med do/_/shed bdag med do/_/byed pa po med do/_/tshor ba po med do/_/shes pa po med do/_/mthong ba po med do/_/de la gzugs
[\[272b.4\]]med do/_/tshor ba med do/_/'du shes med do/_/'du byed rnams med do/_/rnam par shes pa med do/_/de la skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med do/_/de la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med do/_/de ni [#]'phags pa'i
[\[272b.5\]]bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo
[\[272b.6\]]rnams med do/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med do/_/de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med do/_/gang la
[\[272b.7\]]gzugs med pa dang /_tshor ba med pa dang /_'du shes med pa dang /_'du byed rnams med pa dang /_rnam par shes pa med pa dang /_gang la skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med pa dang /_gang la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du med pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid de/_de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
[\[273a.2\]]spyod cing sems can phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams sems can gyi 'du shes las 'grel to[#]/_/gzugs kyi 'du shes las 'grel to/_/gzugs med pa'i 'du shes las 'grel to/_/zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad kyi bar las 'grel to/_/gang zag pa med pa'i chos 'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi
[\[273a.3\]]phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi
[\[273a.4\]]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag kyang de la don dam pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de lta bu ma yin te/_de ltar 'dus ma byas pa dang /_ma skyes pa dang /_dngos po med pa dang /_
[\[273a.5\]]'byung ba med pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste de la bdag med do/_/sems can dang /_srog dang /_skye ba po dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed can dang /_shed bdag dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_
[\[273a.6\]]mthong ba po med do/_/gzugs med do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa med do/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med do/_/rnam pa
[\[273a.7\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su shes pa las ma gtogs pa lam gyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du 'jug pa med de/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid de yang snga nas kyang rang bzhin gyis
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]stong pa nyid/_phyin chad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid/_bar du yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de[#]/_de nam yang rang bzhin gyis mi stong ba ma yin no/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can du 'du shes pa'i
[\[273b.2\]]sems can rnams kyi sems can gyi 'du shes yongs su dgrol [#]ba'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod do/_/de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi lam dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang /_lam thams cad la spyod do[#]/_/byang
[\[273b.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/_des tshe'i 'du byed byin gyis brlabs te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
[\[273b.4\]]'tshang rgya'o/_/de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi tshul rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi [#]rgyun mi gcod do/_/de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul te/_'das pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom
[\[273b.5\]]ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang [#]'di lta ste/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid do/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi tshul 'di lta ste/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid do/_/da ltar phyogs
[\[273b.6\]]bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/_rang bzhin gyis [#]stong pa nyid de/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gzhan du ni 'jig rten du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bas
[\[273b.7\]]na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis thams cad [#]du ji ltar spyad na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba de ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad par bya'o/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi bar pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/_de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa [#]las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar na [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams [#]rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos thams cad la spyod cing
[\[274a.2\]]gzugs kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/
[\[274a.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas
[\[274a.4\]]pa'i snyoms [#]par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa
[\[274a.5\]]bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma [(]'dras [,]'dres [)]pa rnams kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no zhes bgyi bar rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi
[\[274a.6\]]bgyid kyi/_gzugs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rang
[\[274a.7\]]bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bgyi bar spyod pa ngo mtshar che'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/_/rab 'byor gal te [#]gzugs kyang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]kyang gzhan/_tshor ba yang gzhan/_'du shes kyang gzhan/_'du byed rnams kyang [#]gzhan/_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_phung po dang khams dang /_skye mched [#]dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_pha rol tu
[\[274b.2\]]phyin pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams [#]kyang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis
[\[274b.3\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying
[\[274b.4\]]rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan [#]ma yin no/_/gal te gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[274b.5\]]dpa' chen po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi [#]phyir gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong pas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing bla na
[\[274b.6\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yi na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang [#]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
[\[274b.7\]]tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/rab 'byor gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/_rab
[\[275a.2\]]'byor gang gi [#]phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
[\[275a.3\]]'tshang rgya'o/_/rab 'byor gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir bla na med pa yang dag
[\[275a.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob par byed de/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa
[\[275a.5\]]nyid la [#]ni chos gang yang rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba'am/_rtag tu gnas pa'am 'gro ba med de/_gzhan du na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang bdud dang tshangs par bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams 'di ni gzugs so/_/bdag gi gzugs so/_/bdag ni gzugs dang ldan pa'o/_/'di ni rnam par
[\[275a.6\]]shes pa'i bar ro/_/bdag gi rnam par shes pa'o/_/bdag ni rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'o snyam du rmongs shing /_de dag gzugs la mngon par zhen/_rnam par shes pa'i bar la mngon par zhen te/_bdag tu bya ba dang bdag gir bya ba la spyod do/_/bdag tu bya ba dang bdag gir bya ba la mngon par
[\[275a.7\]]zhen nas phyi nang gi dngos po la mngon par zhen cing chags so/_/de ltar mngon par zhen cing chags nas skye ba'i skye mched dag tu gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la nye bar len te/_skye ba dang /_rga [#]ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las [#]yongs su mi 'gro la[#]/_'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su mi 'grol [#]lo//_//bam po bdun cu pa/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la
[\[275b.2\]]spyod cing /_gzugs stong pa'am/_'on tam mi stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa'am/_'on tam mi stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par
[\[275b.3\]]'byung ba rnams stong pa'am/_'on tam mi stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams stong pa'am[#]/_'on tam mi stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam
[\[275b.4\]]gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong
[\[275b.5\]]pa'am/_'on tam mi stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa'am/_'on tam mi stong
[\[275b.6\]]zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du stong pa'am/_'on tam mi stong zhes bya bar rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni [#]'di ni gzugs so/_/'di ni gzugs kyi stong pa nyid do zhes gzugs rnam
[\[275b.7\]]par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni 'di ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'o/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid do zhes rnam par shes pa [#]rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni 'di dag ni skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/_/'di dag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i stong pa nyid do zhes rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni 'di dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so/_/
[\[276a.2\]]'di dag ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi stong pa nyid do zhes byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_
[\[276a.3\]]mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/_/'di dag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid do zhes gzungs kyi sgo rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/rang
[\[276a.4\]]bzhin stong pa nyid ni 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/_/'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid do zhes
[\[276a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni 'di dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang byang chub bo/_/'di ni byang chub kyi stong
[\[276a.6\]]pa nyid do zhes byang chub rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' ni nam mkha' [#]rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/nang gi nam mkha' ni phyi'i nam mkha' rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/phyi'i nam mkha' ni nang gi nam mkha' rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/rab 'byor
[\[276a.7\]]de bzhin du gzugs kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/stong pa nyid kyang gzugs rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag la gang 'di ltar 'di ni gzugs so/_/'di ni stong pa nyid do zhes rnam par 'khrug par mi [#]byed pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin med do/_/de bzhin du chos
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]thams cad la sbyar ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'ang [#]stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do[#]/_/stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams kyang stong pa nyid
[\[276b.2\]]rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do[#]/_/stong pa nyid kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang stong pa nyid [#]rnam par 'khrug par mi byed/_stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
[\[276b.3\]]rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams [#]dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa
[\[276b.4\]]dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed/_stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs
[\[276b.5\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do[#]/_/stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid
[\[276b.6\]]dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do[#]/_/stong pa nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag la [#]gang 'di ltar 'di ni gzugs/_'di ni stong pa
[\[276b.7\]]nyid do/_/'di ni [#]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa 'di ni stong pa nyid do/_/'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'di ni stong pa nyid do zhes rnam par 'khrug pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin med do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]te chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis na ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te/_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes bgyi bar sems par 'gyur/_bcom ldan
[\[277a.2\]]'das byang chub ni gnyis su dbyer ma mchis te/_gnyis su dbyer ma mchis [#]pas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub ni gnyis su dbyer
[\[277a.3\]]med pa ste/_gnyis la spyod pa la byang chub med do/_/rab 'byor byang chub ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub ni byang chub bo/_/byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bya bar gnyis su bya ba la mi spyod de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
[\[277a.4\]]byang chub de ni gzugs la mi spyod do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi spyod do/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams la mi spyod do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
[\[277a.5\]]chos rnams la mi spyod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa [#]dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par
[\[277a.6\]]shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams [#]la mi spyod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir
[\[277a.7\]]zhe na/_byang chub ni bdag gam bdag gir bya ba med pa ste/_bdag gis [#]gzugs la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/_bdag gi gzugs so zhe'am/_bdag gi [#]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/_bdag gi rnam par shes pa'o zhe'am/_bdag gis [#]
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/_bdag gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o [#]zhe'am/_bdag gis [#]pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/_bdag gi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
[\[277b.2\]]chos rnams so zhe'am/_bdag gis [#]'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_
[\[277b.3\]]mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams [#]la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/_bdag gi gzungs kyi sgo rnams so zhe'am/_bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen
[\[277b.4\]]po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/_bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do zhe'am/_bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/_bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
[\[277b.5\]]bo zhes bya bar bdag dang bdag gir bya ba med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub [#]ni 'dzin pa la mi spyod do/_/mi 'dzin pa la yang mi spyod do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub 'dzin pa
[\[277b.6\]]la'ang mi spyod mi 'dzin pa la'ang mi spyod na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub ci la spyod pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i [#]byang chub 'dzin pa'am/_mi 'dzin pa'am/_ci la yang spyod pa
[\[277b.7\]]yod [#]dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_dgra bcom pa'i rmi lam gyi blo 'dzin pa'am/_mi 'dzin pa'am gang la yang spyod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_dgra bcom pa
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]la yong ye nyal ba yang ma mchis na/_de'i rmi lam gyi blo 'dzin pa'am/_mi 'dzin pa la spyod par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyang 'dzin pa'am mi 'dzin pa la
[\[278a.2\]]spyod pa med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub 'dzin pa la yang mi spyod mi 'dzin pa la [#]yang mi spyod/_gzugs la yang mi spyod/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la yang [#]mi spyod/_skye mched
[\[278a.3\]]dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la yang [# ]mi spyod/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la'ang mi spyod/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_
[\[278a.4\]]rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams [#]la yang mi spyod/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so
[\[278a.5\]]yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang mi spyod/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yang mi spyod na/_ji ltar na [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad/_stong pa nyid bcu
[\[278a.6\]]bzhi dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
[\[278a.7\]]dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyad/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bgyis/_mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par zhugs/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]bgyis sems can rnams [#]yongs su smin par bgyis/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su bsgrubs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug la ma spyad/_stong
[\[278b.2\]]pa nyid bcu bzhi la ma spyad/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la ma spyad/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la ma spyad/_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la ma spyad/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs
[\[278b.3\]]pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ma spyad/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis/_mngon par shes pa lnga la ma gnas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma
[\[278b.4\]]mchis par ma zhugs/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma bgyis/_sems can rnams [#]yongs su smin par ma bgyis/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su ma bsgrubs par ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
[\[278b.5\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du [#]smras pa de bzhin te/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par ma byas/_stong pa nyid bcu bzhi dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_rnam par thar pa'i
[\[278b.6\]]sgo gsum dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas
[\[278b.7\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par ma byas/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su ma rdzogs/_mngon par shes pa lnga la ma gnas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma zhugs/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas/_sems can rnams [#]yongs su
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]smin par ma byas/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu [#]yongs su ma bsgrubs par ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
