[\[279a.2\]]dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa [#]dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /[# ]rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin
[\[279a.3\]]dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs
[\[279a.4\]]su rdzogs par byas/_mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/_sems can rnams [#]yongs su smin par byas/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su bsgrubs/_mi
[\[279a.5\]]nyams pa'i chos nyid dang /_rtag tu btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de yang gzugs kyi rang bzhin la gnas/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin
[\[279a.6\]]la gnas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi rang bzhin la gnas te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/rang bzhin de yang nye bar zhi ba ste/_chos gang yang 'phel bar byed
[\[279a.7\]]pa'am/_'grib par byed pa'am/_skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba'am/_thob pa'am/_mngon par rtogs par byed pa med do zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i chos la 'god pa'i phrin las yin no//_//rab 'byor de yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'i
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]chos nye bar bzung nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'i don dam par ni gzugs sam/_tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed rnams sam[#]/_rnam par shes pa'am/_skye mched dam/_khams sam/_
[\[279b.2\]]rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'am/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams sam/_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sam/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas
[\[279b.3\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen
[\[279b.4\]]po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar ram/_gang byang chub tu spyod pa'i chos de lta bu yang med de/_chos de dag thams cad ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad nye bar bzung ste btags pa yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin no/_/de bas na
[\[279b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub tu spyod kyang sems de dag mi dmigs te/_sems can rnams dang byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gang gi tshe rab 'byor
[\[279b.6\]]khyod kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba spang ba'i phyir dbang po rnams thob par 'gyur ba [#]dang /_bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang [#]/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba de'i tshe rmi lam mam/_
[\[279b.7\]]sems sam/_lam mam/_'bras bu dmigs par 'gyur ba yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'o na ci ltar rab 'byor zhes bya ba'i ming can gyi gnas brtan khyod kyis [#]dgra bcom pa thob bo zhes btags pa yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]'jig rten gyi tha snyad nye bar bzung nas lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/_/gzugs kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed
[\[280a.2\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du
[\[280a.3\]]btags pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes
[\[280a.4\]]pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi [#]dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang
[\[280a.5\]]'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos gang la yang 'phel bar byed pa'am/_'grib par byed pa'am/_phan 'dogs pa'am/_gnod par byed pa de lta bu [#]
[\[280a.6\]]gang yang mi [#]dmigs te/_chos kyi rang bzhin nye bar bzung nas chos rnams kyi chos kyi rang bzhin de yang ma dmigs na/_sems dang po bskyed pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do/_/sa bcu pa'i bar dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang
[\[280a.7\]]chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams su dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu [#]dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa
[\[280b.2\]]chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha
[\[280b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te sems can rnams kyi don byed do zhes bya ba ni brdar btags pa'i shes pa la 'god pa'i phrin las yin no//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
[\[280b.4\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid bcu bzhi dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge
[\[280b.5\]]'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen
[\[280b.6\]]po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pas byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba ma mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das de ci [#]ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[280b.7\]]chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs [#]pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i bdag po dang len pa yang mi dmigs/_chos de dag las gzhan du yang mi spyod na de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam 'thob par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
[\[281a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshul
[\[281a.3\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang /_tshul khrims dang tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang mi [#]dmigs/_chos de gnyis las gzhan du [#]mi spyod na de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam 'thob par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
[\[281a.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
[\[281a.5\]]kyang /_bzod pa dang bzod pa dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs/_chos de gnyis las gzhan du yang mi spyod na/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam 'thob [#]par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod
[\[281a.6\]]na/_thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang /_brtson 'grus
[\[281a.7\]]dang brtson 'grus rtsom pa yang mi dmigs/_chos de [#]gnyis las gzhan du yang ma [#]dmigs na/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam 'thob par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]na/_thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang /_
[\[281b.2\]]bsam gtan dang bsam gtan pa'ang mi dmigs/_chos de [#]gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam 'thob [#]par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/_
[\[281b.3\]]thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom yang shes rab dang shes rab dang ldan
[\[281b.4\]]pa'ang mi dmigs/_chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam 'thob [#]par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/_thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa
[\[281b.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la spyod kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
[\[281b.6\]]rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa sgom pa yang mi dmigs/_chos de [#]gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam 'thob [#]par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[281b.7\]]la de ltar spyod na/_thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub kyi lam la brtson par bgyid pa [#]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas gzugs la mi
[\[282a.2\]]sbyor mi 'byed de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/_dbye bar bya ba'i gzugs la ngo bo nyid med do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang la [#]sbyar ba'am dbye bar byed pa'i [#]rnam par shes pa la
[\[282a.3\]]ngo bo nyid med do/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang la sbyar ba'am dbye bar bya ba'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la ngo bo nyid med do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs
[\[282a.4\]]kyi chos rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang la [#]sbyar ba'am dbye bar bya ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la ngo bo nyid med do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa
[\[282a.5\]]dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams [#]la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang [#]sbyar ba'am/_dbye bar bya ba'i gzungs
[\[282a.6\]]kyi sgo rnams la ngo bo nyid med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang
[\[282a.7\]]sbyar ba'am/_dbye bar bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la ngo bo nyid med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos gang la yang sbyar ba'am dbye bar bgyi ba'i ngo bo nyid ma mchis na/_gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bgyi ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]phyin pa ji ltar mngon par sgrub par 'gyur/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs par ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu
[\[282b.2\]]de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/_de yang thabs mkhas pas yin gyi/_
[\[282b.3\]]thabs mi mkhas pas ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos [#]gang la la zhig gi ngo bo nyid dmigs na ni de'i phyir 'dzin par mi [#]'gyur na/_'on te mi dmigs na 'di ni gzugs so/_/'di ni tshor ba'o/_/'di
[\[282b.4\]]ni 'du shes so/_/'di ni 'du byed rnams so/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya bar yang ci zhig bzung [#]/_'di dag ni skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/_/'di dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so/_/
[\[282b.5\]]'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa
[\[282b.6\]]dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/_/'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/_/'di dag [#]ni rnam pa
[\[282b.7\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ro zhes bya bar yang ci zhig [#]bzung ste/_shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzung du med do[#]/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzung du med do[#]/_/stong pa nyid [#]thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ni gzung du med do[#]/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang [#]/_
[\[283a.2\]]mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzung du med pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang
[\[283a.3\]]dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni gzung du med pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu de ni gzung du med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
[\[283a.4\]]bslab [#]par bya ste/_de la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni slob [#]par bya ba yang mi dmigs na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lta ci smos/_byang chub lta yang ci smos/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams lta yang [#]ci smos/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lta yang ci smos/_rang
[\[283a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lta yang ci smos/_nyan thos kyi chos rnams lta yang ci smos/_so so'i [#]skye bo'i chos rnams lta yang ci smos/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu de ni 'di ltar chos gang la yang ngo bo nyid med do/_/de ltar chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la so so'i [#]skye bo ni gang rgyun du
[\[283a.6\]]zhugs pa ni gang zhig yod/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas ni gang zhig yod/_byang chub sems dpa' ni gang zhig yod/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni gang zhig yod/_gal te gang zag
[\[283a.7\]]de dag dmigs su med na/_chos gang gis so so'i [#]skye bo'am/_rgyun du zhugs pa'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'am/_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas sam/_byang chub sems dpa' 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]rgyas zhes bya bar brjod pa'i chos de dag 'byung bar yang ga la 'gyur/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa la ni 'di dag ni so so'i [#]skye bo zhes bgyi ba nas/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi ba'i bar
[\[283b.2\]]du 'byung ba ci'i slad du dmigs par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu ci gzugs kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba de lta bu yod dam/_yod par gyur tam/_yod par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log ma
[\[283b.3\]]gtogs [#]par de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu ci tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/_yod par gyur tam/_yod par 'gyur ram/_gsol
[\[283b.4\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcom brgyad kyi bar gyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/_yod par gyur tam/_yod par
[\[283b.5\]]'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_chos thams cad la [#]dngos po med pa [#]phyin ci log gi dbang gis sems can rnams rnam par rtog ste/_de'i phyir byang chub
[\[283b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas chos thams cad dngos po med par mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug [#]go zhes bya ba ni dmigs su med pa'i ye shes la 'god pa'i phrin las yin no//_//gsol pa/_bcom
[\[283b.7\]]ldan 'das thabs mkhas pa [#]gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med par mthong nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug pa'i thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 'di la
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos gang yang gang la thogs par 'gyur ba'i dngos po'am/_gang la thogs par gyur nas zhum par 'gyur ba'am/_zhum par gyur nas sgyid lug par 'gyur ba'am[#]/_sgyid lug par gyur nas
[\[284a.2\]]tshi chad par 'gyur ba'am/_tshi chad par gyur nas le lor 'gyur ba'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_shA ri'i bu sems can rnams rmongs pas phung po zhes bya ba'am/_skye mched ces bya ba'am/_khams zhes bya ba'am/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'am/_rten cing 'brel par
[\[284a.3\]]'byung ba'i chos zhes bya bar mngon par zhen pa ma gtogs par chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'o/_/srog med pa'o/_/srog dang bral ba'o/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa'o/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa'o/_/de lta [#]bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
[\[284a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /[# ]rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par yang dag par rjes su mthong bas sgyu ma'i mkhan po lta bu'i lus byin gyis brlabs nas sems can rnams la chos ston te/_sems can gang ser sna can du
[\[284a.5\]]gyur pa de dag la sbyin pa'i gtam byed do/_/tshul khrims ngan pa can rnams la tshul khrims kyi gtam byed do/_/gnod sems can rnams la bzod pa'i gtam byed do/_/le lo can rnams la brtson 'grus kyi gtam byed do/_/sems g.yeng ba rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi gtam byed do/_/shes rab
[\[284a.6\]]'chal ba can rnams la shes rab kyi gtam byed do/_/gang gi tshe sems can de dag sbyin pa la bkod par gyur pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab la bkod par gyur pa de'i tshe/_de las gong du sems can de dag la 'phags pa'i gtam
[\[284a.7\]]'byung bar 'gyur ba gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang /_rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gtam byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_de ltar sems can ma mchis shing yang dag par [#]ma mchis pa rnams sbyin pa la sbyor/_tshul
[\[284b.2\]]khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab la sbyor zhing de las gong du 'phags pa'i gtam 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid
[\[284b.3\]]dang /_rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gtam bgyid pa ji ltar dmigs par [#]ma mchis par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
[\[284b.4\]]phyin pa [#]spyod pa la dmigs pa gang yang med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_kun rdzob kyi brdas tha snyad du yod [#]pa ma gtogs par sems can gang yang mi dmigs te/_shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems
[\[284b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste/_kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang /_don dam pa'i bden pa dang /_bden pa gnyis la gnas nas sems can rnams la chos ston kyang /_shA ri'i bu bden pa gnyis la sems can du dmigs pa med de/_sems can du gdags pa yang [#]med do/_/'on kyang byang
[\[284b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams la chos ston na des sems can de dag tshe 'di nyid la bdag tu mi dmigs na/_gang thob par bya ba dang /_gang gis thob par bya ba lta ci smos te/_shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub
[\[284b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang la yang gcig pa'am tha dad par ma dmigs na/_'di lta bu'i go cha
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]'tshal ba dang /_go cha de 'tshal bas 'dod pa'i khams na yang mi gda'/_gzugs mchis pa'i khams na yang mi gda'/_gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams na yang mi gda'/_'dus byas kyi khams dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams na yang mi gda' la/_sems can
[\[285a.2\]]rnams khams gsum nas 'grel zhing sems can du yang mi dmigs/_sems can du gdags pa yang mi dmigs pa ni spro ba chen po dang ldan pa ste/_sems can du gdags pa ma mchis pas sems can bcings [#]pa dang 'grol [#]ba ma mchis/[ #]sems can bcings pa dang 'grol [#]ba ma mchis pas
[\[285a.3\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis/_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis pas/_lam gyi rgyud [#]tha dad pa ma mchis/[# ]lam gyi rgyud [#]tha dad pa ma mchis pa [#]las dang nyon mongs pa ma mchis te/_las dang nyon mongs pa ma mchis na rnam par smin pa gang gis bdag gam
[\[285a.4\]]sems can 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na gda' bar gyur pa'i rnam par smin pa de lta bu yang ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_tshig ji skad du brjod pa bzhin te/_gal te sngon sems can zhig byung bar gyur pa [#]phyis byung ba med par byung bar gyur tam/_
[\[285a.5\]]'o na de ni de bzhin du sngon yod pa las phyis med par gyur tam/_'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba sngon yod pa la phyis med par gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' yang sngon yod pa las phyis med par gyur na ni skyon 'dir 'gyur ba zhig na/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang
[\[285a.6\]]rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung [#]/_chos de dag ni [#]de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis
[\[285a.7\]]mi khyab pa'i dbyings de bzhin du gnas pa ste/_de la bdag kyang med/_sems can yang med/_srog kyang med/_'gro ba yang med/_gso ba yang med/_skyes bu yang med/_gang zag kyang med/_shed can yang med/_shed bdag kyang med/_byed pa po yang med/_tshor ba po yang med/_shes pa po yang
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]med/_mthong ba po yang med na/_de la gzugs lta ga la yod/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa lta ga la yod/_skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lta ga la yod/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams lta ga la yod/_chos [#]de dag
[\[285b.2\]]med na 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba gang na sems can sgrol bar bya ba de lta bu dag lta [#]ga la yod[#]/_shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las de lta bu'i chos ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de dag thos nas sems can rnams kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par
[\[285b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'jug ste/_phyin ci log gis byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen pa ma gtogs par sems can nam/_chos gang yang dmigs pa med do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i go cha chen po gyon te/_go cha de bgos pas
[\[285b.4\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog ste/_bdag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba [#]bya ba ma yin gyis[#]/_gdon mi za bar bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
[\[285b.5\]]'tshang rgya bar bya'o/_/de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can rnams kyi don chos bzhin du byas te/_don byas pa des sems can rnams phyin ci log las yongs su sgrol bar bya'o snyam mo/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sprul pa'i skyes bu zhig
[\[285b.6\]]gis srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po sprul te/_sprul nas bza' ba dang bca' ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba shin tu mang bas tshim par byas te[#]/_de ltar tshim par byas nas bdag gis ni bsod nams mang po spel to/_/bdag gis ni bsod nams mang po spel to zhes ched du brjod pa
[\[285b.7\]]ched du brjod na/_shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_ci de la [#]la la zhig ston mo byas pa'am/_tshim par byas pa'am/_la las bsod nams 'phel bar byas pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad la spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan
[\[286a.2\]]dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi
[\[286a.3\]]sgo thams cad la spyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_
[\[286a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i tshe sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/_sems can la la zhig dmigs par byas shing gdul [#]bar bya ba de lta bu'i sems can gang yang mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la 'god pa'i phrin las yin no//_//
[\[286a.5\]]bam po bdun cu gcig pa/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang [#]byang chub kyi lam gang la spyad de/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyis pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
[\[286a.6\]]su dag par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/_tshul khrims
[\[286a.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/_nang stong pa nyid la spyod/_phyi stong pa nyid la spyod/_phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [#]
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]kyi bar la spyod/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi
[\[286b.2\]]dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_
[\[286b.3\]]gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyod/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod cing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/
[\[286b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyis [#]pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di
[\[286b.5\]]la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/_sbyin pa byin nas 'di skad ces 'dems [#]shing rjes su ston te/_rigs kyi bu dag sbyin pa la bzung bas ma 'dzin cig_/sbyin pa la bzung bas 'dzin
[\[286b.6\]]zhing lus gang mngon par grub pas sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus mngon par grub par gyur ta re/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di la don dam par ni sbyin pa yang med/_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang med/_sbyin pa'i bdag po yang med/_len pa yang med de/_chos de dag
[\[286b.7\]]thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o/_/rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos ni len pa yang med de/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni bzung du med pa'o zhes 'dems [#]shing rjes su ston to/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_de ltar sems
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang sbyin pa mi dmigs so/_/sbyin pa'i bdag po mi dmigs so/_/len pa mi dmigs so/_/de ni mi dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de chos gsum po de dag mi dmigs pas sems
[\[287a.2\]]can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la sbyor ro/_/rang byang chub la sbyor ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sbyor ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
[\[287a.3\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/_bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo/_/sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing
[\[287a.4\]]mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/_de lta bu'i sbyin pa chen po byin zhing rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i rigs dang skal ba [#]mnyam par skye'o/_/bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/_/khyim bdag gi
[\[287a.5\]]rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/_/khams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'thob bo/_/de [#]de dag na yang sems can de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su sdud de bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang /_tshig snyan pa dang /_don spyod pa dang /_don
[\[287a.6\]]mthun pas yongs su sdud do/_/de de ltar sbyin pas yongs su bsdus pa'i sems can de yang [#]rim gyis tshul khrims la rab tu dgod [#]do/_/bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab la rab tu dgod [#]do/_/bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med
[\[287a.7\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu dgod [#]do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rab tu 'god do/_/'phags
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /[# ]tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa
[\[287b.2\]]med pa [#]dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rab tu 'god do/_/yang dag pa'i skyon med par 'jug par byed do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa [#]nyid thob par
[\[287b.3\]]byed do/_/rang byang chub thob par byed do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul lo/_/kye skyes bu dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi dka' ste/_phyin ci log gis rmongs pa'i sems can rnams
[\[287b.4\]]kyi [#]khong du mi chud pa ma gtogs par chos gang la sems can rnams chags par gyur pa'i chos de lta bu gang yang ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa med kyis/_phyin ci log gi 'dzin pa thams cad rgyun chod la 'khor ba las bdag kyang thar par gyis shig_/gzhan yang thar par gyis shig_/de ltar
[\[287b.5\]]khyed cag kyang don chen po gyis shig_/gzhan yang don chen po la sbyor cig ces yang dag par skul [#]bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/_de ltar spyod pa'i tshe ci nas kyang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye
[\[287b.6\]]bar bzung ste/_nam yang ngan song du mi ltung ba dang /_nam yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mi byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do[#]/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sa bon ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu 'byung ste/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i drung du slong mo pa gang ji snyed cig 'ongs kyang /_'khor
[\[287b.7\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis sems can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par gzhan du na 'khor los sgyur ba yongs su ma bzung ngo zhes de 'di skad ces zer te/_su ci 'dod pa de khyod [#]la byin gyis 'di ni nga'i ma yin gyi khyed kyi'o/_/nga ni nang gi gzugs la yang don du gnyer
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]ba med na/_gzhan lta ci smos te/_gzhan du na ngas sems can rnams kyi don du 'khor ba yongs su bzung gi_/bdag gi don du ni 'khor ba don du [#]gnyer ba ma yin no zhes te/_de snying brtse bas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byas shing snying rje chen pos sems can
[\[288a.2\]]rnams kyi don byed kyang sems can gang yongs su grub pa de lta bu mi dmigs te/_gzhan du na 'du shes dang /_ming dang tha snyad kyis rnam par spyod de/_rnam par spyod pa de yang sgra brnyan lta bur rnam par spyad du med par shes so/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha
[\[288a.3\]]rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste/_spyod pa'i tshe ci nas kyang bdag gi [#]sha yan chad kyang sems can rnams la yongs su ma btang ba med par bya na/_phyi rol gyi yo byad gang gis sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar bya ba dag lta smos su yang med pa de ltar spyad par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_
[\[288a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das yo byad de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes
[\[288a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/nang stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/phyi stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni yo byad do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_
[\[288a.6\]]byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni yo byad do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[288a.7\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni yo byad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu [#]dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/de dag ni yo byad de/_yo byad de dag gis sems can rnams yongs su bsdus shing rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_theg pa chen po'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las [#]zlo ste/_rab 'byor
[\[288b.2\]]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams tshul
[\[288b.3\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can rnams la sbyin pa yang yongs su gtong ste/_de sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe 'di skad ces brjod do/_/rigs kyi bu dag tshur shog_/tshul
[\[288b.4\]]khrims srungs shig_/ngas khyed la [#]zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /[# ]phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_khyim dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi [#]ru dang /_gser dang /_
[\[288b.5\]]dngul dang /_mi'i rkyen dang /_yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar gyis phongs [#]pa med par bya'o/_/khyed kyang phongs [#]pas tshul khrims ngan pa la spyod grang [#]na/_khyed yo byad thams cad dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi bar gyis phongs [#]pa med par byas/_des khyed sdom pa'i tshul khrims la gnos [#]la rim
[\[288b.6\]]gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi theg pa'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis sdug bsngal mthar phyin par gyis shig ces nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims bsrungs so[#]/_/_
[\[288b.7\]]gzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par bskul lo/_/tshul khrims kyi legs pa brjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang tshul khrims bsrung ba de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]de ltar tshul khrims la sbyar zhing tshul khrims la rab tu bkod de/_rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
[\[289a.2\]]sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha
[\[289a.3\]]rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can gang khro ba dang gnod sems su byed pa dag mthong na/_de la 'di skad ces zer ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed ci'i rgyus gnod sems su byed par gyur/_khyed gang gis phongs [#]shing gnod sems su byed par gyur pa de dang de nga las [(]long [,]longs [)]shig_/ngas khyed zas dang /_skom
[\[289a.4\]]dang /_mi'i rkyen gyi yo byad gang ci [#]rung ba'i bar gyis phongs [#]pa med par byas/_khro ba dang gnod sems med par gyis shig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can de dag bzod pa la sbyor te/_'di skad du gcugs gang gis khro ba skye
[\[289a.5\]]bar gyur pa de ni snying po med pa ste/_de la dngos po gang yang med do/_/khro ba de ni yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa ste/_dngos po gang gi phyir khyed [#]'thab cing 'khon pa dang gnod sems su byed par gyur pa dang /_de ltar 'thab cing 'khon te gnod sems su gyur nas dbyig pa 'gyed pa dang /_
[\[289a.6\]]mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang /_phan tshun gyi srog la rgal [#]bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po de la dngos po'i rang bzhin gang yang med na/_de ltar yin yang khyed yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yongs su rtog [#]pas 'khrugs na/_sems can dmyal ba dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i
[\[289a.7\]]'jig rten dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/_de ma yin pa'i ngan song gzhan dag tu yang khyed sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dang /_tsha zhing rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur gyis/_skyes bu khyed rnams dngos po med pa'i chos kyi don du las gang yongs su bzung bas mir skye ba yang thob
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]par mi 'gyur na/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad par 'gyur ba lta smos su med pa de lta bu'i las yongs su ma 'dzin cig_/grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni dkon no/_/mir skye ba thob pa ni dkon no/_/dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni dkon no/_/'khor ba las thar pa ni dkon no/_/de ltar
[\[289b.2\]]yin gyi dal ba 'di ni don med par ma byed cig_/mi khom par gyur cing gsor mi rung bar gyur ta re zhes de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang bzod pa sgrub bo/_/gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par bskul lo/_/bzod pa'i legs pa brjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang
[\[289b.3\]]bzod pa sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar bzod pa la sbyar zhing bzod pa la rab tu bkod do[#]/_/rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub
[\[289b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams brtson 'grus
[\[289b.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong ba [#]na/_'di skad du khyod ci'i phyir le lo byed ces brjod de/_de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_de la byang chub
[\[289b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can de dag la 'di skad ces zer te/_kye [#]skyes bu dag ngas sbyin pa'i rkyen tam/_tshul khrims kyi rkyen tam/_bzod pa'i rkyen tam/_gzhan yang rnam pa gang dang gang gis brtson 'grus rtsom [#]du rung ba
[\[289b.7\]]de dag khyed la ngas nye bar bsgrub par byas/_brtson 'grus rtsoms shig ces nas sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i yo byad la spyod cing lus sam/_sems kyis brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_de dag lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i chos thams
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_dge ba'i chos de dag gis 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i chos rnams sgom mo/_/de dag bsgoms pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob po/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra
[\[290a.2\]]bcom pa nyid 'thob po/_/rang byang chub 'thob bo/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul lo/_/
[\[290a.3\]]brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar brtson 'grus la sbyor [#]zhing brtson 'grus la rab tu bkod
[\[290a.4\]]do[#]/_/rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub
[\[290a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems g.yeng bar [#]gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na 'di skad du sems can khyed
[\[290a.6\]]ci'i phyir bsam gtan la mnyam par mi 'jog ces brjod do[#]/_/de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can de dag la 'di skad du 'dems [#]te/_kye sems can dag ngas rkyen gang dang gang gis phyi
[\[290a.7\]]nang gi chos la rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub par bya'o zhes nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag la rkyen gang dang gang nye bar bsgrubs pas rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar bsgrubs te/_de'i phyir de dag rnam par rtog pa chad
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]nas bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/byams pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug go/_/nam mkha'
[\[290b.2\]]mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de dag bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis
[\[290b.3\]]sems 'dul [#]bar gyur pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom mo/_/
[\[290b.4\]]de dag bsgoms pas rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las 'das te[#]/_de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam las yongs su mi nyams te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
[\[290b.5\]]shing ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su [#]sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
[\[290b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing shes rab 'chal bar gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na/_'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i phyir shes rab mi sgom zhes brjod de/_de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[290b.7\]]po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can de dag la 'di skad du 'dems [#]te/_nga las yo byad rnams long la sbyin pa byin cig_/tshul khrims srungs shig_/bzod pa sgoms shig_/brtson 'grus rtsoms shig_/ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par zhog cig_/rnam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]par gyis la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa la bdag gam/_sems can nam/_srog gam/_'gro ba'am/_gso [#]ba'am/_skyes bu'am/_gang zag gam/_shed can nam/_shed bdag gam/_byed pa po'am/_tshor ba po'am/_shes pa po'am/_mthong ba po'am/_
[\[291a.2\]]gzugs sam/_tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed rnams sam[#]/_rnam par shes pa'am/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'am/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams sam/_stong pa nyid thams cad dam[#]/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'am/_
[\[291a.3\]]bsam gtan nam/_tshad med pa'am/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'am/_rnam par thar pa'am/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'am/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa'am/_ting nge 'dzin tam/_gzungs kyi sgo'am/_
[\[291a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs sam/_mi 'jigs pa'am/_so so yang dag par rig pa'am/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang [#]/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_
[\[291a.5\]]dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ram/_chos gang yang yod dam/_yongs su rtogs shig ces 'dems [#]shing rjes su ston te/_des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos gang la yang
[\[291a.6\]]dmigs pas mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang mi dmigs te/_de la mngon par zhen pa med pas chos gang yang skye ba'am 'gag pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas 'di ni sems can
[\[291a.7\]]dmyal ba'o/_/'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o/_/'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o/_/'di ni lha ma yin gyi rigs [#]su gtogs pa'o/_/'di ni lha'o/_/'di ni mi'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims ngan pa can no/_/'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]ba'o/_/'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar rnam par mi rtog ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[291b.2\]]dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[291b.3\]]dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag
[\[291b.4\]]la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrubs te/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sgom mo/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgoms pas [#]'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[291b.5\]]chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can mgon med pa sdug bsngal ba/_kha zas dang gos kyis
[\[291b.6\]]phongs pa dag mthong na 'di ltar yongs su smin par byed de/_rigs kyi bu dag tshur [(]sheg[,]shog[) ]/nga las [#]zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_mi'i rkyen dang /_yo byad gang ci yang rung ba rin po che [#]bdun gyi bar
[\[291b.7\]]du long la/_sems can rnams la phan thogs shig_/de ni khyed la yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur gyis/_'di ltar don 'di ni pha bi [#]yin gyi/_bdag gi ma yin no snyam du bsam par mi bya'o/_/don 'di ni bdag gis yun ring po nas sems can rnams kyi don du bsgrubs pa yin no zhes de
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]ltar khyed kyis bdag gi yin par soms la/_sems can rnams la yongs su [(]thong [,]thongs [)]shig_/sbyin pa des kyang tshul khrims la sbyor cig_/bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab la sbyor cig_/stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
[\[292a.2\]]chos rnams la sbyor cig_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes
[\[292a.3\]]pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la sbyor cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la sbyor cig_/de tsam gyis dga'
[\[292a.4\]]bar ma sems par gong du 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa rnams la khod cig_/'di lta ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la khod [#]cig_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa [#]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
[\[292a.5\]]chub la khod cig ces 'dems [#]shing rjes su ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/_de ltar yongs su smin par byas pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su
[\[292a.6\]]thar pa nas/_'khor ba thams cad kyi bar las yongs su thar ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sems can rnams 'di ltar yongs su smin par bya'o/_/rkyen gang dang ma ldan pas khyed tshul khrims ngan par byed par [#]
[\[292a.7\]]'gyur ba'i rkyen de dag ngas khyed la bshugs kyis[#]/_zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_mi'i rkyen dang /_yo byad gang ci yang rung ste/_rin po che bdun gyi bar du long la sems can rnams la phan thogs
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]shig ces 'dems [#]shing rjes su ston to/_/de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan [#]'dogs te/_phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par blangs shing gnas te/_de dag sdom pa'i tshul khrims ma zhig ma
[\[292b.2\]]gong ma 'dres pa skyon med pa ma nyams pa rang dbang yod pa mkhas pas bsngags pa shin tu rdzogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyur 'gyur ba la gnas shing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas/_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes
[\[292b.3\]]su thob par byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can shes rab 'chal par gyur pa blo chung ba
[\[292b.4\]]dag mthong na/_'di ltar yongs su smin par byed de/_rkyen gang dang ma ldan pas khyed shes rab 'chal par 'gyur ba'i rkyen de dag ngas khyed la bshugs kyis zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_mi'i rkyen
[\[292b.5\]]dang /_yo byad gang ci yang rung ba rin po che bdun gyi bar du long shig ces nas/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te/_phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas rmongs pa med cing /_shes rab dang ldan par gyur pa de dag shes rab
[\[292b.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas/_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar
[\[292b.7\]]gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rjes su thob par byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
[\[293a.2\]]shing /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/_de ltar yongs su smin par byas pa rnams/_ngan song gsum nas yongs su thar pa nas/_'khor ba thams cad kyi bar las yongs su thar ro/_/[#]de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di snyam du gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
[\[293a.3\]]de [#]lta bu'i go bgo bar bya na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam ni ji lta bu zhig yod snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs su chud nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[293a.4\]]rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/rab 'byor stong pa nyid thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[293a.5\]]dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon
[\[293a.6\]]pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_
[\[293a.7\]]snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos gang
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par mi bya ba dang /_gang la ma bslabs kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang yod dam/_rab 'byor gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par mi
[\[293b.2\]]bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang med do[#]/_/chos thams cad la ma bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad stong pa lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[293b.3\]]dpa' chen po chos thams cad la ji ltar bslab par bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'di snyed do zhes bgyi ba'am/_'di dag go zhes bgyi ba'am/_'jig rten pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/_/zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/_/zag pa med pa'i chos ni 'di
[\[293b.4\]]dag go/_/'dus byas kyi chos ni 'di dag go/_/'dus ma byas kyi chos ni 'di dag go/_/so so'i skye bo'i chos ni 'di dag go/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'di dag go/_/byang chub
[\[293b.5\]]sems dpa'i chos ni 'di dag go/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'di dag go zhes bgyi ba ni spros pa ma mchis pa 'phro bar mi bgyid pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_chos thams cad ni stong pa'o/_/rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa
[\[293b.6\]]ma yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la bslabs shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad
[\[293b.7\]]la bslabs shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/rab 'byor khyod kyis gzhan yang gang 'di skad du gal te chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyed do zhes bya ba'am/_'di dag go zhes bya ba dang /
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]'jig rten pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/_/zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/_/zag pa med pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/_/'dus byas kyi chos ni 'di dag go/_/'dus ma byas kyi chos ni 'di dag go/_/so so'i skye bo'i
[\[294a.2\]]chos ni 'di dag go/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'di dag go/_/byang chub sems dpa'i chos ni 'di dag go/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'di dag go zhes bya bar ji ltar chos [#]
[\[294a.3\]]rnam par dbye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/_rab 'byor ci sems can 'di dag gis de ltar chos thams cad stong ngo zhes bya bar shes sam/_gal te shes na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi byed de/_rab
[\[294a.4\]]'byor sems can 'di dag chos thams cad stong ngo zhes bya bar mi shes pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_chos rnam par 'god par byas shing sems can rnams la chos ston to
[\[294a.5\]]zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam la dgod pa'i phrin las yin no//_//rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam la spyod pas thog ma nyid du 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/_mngon par 'du bya ba ma gtogs par 'di la chos gang yang ngo bo nyid kyis
[\[294a.6\]]dmigs su med do zhes bya bar yongs su brtag par bya'o/_/de chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la de ltar rtogs [#]pas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams sam/_stong pa nyid thams cad dam/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nam/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa
[\[294a.7\]]dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang [#]/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid
[\[294b.2\]]dang [#]/_rang byang chub bam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar ram/_chos gang la yang mngon par chags par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi [#]stong pa ste/_stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen
[\[294b.3\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/stong pa nyid kyang dmigs su med na/_gang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med par chos thams cad kyis rnam par spyod do/_/de bslab pa
[\[294b.4\]]'di la gnas shing sems can 'di dag ci la spyod ces sems can gyi spyod pa la lta ste/_de 'di snyam du kye ma sems can 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'dzin pa la spyod do/_/kye ma sems can 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'dzin pa las dgrol bar bya ba dka' ba med do zhes nas de'i tshe
[\[294b.5\]]thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te 'di skad du ston to/_/kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/sbyin pa byin cig_/des khyed longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur gyi[#]/_longs spyod des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims
[\[294b.6\]]la 'dems [#]te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/tshul khrims srungs shig_/tshul khrims des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du bzod pa la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/bzod pa sgoms shig_/bzod pa des kyang rlom
[\[294b.7\]]sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du brtson 'grus la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/brtson 'grus rtsoms shig_/brtson 'grus des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin la 'dems
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par zhog cig_/ting nge 'dzin des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du shes rab la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/shes rab sgoms shig_/shes
[\[295a.2\]]rab des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du stong pa nyid thams cad la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/stong pa nyid sgoms shig_/stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs
[\[295a.3\]]kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sgoms shig_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_
[\[295a.4\]]tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la 'dems te/_kye sems
[\[295a.5\]]can dag [#]tshur sheg_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgoms shig_/gzungs kyi sgo de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po
[\[295a.6\]]dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgoms shig_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin
[\[295a.7\]]du rgyun du zhugs pa'i [#]'bras bu la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgoms shig_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/rang byang chub sgoms shig_/rang byang chub des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag
[\[295b.2\]]tshur sheg_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgoms shig_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang med do zhes de lta [#]de ltar sems can rnams la 'dems pa dang /_rjes su ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyad kyang gang la yang mngon par
[\[295b.3\]]zhen pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni [#]mngon par zhen pa med pa ste/_de ni 'di ltar de dag la stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir/_gang gis mngon par zhen par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam la spyod kyang gang la yang
[\[295b.4\]]mi gnas te/_de gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi gnas so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
[\[295b.5\]]kyang de la mi gnas so/_/de bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan dang po ni bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam
[\[295b.6\]]pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/de bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug_/byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha'
[\[295b.7\]]yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug_/rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_/
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/gang mnyam par gzhag pa
[\[296a.2\]]de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/de rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob kyang de la mi gnas so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid thob kyang de la mi gnas so/_/
[\[296a.3\]]de rang byang chub thob kyang de la mi gnas so/_/gsol pa/_de [#]ci'i slad du mi gnas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir mi gnas te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_ngo bo nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa ste/_de gnyis kyi phyir gang la gnas pa'am/_gang gis gnas pa'am/_gang [#]
[\[296a.4\]]gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu de dag la gnas med do/_/de tsam gyis dga' bar yang mi 'dzin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de 'di snyam du bdag gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi bya ba ma yin te/_de la gnas par mi bya'o/_/bdag gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
[\[296a.5\]]dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid thob par mi bya ba ma yin te/_de la gnas par mi bya'o/_/bdag gis rang sangs rgyas kyi [#]sa'i bar du thob par mi bya ba ma yin te/_de la gnas par mi bya'o/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par
[\[296a.6\]]'tshang rgya bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag gis ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang mi skyed [#]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag gis ni sa dang po nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na
[\[296a.7\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do/_/bdag gis ni sa bcu pa'i bar nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do/_/byang
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do snyam ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems g.yeng ba med par lus sam/_ngag gam
[\[296b.2\]]yid kyis gang spyod kyang [#]rung ste/_byang chub kyi sems kyis mi spyod pa med de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub kyi sems la gnas nas/_yid g.yeng ba med par byang chub kyi lam sgrub po/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad ma skyes pa
[\[296b.3\]]lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos [#]byang chub kyi lam ji ltar sgrub par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa ste/_de [#]ji lta bu zhes bya [#]na/_gang mngon par 'du mi byed pa de dag la ni chos
[\[296b.4\]]thams cad ma skyes pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid de bzhin du gnas pa ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor [#]de de bzhin
[\[296b.5\]]no/_/[#]de de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_chos rnams kyi chos [#]nyid ni de bzhin du gnas so/_/de la yang gang chos kyi gnas nyid de lta bu mi shes pa de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos [#]byang
[\[296b.6\]]chub kyi lam bskyed de/_lam des sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su thar par byed do zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa spangs pa la 'god pa'i phrin las yin no//_//gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags skyes par gyur pa'i lam gyis byang chub 'thob [#]par
[\[296b.7\]]'gyur ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ma skyes pa'i lam gyis byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na skyes kyang
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]skyes la ma skyes kyang ma skyes pa'i lam gyis byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na skyes pa yang ma lags/_ma skyes pa yang ma lags pa'i lam gyis byang chub 'thob
[\[297a.2\]]par 'gyur ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub ni lam gyis thob pa yang ma yin/_lam ma yin pas thob pa yang ma yin te/_
[\[297a.3\]]byang chub nyid kyang lam mo/_/lam nyid kyang byang chub po/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub nyid kyang lam mo/_/lam nyid kyang byang chub lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub snga nas kyang thob par 'gyur na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
[\[297a.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi [#]skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[# ]mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_thugs rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
[\[297a.5\]]bco brgyad kyis brjod do zhes kyang ci'i slad du bstan/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sangs rgyas shig byang chub thob par byed pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/sangs rgyas ni byang chub thob par mi mdzad do/_/sangs
[\[297a.6\]]rgyas nyid kyang byang chub bo/_/byang chub nyid kyang sangs rgyas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub snga nas thob par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
[\[297a.7\]]sems dpa' chen pos ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas/_stong pa nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su rdzogs par byas/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /[# ]stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
[\[297b.2\]]bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
[\[297b.3\]]pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas phyin chad de [#]de bzhin gshegs pa'i [#]thams cad gzigs pa/_chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur [#]ba zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob [#]pa la
[\[297b.4\]]dgod pa'i phrin las yin no//_//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa la gnas na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab
[\[297b.5\]]'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bdag dang gzhan gyi lus kyi gnas ngan len dang /_ngag gi [#]gnas ngan len dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ste/_de yongs su dag par byas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
[\[297b.6\]]dag par byed do//_//bam po bdun cu gnyis pa/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das lus kyi [#]gnas ngan len ni gang lags/_ngag gi gnas ngan len ni gang lags/_yid kyi gnas ngan len ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lus kyi las mi dge ba srog gcod pa
[\[297b.7\]]dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gnas ngan len to/_/ngag gi las ni [#]mi dge ba brdzun du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_zhe gcod pa'i tshig dang /_tshig 'khyal pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gnas ngan len to/_/yid kyi las mi dge ba
[\[298a\]]
