[\[298a.1\]]chags sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyi gnas ngan len to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang ser sna'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyi gnas ngan len to/_/tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems dang /_'khrugs [#]pa'i sems
[\[298a.2\]]dang /_le lo'i sems dang /_g.yeng ba'i sems dang /_mnyam par ma [#]bzhag pa'i sems dang /_shes rab 'chal ba'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyi gnas ngan len to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/rab 'byor
[\[298a.3\]]gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa [#]dang bral ba ni byang
[\[298a.4\]]chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa
[\[298a.5\]]dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byed pa'am/_de la 'dod pa bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byed pa'am/_de la 'dod pa bskyed pa ni byang chub
[\[298a.6\]]sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byed pa'am/_de la 'dod pa bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed pa'am/_de la 'dod pa bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/rang byang chub mngon du
[\[298a.7\]]byed pa'am/_de la 'dod pa bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to[#]/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams [#]dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/mig gi 'du shes ni ga [#]
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]gnas ngan len to/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/gzugs kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_chos kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/_
[\[298b.2\]]rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa
[\[298b.3\]]dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
[\[298b.4\]]ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/sa'i khams kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/chu'i khams dang /_mi'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams
[\[298b.5\]]dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/ma rig pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang /_gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_
[\[298b.6\]]srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/bud med kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/skyes pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi 'du shes ni [#]gnas ngan len to/_/gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams kyi 'du shes ni
[\[298b.7\]]gnas ngan len to/_/dge ba'i 'du shes dang /_mi dge ba'i 'du shes dang /_'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'du shes dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'du shes dang /_zag pa med pa'i 'du shes dang /_'dus byas kyi 'du shes dang /_'dus ma byas kyi 'du shes ni
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]gnas ngan len to/_/rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gnas ngan len to[#]/_/ngag gi gnas ngan len [#]dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan len te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gnas ngan len
[\[299a.2\]]de thams cad rnam par spangs shing bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par bskul te/_de zas 'dod pa la ni [#]zas yongs su gtong ngo /_/skom 'dod pa la ni skom/_gos 'dod pa la ni gos yongs su gtong ngo /_/mi'i rkyen dang yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du 'dod
[\[299a.3\]]pa la ni de dag yongs su gtong ste/_gzhan yang mi'i rkyen [#]dang yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du yongs su gtong ba la yang dag par bskul zhing rab tu 'god de/_de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya
[\[299a.4\]]ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/de bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims bsrung ngo /_/gzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par bskul lo/_/bdag kyang bzod pa sgom mo/_/gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par bskul lo/_/bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul
[\[299a.5\]]lo/_/bdag kyang bsam gtan la [#]snyoms par 'jug go/_/gzhan yang bsam gtan la yang dag par bskul lo/_/bdag kyang shes rab sgom mo/_/gzhan yang shes rab la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go/_/'dul lo/_/rab tu 'god do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing sangs
[\[299a.6\]]rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang zhing dkon mchog gsum la 'bul bar [#]byed kyang de [#]'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che sna bdun gyi
[\[299a.7\]]rgyu las grub par gyur cig ces bya bar [#]sems bskyed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi spyan mnga' 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten gyi drung du lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dkrol bar byed kyang de 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa [#]ba 'dis bdag gi
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing du lha rdzas kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya bar sems bskyed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lha rdzas kyi [#]spos kyis yongs su bkang zhing sangs rgyas rnams sam/_sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten dag
[\[299b.2\]]la 'bul bar byed kyang de 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi [#]sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par lha rdzas kyi spos kyi ngad ldang bar gyur cig ces bya bar sems bskyed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas de bzhin gshegs
[\[299b.3\]]pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos la 'bul bar byed cing de 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa dang /_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la man bus
[\[299b.4\]]brtsal [#]ro brgya dang ldan pa mngon par 'grub par gyur cig ces bya bar sems bskyed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la lha rdzas kyi byug pa yongs su 'bul bar byed kyang de 'di snyam
[\[299b.5\]]du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can thams cad kyang lha rdzas kyi reg pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces bya bar sems bskyed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
[\[299b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du yid kyis bsams pa tsam gyis yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams dang /_sems can thams cad la dbul zhing yongs su gtang [#]bar bya'o snyam du sems te/_de de
[\[299b.7\]]ltar sems pa'i [#]tshe 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der [#]bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyang yid kyis bsams pa tsam gyis
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg yongs su 'grub par gyur cig ces bya bar sems bskyed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di snyam du sems te/_ma la
[\[300a.2\]]bdag nyid [#]kyang bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par gzhag go/_/sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan dang po la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid [#]kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par gzhag go/_/sems can thams cad kyang
[\[300a.3\]]bsam gtan bzhi pa la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid [#]kyang byams pa la mnyam par gzhag go/_/sems can thams cad kyang byams pa la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyang snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms la mnyam par gzhag go/_/sems can thams cad kyang btang snyoms la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyang
[\[300a.4\]]nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go/_/sems can thams cad kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
[\[300a.5\]]mched la mnyam par gzhag go/_/sems can thams cad kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom [#]par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyang
[\[300a.6\]]yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid [#]kyang rnam par thar
[\[300a.7\]]pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la 'god do snyam ste/_de de ltar sems pa'i tshe/_de 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na [#]med pa yang
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can thams cad bsam gtan bzhi dang mi 'bral zhing tshad med pa bzhi dang mi 'bral ba dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_
[\[300b.2\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang mi 'bral bar shog shig [#]ces bya bar sems bskyed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/de
[\[300b.3\]]nam bsam pa de dag [#]thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur gyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/_de bdag nyid kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa yin/_sems can de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par byed pa
[\[300b.4\]]yin te/_de bdag nyid kyi lus kyang mdzes pa yin te/_sems can gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang 'di lta ste/_bsod nams kyis yongs su bzung ba'i phyir gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs mngon par 'grub
[\[300b.5\]]ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ltar yongs su dag par byed de/_ci nas kyang ngan song gsum du gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /_lta ba'i rnam par gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug tu
[\[300b.6\]]gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /_bud med dang /_skyes par gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /_theg pa gnyis su gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med par gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin par gdags pa'i
[\[300b.7\]]ming yang mi srid pa dang /_bdag dang bdag gir bya bar gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_kun nas ldang bar gdags pa'i ming yang [#]mi srid pa dang /_phyin ci log tu gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /_'bras bur gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid cing gzhan du na
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]sems can de dag 'dod pa bzhin du shing rlung gis btab pa'am phyi nang gi dngos po dag las 'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang /_smon pa med pa'i sgra dang /_mi skye mi 'gag pa'i sgra dang /_chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i sgra dang /_chos
[\[301a.2\]]thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong pa'i sgra 'byung ba dang /_chos de dag gi ngo bo nyid ji lta ba bzhin [#]ngo bo nyid med pa'i sgra dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung [#]yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ngo /_/gang stong pa nyid [#]de la ni
[\[301a.3\]]mtshan ma med do/_/gang la ni [#]mtshan ma med pa de la ni smon pa med do zhes bya ba'i chos bstan pa'i sgra nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par 'gro yang rung /_'dug kyang rung /_ldang yang [#]rung /_nyal yang rung ste/_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa [#]'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bur sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong [#]ngo /_/de
[\[301a.4\]]lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyogs bcu'i [#]'jig rten gyi khams dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed
[\[301a.5\]]cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad legs pa [#]brjod par 'gyur te/_sems can gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
[\[301a.6\]]sangs rgyas des chos bstan na/_sems can gang yang 'di ni chos so/_/'di ni chos ma yin zhes bya bar the tshom za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni chos ma yin pa gang yang med de thams cad kyang chos so/_/de la sems can
[\[301a.7\]]gang mi [#]dge ba'i rtsa bas non pa dang /_sangs rgyas sam/_sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa/_bdag tu lta bar bying ba nas lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi bar du bying ba rtag pa'am chad pa'i mtha' la gnas pa/_
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]log par 'dzin pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa la ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin par 'du shes pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin pa la ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par 'du shes pa de dag ni chos ma yin pa yang
[\[301b.2\]]chos so zhes zer/_chos la yang chos ma yin no zhes zer ro[#]/_/de dag chos spong bar 'gyur te/_de ltar chos spangs nas lus zhig pa'i 'og tu shi nas ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye bar [#]'gyur te/_de lta bu dag la yang [#]sangs rgyas bcom ldan
[\[301b.3\]]'das de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhing 'khor ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sems can de dag sdig par lta ba'i rnam pa de dag las rnam par 'grol te[#]/_de ltar rnam par bkrol nas nges pa'i phung por rab tu bkod do[#]/_/der bkod pa
[\[301b.4\]]rnams phyin chad ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yin te/_de ltar yongs su sbyangs pas sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos sam/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
[\[301b.5\]]sam/_zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos sam/_zag pa med pa'i chos sam/_'dus byas kyi chos sam/_'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la yang gnas par mi 'gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du nges par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
[\[301b.6\]]dag pa la 'god pa'i phrin [#]las yin no//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges zhes bgyi'am/_ma nges zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab
[\[301b.7\]]'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nges pa ste/_ma nges pa ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das [#]nyan thos kyi phung po'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi phung po'am/_sangs rgyas kyi phung po'am/_phung po gang du nges pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos kyi phung por nges pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi phung por nges pa ma yin gyi/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi phung por nges so[#]/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems
[\[302a.2\]]dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nges zhes bgyi'am/_'on tam phyir mi ldog par nges zhes bgyi/_skye ba gcig gis thogs par nges zhes bgyi'am/_'on tam srid pa tha mar [#]nges zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sems dang po bskyed pa'i
[\[302a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nges pa'o/_/phyir mi ldog pa ni nges pa'o/_/srid pa gcig gis thogs pa ni nges pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur ram mi 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
[\[302a.4\]]pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/_rab 'byor nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ngan song du mi skye'o/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_brgyad pa'am/_rgyun du zhugs pa'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'am/_dgra bcom pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ram/_gsol
[\[302a.5\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_sbyin pa gtong ba dang /_tshul khrims srung [#]ba dang /_bzod pa sgrub pa dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin
[\[302a.6\]]la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_shes rab sgom [#]pa dang /_mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang ba'i don du gnas pa de ni ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba'i gnas med do/_/lha tshe ring por skye ba'i gnas med do/_/gang na dge ba'i chos rnams mi spyod pa de lta bur skye ba'i gnas med do/_/glen pa dang lkugs
[\[302a.7\]]par 'gyur ba'i yul du skye ba'i gnas med do/_/mtha' 'khob kyi kla klo dang /_mi srun zhing 'khor bzhi rgyur med pa'i yul du skye ba'i gnas med do/_/log par lta ba'i rigs su skye ba'i gnas med do/_/gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang /_chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra mi
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]grag [#]par 'gyur ba de lta bur skye ba'i gnas med do/_/bya ba ma yin par lta bar ltung ba'i gnas med do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zhugs
[\[302b.2\]]pa ni mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod ces bya ba'i gnas med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan zhing tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i gnas su mi skye ba lags na[#]/_gang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
[\[302b.3\]]nyid kyang byol song gi rgyud du skyes pa'i rabs bstan na/_de'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gang du mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mi dge ba'i las kyis byol song gi rgyud du skye ba ma yin gyi/_lus gang dang gang gis sems can
[\[302b.4\]]rnams [#]don du 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing sems can rnams kyi don du yongs su 'dzin kyang /_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar thabs mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byol song gi skye gnas su skyes shing de la la zhig gsod du 'ongs kyang bla na med pa'i bzod
[\[302b.5\]]pas bdag yongs su gtong zhing sems can de dag la gnod par mi byed pa de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa dag dgra bcom pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas dag la yod dam/_rab 'byor de bas na rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi phyir bla na
[\[302b.6\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed cing byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba yang [#]byol song gi skye gnas kyi rgyud kyi nyes pas mi gos par rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i chos gang la gnas shing byang chub sems
[\[302b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su rdzogs par mi bya ba'i dge ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang [#]med de/_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni bla na
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste snying po byang chub la 'jug [#]gi bar du dge ba'i chos gang yang yongs su rdzogs par mi bya ba med do/_/dge ba'i chos gang
[\[303a.2\]]yang yongs su [#]rdzogs par ma byas par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur [#]ba de lta bu med de/_de ni gnas ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos [#]sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge
[\[303a.3\]]ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la bslab par bya ste/_de la bslabs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob bo/_/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang yongs su spong ngo /_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems
[\[303a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos dkar po zag pa ma mchis pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ngan song ngam/_byol song gi skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa zag pa med pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom
[\[303a.5\]]ldan 'das de de lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'phags shing zag pa mi mnga' ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags mngon par sprul pa mdzad
[\[303a.6\]]cing /_de mngon par sprul nas sangs rgyas kyi phrin [#]las mdzad pa de lta bu yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor des de bzhin gshegs pa byol song gi skye gnas par 'gyur [#]ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni
[\[303a.7\]]ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa dang ldan pa yang ched du bsams shing de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin te/_lus de dag gis sems can rnams ci rigs ci tshul du yongs su smin par byed do/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_dgra bcom pas sprul pa mngon par sprul
[\[303b.2\]]na/_sprul pa des dgra bcom pa'i las byas shing las des gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba skye bar 'gyur ba yod dam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de [#]bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[303b.3\]]po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa dang ldan pa yang ched du bsams shing de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin te/_ci rigs ci tshul du sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/de lta bu'i lus des sdug bsngal du yang mi 'gyur te/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yang nyams su mi myong ngo /_/rab 'byor
[\[303b.4\]]de ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma las glang po'i gzugs sam/_rta'i gzugs sam/_glang gi gzugs shig bstan tam/_gzhan yang sgyu ma rnam pa sna tshogs bstan na/_de dag glang po'i gzugs sam/_rta'i gzugs sam/_glang gi gzugs sam/_srog chags
[\[303b.5\]]kyi rigs gzhan dag tu yang 'gyur ba yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa dang ldan pa yang ched du bsams shing de lta bu'i
[\[303b.6\]]lus yongs su 'dzin te/_lus de dag gis sems can rnams kyi don byed de/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i ye shes zag pa ma mchis pa dang ldan
[\[303b.7\]]zhing lus gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin pa ni thabs shin tu mkhas pa ste de ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges par 'jog pa'i phrin las yin no//_//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po ni [#]chos dkar po gang dang gang la gnas shing de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa bgyid kyang las de lta bus mi gos par spyod pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'
[\[304a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i [#]thabs mkhas pa la spyod de/_thabs mkhas pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu sems can rnams kyi don byed kyang des de la gang yang reg par 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang
[\[304a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang reg par byed pa dang /_gang gis reg par byed pa [#]dang /_gang la reg par bya ba de lta bu'i chos gsum po de dag thams cad mi dmigs te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos gsum po de dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pas stong pa nyid ni stong pa
[\[304a.4\]]nyid la reg par mi byed do/_/stong pa nyid kyis chos gang la yang reg par mi 'gyur ro/_/stong pa nyid kyang reg par bya ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de/_de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[304a.5\]]chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gzhan la [#]mi gnas kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig la gnas shing rnam pa de lta bu'i thabs
[\[304a.6\]]mkhas pa la spyod pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khongs su ma chud pa de lta bu yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong na/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[304a.7\]]pa'i khongs su chos thams cad 'dus pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid la ni chos gang yang khongs su [#]chud pa'am/_khongs su ma chud pa zhes bgyi ba ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis mi stong ngam/_gsol pa/_
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das stong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ste chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong na/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid du ma 'dus sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rnam
[\[304b.2\]]grangs des na[#]/_khyod kyis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi don tshad med pa la 'god pa'i phrin las yin no//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
[\[304b.3\]]gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas te/_mngon par shes pa gang la gnas shing phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams
[\[304b.4\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mchi ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag la yang [#]bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang /_chos nyan zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i
[\[304b.5\]]mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub [#]pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyogs
[\[304b.6\]]bcu'i phyogs re re'i [#]'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong ngo /_/
[\[304b.7\]]gzhan du na ming dang brdar [#]btags pa nye bar bzung zhing bstan pa ma gtogs te/_gdags pa kun kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo /_/gal te 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mi stong la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mi stong ste/_gdags pa'i rgyu de dag
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mi stong pa zhig yin na ni/_nyi tshe'i stong pa nyid du 'gyur te/_de yang stong pa nyi tshe ba ma yin no/_/de'i phyir chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ste/_de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas shes rab
[\[305a.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrubs te/_mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas shing lha'i mig dang /_lha'i rna ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas dran pa dang /_'chi 'pho shes pa mngon par
[\[305a.3\]]bsgrubs te[#]/_mngon par shes pa med par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub ni mngon par
[\[305a.4\]]shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'dus pa ste/_mngon par shes pa de dag las byang chub yongs su btsal bar bya'o/_/de tshol ba'i tshe lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas bdag nyid kyang dge ba'i chos thams cad mthong la/_gzhan yang dge ba'i chos thams cad la sbyor te/_dge ba'i chos
[\[305a.5\]]de dag la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/_stong pa nyid ni gang la mngon par zhen cing ro myong [#]bar byed par mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med de[#]/_stong pa [#]nyid ni ro myong [#]bar byed pa med do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
[\[305a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lha'i mig mngon par bsgrubs te[#]/_lha'i mig des chos thams cad kyang stong pa nyid du mthong ste/_de [#]chos de dag la gnas shing las mngon par sgrub bo/_/las mngon par sgrub pa des sems can rnams la [#]chos ston te/_sems
[\[305a.7\]]can nam sems can du gdags par dmigs pa med do/_/de ltar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrubs te/_mngon par shes pa de dag gis mngon par shes par bya ba'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]byed do/_/de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/_de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing sbyin pa'am/_tshul khrims sam/_bzod pa'am/_brtson 'grus sam/_bsam gtan nam/_shes rab bam/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
[\[305b.2\]]chos rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad med pa rnams sam/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_mthar gyis gnas
[\[305b.3\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/_mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_nyan thos kyi chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i
[\[305b.4\]]chos sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing /_sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/_de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_sbyin pa byin cig_/phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang mi nus na/_gzhan
[\[305b.5\]]gyi don lta ci smos kyis/_de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag kyang bde bar gyis shig_/gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig_/phongs pas zil gyis non zhing nying sha nying gis zos te/_ngan song gsum las mi thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji
[\[305b.6\]]snyed pa [#]de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te[#]/_skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don yang bya bar mi nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/_byol song gi [#]skye gnas
[\[305b.7\]]sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/_bdag kyang gdon par mi nus na/_gzhan gdon par [#]lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]ston to/_/sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa [#]de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig[# ]/sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/_de lta bas na
[\[306a.2\]]khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yin gyis/_de bas na khyed kyis 'khrugs [#]pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs yang mi dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re
[\[306a.3\]]zhes chos ston to/_/sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te[#]/_kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/_byol song gi skye
[\[306a.4\]]gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/_bdag kyang gdon par mi nus na/_gzhan gdon par [#]lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/
[\[306a.5\]]sems can [#]sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa [#]de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed
[\[306a.6\]]ngan song gsum du ltung na bdag kyang gdon par mi nus na/_gzhan gdon par [#]lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyod kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can shes rab 'chal pa can [#]gang ji snyed pa de dag
[\[306a.7\]]la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don yang bya bar mi nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_gang shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni mi sdug pa la sbyor ro/_/zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag [#]
[\[306b.2\]]thams cad ni byams pa la sbyor ro/_/gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro/_/lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/_nyan thos kyi lam mam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/_sangs rgyas kyi
[\[306b.3\]]lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis [#]stong ste/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/_stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang
[\[306b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa [#]la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/_/de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_
[\[306b.5\]]nub byang dang /[# ]'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/_de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing /_sbyin pa'am/_tshul khrims sam/_bzod pa'am/_brtson 'grus sam/_bsam gtan nam/_shes rab bam/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sam/_rnam
[\[306b.6\]]par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'am/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad med pa rnams sam/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/[# ]ting
[\[306b.7\]]nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/[ #]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/_mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_nyan thos kyi chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_byang chub
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]sems dpa'i chos sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/_de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_sbyin pa byin cig_/phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_phongs
[\[307a.2\]]pas ni bdag gi don yang bya bar mi nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis de ltar khyod kyis sbyin pa byin la/_bdag kyang bde bar gyis shig_/gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig_/phongs pas zil gyis non zhing nying sha nying gis zos te/_ngan song gsum las mi thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos
[\[307a.3\]]ston to/_/sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi [#]don kyang bya bar mi nus na gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni
[\[307a.4\]]sems can dmyal ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/_gzhan gdon pa [#]lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi
[\[307a.5\]]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te[#]/_de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur
[\[307a.6\]]te/_de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/_sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yin gyis/_de bas na khyed kyis 'khrugs [#]pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/_/_
[\[307a.7\]]phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_le los ni bdag gi don kyang byed par [#]mi nus na gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na bdag kyang gdon par mi nus na/_gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes
[\[307b.2\]]chos ston to/_/sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag sems [#]g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar
[\[307b.3\]]khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/_gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis [#]g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la
[\[307b.4\]]'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don yang bya bar mi nus na/_gzhan gyi [#]don lta ci smos te/_gang shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin
[\[307b.5\]]rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni mi sdug pa la sbyor ro/_/zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni byams
[\[307b.6\]]pa la sbyor ro/_/gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro/_/lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de [#]dag ni yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor ro[#]/_/nyan thos kyi lam mam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/_sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing /_de dag la
[\[307b.7\]]'di skad du chos ston te/_khyed kyis [#]chos gang la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis [#]stong ste/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/_stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na [#]byang chub sems dpa'
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni mngon par shes pa rnams la ma gnas par sems
[\[308a.2\]]can rnams la chos bstan par mi nus te/_lam gol par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang lam du gzud par mi nus so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_bya 'dab ma med pa ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar mi nus so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
[\[308a.3\]]kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la ma brten par sems can rnams la chos bstan par mi nus so/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/_de mngon par shes
[\[308a.4\]]pa mngon par bsgrubs pa de dag gis [#]sems can rnams kyi don ji ltar bya bar dga' ba de bde bar byed do/_/des [#]lha'i mig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/_de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong [#]/_de ltar mthong nas
[\[308a.5\]]kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis [#]de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/_de dang mthun par [#]sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i
[\[308a.6\]]gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du [#]chos ston to/_/des lha'i mig gis [#]lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/_de dag tu sems can
[\[308a.7\]]gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/_de dang mthun pa'i [#]sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]dang [#]/_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/des lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis 'di lta ste/_lha dang mi gnyis ka'i sgra yang thos te/_de shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom
[\[308b.2\]]ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/_thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/_/de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_
[\[308b.3\]]shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston te/_de [#]lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas
[\[308b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/_thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/_/de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/_sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_
[\[308b.5\]]bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/_de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa des sems can rnams kyi sems shes par
[\[308b.6\]]byas shing de dag la de bzhin nyid du chos ston te/_sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/des bdag gam gzhan
[\[308b.7\]]gyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa des sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan 'di zhes bya ba nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byung ngo zhes bya bar yang shes te/_sems can sngon gyi gnas
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]rjes su dran pa la mos pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la yang dag pa nyid du chos ston te/_sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung
[\[309a.2\]]ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/de rdzu 'phrul gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed de/_bsnyen bkur byas nas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis sems can rnams la chos ston te[#]/_sbyin
[\[309a.3\]]pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/de zag pa med pa mngon du bya ba'i shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin
[\[309a.4\]]te/_de zag pa med pa mngon du bya ba'i shes pa shin tu rig pa des sems can rnams la chos ston te/_sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i
[\[309a.5\]]gtam gyi bar du chos ston te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par byas te[#]/_de mngon par shes pa shin tu 'dris pa de dag gis lus ci dang ci lta bu yongs su [#]bzung
[\[309a.6\]]bar 'dod pa de dang de lta bu'i lus yongs su bzung zhing mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don byed de/_bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba de dag gis gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i skyes bu ni dgos pa thams cad byed kyang bde
[\[309a.7\]]ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba des gos par 'gyur ba med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse [#]zhing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mos pa ji
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]lta ba bzhin du chos ston [#]kyang bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba des 'phrogs [#]par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_de ltar mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse [#]bar byas te/_ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
[\[309b.2\]]su dag par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de ltar rtse [#]bar bya ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
[\[309b.3\]]chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lam gyi yan lag dang mi ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub med do zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung du nye bar 'gro ba dang /_
[\[309b.4\]]bsnyen bkur bya ba la sogs pa la dgod pa'i phrin [#]las yin no//_//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi yan lag yongs su [#]rdzogs par bgyis shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
[\[309b.5\]]par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i lam de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor dge ba'i chos thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam gyi yan lag go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das lam gyi yan lag gang gis bla na med pa
[\[309b.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos de dag gang lags//_//bam po bdun cu gsum pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i
[\[309b.7\]]chos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing de yongs su gtong ba'i tshe ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni sbyin pa'o/_/'di la gtang [#]bar bya'o/_/bdag gis sbyin par bya'o zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam
[\[310a.2\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing shes rab sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni shes rab po/_/bdag gis shes rab sgom mo/_/'di'i don du shes rab sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[310a.3\]]pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i chos stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_
[\[310a.4\]]'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[310a.5\]]smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /[# ]snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod kyang
[\[310a.6\]]de la mi rtog cing sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom [#]mo zhes gsum po
[\[310a.7\]]de dag la mi rtog pa ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor dge ba'i chos de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]lam ste/_lam des 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /[# ]da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can tshad med pa rnams ded [#]de 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal [#]bar gyur pa dang /_rgal [#]ba dang /_rgal [#]bar 'gyur ba ste/_lam de yongs su rdzogs par byas shing byang chub sems
[\[310b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
[\[310b.3\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag thams cad [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos lags na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang 'di skad du gal te chos de dag thams cad [#]byang chub sems dpa'i chos yin na/_sangs rgyas
[\[310b.4\]]kyi chos gang yin zhes zer ba ni/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang chos de dag nyid rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar zad de/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yongs su spong ngo /_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[310b.5\]]chen po ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste/_byang chub
[\[310b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la khyad par de yod do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_zhugs pa yang gzhan la/_'bras bu la gnas pa'ang gzhan te/_de gnyis ka yang 'phags pa'i gang zag ma yin zhes mi
[\[310b.7\]]bya'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bar chad med pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa'
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyad par ro zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi yan lag la 'god pa'i phrin [#]las yin no//_//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rang gi
[\[311a.2\]]mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos de dag la [#]ni sems can dmyal ba pa'o/_/'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o/_/'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o/_/'di ni lha'o/_/'di ni mi'o/_/'di ni rigs kyi sa'o/_/'di ni brgyad pa'o/_/'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni
[\[311a.3\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar khyad par dang rnam par dbye ba [#]ji ltar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[311a.4\]]ji ltar gang zag de dag dmigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyang dmigs su ma mchis/_las ji ltar dmigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa yang dmigs su ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du
[\[311a.5\]]smras pa de bzhin te/_chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gang gis rang gi [#]mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad de ltar ma shes pa de dag ni ngan par spyad pa'am/_legs par spyad pa'am/_mi g.yo ba'i las mngon par
[\[311a.6\]]'du byed de/_de dag ngan par spyad pa'i las kyis ngan song gsum du ltung ngo /_/legs par spyad pa'i las kyis [#]lha dang mir skye'o/_/nyams pa med pa'i las kyis gzugs kyi khams sam/_gzugs med pa'i khams su skye'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[311a.7\]]la spyad/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/_nang stong pa nyid la spyad/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyad/_dran pa nye
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]bar gzhag pa rnams la spyad/_yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyad/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam
[\[311b.2\]]gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs
[\[311b.3\]]kyi sgo rnams la spyad/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang [#]/_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyad de/_nyams pa med pa'i spyod pas byang chub kyi lam bskyed nas/_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byang
[\[311b.4\]]chub kyi yan lag gi 'khor dang ldan pa la mnyam par gzhag cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams kyi don byed de/_don byas nas ci nas kyang phyis chud zos [#]shing rgyud lnga'i 'khor bar mi
[\[311b.5\]]ltung ba de ltar don byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rgyud lnga'i 'khor bar [#]gzigs sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ma yin no/_/gsol
[\[311b.6\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_de bzhin gshegs pas chos nag po'am/_dkar po'am/_gnag pa'am/_dkar ba'am/_mi gnag mi dkar bar dmigs lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ste ma dmigs na/_sems
[\[311b.7\]]can dmyal ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ji ltar gdags par mdzad/_lha dang mir ji ltar gdags par mdzad/_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas su ji ltar gdags par mdzad/_
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i [#]sangs rgyas su ji ltar gdags par mdzad/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ci sems can 'di dag chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes
[\[312a.2\]]sam/_gsol pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te sems can de dag 'di ltar chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi 'jug
[\[312a.3\]]ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs na sems can rnams kyang ngan song gsum dang /_'khor ba'i rgyud rnams las mi 'grol te/_rab 'byor sems can de dag chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par mi shes la mi shes pas rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su mi
[\[312a.4\]]'grol bas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par mthong nas/_sems can rnams kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug ste/_chos 'di dag ni ji
[\[312a.5\]]ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu yod pa ma yin na/_de dag ni med cing yang dag pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yod par brtags shing sems can med pa la sems can du 'du shes/_gzugs med pa la gzugs su 'du shes pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_
[\[312a.6\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa med pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes/_skye mched rnams med pa la skye mched du 'du shes/_khams rnams med pa la khams su 'du shes/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams [#]med pa la rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar [#]'du shes/_'jig
[\[312a.7\]]rten pa'i chos med pa [#]la 'jig rten pa'i chos su 'du shes/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos med pa [#]la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos su 'du shes/_zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos med pa [#]la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos su 'du shes/_zag pa med pa'i chos med pa [#]la zag pa med pa'i chos su 'du
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]shes/_'dus [#]byas kyi chos med pa la 'dus [#]byas kyi chos su 'du shes/_'dus ma byas kyi chos med pa [#]la 'dus ma byas kyi chos su 'du shes nas yod pa ma yin pa'i [#]phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mngon par 'du byed
[\[312b.2\]]pa de dag rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su mi 'grol ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [#]dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus par byas te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
[\[312b.3\]]par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams yongs su 'grel to zhes bya ba ni las dang 'bras bur 'brel [#]pa chud mi za ba la dgod pa'i phrin las yin no//_//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_gal te chos thams cad rang gi mtshan
[\[312b.4\]]nyid kyis stong pa lags na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams yongs su 'grel pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor
[\[312b.5\]]'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_sdug bsngal ba dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam sems can rnams la
[\[312b.6\]]ston to/_/'chad do/_/'jog go/_/'god do/_/'grel to/_/rnam par 'byed do/_/gsal bar byed do/_/yang dag par brjod [#]do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'dir dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang ci snyed pa gang gis [#]dkon mchog gsum rnam par dgod pa de dag thams cad yongs su 'dus te/_
[\[312b.7\]]sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /_chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog gsum 'jig rten du byung bas sems can rnams lam rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su 'grel to/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]bar 'gyur ram/_'on te sdug bsngal gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/_kun 'byung ba 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/_'on te kun 'byung bas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/_sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'tshal bas yongs su
[\[313a.2\]]mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/_'on te sdug bsngal 'gog pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/_lam 'tshal bas [#]yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/_'on te lam gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor
[\[313a.3\]]sdug bsngal shes pas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/_sdug bsngal gyis kyang ma yin no/_/kun 'byung ba shes pas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/_kun 'byung bas kyang ma yin no/_/sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/_sdug bsngal 'gog pas kyang ma
[\[313a.4\]]yin no/_/lam shes pas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/_lam gyis kyang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'da' bar [#]ngas gsungs te/_sdug bsngal shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/_sdug bsngal
[\[313a.5\]]gyis kyang ma yin no/_/kun 'byung ba shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/_kun 'byung bas kyang ma yin no/_/sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pas yongs su mya ngan las [#]'da' ba ma yin/_sdug bsngal 'gog pas kyang ma yin no/_/lam shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma
[\[313a.6\]]yin/_lam gyis kyang ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang la sdug bsngal ba yang ma mchis/_sdug bsngal 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/_kun 'byung ba yang ma mchis/_kun 'byung ba 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/_'gog pa yang ma mchis/_'gog pa 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/_lam
[\[313a.7\]]yang ma mchis/_lam 'tshal ba yang ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi [#]mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba de [#]gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag gi de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_de bzhin du gnas pa'i dbyings dang /_chos kyi dbyings mi 'phel mi 'grib
[\[313b.2\]]par 'dug pa ste/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bden pa khong du chud pa ji lta ba bzhin du bden pa khong du chud par bya ba'i don du spyod do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[313b.3\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na bden pa rtogs pa'i don du spyod pa lags/_ji ltar spyod na bden pa rtogs shing 'tshal te khong du chud nas nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa lags/_bcom [(]ldan
[\[313b.4\]]ldan [,]ldan [)]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos de dag ci nas kyang chos gang yang dmigs su med pa de ltar mthong ste/_chos thams cad ma dmigs pas bden par rtogs [#]pa'am/_bden
[\[313b.5\]]par ma rtogs [#]pa'i chos thams cad stong par mthong ste/_des de ltar mthong bas skyon med par chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur te/_rigs kyi sa la gnas pa de spyi bor ltung ba gang gis nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung
[\[313b.6\]]bar 'gyur ba spyi bor ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' de rigs kyi sa de la gnas shing bsam gtan bzhi sgrub bo/_/tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgrub bo/_/de lhag mthong gi sa de la gnas shing chos thams cad rab tu shes par byed do/_/
[\[313b.7\]]'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par byed do/_/de sdug bsngal yongs su shes kyang sdug bsngal la dmigs [#]pa'i sems mi bskyed do/_/kun 'byung ba rab tu spangs kyang kun 'byung ba la dmigs pa'i sems mi bskyed do/_/'gog pa mngon du byed kyang 'gog pa la dmigs pa'i sems mi
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]bskyed do/_/lam bsgom [#]yang lam la dmigs pa'i sems mi bskyed de[#]/_gzhan du na [#]byang chub la gzhol ba'i sems kyis chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
[\[314a.2\]]zhes bgyi ba gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stong pa nyid do/_/gsol pa/_stong pa nyid [#]gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de/_rnam pa de lta bu'i lhag mthong gis chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar blta [#]ste/_ngo bo nyid gang la
[\[314a.3\]]gnas shing byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid chos gang la yang ngo bo nyid yod par mi mthong ngo /_/dngos po med pa ni byang chub ste/_de ni sangs rgyas kyis ma mdzad/_rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/_dgra bcom pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_rgyun du
[\[314a.4\]]zhugs pas ma byas/_de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma byas/_gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang ma byas te/_gzhan du na yang dag pa ji lta ba de sems can rnams kyis ma shes mi [#]mthong bas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[314a.5\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston to zhes bya ba ni bden pa mthong ba la dgod pa'i phrin las yin no//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan
[\[314a.6\]]'das gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/_bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob par 'tshal bas gzugs la ji ltar bslab [#]par bgyi/_tshor ba dang /_
[\[314a.7\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la ji ltar bslab [#]par bgyi/_mig gi skye mched dang /_rna ba'i skye mched dang /_sna'i skye mched dang /_lce'i skye mched dang /_lus kyi skye mched dang /_yid kyi skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_gzugs kyi skye mched dang /_sgra'i
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]skye mched dang /_dri'i skye mched dang /_ro'i skye mched dang /_reg bya'i skye mched dang /_chos kyi skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes
[\[314b.2\]]pa'i khams dang /_sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_yid kyi khams
[\[314b.3\]]dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i skye mched dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /[ (]lca [,]lce [)]dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_ma rig pa dang /_'du byed dang /_
[\[314b.4\]]rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang /_gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang /_kun 'byung gi bden pa dang /_'gog pa'i bden pa dang /_lam gyi
[\[314b.5\]]bden pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_gzugs can gyi chos rnams dang /_gzugs can ma lags pa dang /_bstan du mchis pa rnams dang /_bstan du ma mchis pa rnams dang /_thogs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /_thogs pa ma mchis pa rnams dang /_'dus bgyis pa rnams dang /_'dus ma bgyis pa rnams dang /_
[\[314b.6\]]zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /_zag pa ma mchis pa rnams dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa rnams dang /_kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa rnams dang /_dman pa rnams dang /_gya nom pa rnams dang /_nang gi bdag nyid rnams dang /_phyi'i bdag nyid rnams dang /_mthong
[\[314b.7\]]ba dang /_thos pa dang /_rnam par shes pa rnams dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams dang /_dge ba dang /_mi [(]dag [,]dge [)]ba dang /_lung du ma bstan pa rnams dang /_'dod pa dang rab tu ldan pa rnams dang /_gzugs dang rab tu ldan pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa dang rab tu
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]ldan pa rnams dang /_slob pa rnams dang /_mi slob pa rnams dang /_slob pa yang ma lags/_mi slob pa yang ma lags pa rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_'dod chags dang /_khong khro dang /_nga rgyal dang /_ma rig pa dang /_lta ba dang /_the tshom la ji ltar bslab par
[\[315a.2\]]bgyi/_ser sna dang /_sbyin pa dang /_'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang /_tshul khrims dang /_gnod sems dang /_bzod pa dang /_le lo dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_rnam par g.yeng ba dang /_bsam gtan dang /_'chal pa'i shes rab dang /_shes rab la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_rnam par rtog pa dang /_
[\[315a.3\]]stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_log pa'i smon lam dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa dang /_sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i chos rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_nyon mongs pa rnams dang /_nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba
[\[315a.4\]]dang /_'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la [#]'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byams pa [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[315a.5\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob par 'dod pas gzugs ming tsam mo zhes bya bar bslab par bya'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ming tsam mo zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
[\[315a.6\]]pa rnams kyi bar du ming tsam mo zhes bya bar bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe 'di ni gzugs so 'di ni ming ngo zhes dngos po dang bcas par dmigs/_gang gi tshe
[\[315a.7\]]'di ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa [#]'di ni ming ngo zhes dngos po dang bcas par dmigs/_gang gi tshe 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar ro/_/'di ni ming ngo zhes 'du byed kyi mtshan ma nye bar bzung ste dngos po dang bcas par dmigs pa de'i tshe
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]ji ltar byang chub sems dpas gzugs ming tsam mo zhes bgyi bar [#]bslab par bgyi/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ming tsam zhes bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ming tsam zhes bgyi bar bslab par bgyi/_gal te dngos po ma mchis
[\[315b.2\]]pa [#]lags na de'i ming de yang ming tsam kho na zhes bgyi bar mi rung lags te/_gzugs zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de ni ming tsam kho na zhes bgyi bar mi rung lags so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
[\[315b.3\]]zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa 'di yang ming tsam kho na zhes bgyi bar mi rung lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzugs zhes bgyi ba gang yin pa 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i
[\[315b.4\]]dngos po de dang der glo bur du ming du btags pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de [#]ni glo bur du ming du btags pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar gang yin pa 'di yang glo bur du ming du btags pa'o/_/byams pa gang las 'du
[\[315b.5\]]byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po des gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming der gzugs zhes bya bar yang dag par rtogs pa dang /_rab tu rtogs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig par 'gyur te/_byams pa rnam grangs des na gzugs zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[315b.6\]]rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di ni [#]'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang der glo bur du ming du btags pa yin par de ltar rig par bya'o/_/byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i [#]dngos po 'dir
[\[315b.7\]]'ga' zhig 'du shes sam/_nye bar btags pa'am ming ngam tha snyad dam/_mngon par shes par gyur pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang gzugs zhes bya ba gang yin pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar gang yin pa 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po der glo bur du ming du btags pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
[\[316a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags na ni gzugs zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa 'di dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa 'di dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i
[\[316a.3\]]bar du gang lags pa 'di [#]'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang nye bar bzung nas ming dang 'du shes dang btags pa dang /_rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du dmigs pa kho na lags sam/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[316a.4\]]chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po la gzugs zhes bya bar ming dang 'du shes dang /_'dogs pa dang /_rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa la/_byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_de gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid yin nam btags pa tsam du zad/_gsol pa/_
[\[316a.5\]]btags pa tsam du bas so/_/bcom ldan 'das btags pa tsam du bas lags so/_/byams pa'o na gzugs zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di [#]'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang nye bar bzung nas ming dang 'du shes dang 'dogs pa dang rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du dmigs
[\[316a.6\]]pa kho na'o [#]zhes de ltar sems/_byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid yin nam btags pa tsam du zad/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das btags pa tsam du bas [#]
[\[316a.7\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das btags pa [#]tsam du bas lags so/_/byams pa 'o na de ji ltar tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o zhes ji ltar de snyam du sems/_byams pas
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te gzugs ming dang 'du shes dang brda dang btags pa dang /_tha snyad tsam kho na lags la/_bcom ldan 'das gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ming dang 'du
[\[316b.2\]]shes dang brda dang btags pa dang tha snyad tsam kho na lags na/_de ltar na [#]ming dang 'du shes dang brda dang btags pa dang tha snyad tsam zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa 'di gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lags sam/_de ltar na ming dang 'du shes dang brda dang btags pa
[\[316b.3\]]dang tha snyad tsam zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa 'di tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid du dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa 'di [#]ji snyam du
[\[316b.4\]]sems/_gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming dang 'du shes dang brda dang btags pa dang /_tha snyad tsam kho na gang yin pa dang /_tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_'du shes zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang
[\[316b.5\]]'du shes dang brda dang btags pa dang tha snyad tsam kho na gang yin pa de la ci gang skye ba'am 'jig pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_byams pa'o na khyod 'di ji snyam du sems/_
[\[316b.6\]]gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa'o snyam du gang las sems par 'gyur/_byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci rnam pa thams cad du
[\[316b.7\]]mtshan nyid thams cad kyis gzugs ma mchis pa kho na lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das ci rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma mchis pa kho na lags sam/_
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis gzugs med do zhes nga mi smra'o/_/byams pa rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes
[\[317a.2\]]pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med do zhes nga mi smra'o/_/byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs ma mchis pa lags/_ji ltar na tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ma
[\[317a.3\]]mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa 'jig rten gyi brda dang tha snyad kyis gzugs yod kyi/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/byams pa 'jig rten gyi brda dang /_tha snyad kyis [#]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi
[\[317a.4\]]chos rnams kyi bar du yod kyi/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na don dam par dbyings 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te don dam par dbyings brjod du [#]ma
[\[317a.5\]]mchis pa lags na/_de ji ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la gzugs zhes bgyi bar glo bur du ming du 'dogs par 'gyur/_'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams [#]zhes
