[\[317a.6\]]bgyi ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du 'dogs par ji ltar 'gyur/_gal te don dam par ma mchis na ni 'o na brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings su yang ji ltar 'gyur te/_'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings zhes bgyir mi rung lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis
[\[317a.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_byams pa de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig_/byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems gang gi tshe brjod du med pa'i dbyings su shes rab 'jug pa de'i tshe 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la gzugs zhes bya ba dang /_tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]'du shes zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du btags pa 'di khyod kyis dmigs sam/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_byams pa rnam grangs 'dis 'du
[\[317b.2\]]byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang yin pa de brjod du med pa'i dbyings kyang ma yin la/_'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan pa yang ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/byams pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po der gzugs zhes bya ba dang /_tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[317b.3\]]'du shes zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar [#]du glo bur du ming du btags pa gang yin pa 'di brjod du med pa'i dbyings yin du zin na ni 'o na byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang yongs su mya
[\[317b.4\]]ngan las 'das par [#]'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/_/byams pa gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan yin du zin na ni 'o na mtshan ma de yang mi dmigs na/_ji ltar
[\[317b.5\]]brjod du med pa'i dbyings de rtogs par 'gyur ram/_byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma de las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan pa yang ma yin/_gang la gzugs zhes bya ba dang /_tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_'du shes zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[317b.6\]]rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du btags pa gang yin pa 'di las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' brjod du ma
[\[317b.7\]]mchis pa'i [#]dbyings dang 'brel par shes rab 'jug par gnas pa ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la gzugs zhes bgyi ba dang /_tshor ba zhes bgyi ba dang /_'du shes zhes bgyi ba dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bgyi ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du btags pa de [#]mi dmigs na/_bcom ldan 'das ci mchis pa mi dmigs lags sam/_'on te ma mchis pa mi dmigs pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la
[\[318a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_byams pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de ni yod pa nyid dam med pa nyid gang yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byams pa gang gi tshe khyod 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la rnam par rtog pa de'i tshe 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de mngon par rtogs [#]pa rnams kyis gzung [#]bar
[\[318a.3\]]'gyur ram/_gang gi tshe brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang 'brel par shes rab 'jug par gnas te/_rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe rnam par mi rtog par bzung bar 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das de lta [#]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa de ltar yin na 'di lta ste/_'du
[\[318a.4\]]byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang du gzugs zhes bya ba dang /_tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_'du shes zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du btags pa gang yin pa de rnam par rtog
[\[318a.5\]]pa tsam du zad dam/_rnam par rtog pa tsam nyid do/_/de de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas te/_rnam par rtog pa rnams dang 'brel par gyur pa na gzugs zhes bya ba dang /_tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_'du shes zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par
[\[318a.6\]]shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa gang yin pa de la yod pa gang yin gang yod pa ni dmigs par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das la byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi
[\[318a.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa la zhugs pas gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i brtags [#]pa rnam pa du zhig tu rtogs par bgyi/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]brtags pa rnam pa du zhig tu rtogs par bgyi ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos rab tu dbye ba la [#]mkhas pa la zhugs pas gzugs rab tu dbye ba la zhugs pa'i brtags pa rnam pa gsum
[\[318b.2\]]du rtogs par bya/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i brtags pa [#]rnam pa gsum du rtogs par bya ste/_'di lta ste/_'di dag ni kun du brtags pa'i gzugs so/_/'di dag ni rnam par brtags pa'i
[\[318b.3\]]gzugs so/_/'di dag ni chos nyid kyi gzugs so/_/'di lta ste/_'di dag ni kun du brtags pa'i tshor ba'o/_/'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i tshor ba'o/_/'di ni chos nyid kyi tshor ba'o/_/'di lta ste/_'di ni kun du brtags pa'i 'du shes so/_/'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i 'du shes so/_/
[\[318b.4\]]'di ni chos nyid kyi 'du shes so/_/'di lta ste/_'di ni kun du brtags pa'i 'du byed rnams so/_/'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i 'du byed rnams so/_/'di ni chos nyid kyi 'du byed rnams so/_/'di lta ste/_'di ni kun du brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o/_/'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i rnam par shes
[\[318b.5\]]pa'o/_/'di ni chos nyid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_'di dag ni kun du brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go/_/'di dag ni rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/_/'di dag ni chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes bya ba'o[#]/_/byams pas
[\[318b.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kun du brtags pa'i gzugs ni gang lags/_rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs ni gang lags/_chos nyid kyi gzugs ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kun du brtags pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_
[\[318b.7\]]kun du brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar ni gang lags/_rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams [#]ni gang lags/_chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa gang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]po de dang de la gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming dang 'du shes dang btags [#]pa dang tha snyad la brten nas gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su rtogs [#]pa 'di ni kun du brtags pa'i gzugs so/_/byams pa gang [#]'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_'du
[\[319a.2\]]shes zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang /_'du shes dang btags [#]pa dang /_tha snyad la brten nas/_tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dang /_'du shes kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_'du byed rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_rnam par
[\[319a.3\]]shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi [#]ngo bo nyid du yongs su rtog pa 'di ni kun du brtags pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'o/_/'di dag ni kun du brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go/_/'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i
[\[319a.4\]]dngos po de rnam par rtog pa tsam gyi [#]chos nyid la gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa la brten nas mngon par brjod do[#]/_/gang la 'di ni gzugs so zhes bya ba dang /_tshor ba'o zhes bya ba dang /_'du shes so zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams so zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas
[\[319a.5\]]kyi chos rnams kyi bar zhes bya ba'i ming dang 'du shes dang btags pa dang tha snyad gang yin pa 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs so/_/'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i tshor ba'o/_/'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i 'du shes so/_/'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i 'du byed rnams so/_/'di ni rnam par
[\[319a.6\]]brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o/_/'di dag ni rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_chos nyid dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_gang
[\[319a.7\]]kun du [#]brtags pa'i gzugs des rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang /_ther zug ther zug gi dus su ngo bo nyid med pa kho na dang /_chos bdag med pa dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni chos nyid kyi gzugs so/_/'di ni chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang /_
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'o/_/'di dag ni chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go/_/byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs gsum po 'di dag la rdzas su ma mchis par lta ba'i gzugs ni gang lags/_rdzas su ma mchis
[\[319b.2\]]pa [#]ni gang lags/_rdzas su ma mchis pa yang ma lags la rdzas su mchis pa yang ma lags shing don dam pas rab tu phye ba ni gang lags/_tshor ba gsum po 'di dag dang /_'du shes [#]gsum po 'di dag dang /_'du byed [#]gsum po 'di dag dang /_rnam par shes pa gsum po 'di dag
[\[319b.3\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du gsum po 'di dag las rdzas su ma mchis pa ni gang lags/_rdzas su mchis pa ni gang lags/_rdzas su ma mchis pa yang ma lags la rdzas su mchis pa yang ma lags shing don dam pas rab tu phye ba de dag ni gang lags/_bcom ldan
[\[319b.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa gang kun du brtags pa'i gzugs de ni rdzas su med par blta bar bya'o/_/rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa rdzas su yod pa'i phyir rdzas su yod par blta bar bya ste/_rang dbang du 'byung ba'i [#]phyir ni ma yin no/_/gang
[\[319b.5\]]chos nyid kyi gzugs de ni rdzas su med pa yang ma yin rdzas su yod pa yang ma yin zhing don dam pas rab tu phye bar blta bar bya'o/_/byams pa gang kun du brtags pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_gang [#]kun du brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
[\[319b.6\]]rnams kyi bar de dag ni rdzas su med par blta bar bya'o/_/gang rnam par brtags pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_gang rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bar de dag ni rnam par rtog pa [#]rdzas su yod pa'i phyir rdzas su yod
[\[319b.7\]]par blta bar bya ste/_rang dbang du gyur pa'i phyir ni ma yin no/_/byams pa gang chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_byams pa gang chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni rdzas su med pa yang ma yin la rdzas su yod pa
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]yang ma yin zhing don dam pas rab tu phye bar blta bar bya'o/_/byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_'du shes zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bya
[\[320a.2\]]ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la dgongs nas 'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas
[\[320a.3\]]pa'o/_/'di lta ste tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_'du shes zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[320a.4\]]byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_kun du brtags pa'i gzugs la rdzas su med pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs yin nam 'on te ma yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/de la gzugs zhes bya ba ming dang 'du shes dang btags pa dang tha snyad tsam gang yin pa de ci gzugs
[\[320a.5\]]yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so[#]/_/byams pa rnam grangs des kyang [#]kun brtags pa'i gzugs de gzugs kyang ma yin la gzugs ma yin pa yang ma yin te/_gang gzugs kyang ma yin la gzugs ma yin pa yang ma yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa ste/_ngas
[\[320a.6\]]'di la dgongs nas 'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya'o/_/byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang la brten nas gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming dang btags pa dang tha snyad du gyur pa rnam par brtags pa'i
[\[320a.7\]]gzugs rdzas su yod pa nyid gang yin pa de ci ga [#]gzugs ma yin pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/byams pa 'di ji snyam du [#]sems/_rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs de nyid la kun du brtags pa'i gzugs des de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin zhing de'i mtshan nyid
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]ma yin pa gang yin pa de gzugs yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar gang rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs de yang gzugs kyang ma yin la gzugs ma yin pa yang ma yin te/_gang gzugs kyang ma yin la gzugs ma yin [#]pa
[\[320b.2\]]yang ma yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa ste/_ngas [#]de la dgongs nas 'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya'o/_/byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang chos nyid kyi gzugs bdag med pas rab tu phye ba'i gzugs de ci gang
[\[320b.3\]]gzugs yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/chos nyid kyi gzugs de nyid gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang chos nyid kyi gzugs gang yin pa de yang
[\[320b.4\]]gzugs kyang ma yin la gzugs ma yin pa yang ma yin te/_gang gzugs kyang ma yin la gzugs ma yin pa yang ma yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa ste/_ngas de la dgongs nas 'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes
[\[320b.5\]]dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/_/byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ltar gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas
[\[320b.6\]]shing de ltar tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi [#]chos rnams kyi bar dag la gnyis su ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas pa mtha' gnyis spangs nas dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pas yongs su shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta [#]bu/_spong
[\[320b.7\]]ba'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu/_mngon sum du bgyid pa'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu/_sgom pa'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bur lta [#]bar bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mtha' gnyis spangs nas 'di ltar dbu ma'i
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]lam la zhugs pas gang gzugs yongs su shes pa yang ma yin/_yongs su mi shes pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar
[\[321a.2\]]du yongs su shes pa yang ma yin/_yongs su ma [#]shes pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o/_/gang gzugs spong ba yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o/_/gang tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi
[\[321a.3\]]bar du spong ba yang ma yin mi spong ba yang [#]ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o/_/gang gzugs spong ba mngon sum du byed pa yang ma yin la mngon sum du mi byed pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i mngon sum du byed pa'o/_/gang gzugs spang ba'i phyir lam sgom pa yang ma yin mi sgom pa yang ma yin pa de
[\[321a.4\]]nyid de'i sgom pa'o/_/gang tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du [#]spang ba'i phyir lam sgom pa yang ma yin mi sgom pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i sgom pa'o/_/byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang
[\[321a.5\]]chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di [#]lta bu'i yongs su 'tshal ba dang /_spong ba dang /_mngon sum du bgyid pa dang /_sgam pa dang ldan pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
[\[321a.6\]]mya ngan las 'das pa ni zab po/_/mchog tu zab po/_/byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ltar zab pa dang mtshag tu zab pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa byang chub
[\[321a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yin/_mya ngan las ma 'das pa yang ma yin te/_de'i phyir zab pa dang mchog tu zab pa zhes bya'o/_/byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma lags/_mya ngan las ma 'das pa yang ma lags[#]/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa gzhan gyi don las brtsams te 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong bas mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yin no/_/bdag gi don las brtsams te
[\[321b.2\]]mya ngan las ma [#]'das pa yongs su mi gtong bas mya ngan las ma 'das pa yang ma yin no/_/byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi don las bsams [#]te 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong na/_de 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong bas ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa la [#]
[\[321b.3\]]yongs su gtong [#]bar mi 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi don las brtsams te/_mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong na 'dis [#]ji ltar 'khor ba yongs su gtang bar mi 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa 'di la
[\[321b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'khor ba la 'khor ba nyid du rnam par mi rtog mya ngan las 'das pa la yang [#]mya ngan las 'das pa nyid du rnam par mi rtog ste/_de de ltar rnam par mi rtog pas 'di lta ste/_'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa de dag mnyam pas mnyam par
[\[321b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de [#]'khor ba la 'khor ba nyid de [#]rnam par mi rtog pas 'khor ba las yid 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la mya ngan las 'das pa nyid du mi rtog pas mya ngan las 'das pa la yang yongs su mi rtog par rig par bya'o/_/byams
[\[321b.6\]]pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings pa [#]gnas pas 'khor ba ji ltar ma btang [#]ba de ltar blangs pa yang ma mchis shing mya ngan las 'das pa ji ltar ma btang [#]ba de ltar [#]blangs pa yang ma mchis par
[\[321b.7\]]mi 'gyur ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das gal te blangs pa ma mchis na ji ltar ma btang [#]ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa nga ni 'di ltar 'khor ba len to zhe'am mi len to zhes mi smra'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa len to zhe'am mi len to zhes mi smra'o/_/byams
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]pa 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la dmigs pa'i ye shes sems la dbang thob pas thabs la mkhas pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'khor ba bstan pa'i phyir
[\[322a.2\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong ba'o zhes nga smra'o/_/stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i dbyings la gnas pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong ba'o zhes nga smra'o/_/byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par mi rtog
[\[322a.3\]]pa'i mtshan nyid 'dus pa ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa gzugs gang yin pa dang /_tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_'du shes gang yin pa dang /_'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang /_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du gang
[\[322a.4\]]yin pa dang /_gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_chos de dag dang stong pa nyid de'i dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyis su med pa spros pa med pa gang
[\[322a.5\]]yin pa de ni/_byams pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'dus par blta'o/_/byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nyan thos thams cad gcig tu nges par gtan du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa de ni ma
[\[322a.6\]]yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byams pa 'jig rten 'di ni khams sna tshogs pa khams du ma ste/_khams sna tshogs can der 'byung ba ni sems can gyi rigs dang rang bzhin mang du dmigs te/_byams pa gang thog ma nyid nas bzang po'i bye brag don du gnyer ba ste/_bzang po'i bye brag nyid thob
[\[322a.7\]]par 'gyur ba yang yod/_gang thog ma nyid nas dman pa'i bye brag don du gnyer ba ste/_dman pa nyid thob pa de nyid kyis [#]chog par 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi rnam pa de lta bu yang yod/_gang thog ma nyid nas dman pa'i bye brag don du gnyer ba ste/_dman pa'i bye brag thob la [#]de tsam gyis chog par
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]mi 'dzin gyi de'i gong du bzang po'i bye brag tshol zhing bzang po thob [#]par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bye brag de lta bu yang yod do/_/byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi rigs kyi [#]rnam pa gsum po gang lags pa de dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
[\[322b.2\]]byang chub don du gnyer yang skye ba ma mchis pas ji ltar thob par 'gyur/_sgrub pa nyid de'i skye ba lags par ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa de'i skye ba ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis skye bar ni [#]nga mi smra'o/_/de'i skye ba
[\[322b.3\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang sprul pa dang yongs su bsgyur ba'o zhes nga 'dogs so/_/byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar thog ma nyid nas bzang po'i bye brag don du gnyer zhing bzang po'i bye brag nyid thob par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam pa rlabs po che dang /_che ba'i
[\[322b.4\]]lhag pa'i bsam pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa rlabs po che ni gang lags/_che ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams brgya byin nyid dang /_
[\[322b.5\]]'jig rten skyong [#]ba nyid dang /_'khor los sgyur ba nyid thams cad dang /_'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi de dag la ma chags shing mi 'dzin pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo [#]bar byed pa 'di ni byang chub
[\[322b.6\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa rlabs po che'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma chags pa'i bde ba dang /_'dzin pa med pa'i bde ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bya bar 'dod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
[\[322b.7\]]sngo [#]bar byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/_'khor ba yongs su mi gtong ba che ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/de nas [#]bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i [#]chos
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]rnams ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba rnams la slob par 'tshal bas/_bla na med
[\[323a.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi [#]lags so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis [#]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis te/_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ma mdzad/_rang sangs rgyas
[\[323a.3\]]dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_rgyun du zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/_de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/_gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang ma bgyis na chos de dag la 'di dag ni sems can
[\[323a.4\]]dmyal ba pa'o/_/'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o/_/'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o/_/'di ni lha'o/_/'di ni mi'o/_/las 'dis [#]ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten par 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni mir 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni rgyal chen bzhi'i
[\[323a.5\]]ris kyi lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal
[\[323a.6\]]dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge [#]dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams dang /_mi spong ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_legs mthong dang /_rab lta dang /_'og min gyi lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni nam
[\[323a.7\]]mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]rgyas su 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bar tha dad du dbye ba'am/_rnam par dgod pa [#]yang ji ltar 'gyur/_bcom ldan
[\[323b.2\]]'das dngos po ma mchis pa la ni bgyi ba gang yang ma mchis te/_bgyi ba gang gis sems can dmyal bar mchi ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba'am/_mir skye ba'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
[\[323b.3\]]lhar skye ba'am/_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin
[\[323b.4\]]med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /_mi spong ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_legs mthong dang /_rab lta dang /_'og min gyi lhar skye ba'am/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad [(]med
[\[323b.5\]]med [,]med [)]pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'am/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'am/_byang
[\[323b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam la spyod par 'gyur ba'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'am/_thob par gyur nas sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_
[\[323b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das [(]gyis [,]kyis [)#]tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_rab 'byor dngos po med pa la ni las kyang med/_bya ba yang med/_'bras bu yang med na/_'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo 'phags pa'i
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]chos la mi mkhas pa rnams kyis chos rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mi shes te/_phyin ci log las byung ba'i sems kyis las sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pas de dag gi lus rnam pa de bzhin du mngon par 'grub ste/_sems can dmyal ba'am/_byol song gi
[\[324a.2\]]skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/_mi'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_
[\[324a.3\]]'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /_mi spong ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_legs mthong dang /_rab lta dang /_'og min gyi lha 'am/_nam mkha'
[\[324a.4\]]mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha'i nang du lus mngon par 'grub ste/_dngos po med pa la ni las sam/_bya ba'am 'bras bu med de/_dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni
[\[324a.5\]]dngos po med pa nyid do/_/rab 'byor de la 'di skad du dngos po med pa la ni bya ba gang yang med de/_bya ba gang gis sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'am/_mir skye ba'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba'am/_
[\[324a.6\]]sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge
[\[324a.7\]]dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che dang /[# ]'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /_mi spong ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_legs mthong dang /_rab lta dang /_'og min gyi lhar skye ba'am/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha'
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi [#]lhar skye ba'am/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub
[\[324b.2\]]thob par 'gyur ba'am/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam la spyod pa'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'am/_de thob nas sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su sgrol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bya ba gang yang med do zhes zer ba ni/_rab 'byor de ji
[\[324b.3\]]snyam du sems/_lam dngos po med pa ma yin nam/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dngos po med pa ma yin nam/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dngos po med pa ma yin nam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
[\[324b.4\]]kyi bar du dngos po med pa ma yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub ni dngos po
[\[324b.5\]]ma mchis so[#]/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_dngos po med pa'i chos shig dngos po med pa'i chos thob par byed snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
[\[324b.6\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar na dngos po med pa gang yin pa dang /_lam gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin/_gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa/_mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/_'di ltar
[\[324b.7\]]mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/rab 'byor de la byang chub [#]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can phyin ci log bzhis phung po lnga la mngon par zhen pa/_mi rtag pa la rtag pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa/_sdug bsngal ba la bde ba'i 'du
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]shes su gyur pa/_bdag med pa la bdag tu [#]'du shes su gyur pa/_mi sdug pa la sdug pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa/_dngos po la mngon par zhen pa rnams dngos po las rnam par 'grel to zhes bya ba ni phyin ci log spangs pa la dgod pa'i phrin las yin no//_//rab
[\[325a.2\]]'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la dngos po'o zhes nas mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po de bzhin ma nor ba [#]de bzhin zhes bgyi ba ma mchis sam/_de ste ma mchis na ni mngon par 'du bgyid par yang ji ltar 'gyur/_sug las
[\[325a.3\]]des kyang shul [#]rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba na [#]ci ste mi 'grol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor phyin ci log ma gtogs [#]par gang la gnas na ste/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams las mngon par 'du byed pa'i dngos po ni chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam yang med do/_/rab
[\[325a.4\]]'byor de lta bas na ci nas kyang don 'di gsal zhing rdzogs pa dang /_mkhas pas [#]shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bshad do/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rmi lam du mthong ba la rmi lam mthong ba de gang la gnas shing 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yongs su spyod pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang
[\[325a.5\]]yang yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rmi lam nyid kyang ma mchis na rmi lam mthong ba de gang [#]la gnas shing /_'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yongs su spyod pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'jig
[\[325a.6\]]rten pa'am/_'jig [(]rtan [,]rten [)]las 'das pa'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa'am/_zag pa med pa'am/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la yang rmi lam dang 'dra ba ma yin pa de lta bu yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'am/_'jig rten las 'das
[\[325a.7\]]pa'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa'am/_zag pa ma mchis pa'am/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la [#]yang rmi lam lta bu ma lags pa de lta bu ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ci rmi lam lta bu [#]rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba yod dam/_gsol pa/
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rmi lam la lam [#]bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam sgom pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan
[\[325b.2\]]'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ni dngos po ma mchis pa ste/_brjod pa dang /_tshig dang /_sgra dang /_yi ge thams cad kyis gdags su ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_me long la gzugs brnyan snang ba de la
[\[325b.3\]]gang las mngon par 'du byed cing mngon par 'dus byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'am/_mi dang lhar 'gro ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom
[\[325b.4\]]ldan 'das de ni gzhan du na byis pa rnams slu [#]ba ma gtogs par dngos po ma mchis pa ste/_gzugs brnyan nyid kyang ma mchis na/_gang mngon par 'du bgyid cing mngon par 'du bgyis pas sems can dmyal bar mchi ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig
[\[325b.5\]]rten du mchi ba'am/_mi dang lhar gyur pa'i sug las lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de [#]ji snyam du sems/_de la lam bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
[\[325b.6\]]lam sgom pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzugs brnyan nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis na/_lam bsgoms [#]pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam sgom pa lta smos kyang ci
[\[325b.7\]]'tshal te ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_nags stug po dang /_ri dang /_gcong rong dang /_lung pa nas sgra brnyan byung na sgra brnyan de las mngon par 'du byed cing mngon par 'du byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'am/_byol
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'am/_lha dang mir gyur pa [#]de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sgra brnyan de nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis na/_de la gang sug
[\[326a.2\]]las mngon par 'du bgyid cing mngon par 'du bgyis na sems can dmyal bar mchi ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba'am/_lha dang mir skye ba'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_
[\[326a.3\]]dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes
[\[326a.4\]]dang /_'bras bu che dang /[# ]'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /_mi spong ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_legs mthong dang /_rab lta dang /_'og min gyi lhar skye ba'am/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes
[\[326a.5\]]med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgra brnyan gyi [#]lam gang la bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de
[\[326a.6\]]lta bu'i lam [#]sgom pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das sgra brnyan nyid kyang shin tu ma mchis pa lags na/_lam gang bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i lam sgom pa lta smos
[\[326a.7\]]kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_smig rgyu la chu med par chur 'du shes su gyur pa dang /_chu klung med par chu klung gi 'du shes su gyur pa dang /_grong khyer med par grong khyer gyi 'du shes su gyur pa dang /_skyed mos
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]tshal med par skyed mos tshal gyi 'du shes su gyur pa de la 'du shes kyi lam gang mngon par 'du byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'am/_mir skye ba'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba'am/_
[\[326b.2\]]sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge
[\[326b.3\]]dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /_mi spong ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_legs mthong dang /_rab lta dang /_'og min gyi lhar skye ba'am/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas
[\[326b.4\]]skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye ba de lta bu yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das smig rgyu la 'du shes phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang /_mig gis log par mthong ba ma gtogs par chu klung dang /_grong khyer dang /_skyed
[\[326b.5\]]mos tshal shin tu ma mchis na sug las gang mngon par 'du bgyis pas/_sems can dmyal bar mchi ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba'am/_mir skye ba'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral
[\[326b.6\]]dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_
[\[326b.7\]]bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /_mi spang [#]ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_legs mthong dang /_rab lta dang /_'og min gyi lhar skye ba'am/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_phyin ci log gi 'du shes de la lam gang bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par
[\[327a.2\]]yang mi 'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam sgom pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log gi 'du shes de nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags na/_lam gang bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi
[\[327a.3\]]'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i lam sgom pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma sna tshogs glang po'i tshogs sam/_rta'i tshogs sam/_glang gi tshogs sam/_dpung
[\[327a.4\]]bu chung gi tshogs sam/_bud med kyi gzugs sam/_skyes pa'i gzugs mngon par sprul nas/_sgyu ma de la gang mngon par 'du byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'am/_mir skye ba'am/_rgyal
[\[327a.5\]]chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal
[\[327a.6\]]dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che dang /[# ]'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /_mi spong ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_legs mthong dang /_rab lta dang /_'og min gyi lhar skye ba'am[#]/_nam mkha' mtha' yas
[\[327a.7\]]skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_sgyu ma de gang la gnas te sug las de [#]gang mngon
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]par 'du bgyid pa dang /_sug las gang mngon par 'du bgyis pas/_sems can dmyal bar mchi ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba'am/_mir skye ba'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_
[\[327b.2\]]dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_
[\[327b.3\]]bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /_mi spong ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_legs mthong dang /_rab lta dang /_'og min gyi lhar skye ba'am/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye
[\[327b.4\]]mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ba ni skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma la gang lam bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/_rnam
[\[327b.5\]]par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam sgom [#]pa gang yang yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos la nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' [#]stsal pa/_rab
[\[327b.6\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa mdzad na/_sprul pa de las gang mngon par 'du byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/_mir skye ba 'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba'am/_
[\[327b.7\]]sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /_mi spong ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_legs mthong dang /_rab lta dang /_'og min gyi lhar skye ba'am/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam
[\[328a.2\]]shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi [#]lhar skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das sprul pa de la dngos po ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis
[\[328a.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sprul pa de la lam gang bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang [#]mi 'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam sgom [#]pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab
[\[328a.4\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/_de la gang la la zhig kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ci ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par
[\[328a.5\]]byang bar 'gyur ba gang yang med pa de bzhin du kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag dang bdag gir bya ba la gnas shing sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur gyi/_yang dag pa mthong ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par
[\[328a.6\]]byang bar 'gyur ba med do/_/ji ltar yang dag pa mthong ba la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba med pa de bzhin du kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med do zhes bya ba ni phyin ci log bzhi [#]med pa spang ba'i 'du [#]shes la rab tu dgod pa'i phrin las yin no//_//de nas
[\[328a.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par mthong ba la kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du yang dag par ma mthong ba la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]byang bar 'gyur ba ma mchis te/_de ni chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid pas bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis
[\[328b.2\]]te/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par byang bar gsungs pa ste ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni ngas
[\[328b.3\]]rnam par byang bar gsungs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi
[\[328b.4\]]gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung [#]/_de bzhin du gnas pa'i chos kyi gnas nyid dang dbyings 'di lta ste/_chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba 'di ni rab 'byor rnam par byang
[\[328b.5\]]ba ste/_de ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis brjod kyi/_de ni brjod du med cing smos su med pa yin te/_sgra dang tshig thams cad kyi lam las 'das pa'i chos so zhes bya ba ni rnam par byang ba la dgod pa'i phrin las yin no//_//gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rmi lam
[\[328b.6\]]lta bu/_sgra brnyan lta bu/_mig yor lta bu/_smig rgyu lta bu/_sgyu ma lta bu/_sprul pa lta bu lags na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_chos thams
[\[328b.7\]]cad sprul pa lta bu ste/_dngos po ma mchis pa rdzas ma mchis pa la bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/phyi stong
[\[329a.2\]]pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag
[\[329a.3\]]bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
[\[329a.4\]]'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag
[\[329a.5\]]par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /[# ]snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/'od chen po yongs
[\[329a.6\]]su rdzogs par bya'o[#]/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su [#]shes par bya ste[#]/_dbyangs gcig gis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bgyi bar bla na med pa yang dag par
[\[329a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gang khyod kyis brjod pa'i chos de dag rmi lam lta bu dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu yin no/_/
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag rmi lam lta bu dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /[# ]sprul pa lta bu lags na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/_bcom ldan
[\[329b.2\]]'das rmi lam ni yang dag pa ma lags/_sgra brnyan dang /_mig yor dang /_smig rgyu dang /_sgyu ma dang /_sprul pa ni yang dag pa ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa ma lags pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha
[\[329b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyad pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la
[\[329b.4\]]spyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon
[\[329b.5\]]par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyad pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
[\[329b.6\]]par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_yang dag pa ma yin pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[329b.7\]]dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyad pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa [#]nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[330a.2\]]gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu [#]dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyad pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
[\[330a.3\]]par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par [#]'tshang rgya'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du
[\[330a.4\]]sems/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/_stong
[\[330a.5\]]pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_
[\[330a.6\]]mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/_de bzhin gshegs
[\[330a.7\]]pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]de ni ma lags so//_//bam po bdun cu bzhi pa ste tha ma'o[#]/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/tshul khrims kyi
[\[330b.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/nang stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag
[\[330b.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par [#]'tshang mi rgya'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
[\[330b.4\]]rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
[\[330b.5\]]'tshang mi rgya'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon
[\[330b.6\]]pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa
[\[330b.7\]]rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos 'di dag thams cad kyang 'dus byas pa/_mngon par
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]'dus byas pa ste/_'dus byas pa dang /_mngon par 'dus byas pa'i chos kyis [#]ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so/_/rab 'byor 'on kyang chos de dag ni thams cad kyang lam bsgrubs [#]pa dang /_lam bskyed pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba ste/_'bras bu thob pa'i
[\[331a.2\]]phyir na [#]ma yin no/_/chos de dag gi mi skye ba dang /_mi 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni mtshan nyid med pa yang yin te/_de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[331a.3\]]pa'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ram/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nam/_'phags
[\[331a.4\]]pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad med pa rnams sam/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa brgyad dam/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa
[\[331a.5\]]med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/_mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_byams pa chen po'am/_snying rje chen po'am/_sangs
[\[331a.6\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_dge ba'i chos gang dang gang brtsams [#(]yang [,]kyang [)]de thams cad sgyu ma lta bu zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam
[\[331a.7\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams [#]dang /_rnam par thar pa [#]dang /_mthar gyis [#]gnas pa'i
[\[331b.2\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_
[\[331b.3\]]byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag yongs su rdzogs par ma [#]byas pa dang /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par ma
[\[331b.4\]]byas pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba ni gnas med do/_/de'i phyir de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing dge ba'i chos
[\[331b.5\]]gang dang gang brtsams [#]pa de thams cad rmi lam lta bur shes so/_/sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur shes so/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[331b.6\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
[\[331b.7\]]pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_snying rje
[\[332a.2\]]chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rmi lam lta bur shes so/_/sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_smig [#]rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur shes so/_/sems can de dag thams cad kyang rmi lam la spyod do
[\[332a.3\]]zhes bya bar shes so/_/sgra brnyan dang /_mig yor dang /_smig rgyu dang /_sgyu ma dang /_sprul pa la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rmi lam lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin te/_de ltar bzung
[\[332a.4\]]zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin te/_de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
[\[332a.5\]]nyid thob par byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang bzung du med do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang bzung du med do/_/nang
[\[332a.6\]]stong pa nyid kyang bzung du med do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yang bzung du med do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang bzung du
[\[332a.7\]]med do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang [#]bzung du med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang bzung du med do/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[332b.2\]]dpa' chen po chos thams cad bzung du med par shes par byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad ni bzung du med cing dngos po med pa ste/_rmi lam lta bu dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_
[\[332b.3\]]sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu ste/_sems can rnams kyis chos de dag ma shes ma mthong ma rtogs [#]par bzung du med pa'i [#]chos gang yang 'thob par mi nus pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang
[\[332b.4\]]dag par 'jug ste/_de sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_sbyin pa gang ci gtong yang sems can thams cad kyi don du gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims gang ci srung [#]ba dang /_bzod pa gang ci sgom pa dang /_brtson 'grus gang ci rtsom pa dang /_bsam gtan gang ci la mnyam par gzhog pa dang /_shes
[\[332b.5\]]rab gang ci sgom yang sems can thams cad kyi don du sgom ste/_bdag gi don du ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi 'jug ste/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[332b.6\]]sems can gang sems can med pa la sems can gyi 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_bdag med pa la bdag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_srog med pa la srog gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_'gro ba med pa la 'gro ba'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_gso ba med pa la gso ba'i 'du shes su gnas
[\[332b.7\]]pa dang /_skyes bu med pa la skyes bu'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_gang zag med pa la gang zag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_shed can med pa la shed can gyi 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_shed bdag med pa la shed bdag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_byed pa po med pa la byed pa po'i 'du
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]shes su gnas pa dang /_byed du 'jug pa po med pa la byed du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_slong ba po med pa la slong ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_slong du 'jug pa po med pa la slong du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_tshor ba po
[\[333a.2\]]med pa la tshor ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_tshor du 'jug pa po med pa la tshor du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang /_shes pa po med pa la shes pa po'i 'du shes su gnas [#]pa dang /_mthong ba po med pa la mthong ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa de dag phyin ci log las rnam par 'grol te [#]phyin
[\[333a.3\]]ci log las rnam par bkrol zhing /_'chi ba med pa'i dbyings su 'god do/_/de la bkod nas rgyu ba 'di dag yongs su mi rgyu ste/_bdag gi 'du shes sam/_sems can gyi 'du shes sam/_srog gi 'du shes sam/_'gro ba'i 'du shes sam/_gso [#]ba'i 'du shes sam/_skyes bu'i 'du shes sam/_gang
[\[333a.4\]]zag gi 'du shes sam/_shed can gyi 'du shes sam/_shed bdag gi 'du shes sam/_byed pa po'i 'du shes sam/_byed du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/_slong ba po'i 'du shes sam/_slong du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/_tshor ba po'i 'du shes sam/_tshor du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes
[\[333a.5\]]sam/_shes pa po'i 'du shes sam/_mthong ba po'i 'du shes sam/[# ]mthong ba po'i 'du shes yongs su mi rgyu ste/_de g.yo ba dang /_rlom sems dang 'bar ba dang spros pa 'di dag btang nas spros pa med pa'i sems kyis nye bar bsgrubs shing mang du spyad pa [#]spyod de/_rab 'byor rnam grangs
[\[333a.6\]]des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag nyid kyang chos gang la yang mngon par zhen pa med la/_sems can thams cad kyang mngon par zhen pa med pa la rab tu 'god de/_de ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi don dam par ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_
[\[333a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas sam/_ma lags kyi don dam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]chos 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod pa ste/_de la chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba de lta bu gang yang mi dmigs te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon
[\[333b.2\]]par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa ste/_gnyis kyis ni gang yang thob pa'am mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ste gnyis kyis thob pa dang mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis na gnyis su ma mchis pas thob pa dang /_mngon par
[\[333b.3\]]rtogs par 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnyis kyis kyang thob pa dang /_mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med/_gnyis su med pas kyang thob pa dang mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med de[#]/_gang la gnyis kyang med la mi gnyis pa yang med pa ni thob pa dang mngon par rtogs
[\[333b.4\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 'di ni thob pa'o/_/[#]'di ni mngon par rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa ste/_chos mnyam pa nyid la spros pa med de/_spros pa med pa ni chos [#]mnyam pa nyid do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rnams la chos mnyam pa nyid
[\[333b.5\]]ces bgyi ba yang gang zhig mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang la dngos po med pa dang /_dngos po med pa yang ma yin pa dang /_ngo bo nyid [#]med pa dang /_yongs su brjod du med pa 'di ni chos mnyam pa nyid de/_chos mnyam pa nyid [#]de ni brjod du med pa'o/_/chos mnyam pa nyid ma gtogs
[\[333b.6\]]par yang dmigs par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang med de/_chos mnyam pa nyid ni chos thams cad las rnam par 'das pa'o/_/chos mnyam pa nyid ni byis pa'am/_'phags pa'am/_chos gang gis kyang shes par [#]mi rung zhing yul ma yin pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos mnyam pa
[\[333b.7\]]nyid do [#]de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yang ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos mnyam pa nyid ni 'phags pa thams cad kyi yul ma yin te/_rgyun du zhugs pa'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'am/_dgra bcom pa'am/_rang byang chub bam/
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' bsgyur [#]ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[334a.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te chos [#]mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gzhan zhig yin na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga'
[\[334a.3\]]bsgyur [#]bar yang 'gyur na/_rab 'byor so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang /_chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dang /_brgyad pa rnams dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa
[\[334a.4\]]rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi [#]chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/_mnyam pa nyid dang mi mnyam pa nyid la bye brag gang yang med do/_/de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi [#]mnyam pa nyid gang
[\[334a.5\]]yin pa dang /_'phags pa [#]thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/_mnyam pa nyid gcig pa la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o/_/'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'o/_/_
[\[334a.6\]]'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar gnyis su bya ba med de/_rnam par rtog pa de dag ni mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ste chos thams cad [#]mnyam pa nyid la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o/_/[#]'di ni rgyun du
[\[334a.7\]]zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi ba'i rnam par rtog pa de dag mi dmigs so/_/des
[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]so so'i skye bo rnams dang /_dad pas rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_brgyad pa rnams dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems
[\[334b.2\]]dpa' rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khyad par ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang /_dad pas rjes
[\[334b.3\]]su 'brang ba rnams dang /_chos kyis [#]rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_brgyad pa rnams dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_de bzhin
[\[334b.4\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyad par med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ste chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang /_dad pas rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_chos kyis [#]rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_brgyad pa
[\[334b.5\]]rnams dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
[\[334b.6\]]la khyad par ma mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /_chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog dang /_dkon mchog gsum po de dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du
[\[334b.7\]]sems/_sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/_dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la/_chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal
[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]ba ltar na sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/_dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags kyi/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dkon mchog gang lags pa dang /_chos dkon mchog
[\[335a.2\]]gang lags pa dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog gang lags pa de nyid chos mnyam pa nyid de/_chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma lags/_mi ldan pa yang ma lags/_gzugs ma mchis pa/_bstan du ma mchis pa/_thogs pa ma mchis pa/_mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan
[\[335a.3\]]nyid ma mchis pa'o/_/de ltar chos rnams mtshan nyid ma mchis pa [#]'di ni so so'i skye bo'o/_/'di ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'o/_/'di ni chos kyis [#]rjes su 'brang ba'o/_/'di ni brgyad pa'o/_/'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang
[\[335a.4\]]sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes rnam par 'god par bgyi ba de ni bcom ldan 'das [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]yul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_mtshan
[\[335a.5\]]nyid med pa'i chos rnams rnam par dgod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_de ste de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la mngon par
[\[335a.6\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir chos rnam par dgod par mdzad na/_sems can dmyal ba yod par mngon nam/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_mi yod par mngon nam/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam/_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_
[\[335a.7\]]dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod
[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /_mi spong ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_legs mthong dang /_rab lta dang /_'og min gyi lha yod par mngon nam/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_
[\[335b.2\]]'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu
[\[335b.3\]]phyin pa yod par mngon nam/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yod par mngon nam/_nang stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod par mngon nam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs
[\[335b.4\]]dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod par mngon nam/_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa
[\[335b.5\]]nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod par mngon nam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa [#]dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas
[\[335b.6\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod par mngon nam/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yod par mngon nam/_sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /_chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/_nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas
[\[335b.7\]]kyi theg pa dang /_theg pa chen po yod par mngon nam/_dad pas [#]rjes su 'brang ba dang /_chos kyis [#]rjes su 'brang ba dang /_brgyad pa yod par mngon nam/_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems
[\[336a\]]
[\[336a.1\]]dpa' dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos de dag thams cad ni ma [#]mchis par mngon par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor
[\[336a.2\]]de lta bas na de ltar chos mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/_chos rnams rnam par dgod par mdzad pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu'i byed pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba de bzhin du so so'i [#]skye bo rnams kyang chos mnyam
[\[336a.3\]]pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/_de bzhin du dad pas [#]rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_chos kyis [#]rjes su 'brang ba [#]dang /_brgyad pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang [#]/_
[\[336a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' yang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo'o/_chos mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da'o/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir
[\[336a.5\]]zhe na/_de na 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /[# ]chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag
[\[336a.6\]]pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de nyid ni so so'i skye bo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/_de nyid ni dad pas [#]rjes su 'brang ba
[\[336a.7\]]rnams dang /_chos kyis [#]rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_brgyad pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[336b\]]
[\[336b.1\]]ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa [#]de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings nyid dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/_de dag thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid de/_de las rnam par mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag ni chos nyid
[\[336b.2\]]dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de bzhin nyid yin te/_de dag las chos mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba [#]gang yang med do zhes bya ba ni rnam par byang
