[\[336b.3\]]ba'i tshogs la dgod pa'i phrin las yin no//_//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa de nyid dad pas [#]rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_chos kyis [#]rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_brgyad pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams
[\[336b.4\]]dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang [#]/_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi
[\[336b.5\]]chos mnyam pa nyid lags na/_bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos 'di lta ste/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang [#]/_rnam par shes pa dang /_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti
[\[336b.6\]]mug dang /_lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam
[\[336b.7\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_
[\[337a\]]
[\[337a.1\]]yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa'i
[\[337a.2\]]sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs
[\[337a.3\]]kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi [#]chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad
[\[337a.4\]]bzang po brgyad cu dang /_'dus byas kyi khams dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams te/_bcom ldan 'das chos de dag ni kun kyang gcig dang gcig tu mi 'dra ba gcig las gcig 'das pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_tshor ba dang /_
[\[337a.5\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams [#]dang /_rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_'dod chags kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_zhe sdang gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_gti mug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_lta ba'i
[\[337a.6\]]rnam pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid
[\[337a.7\]]kyang gzhan/_nang stong pa nyid kyi chos [#]nyid kyang gzhan/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_
[\[337b\]]
[\[337b.1\]]byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams [#]dang /_mthar
[\[337b.2\]]gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa
[\[337b.3\]]rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_'dus byas
[\[337b.4\]]kyi khams dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar [#]mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi chos nyid mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur ba lags/_chos rnam par dgod pa ni ji ltar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
[\[337b.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gang la gnas shing chos rnams tha dad du bgyid pa lags/_chos rnams tha dad du ma bgyis par ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi nus na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
[\[337b.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sa nas sar 'phar zhing skyon med par 'jug pa lags/_ji ltar skyon med par zhugs nas nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/_mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar mngon par
[\[337b.7\]]shes pas rnam par rtse [#]zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
[\[338a\]]
[\[338a.1\]]su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang /_de dag la rnam par rtse [#]bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba lags/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lags/_de dag tu yang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lags/_dge ba'i
[\[338a.2\]]rtsa ba des sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang 'di skad du de ste chos thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam
[\[338a.3\]]pa nyid de/_de nyid dad pas [#]rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_chos kyis [#]rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_brgyad pa rnams dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub
[\[338a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid yin na/_mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ji ltar gcig par 'gyur zhes zer ba 'di [#]rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[338a.5\]]gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid

[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_

[\[338b.3\]]dag par rig pa rnams dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
[\[338b.4\]]bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi [#]chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i
[\[338b.5\]]chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'o na stong pa nyid la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams [#]dang /_rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/_skye
[\[338b.6\]]mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dam/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_

[\[339a\]]
[\[339a.1\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms [#]par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge

[\[339a.5\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar [#]rnam grangs des 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la [#]yang so so'i skye bo med/_so so'i skye bo las gud na yang de med/_de la yang dad pas [#]rjes su 'brang ba med/_dad pas [#]

[\[339b.1\]]sangs rgyas las gud na yang de med/_de la yang byang chub sems dpa' [#]med/_byang chub sems dpa' las gud [#]na yang de med/_de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa med/_de bzhin gshegs pa las gud na yang de med par rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_chos nyid de 'dus bgyis

[\[339b.6\]]las kyang mi g.yo la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang byed do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa ste/_de'i slad du chos gang la yang gang ci yang bgyid pa
[\[339b.7\]]ma mchis na/_de ltar chos thams cad ci yang bgyid pa ma mchis shing ci yang ma lags pa la/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_don dam pa las kyang mi g.yo la sbyin pa dang tshig snyan pa dang /_don bgyi ba
[\[340a\]]
[\[340a.1\]]dang /_don mthun pas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/_stong pa nyid gang yin pa de [#]ni gang la yang ci yang
[\[340a.2\]]byed pa med ci yang mi byed pa yang med de/_gal te sems can 'di dag bdag cag nyid kyis [#]stong pa nyid shes na ni de ltar stong pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/_sems can rnams kyang bdag gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing bdag gi 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las
[\[340a.3\]]'grel pa dang /_sems can gyi 'du shes dang /_srog gi 'du shes dang /_'gro ba'i 'du shes dang /_gso ba'i 'du shes dang /_skyes bu'i 'du shes dang /_gang zag gi 'du shes dang /_shed can gyi 'du shes dang /_shed bdag gi 'du shes dang /_byed pa po'i 'du shes dang /_
[\[340a.4\]]tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang /[# ]shes pa po'i 'du shes dang /_mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral [#]nas stong pa nyid

[\[340a.6\]]'brel par 'byung ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing rten cing [#]'brel par 'byung ba'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang bral nas 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings
[\[340a.7\]]stong pa yin yang 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings su 'god pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthur mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas tha mi dad par yongs su shes pa la 'god pa'i phrin las yin no//_//gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de cis stong pa lags/_
[\[340b\]]
[\[340b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'du shes thams cad kyis stong ste/_rab 'byor la la zhig gis sprul pa zhig sprul na/_de la gang stong pa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/_
[\[340b.2\]]sprul pa de la gang stong pa nyid ma lags pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang ma mchis te/_stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang /_sprul pa gang lags pa'i chos de gnyis ka [#]ldan pa yang ma lags/_mi ldan pa yang ma lags te/_de gnyis ga yang stong pa nyid kyis [#]stong na de ci'i
[\[340b.3\]]slad du 'di ni stong pa nyid do/_/'di ni sprul pa'o zhes bgyi bar rnam par bcab par mdzad/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid dang /_sprul pa gnyis ka yang stong pa nyid la dmigs su ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor
[\[340b.4\]]gzugs sam/_tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed rnams sam[#]/_rnam par shes pa gang sprul pa ma yin pa de lta bu yod dam/_gang sprul pa de ni stong pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te 'jig rten pa'i chos sprul pa lags kyang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
[\[340b.5\]]chos 'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_
[\[340b.6\]]'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs

[\[341a\]]
[\[341a.1\]]bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes gang zag rnam par dgod pa'i chos 'di dag [#]kyang sprul pa lta bu lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor

[\[341a.3\]]rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad sprul pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang spangs pa zhes bgyi ba rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi
[\[341a.4\]]sa'am/_sangs rgyas kyi sa'am[#]/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyar [#]ba thams cad spangs [#]pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor skye ba'am/_'gag pa'i chos gang ci yang rung ste/_de thams cad sprul pa'o/_/gsol pa/_
[\[341a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das gang ma sprul pa'i chos de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos gang la skye ba yang med/_'gag pa yang med pa de ni ma sprul pa'o/_/gsol pa/_de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi mnyam pa'i rmongs pa med pa'i
[\[341a.6\]]chos can gyi mya ngan las 'das pa ste/_chos de ni ma sprul pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du stong pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/_gnyis su yang mi dmigs te/_chos gang yang stong pa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu med do zhes bka' stsal pa de ltar na/_bcom ldan 'das rmongs pa med pa'i
[\[341a.7\]]chos can yang sprul par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/_de dag ni nyan thos kyis ma byas/_rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/_
[\[341b\]]
[\[341b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma byas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma byas te/_ngo bo nyid kyi [#]stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[341b.2\]]las dang po pa'i gang zag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi na ji ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ci sngon dngos po yod par 'gyur [#]la phyis dngos po med par gyur pa yod dam/_
[\[341b.3\]]rab 'byor 'di la dngos po yod pa yang med/_dngos po med pa yang med/_ngo bo nyid kyang med/_gzhan gyi dngos po yang med na/_de la gang yongs su shes par bya ba'i [#]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba lta yod par 'gyur re skan zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das
[\[341b.4\]]pa la dgod pa'i phrin las yin te[#]/_'di dag gis ni phrin las rnams gsungs so/_/chos kyi sku'i mngon par rtogs pa bstan zin to/_/'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_mngon par rtogs pa'i
[\[341b.5\]]rgyan gyi rjes su 'brangs nas dag par gtugs pa las[#]/_chos kyi sku'i dbang du byas pa bslab pa'i 'bras bu'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
[\[341b.6\]]byams pa la sogs pa grangs med pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA [#]
[\[341b.7\]]ya na chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa re ba ta dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang /_'khor rnam pa bzhi dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis
[\[342a\]]
[\[342a.1\]]gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do//_//phun sum tshogs gnyis 'byung ba bde ba'i go 'phang [#]'jig rten rnams kyis thob bya'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das [#]thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs kyis gang zhig rab tu
[\[342a.2\]]gsal mdzad pa/_/ma lus chos kyi de nyid gnas gyur mdo 'di don du gnyer bas thos gyur nas/_/rang gi gnas su song la nyin dang mtshan du mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom [#]par gyis/_/lta ba mang pos kun du dkrugs [#]pas da ltar [#]rtsod pa'i dus 'dir klog
[\[342a.3\]]pa'ang shin tu nyung /_/glegs bam du ma'i tshig rnams mi mthun tha dad gyur pa mthong nas dad pas 'dir/_/rgol ba'i glang po'i dbang po khros pas 'ong ba'i klad 'gems seng ge bzang po bdag_/gang gis dag par gtugs pa 'jig rten don du mnyam par gzhag
[\[342a.4\]]pa mkhas [#]pas blang bar gyis/_/'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rjes su 'brangs nas dag par gtugs pa phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas [#]dang /_byang chub sems
[\[342a.5\]]dpa' thams cad dang /_'phags pa [#]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum/_chos kyi phyag rgya/_chos kyi snang ba/_chos kyi snying po/_/chos kyi rnga bo che/_chos rin po che mi zad pa'i gter/_chos rnams kyi mdzod/_chos
[\[342a.6\]]rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mig tu gyur pa/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas [#]pas phyag byas pa [#]bde ba thams cad kyi rgyud rdzogs so//_//bal yul yam bu'i bsod nams rgyun 'byung gi gtsug lag khang du paN+Di ta zhi ba bzang po dang /_
[\[342a.7\]]lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//[# ]//_
